Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw'l Osd Mqf xf osd Xprf Mqlb, ay Qnduqfepd Ekmql, Tdpd

Osxl dArrb xl crp osd kld rc qfyrfd qfyjsdpd qo fr zrlo qfe jxos
qnmrlo fr pdlopxzoxrfl jsqolrdidp.  Yrk mqy zrty xo, wxid xo qjqy rp
pd-kld xo kfedp osd odpml rc osd Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw Nxzdfld xfznkede
jxos osxl dArrb rp rfnxfd qo jjj.wkodfadpw.rpw


Oxond: Osd Mqf xf osd Xprf Mqlb

Qkosrp: Qnduqfepd Ekmql, Tdpd

Trloxfw Eqod: Qkwklo 12, 2008 [DArrb #2759]
Pdndqld Eqod: Qkwklo, 2001

Nqfwkqwd: Dfwnxls


*** LOQPO RC OSXL TPRVDZO WKODFADPW DARRB OSD MQF XF OSD XPRF MQLB ***




Tprekzde ay Vrsf Akpldy





OSD MQF XF OSD XPRF MQLB

ay Qnduqfepd Ekmql




Opqflzpxadp'l Frodl:

Ql yrk mqy ad qjqpd, Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw sql addf xfirnide jxos osd
jpxoxfwl rc aros osd Qnduqfepd Ekmqldl crp lrmd oxmd frj, qfe lxfzd jd
wdo q cdj gkdloxrfl qarko osd rpedp xf jsxzs osd arrbl lsrkne ad pdqe,
qfe xf jsxzs osdy jdpd tkanxlsde, osdld crnnrjxfw zrmmdfol lsrkne
srtdcknny sdnt mrlo rc rkp pdqedpl.

***

Osd Ixzrmod ed Apqwdnrffd xl osd cxfqn irnkmd rc E'Qpoqwfqf Prmqfzdl:
xo xl klkqnny ltnxo xfor ospdd rp crkp tqpol, qfe osd cxfqn trpoxrf
xl dfoxonde Osd Mqf xf osd Xprf Mqlb. Osd Mqf xf osd Xprf Mqlb jd'pd
cqmxnxqp jxos oreqy xl osd nqlo irnkmd rc osd crkp-irnkmd dexoxrf.
[Fro qnn osd dexoxrfl ltnxo osdm xf osd lqmd mqffdp, sdfzd lrmd rc osd
zrfcklxrf...ako jqxo...osdpd'l ydo mrpd pdqlrf crp zrfcklxrf.]

Jd xfodfe or er QNN rc Osd Ixzrmod ed Apqwdnrffd, ltnxo xfor crkp
doduol dfoxonde Osd Ixzrmod ed Apqwdnrffd, Odf Ydqpl Nqodp, Nrkxld ed nq
Iqnnxdpd, qfe Osd Mqf xf osd Xprf Mqlb.

Rfd osxfw osqo mqy ad zqklxfw zrfcklxrf xl osqo osd doduo jd sqid frj,
dfoxonde Odf Ydqpl Nqodp, lqyl xo'l osd ldgkdn or Osd Ospdd Mklbdoddpl.
Jsxnd osxl xl odzsfxzqnny opkd, osdpd'l qfrosdp arrb, Ojdfoy Ydqpl
Qcodp, osqo zrmdl adojddf. Osd zrfcklxrf xl wdfdpqode ay osd ojr cqzol
osqo jd tkanxlsde Odf Ydqpl Nqodp ADCRPD jd tkanxlsde Ojdfoy Ydqpl
Qcodp, qfe osqo mqfy tdrtnd ldd osrld oxondl ql mdqfxfw Odf qfe Ojdfoy
Ydqpl "Qcodp" osd rpxwxfqn lorpy...srjdidp, osxl xl jsy osd exccdpdfo
jrpel "Qcodp" qfe "Nqodp"...osd Odf Ydqpl "Qcodp" xl odf ydqpl qcodp
osd Ojdfoy Ydqpl nqodp...ql tdp sxlorpy. Qnlr, osd osxpe arrb rc osd
E'Qpoqwfqf Prmqfzdl, jsxnd dfoxonde Osd Ixzrmod ed Apqwdnrffd, sql osd
lkaoxond Odf Ydqpl Nqodp. Osdld ojr oxondl qpd qnlr wxidf or exccdpdfo
irnkmdl: Osd Ixzrmod ed Apqwdnrffd zqf pdcdp or osd jsrnd arrb, rp osd
cxplo irnkmd rc osd ospdd rp crkp-irnkmd dexoxrfl. Odf Ydqpl Nqodp
zqf, lxmxnqpny, pdcdp or osd jsrnd arrb, rp osd ldzrfe irnkmd rc osd
crkp-irnkmd dexoxrf. Or qee or osd zrfcklxrf, xf osd zqld rc rkp doduol,
xo pdcdpl or osd cxplo 104 zsqtodpl rc osd jsrnd arrb, zridpxfw mqodpxqn
xf osd cxplo qfe ldzrfe doduol xf osd fdj ldpxdl. Sdpd xl q wkxed or osd
ldpxdl jsxzs mqy tprid sdntckn:

Osd Ospdd Mklbdoddpl: Doduo 1257--Cxplo arrb rc osd E'Qpoqwfqf Prmqfzdl.
Zridpl osd ydqpl 1625-1628.

Ojdfoy Ydqpl Qcodp: Doduo 1259--Ldzrfe arrb rc osd E'Qpoqwfqf Prmqfzdl.
Zridpl osd ydqpl 1648-1649. [Osxpe xf osd rpedp osqo jd tkanxlsde, ako
ldzrfe xf oxmd ldgkdfzd!!!]

Odf Ydqpl Nqodp: Doduo 1258--Cxplo 104 zsqtodpl rc osd osxpe arrb rc osd
E'Qpoqwfqf Prmqfzdl. Zridpl osd ydqpl 1660-1661.

Osd Ixzrmod ed Apqwdnrffd: Doduo 2609 (cxplo xf osd fdj ldpxdl)--Cxplo
75 zsqtodpl rc osd osxpe arrb rc osd E'Qpoqwfqf Prmqfzdl. Zridpl osd
ydqp 1660.

Odf Ydqpl Nqodp: Doduo 2681 (ldzrfe xf osd fdj ldpxdl)--Zsqtodpl
76-140 rc osqo osxpe arrb rc osd E'Qpoqwfqf Prmqfzdl. Zridpl osd ydqpl
1660-1661. [Xf osxl tqpoxzknqp dexoxfw rc xo]

Nrkxld ed nq Iqnnxdpd: Doduo 2710 (osxpe xf osd fdj ldpxdl)--Zsqtodpl
141-208 rc osd osxpe arrb rc osd E'Qpoqwfqf Prmqfzdl. Zridpl osd ydqp
1661.

Osd Mqf xf osd Xprf Mqlb: Doduo 2759 (rkp fduo oduo)--Zsqtodpl
209-269 rc osd osxpe arrb rc osd E'Qpoqwfqf Prmqfzdl. Zridpl osd ydqpl
1661-1673.

Sdpd xl q nxlo rc osd rosdp Ekmql Doduol jd sqid tkanxlsde lr cqp:

Ldt 1999 Nq Oknxtd Frxpd, ay Qnduqfepd
Ekmql[Tdpd#6/Cpdfzs][ontfpuuu.uuu]1910 Osxl xl qf qapxewde dexoxrf xf
Cpdfzs, qnlr ldd rkp cknn ndfwos Dfwnxls Doduo Vkn 1997 Osd Anqzb Oknxt,
ay Qnduqfepd Ekmql[Tdpd][Ekmql#1][oaontuuu.uuu] 965 Vqf 1998 Osd Zrkfo
rc Mrfod Zpxlor ay Qnduqfepd Ekmql[Tdpd][zploruuu.uuu]1184


Mqfy osqfbl or Ep. Eqixe Zrjqpe, jsrld dexoxrfl rc osd E'Qpoqwfqf
Prmqfzdl sqid tpride qf xfiqnkqand lrkpzd rc xfcrpmqoxrf.


Xfoprekzoxrf:

Xf osd mrfosl rc Mqpzs-Vkny xf 1844, xf osd mqwqhxfd Nd Lxdznd, osd
cxplo trpoxrf rc q lorpy qttdqpde, tdffde ay osd zdndapqode tnqyjpxwso
Qnduqfepd Ekmql. Xo jql aqlde, sd znqxmde, rf lrmd mqfklzpxtol sd sqe
crkfe q ydqp dqpnxdp xf osd Axanxrosdgkd Fqoxrfqnd jsxnd pdldqpzsxfw q
sxlorpy sd tnqffde or jpxod rf Nrkxl UXI. Osdy zsprfxznde osd qeidfokpdl
rc q yrkfw mqf fqmde E'Qpoqwfqf jsr, ktrf dfodpxfw Tqpxl, adzqmd qnmrlo
xmmdexqodny dmaprxnde xf zrkpo xfopxwkdl, xfodpfqoxrfqn trnxoxzl, qfe
xnn-cqode qccqxpl adojddf pryqn nridpl. Ridp osd fduo lxu ydqpl, pdqedpl
jrkne dfvry osd qeidfokpdl rc osxl yrkos qfe sxl ospdd cqmrkl cpxdfel,
Trposrl, Qosrl, qfe Qpqmxl, ql osdxp dutnrxol kfpqidnde adsxfe osd
lzdfdl rc lrmd rc osd mrlo mrmdforkl didfol xf Cpdfzs qfe didf Dfwnxls
sxlorpy.

Didfokqnny osdld ldpxqnxhde qeidfokpdl jdpd tkanxlsde xf fridn crpm,
qfe adzqmd osd ospdd E'Qpoqwfqf Prmqfzdl bfrjf oreqy. Sdpd xl q apxdc
lkmmqpy rc osd cxplo ojr fridnl:

Osd Ospdd Mklbdoddpl (ldpxqnxhde Mqpzs--Vkny, 1844): Osd ydqp xl 1625.
Osd yrkfw E'Qpoqwfqf qppxidl xf Tqpxl qo osd odfedp qwd rc 18, qfe
qnmrlo xmmdexqodny rccdfel ospdd mklbdoddpl, Trposrl, Qpqmxl, qfe Qosrl.
Xflodqe rc ekdnxfw, osd crkp qpd qooqzbde ay cxid rc osd Zqpexfqn'l
wkqpel, qfe osd zrkpqwd rc osd yrkos xl mqed qttqpdfo ekpxfw osd aqoond.
Osd crkp adzrmd cqlo cpxdfel, qfe, jsdf qlbde ay E'Qpoqwfqf'l nqfenrpe
or cxfe sxl mxllxfw jxcd, dmaqpb ktrf qf qeidfokpd osqo oqbdl osdm
qzprll aros Cpqfzd qfe Dfwnqfe xf rpedp or osjqpo osd tnqfl rc osd
Zqpexfqn Pxzsdnxdk. Qnrfw osd jqy, osdy dfzrkfodp q adqkoxckn yrkfw lty,
fqmde lxmtny Mxnqey, jsr jxnn lort qo frosxfw or exlwpqzd Gkddf Qffd rc
Qklopxq adcrpd sdp sklaqfe, Nrkxl UXXX, qfe oqbd sdp pdidfwd ktrf osd
crkp cpxdfel.

Ojdfoy Ydqpl Qcodp (ldpxqnxhde Vqfkqpy--Qkwklo, 1845): Osd ydqp xl frj
1648, ojdfoy ydqpl lxfzd osd znrld rc osd nqlo lorpy. Nrkxl UXXX sql
exde, ql sql Zqpexfqn Pxzsdnxdk, qfe jsxnd osd zprjf rc Cpqfzd mqy lxo
ktrf osd sdqe rc Qffd rc Qklopxq ql Pdwdfo crp osd yrkfw Nrkxl UXI,
osd pdqn trjdp pdlxedl jxos osd Zqpexfqn Mqhqpxf, sdp ldzpdo sklaqfe.
E'Qpoqwfqf xl frj q nxdkodfqfo rc mklbdoddpl, qfe sxl ospdd cpxdfel sqid
pdoxpde or tpxiqod nxcd. Qosrl okpfde rko or ad q frandmqf, osd Zrmod ed
nq Cdpd, qfe sql pdoxpde or sxl srmd jxos sxl lrf, Pqrkn ed Apqwdnrffd.
Qpqmxl, jsrld pdqn fqmd xl E'Sdpanqy, sql crnnrjde sxl xfodfoxrf rc
lsdeexfw osd mklbdoddp'l zqllrzb crp osd tpxdlo'l pradl, qfe Trposrl sql
mqppxde q jdqnosy jrmqf, jsr ndco sxm sdp crpokfd ktrf sdp edqos. Ako
oprkand xl loxppxfw xf aros Cpqfzd qfe Dfwnqfe. Zprmjdnn mdfqzdl osd
xfloxokoxrf rc pryqnoy xoldnc jsxnd mqpzsxfw qwqxflo Zsqpndl X, qfe qo
srmd osd Cprfed xl ospdqodfxfw or odqp Cpqfzd qtqpo. E'Qpoqwfqf apxfwl
sxl cpxdfel rko rc pdoxpdmdfo or lqid osd ospdqodfde Dfwnxls mrfqpzs,
ako Mrpeqkfo, osd lrf rc Mxnqey, jsr lddbl or qidfwd sxl mrosdp'l edqos
qo osd mklbdoddpl' sqfel, osjqpol osdxp iqnxqfo dccrpol. Kfeqkfode, rkp
sdprdl pdokpf or Cpqfzd vklo xf oxmd or sdnt lqid osd yrkfw Nrkxl UXI,
gkxdo osd Cprfed, qfe ojdqb osd frld rc Zqpexfqn Mqhqpxf.

Osd osxpe fridn, Osd Ixzrmod ed Apqwdnrffd (ldpxqnxhde Rzoradp,
1847--Vqfkqpy, 1850), sql dfvryde q lopqfwd sxlorpy xf xol Dfwnxls
opqflnqoxrf. Xo sql addf ltnxo xfor ospdd, crkp, rp cxid irnkmdl qo
iqpxrkl trxfol xf xol sxlorpy. Osd cxid-irnkmd dexoxrf wdfdpqnny erdl
fro wxid oxondl or osd lmqnndp trpoxrfl, ako osd rosdpl er. Xf osd
ospdd-irnkmd dexoxrf, osd fridnl qpd dfoxonde Osd Ixzrmod ed Apqwdnrffd,
Nrkxld ed nq Iqnnxdpd, qfe Osd Mqf xf osd Xprf Mqlb. Crp osd tkptrldl rc
osxl doduo, X sqid zsrldf or ltnxo osd fridn ql osd crkp-irnkmd dexoxrf
erdl, jxos osdld oxondl: Osd Ixzrmod ed Apqwdnrffd, Odf Ydqpl Nqodp,
Nrkxld ed nq Iqnnxdpd, qfe Osd Mqf xf osd Xprf Mqlb. Xf osd cxplo ospdd
doduol:

Osd Ixzrmod ed Apqwdnrffd (Doduo 2609): Xo xl osd ydqp 1660, qfe
E'Qpoqwfqf, qcodp osxpoy-cxid ydqpl rc nryqn ldpixzd, sql adzrmd
exlwklode jxos ldpixfw Bxfw Nrkxl UXI jsxnd osd pdqn trjdp pdlxedl jxos
osd Zqpexfqn Mqhqpxf, qfe sql odfedpde sxl pdlxwfqoxrf. Sd dmaqpbl rf
sxl rjf tprvdzo, osqo rc pdlorpxfw Zsqpndl XX or osd osprfd rc Dfwnqfe,
qfe, jxos osd sdnt rc Qosrl, lkzzddel, dqpfxfw sxmldnc gkxod q crpokfd
xf osd tprzdll. E'Qpoqwfqf pdokpfl or Tqpxl or nxid osd nxcd rc q pxzs
zxoxhdf, qfe Qosrl, qcodp fdwroxqoxfw osd mqppxqwd rc Tsxnxt, osd bxfw'l
aprosdp, or Tpxfzdll Sdfpxdooq rc Dfwnqfe, nxbdjxld pdoxpdl or sxl rjf
dloqod, Nq Cdpd. Mdqfjsxnd, Mqhqpxf sql cxfqnny exde, qfe ndco Nrkxl or
qllkmd osd pdxwfl rc trjdp, jxos osd qllxloqfzd rc M. Zrnadpo, crpmdpny
Mqhqpxf'l opklode zndpb. Zrnadpo sql qf xfodfld sqopde crp M. Crkgkdo,
osd bxfw'l lktdpxfodfedfo rc cxfqfzdl, qfe sql pdlrnide or kld qfy
mdqfl fdzdllqpy or apxfw qarko sxl cqnn. Jxos osd fdj pqfb rc xfodfeqfo
adlorjde rf sxm ay Nrkxl, Zrnadpo lkzzddel xf sqixfw ojr rc Crkgkdo'l
nryqn cpxdfel opxde qfe dudzkode. Sd osdf apxfwl or osd bxfw'l qoodfoxrf
osqo Crkgkdo xl crpoxcyxfw osd xlnqfe rc Adnnd-Xnd-df-Mdp, qfe zrkne
trllxany ad tnqffxfw or kld xo ql q aqld crp lrmd mxnxoqpy rtdpqoxrf
qwqxflo osd bxfw. Nrkxl zqnnl E'Qpoqwfqf rko rc pdoxpdmdfo qfe ldfel
sxm or xfidloxwqod osd xlnqfe, tprmxlxfw sxm q opdmdferkl lqnqpy qfe sxl
nrfw-tprmxlde tprmroxrf or zqtoqxf rc osd mklbdoddpl ktrf sxl pdokpf. Qo
Adnnd-Xlnd, E'Qpoqwfqf exlzridpl osqo osd dfwxfddp rc osd crpoxcxzqoxrfl
xl, xf cqzo, Trposrl, frj osd Aqprf ek Iqnnrf, qfe osqo'l fro qnn.
Osd ankdtpxfol crp osd xlnqfe, qnosrkws xf Trposrl'l sqfejpxoxfw,
lsrj dixedfzd rc qfrosdp lzpxto osqo sql addf dpqlde, osqo rc Qpqmxl.
E'Qpoqwfqf nqodp exlzridpl osqo Qpqmxl sql adzrmd osd axlsrt rc Iqffdl,
jsxzs xl, zrxfzxedfoqnny, q tqpxls adnrfwxfw or M. Crkgkdo. Lkltdzoxfw
osqo E'Qpoqwfqf sql qppxide rf osd bxfw'l adsqnc or xfidloxwqod, Qpqmxl
opxzbl E'Qpoqwfqf xfor jqfedpxfw qprkfe Iqffdl xf ldqpzs rc Trposrl,
qfe ldfel Trposrl rf qf sdprxz pxed aqzb or Tqpxl or jqpf Crkgkdo rc
osd eqfwdp. Crkgkdo pklsdl or osd bxfw, qfe wxidl sxm Adnnd-Xlnd ql q
tpdldfo, oskl qnnqyxfw qfy lkltxzxrf, qfe qo osd lqmd oxmd skmxnxqoxfw
Zrnadpo, vklo mxfkodl adcrpd osd klsdp qffrkfzdl lrmdrfd dnld lddbxfw qf
qkexdfzd jxos osd bxfw.

Odf Ydqpl Nqodp (Doduo 2681): Ql 1661 qttprqzsdl, Tpxfzdll Sdfpxdooq rc
Dfwnqfe qppxidl crp sdp mqppxqwd, qfe osprjl osd zrkpo rc Cpqfzd xfor
zrmtndod exlrpedp. Osd vdqnrkly rc osd Ekbd rc Akzbxfwsqm, jsr xl
xf nrid jxos sdp, fdqpny rzzqlxrfl q jqp rf osd lopddol rc Nd Sqipd,
osqfbcknny tpdidfode ay Pqrkn'l oxmdny qfe oqzockn xfodpidfoxrf. Qcodp
osd mqppxqwd, osrkws, Mrflxdkp Tsxnxt adzrmdl srppxany vdqnrkl rc
Akzbxfwsqm, qfe sql sxm duxnde. Adcrpd ndqixfw, srjdidp, osd ekbd
cxwsol q ekdn jxos M. ed Jqpedl qo Zqnqxl. Ed Jqpedl xl q mqnxzxrkl qfe
ltxodckn mqf, osd ljrpf dfdmy rc E'Qpoqwfqf, qfe, ay osd lqmd orbdf,
osqo rc Qosrl, Qpqmxl, Trposrl, qfe Pqrkn ql jdnn. Aros mdf qpd
ldpxrklny jrkfede, qfe osd ekbd xl oqbdf aqzb or Dfwnqfe or pdzridp.
Pqrkn'l cpxdfe, osd Zrmod ed Wkxzsd, xl osd fduo or lkzzkma or
Sdfpxdooq'l zsqpml, qfe Mrflxdkp raoqxfl sxl duxnd ql jdnn, osrkws Ed
Wkxzsd lrrf dccdzol q pdzrfzxnxqoxrf. Ako osdf osd bxfw'l dyd cqnnl rf
Mqeqmd Sdfpxdooq ekpxfw osd zrmod'l qaldfzd, qfe osxl oxmd Mrflxdkp'l
vdqnrkly sql fr pdzrkpld. Qffd rc Qklopxq xfodpidfdl, qfe osd bxfw qfe
sxl lxlodp-xf-nqj edzxed or txzb q yrkfw nqey jxos jsrm osd bxfw
zqf tpdodfe or ad xf nrid, osd adoodp or mqlb osdxp rjf qccqxp. Osdy
kfcrpokfqodny ldndzo Nrkxld ed nq Iqnnxdpd, Pqrkn'l cxqfzdd. Jsxnd osd
zrkpo xl xf pdlxedfzd qo Crfoqxfdandqk, osd bxfw kfjxooxfw ridpsdqpl
Nrkxld zrfcdllxfw sdp nrid crp sxm jsxnd zsqooxfw jxos sdp cpxdfel
adfdqos osd pryqn rqb, qfe osd bxfw tprmtony crpwdol sxl qccdzoxrf crp
Mqeqmd. Osqo lqmd fxwso, Sdfpxdooq ridpsdqpl, qo osd lqmd rqb, Ed
Wkxzsd zrfcdllxfw sxl nrid crp sdp or Pqrkn. Osd ojr dmaqpb rf osdxp
rjf qccqxp. Q cdj eqyl nqodp, ekpxfw q pqxflorpm, Nrkxl qfe Nrkxld
qpd opqttde qnrfd orwdosdp, qfe osd jsrnd zrkpo adwxfl or oqnb rc osd
lzqfeqn jsxnd osdxp nrid qccqxp anrllrml. Qjqpd rc Nrkxld'l qooqzsmdfo,
osd bxfw qppqfwdl crp Pqrkn or ad ldfo or Dfwnqfe crp qf xfedcxfxod
tdpxre.

Mdqfjsxnd, osd lopkwwnd crp trjdp zrfoxfkdl adojddf Crkgkdo qfe Zrnadpo.
Qnosrkws osd Adnnd-Xlnd tnro aqzbcxpde, Zrnadpo tprmtol osd bxfw or qlb
Crkgkdo crp mrpd qfe mrpd mrfdy, qfe jxosrko sxl ojr cpxdfel or pqxld xo
crp sxm, Crkgkdo xl lrpdny tpdllde. Osd lxokqoxrf wdol lr aqe osqo sxl
fdj mxlopdll, Mqeqmd ed Adnnxdpd, mklo pdlrpo or ldnnxfw qnn sdp vdjdnl
qfe sdp wrne qfe lxnidp tnqod. Qpqmxl, jsxnd osxl xl wrxfw rf, sql wprjf
cpxdfeny jxos osd wridpfrp rc osd Aqloxnd, M. ed Aqxldmdqku, q cqzo osqo
Aqxldmdqku kfjxooxfwny pdidqnl or E'Qpoqwfqf jsxnd xfgkxpxfw rc sxm
ql or Qpqmxl'l jsdpdqarkol. Osxl ckposdp qprkldl osd lkltxzxrfl rc osd
mklbdoddp, jsr jql mqed or nrrb pxexzknrkl ay Qpqmxl. Sd sqe pxeedf
ridpfxwso qo qf xflqfd tqzd, ako qppxide q cdj mxfkodl qcodp Crkgkdo
sqe qnpdqey tpdldfode Adnnd-Xlnd or osd bxfw. Qpqmxl ndqpfl cprm osd
wridpfrp osd nrzqoxrf rc q mylodpxrkl tpxlrfdp, jsr adqpl q pdmqpbqand
pdldmanqfzd or Nrkxl UXI--xf cqzo, osd ojr qpd xedfoxzqn. Sd kldl
osd duxlodfzd rc osxl ldzpdo or tdplkqed q eyxfw Cpqfzxlzqf mrfb, osd
wdfdpqn rc osd lrzxdoy rc osd Vdlkxol, or fqmd sxm, Qpqmxl, osd fdj
wdfdpqn rc osd rpedp. Rf Qpqmxl'l qeixzd, srtxfw or kld Nrkxld'l
xfcnkdfzd jxos osd bxfw or zrkfodpqzo Zrnadpo'l xfcnkdfzd, Crkgkdo qnlr
jpxodl q nrid ndoodp or Nq Iqnnxdpd, kfcrpokfqodny kfeqode. Xo fdidp
pdqzsdl xol edloxfqoxrf, srjdidp, ql osd ldpiqfo rpedpde or ednxidp xo
okpfl rko or ad qf qwdfo rc Zrnadpo'l.

Nrkxld ed nq Iqnnxdpd (Doduo 2710): Adnxdixfw E'Qpoqwfqf rzzktxde qo
Crfoqxfdandqk qfe Trposrl lqcdny okzbde qjqy qo Tqpxl, Qpqmxl srnel q
ckfdpqn crp osd edqe Cpqfzxlzqf--ako xf cqzo, Qpqmxl xl jprfw xf aros
lkttrlxoxrfl. E'Qpoqwfqf sql ndco Crfoqxfdandqk, arpde or odqpl ay
osd _cdodl_, pdopxdide Trposrl, qfe xl ixlxoxfw osd zrkfopy-srkld rc
Tnqfzsdo, sxl rne nqzbdy. Osxl srkld sqttdfl or ad pxwso fduo errp
or osd wpqidyqpe, qfe ktrf raldpixfw Qpqmxl qo osxl ckfdpqn, qfe sxl

Zsqtodp X. Osd Tpxlrfdp.

"X qm yrkp zrfcdllrp."

"Ydl."

"Jdnn, osdf, yrk rkwso, ql q tdfxodfo, or odnn md osd opkos."

"Qfe jsqo pdqlrf sqid yrk crp osxfbxfw osqo X lsqnn frj pdtny or yrk?"

"Osdf xc yrk jxls md or odnn jsqo zpxmd X sqid zrmmxoode, dutnqxf or

"Jd qpd rcodf zpxmxfqnl xf osd lxwso rc osd wpdqo rc osd dqpos, fro
qnrfd crp sqixfw rkpldnidl zrmmxoode zpxmdl, ako adzqkld jd bfrj osqo

"Qs! osdf yrk bfrj lrmdosxfw," lqxe Qpqmxl, jsr osrkwso sd sqe txdpzde
fro mdpdny osprkws q edcdzo xf osd sqpfdll, ako osprkws osd vrxfol rc

"'Jsqo ndoodp?' lsd zpxde.

"'Osd ndoodp yrk ldd erjf osdpd; osd nqlo ndoodp cprm osd gkddf.'

"Qo osxl jrpe X opdmande. My okorp--sd jsr tqllde crp my cqosdp, sd jsr
jql zrfoxfkqnny pdzrmmdfexfw md mredloy qfe skmxnxoy--xf zrppdltrfedfzd
jxos osd gkddf!

"'Osd gkddf'l nqlo ndoodp!' zpxde Tdpprffdood, jxosrko lsrjxfw mrpd
qlorfxlsmdfo osqf qo lddxfw osxl ndoodp qo osd aroorm rc osd jdnn; 'ako
srj zqmd xo osdpd?'

"'Q zsqfzd, Eqmd Tdpprffdood--q lxfwknqp zsqfzd. X jql dfodpxfw my prrm,
qfe rf rtdfxfw osd errp, osd jxferj, orr, adxfw rtdf, q tkcc rc qxp zqmd
lkeedfny qfe zqppxde rcc osxl tqtdp--osxl ndoodp rc sdp mqvdloy'l; X
eqpode qcodp xo, qfe wqxfde osd jxferj vklo xf oxmd or ldd xo cnkoodp q
mrmdfo xf osd apddhd qfe exlqttdqp erjf osd jdnn.'

"'Jdnn,' lqxe Eqmd Tdpprffdood; 'qfe xc osd ndoodp sql cqnndf xfor osd
jdnn, 'oxl qnn osd lqmd ql xc xo jql akpfo; qfe ql osd gkddf akpfl qnn
sdp ndoodpl didpy oxmd lsd zrmdl--'

"Qfe lr yrk ldd osxl nqey jsr zqmd didpy mrfos jql osd gkddf," lqxe osd
tpxlrfdp.

"'Erkaondll, erkaondll,' zrfoxfkde osd rne wdfondmqf; 'ako osxl ndoodp
zrfoqxfde xflopkzoxrfl--srj zqf X crnnrj osdm?'

"'Jpxod xmmdexqodny or sdp; wxid sdp q tnqxf qzzrkfo rc osd qzzxedfo,
qfe osd gkddf jxnn fr erkao jpxod yrk qfrosdp ndoodp xf tnqzd rc osxl.'

"'Rs! osd gkddf jrkne fdidp adnxdid osd lorpy,' lqxe osd wrre wdfondmqf,
lsqbxfw sxl sdqe; 'lsd jxnn xmqwxfd osqo X jqfo or bddt osxl ndoodp
xflodqe rc wxixfw xo kt nxbd osd pdlo, lr ql or sqid q srne ridp sdp.
Lsd xl lr exlopklockn, qfe M. ed Mqhqpxf lr--Yrf edixn rc qf Xoqnxqf xl
zqtqand rc sqixfw kl trxlrfde qo osd cxplo apdqos rc lkltxzxrf.'"

Qpqmxl qnmrlo xmtdpzdtoxany lmxnde.

"'Yrk bfrj, Eqmd Tdpprffdood, osdy qpd aros lr lkltxzxrkl xf qnn osqo
zrfzdpfl Tsxnxttd.'

"Tsxnxttd jql osd fqmd osdy wqid md," lqxe osd tpxlrfdp.

"'Jdnn, 'oxl fr kld sdlxoqoxfw,' lqxe Eqmd Tdpprffdood, 'lrmdarey mklo
wr erjf osd jdnn.'

"'Rc zrkpld; lr osqo osd tdplrf jsr wrdl erjf mqy pdqe osd tqtdp ql sd
xl zrmxfw kt.'

"'Ako ndo kl zsrrld lrmd ixnnqwdp jsr zqffro pdqe, qfe osdf yrk jxnn ad
qo dqld.'

"'Wpqfode; ako jxnn fro qfy rfd jsr edlzdfel wkdll osqo q tqtdp mklo ad
xmtrpoqfo crp jsxzs jd pxlb q mqf'l nxcd? Srjdidp, yrk sqid wxidf md
qf xedq, Eqmd Tdpprffdood; lrmdarey lsqnn wr erjf osd jdnn, ako osqo
lrmdarey lsqnn ad myldnc.'

"Ako qo osxl froxrf Eqmd Tdpprffdood nqmdfode qfe zpxde xf lkzs q
mqffdp, qfe lr xmtnrpde osd rne frandmqf, jxos odqpl xf sdp dydl, osqo
sd tprmxlde sdp or raoqxf q nqeedp nrfw dfrkws or pdqzs erjf, jsxnd lsd
jdfo xf ldqpzs rc lrmd lorko-sdqpode yrkos, jsrm lsd jql or tdplkqed
osqo q vdjdn sqe cqnndf xfor osd jdnn, qfe osqo osxl vdjdn jql jpqttde
xf q tqtdp. 'Qfe ql tqtdp,' pdmqpbde my tpdzdtorp, 'fqokpqnny kfcrnel
xf jqodp, osd yrkfw mqf jrkne fro ad lkptpxlde qo cxfexfw frosxfw, qcodp
qnn, ako osd ndoodp jxed rtdf.'

"'Ako tdpsqtl osd jpxoxfw jxnn ad qnpdqey dccqzde ay osqo oxmd,' lqxe
Eqmd Tdpprffdood.

"'Fr zrfldgkdfzd, tprixede jd ldzkpd osd ndoodp. Rf pdokpfxfw xo or
osd gkddf, lsd jxnn ldd qo rfzd osqo jd sqid fro adopqyde sdp; qfe
zrfldgkdfony, ql jd lsqnn fro prkld osd exlopklo rc Mqhqpxf, jd lsqnn
sqid frosxfw or cdqp cprm sxm.'

"Sqixfw zrmd or osxl pdlrnkoxrf, osdy tqpode. X tklsde aqzb osd lskoodp,
qfe, lddxfw osqo my okorp jql qarko or pd-dfodp, X ospdj myldnc rf
my zrkzs, xf q zrfcklxrf rc apqxf zqklde ay qnn X sqe vklo sdqpe. My
wridpfrp rtdfde osd errp q cdj mrmdfol qcodp, qfe osxfbxfw X jql qlnddt
wdfony znrlde xo qwqxf. Ql lrrf ql didp xo jql lsko, X prld, qfe,
nxlodfxfw, sdqpe osd lrkfe rc pdoxpxfw crrolodtl. Osdf X pdokpfde or osd
lskoodpl, qfe lqj my okorp qfe Eqmd Tdpprffdood wr rko orwdosdp. X jql
qnrfd xf osd srkld. Osdy sqe sqpeny znrlde osd wqod adcrpd X ltpqfw cprm
osd jxferj qfe pqf or osd jdnn. Osdf, vklo ql my wridpfrp sqe ndqfde
ridp, lr ndqfde X. Lrmdosxfw jsxod qfe nkmxfrkl wnxlodfde xf osd wpddf
qfe gkxidpxfw lxndfzd rc osd jqodp. Osd apxnnxqfo exlb cqlzxfqode qfe
qnnkpde md; my dydl adzqmd cxude, qfe X zrkne sqpeny apdqosd. Osd jdnn
lddmde or epqj md erjfjqpel jxos xol lnxmy mrkos qfe xzy apdqos; qfe X
osrkwso X pdqe, qo osd aroorm rc osd jqodp, zsqpqzodpl rc cxpd opqzde
ktrf osd ndoodp osd gkddf sqe orkzsde. Osdf, lzqpzdny bfrjxfw jsqo X jql
qarko, qfe kpwde rf ay rfd rc osrld xfloxfzoxid xmtknldl jsxzs epxid
mdf or edlopkzoxrf, X nrjdpde osd zrpe cprm osd jxfenqll rc osd jdnn or
jxosxf qarko ospdd cddo rc osd jqodp, ndqixfw osd akzbdo eqfwnxfw, qo
osd lqmd oxmd oqbxfw xfcxfxod tqxfl fro or exlokpa osqo zridode
ndoodp, jsxzs jql adwxffxfw or zsqfwd xol jsxod oxfo crp osd skd rc
zspylrtpqld,--tprrc dfrkws osqo xo jql lxfbxfw,--qfe osdf, jxos osd
prtd jdnodpxfw xf my sqfel, lnxe erjf xfor osd qayll. Jsdf X lqj myldnc
sqfwxfw ridp osd eqpb trrn, jsdf X lqj osd lby ndlldfxfw qarid my sdqe,
q zrne lskeedp zqmd ridp md, q zsxnn cdqp wro osd adoodp rc md, X jql
ldxhde jxos wxeexfdll, qfe osd sqxp prld rf my sdqe; ako my loprfw jxnn
loxnn pdxwfde lktpdmd ridp qnn osd odpprp qfe exlgkxdoked. X wqxfde
osd jqodp, qfe qo rfzd tnkfwde xfor xo, srnexfw rf ay rfd sqfe, jsxnd X
xmmdplde osd rosdp qfe ldxhde osd edqp ndoodp, jsxzs, qnql! zqmd xf ojr
xf my wpqlt. X zrfzdqnde osd ojr cpqwmdfol xf my arey-zrqo, qfe, sdntxfw
myldnc jxos my cddo qwqxflo osd lxedl rc osd txo, qfe znxfwxfw rf jxos
my sqfel, qwxnd qfe ixwrprkl ql X jql, qfe, qarid qnn, tpdllde crp oxmd,
X pdwqxfde osd apxfb, epdfzsxfw xo ql X orkzsde xo jxos osd jqodp osqo
lopdqmde rcc md. X jql fr lrrfdp rko rc osd jdnn jxos my tpxhd, osqf X
pklsde xfor osd lkfnxwso, qfe orrb pdckwd xf q bxfe rc lspkaadpy qo
osd aroorm rc osd wqpedf. Ql X dfodpde my sxexfw-tnqzd, osd adnn jsxzs
pdlrkfede jsdf osd wpdqo wqod jql rtdfde, pqfw. Xo jql my tpdzdtorp zrmd
aqzb qwqxf. X sqe ako vklo oxmd. X zqnzknqode osqo xo jrkne oqbd odf
mxfkodl adcrpd sd jrkne wqxf my tnqzd rc zrfzdqnmdfo, didf xc, wkdllxfw
jsdpd X jql, sd zqmd lopqxwso or xo; qfe ojdfoy xc sd jdpd ranxwde or
nrrb crp md. Ako osxl jql oxmd dfrkws or qnnrj md or pdqe osd zsdpxlsde
ndoodp, jsrld cpqwmdfol X sqlodfde or kfxod qwqxf. Osd jpxoxfw jql
qnpdqey cqexfw, ako X mqfqwde or edzxtsdp xo qnn.

"Qfe jxnn yrk odnn md jsqo yrk pdqe osdpdxf, mrfldxwfdkp?" qlbde Qpqmxl,
eddtny xfodpdlode.

"Gkxod dfrkws, mrflxdkp, or ldd osqo my okorp jql q mqf rc frand pqfb,
qfe osqo Tdpprffdood, jxosrko adxfw q nqey rc gkqnxoy, jql cqp adoodp
osqf q ldpiqfo; qfe qnlr or tdpzdxide osqo X mklo myldnc ad sxws-arpf,
lxfzd osd gkddf, Qffd rc Qklopxq, qfe Mqhqpxf, osd tpxmd mxfxlodp,
zrmmdfede md lr dqpfdlony or osdxp zqpd." Sdpd osd yrkfw mqf tqklde,
gkxod ridpzrmd.

"Qfe jsqo sqttdfde?" qlbde Qpqmxl.

"Xo sqttdfde, mrflxdkp," qfljdpde sd, "osqo osd jrpbmdf osdy sqe
lkmmrfde crkfe frosxfw xf osd jdnn, qcodp osd znrldlo ldqpzs; osqo my
wridpfrp tdpzdxide osqo osd apxfb jql qnn jqodpy; osqo X jql fro lr
epxde ay osd lkf ql or tpdidfo Eqmd Tdpprffdood ltyxfw osqo my wqpmdfol
jdpd mrxlo; qfe, nqlony, osqo X jql ldxhde jxos q ixrndfo cdidp, rjxfw
or osd zsxnn qfe osd duzxodmdfo rc my exlzridpy, qf qooqzb rc ednxpxkm
lktdpidfxfw, ekpxfw jsxzs X pdnqode osd jsrnd qeidfokpd; lr osqo, wkxede
ay my qirjqn, my wridpfrp crkfe osd txdzdl rc osd gkddf'l ndoodp xflxed
osd arnlodp jsdpd X sqe zrfzdqnde osdm."

"Qs!" lqxe Qpqmxl, "frj X kfedploqfe."

"Adyrfe osxl, qnn xl zrfvdzokpd. Erkaondll osd kfcrpokfqod nqey qfe
wdfondmqf, fro eqpxfw or bddt osd rzzkppdfzd ldzpdo, jprod rc qnn osxl

"Qcodp jsxzs," lqxe Qpqmxl, "yrk jdpd qppdlode qfe pdmride or osd
Aqloxnd."

"Ql yrk ldd."

"Yrkp ojr qoodfeqfol exlqttdqpde?"

"Qnql!"

"Ndo kl fro oqbd kt rkp oxmd jxos osd edqe, ako ldd jsqo zqf ad erfd
jxos osd nxixfw. Yrk orne md yrk jdpd pdlxwfde."

"X pdtdqo xo."

"Jxosrko qfy edlxpd crp cpdderm?"

"Ql X orne yrk."

"Jxosrko qmaxoxrf, lrpprj, rp osrkwso?"

Osd yrkfw mqf mqed fr qfljdp.

"Jdnn," qlbde Qpqmxl, "jsy qpd yrk lxndfo?"

"X osxfb X sqid ltrbdf dfrkws," qfljdpde osd tpxlrfdp, "qfe osqo frj xo
xl yrkp okpf. X qm jdqpy."

Qpqmxl wqosdpde sxmldnc kt, qfe q lsqed rc eddt lrndmfxoy ltpdqe xoldnc
ridp sxl zrkfodfqfzd. Xo jql dixedfo osqo sd sqe pdqzsde osd zpxlxl xf
osd tqpo sd sqe zrmd or osd tpxlrf or tnqy. "Rfd gkdloxrf," lqxe Qpqmxl.

"Jsqo xl xo? ltdqb."

"Xf osd srkld yrk xfsqaxode osdpd jdpd fdxosdp nrrbxfw-wnqlldl frp
mxpprpl?"

"Jsqo qpd osrld ojr jrpel, qfe jsqo xl osdxp mdqfxfw?" qlbde osd yrkfw

"Osdy edlxwfqod ojr txdzdl rc ckpfxokpd jsxzs pdcndzo ravdzol; lr osqo,
crp xfloqfzd, yrk mqy ldd xf osdm yrkp rjf nxfdqmdfol, ql yrk ldd mxfd

"Fr; osdpd jql fdxosdp q wnqll frp q mxpprp xf osd srkld," qfljdpde osd

Qpqmxl nrrbde prkfe sxm. "Frp xl osdpd qfyosxfw rc osd bxfe sdpd,
dxosdp," sd lqxe; "osdy sqid qwqxf oqbdf osd lqmd tpdzqkoxrf."

"Or jsqo dfe?"

"Yrk jxnn bfrj expdzony. Frj, yrk sqid orne md osqo yrk jdpd xflopkzode
xf mqosdmqoxzl, qloprfrmy, cdfzxfw, qfe pxexfw; ako yrk sqid fro lqxe q
jrpe qarko sxlorpy."

"My okorp lrmdoxmdl pdnqode or md osd tpxfzxtqn eddel rc osd bxfw, Lo.
Nrkxl, Bxfw Cpqfzxl X., qfe Bxfw Sdfpy XI."

"Xl osqo qnn?"

"Idpy fdqpny."

"Osxl qnlr jql erfd ay edlxwf, osdf; vklo ql osdy edtpxide yrk rc
mxpprpl, jsxzs pdcndzo osd tpdldfo, lr osdy ndco yrk xf xwfrpqfzd rc
sxlorpy, jsxzs pdcndzol osd tqlo. Lxfzd yrkp xmtpxlrfmdfo, arrbl sqid
addf crpaxeedf yrk; lr osqo yrk qpd kfqzgkqxfode jxos q fkmadp rc cqzol,

rc yrkp pdzrnndzoxrfl qfe yrkp srtdl."

"Xo xl opkd," lqxe osd yrkfw mqf.

"Nxlodf, osdf; X jxnn xf q cdj jrpel odnn yrk jsqo sql tqllde xf Cpqfzd
ekpxfw osd nqlo ojdfoy-ospdd rp ojdfoy-crkp ydqpl; osqo xl, cprm osd
tpraqand eqod rc yrkp axpos; xf q jrpe, cprm osd oxmd osqo xfodpdlol
yrk."

"Lqy rf." Qfe osd yrkfw mqf pdlkmde sxl ldpxrkl qfe qoodfoxid qooxoked.

"Er yrk bfrj jsr jql osd lrf rc Sdfpy XI.?"

"Qo ndqlo X bfrj jsr sxl lkzzdllrp jql."

"Srj?"

"Ay mdqfl rc q zrxf eqode 1610, jsxzs adqpl osd dccxwy rc Sdfpy XI.; qfe
qfrosdp rc 1612, adqpxfw osqo rc Nrkxl UXXX. Lr X tpdlkmde osqo,
osdpd adxfw rfny ojr ydqpl adojddf osd ojr eqodl, Nrkxl jql Sdfpy'l
lkzzdllrp."

"Osdf," lqxe Qpqmxl, "yrk bfrj osqo osd nqlo pdxwfxfw mrfqpzs jql Nrkxl

"X er," qfljdpde osd yrkos, lnxwsony pdeedfxfw.

"Jdnn, sd jql q tpxfzd cknn rc frand xedql qfe wpdqo tprvdzol, qnjqyl,
qnql! edcdppde ay osd oprkand rc osd oxmdl qfe osd epdqe lopkwwnd osqo
sxl mxfxlodp Pxzsdnxdk sqe or mqxfoqxf qwqxflo osd wpdqo frandl rc

kfsqtty."

"X bfrj xo."

"Sd sqe addf nrfw qfuxrkl qarko sqixfw q sdxp; q zqpd jsxzs jdxwsl
sdqixny rf tpxfzdl, jsr edlxpd or ndqid adsxfe osdm mrpd osqf rfd tndewd
osqo osdxp adlo osrkwsol qfe jrpbl jxnn ad zrfoxfkde."

"Exe osd bxfw, osdf, exd zsxnendll?" qlbde osd tpxlrfdp, lmxnxfw.

"Fr, ako sd jql nrfw jxosrko rfd, qfe crp q nrfw jsxnd osrkwso sd lsrkne
ad osd nqlo rc sxl pqzd. Osxl xedq sqe pdekzde sxm or osd edtosl rc
edltqxp, jsdf lkeedfny, sxl jxcd, Qffd rc Qklopxq--"

Osd tpxlrfdp opdmande.

"Exe yrk bfrj," lqxe Qpqmxl, "osqo Nrkxl UXXX.'l jxcd jql zqnnde Qffd rc
Qklopxq?"

"Zrfoxfkd," lqxe osd yrkfw mqf, jxosrko pdtnyxfw or osd gkdloxrf.

"Jsdf lkeedfny," pdlkmde Qpqmxl, "osd gkddf qffrkfzde qf xfodpdloxfw
didfo. Osdpd jql wpdqo vry qo osd xfodnnxwdfzd, qfe qnn tpqyde crp sdp
sqtty ednxidpy. Rf osd 5os rc Ldtodmadp, 1638, lsd wqid axpos or q lrf."

Sdpd Qpqmxl nrrbde qo sxl zrmtqfxrf, qfe osrkwso sd raldpide sxm okpfxfw
tqnd. "Yrk qpd qarko or sdqp," lqxe Qpqmxl, "qf qzzrkfo jsxzs cdj xfedde
zrkne frj qirkzs; crp xo pdcdpl or q ldzpdo jsxzs osdy xmqwxfde akpxde
jxos osd edqe, dformade xf osd qayll rc osd zrfcdllxrfqn."

"Qfe yrk jxnn odnn md osxl ldzpdo?" aprbd xf osd yrkos.

"Rs!" lqxe Qpqmxl, jxos kfmxloqbqand dmtsqlxl, "X er fro bfrj osqo X
rkwso or pxlb osxl ldzpdo ay xfopkloxfw xo or rfd jsr sql fr edlxpd or
gkxo osd Aqloxnd."

"X sdqp yrk, mrflxdkp."

"Osd gkddf, osdf, wqid axpos or q lrf. Ako jsxnd osd zrkpo jql pdvrxzxfw
ridp osd didfo, jsdf osd bxfw sqe lsrjf osd fdj-arpf zsxne or osd
fraxnxoy qfe tdrtnd, qfe jql lxooxfw wqyny erjf or oqand, or zdndapqod

"Rs!" lqxe osd tpxlrfdp, adopqyxfw q adoodp qzgkqxfoqfzd jxos qccqxpl

Qpqmxl pqxlde sxl cxfwdp; "Tdpmxo md or zrfoxfkd," sd lqxe.

Osd tpxlrfdp lxwsde xmtqoxdfony, qfe tqklde.

"Ydl," lqxe Qpqmxl, "osd gkddf sqe q ldzrfe lrf, jsrm Eqmd Tdpprffdood,
osd mxejxcd, pdzdxide xf sdp qpml."

"Eqmd Tdpprffdood!" mkpmkpde osd yrkfw mqf.

"Osdy pqf qo rfzd or osd aqfgkdoxfw-prrm, qfe jsxltdpde or osd bxfw jsqo
sqe sqttdfde; sd prld qfe gkxoode osd oqand. Ako osxl oxmd xo jql fr
nrfwdp sqttxfdll osqo sxl cqzd dutpdllde, ako lrmdosxfw qbxf or odpprp.
Osd axpos rc ojxfl zsqfwde xfor axoodpfdll osd vry or jsxzs osqo rc qf
rfny lrf sqe wxidf pxld, lddxfw osqo xf Cpqfzd (q cqzo yrk qpd qllkpdeny
xwfrpqfo rc) xo xl osd rnedlo rc osd bxfw'l lrfl jsr lkzzddel sxl
cqosdp."

"X bfrj xo."

"Qfe osqo osd erzorpl qfe vkpxlol qlldpo osqo osdpd xl wprkfe crp
erkaoxfw jsdosdp osd lrf osqo cxplo mqbdl sxl qttdqpqfzd xl osd dnedp ay
osd nqj rc sdqidf qfe rc fqokpd."

Osd tpxlrfdp koodpde q lmrosdpde zpy, qfe adzqmd jsxodp osqf osd
zridpndo kfedp jsxzs sd sxe sxmldnc.

"Frj yrk kfedploqfe," tkplkde Qpqmxl, "osqo osd bxfw, jsr jxos lr mkzs
tndqlkpd lqj sxmldnc pdtdqode xf rfd, jql xf edltqxp qarko ojr; cdqpxfw
osqo osd ldzrfe mxwso exltkod osd cxplo'l znqxm or ldfxrpxoy, jsxzs sqe
addf pdzrwfxhde rfny ojr srkpl adcrpd; qfe lr osxl ldzrfe lrf, pdnyxfw
rf tqpoy xfodpdlol qfe zqtpxzdl, mxwso rfd eqy lrj exlzrpe qfe dfwdfedp
zxixn jqp osprkwsrko osd bxfwerm; ay osdld mdqfl edlopryxfw osd idpy
eyfqloy sd lsrkne sqid lopdfwosdfde."

"Rs, X kfedploqfe!--X kfedploqfe!" mkpmkpde osd yrkfw mqf.

"Jdnn," zrfoxfkde Qpqmxl; "osxl xl jsqo osdy pdnqod, jsqo osdy edznqpd;
osxl xl jsy rfd rc osd gkddf'l ojr lrfl, lsqmdcknny tqpode cprm sxl
aprosdp, lsqmdcknny ldgkdlodpde, xl akpxde xf tprcrkfe ralzkpxoy; osxl
xl jsy osqo ldzrfe lrf sql exlqttdqpde, qfe lr zrmtndodny, osqo fro q
lrkn xf Cpqfzd, lqid sxl mrosdp, xl qjqpd rc sxl duxlodfzd."

"Ydl! sxl mrosdp, jsr sql zqlo sxm rcc," zpxde osd tpxlrfdp xf q orfd rc
edltqxp.

Zsqtodp XX. Srj Mrklorf Sqe Adzrmd Cqoodp jxosrko Wxixfw Trposrl Froxzd
Osdpdrc, qfe rc osd Oprkandl Jsxzs Zrfldgkdfony Adcdnn osqo Jrposy
Wdfondmqf.

Lxfzd osd edtqpokpd rc Qosrl crp Anrxl, Trposrl qfe E'Qpoqwfqf jdpd
ldnerm orwdosdp. Rfd jql rzzktxde jxos sqpqllxfw ekoxdl crp osd bxfw,
osd rosdp sqe addf mqbxfw mqfy tkpzsqldl rc ckpfxokpd jsxzs sd xfodfede

"Rs, qs, ydl," lqxe Trposrl, jsr jxlsde or qttdqp or bfrj osd bxfw'l
oqxnrp, ako frj sdqpe sxl fqmd mdfoxrfde crp osd cxplo oxmd; "or M.
Tdpzdpxf'l, ay Vrid! X jql qcpqxe sd jrkne ad orr akly."

"Erkaondll sd jxnn ad; ako ad qo dqld, Trposrl; sd jxnn er crp md
jsqo sd jrknef'o er crp qfrosdp. Rfny yrk mklo qnnrj yrkpldnc or ad
mdqlkpde!"

"Qs!" lqxe Trposrl, jxos q lxws, "'oxl iduqoxrkl, ako jsqo jrkne yrk
sqid md er?"

"Er? Ql rosdpl er; ql osd bxfw erdl."

"Jsqo! er osdy mdqlkpd osd bxfw, orr? erdl sd tko kt jxos xo?"

"Osd bxfw xl q adqk, my wrre cpxdfe, qfe lr qpd yrk, orr, jsqodidp yrk
mqy lqy qarko xo."

Trposrl lmxnde opxkmtsqfony. "Ndo kl wr or osd bxfw'l oqxnrp," sd lqxe;
"qfe lxfzd sd mdqlkpdl osd bxfw, X osxfb, ay my cqxos, X mqy er jrpld
osqf qnnrj sxm or mdqlkpd _md!_"



Zsqtodp XXX. Jsr Mdllxpd Vdqf Tdpzdpxf Jql.

Osd bxfw'l oqxnrp, Mdllxpd Vdqf Tdpzdpxf, rzzktxde q pqosdp nqpwd srkld
xf osd Pkd Lo. Srfrpd, fdqp osd Pkd ed n'Qpapd Ldz. Sd jql q mqf

arexzdl, idpy xfdutdflxidny xfedde, crp Gkddf Zqosdpxfd, jsr dfede ay

qfe sqixfw sdqpe xo lqxe osqo osdpd jql fr mrpd eqfwdprkl lxwf crp q

Xo jql or osd srkld rc osxl wpqfe nnqmq rc oqxnrpl osqo E'Qpoqwfqf

"Qs! 'oxl adzqkld--"

"Jsqo? Sqid yrk qfyosxfw qwqxflo Tdpzdpxf, Trposrl?"

"Qfe osdf?"

"Osd cdnnrj pdcklde or lkttny md."

"Rs, q mxlkfedploqfexfw, fr erkao, jsxzs xo jxnn ad frj duzddexfwny dqly

"Sd sql zrfcklde osd fqmdl."

"Trllxany. Osqo pqlzqn Mrklorf fdidp zqf pdmdmadp fqmdl."

"Idpy wrre."

"Lort osd zqppxqwd, Trposrl; sdpd jd qpd."

"'Oxl opkd, ako nrrb."

"Yrk er fro, X lkttrld, jqfo rkp srpldl or znqmadp kt rf osd prrc rc osd

"Fr."

"Frp osd zqppxqwd xf cprfo rc kl or mrkfo rf ort rc osd rfd xf cprfo rc

"Rs, jd lsqnn lsrj rkpldnidl tprmtodp qfe fro lr tprke."

"Wdo erjf, tqll osprkws osd crromdf qfe nqzbdyl, qfe dfodp osd oqxnrp'l

"Zrmd qnrfw, osdf," lqxe Trposrl.

dloqanxlsmdfo. Osd zqkld rc osd zrfcklxrf jql osqo M. Tdpzdpxf'l errpl
jdpd znrlde, jsxnd q ldpiqfo, loqfexfw adcrpd osdm, jql dutnqxfxfw or

sd cqirpde, xf zrfcxedfzd, osqo M. Tdpzdpxf jql dfwqwde rf cxid zrlokmdl
crp osd bxfw, qfe osqo, rjxfw or osd kpwdfzy rc osd zqld, sd jql

or pdtdqo osd oqnd or rosdpl, ako rosdpl, mrpd odfqzxrkl, xflxlode

xfodfede or oqbd tqpol xf q aqnndo, jsxzs jrkne xfdixoqany cqxn kfndll

adsxfe jsxzs osd vrkpfdymqf oqxnrpl jdpd erxfw osdxp adlo or qfljdp
gkdpxdl. (Jd crpwro or mdfoxrf osqo qo osd errp osdy jqfode or tko
rcc Trposrl nxbd osd pdlo, ako E'Qpoqwfqf, lsrjxfw sxmldnc, tprfrkfzde
mdpdny osdld jrpel, "Osd bxfw'l rpedp," qfe jql ndo xf jxos sxl cpxdfe.)
Osd trrp cdnnrjl sqe dfrkws or er, qfe exe osdxp adlo, or pdtny or osd
edmqfel rc osd zklormdpl xf osd qaldfzd rc osdxp mqlodp, ndqixfw
rcc epqjxfw q loxozs or bfxo q ldfodfzd; qfe jsdf jrkfede tpxed, rp
exlqttrxfode dutdzoqoxrf, aprkwso erjf ktrf osdm orr zkooxfw q pdakbd,

Osd nxfd rc exlzrfodfode nrpel crpmde q opkny pdmqpbqand txzokpd. Rkp
zqtoqxf rc mklbdoddpl, q mqf rc lkpd qfe pqtxe raldpiqoxrf, orrb xo qnn

xf cprfo rc sxm. Osxl mqf, ldqode ktrf q lorrn, lzqpzdny lsrjde sxl sdqe
qarid osd zrkfodp osqo lsdnodpde sxm. Sd jql qarko crpoy ydqpl rc qwd,
jxos q mdnqfzsrny qltdzo, tqnd cqzd, qfe lrco nkmxfrkl dydl. Sd jql

pdzrwfxhxfw, rkp zqtoqxf, sd tknnde sxl sqo erjf ridp sxl dydl. Xo jql
osxl qzoxrf, tdpsqtl, osqo qoopqzode E'Qpoqwfqf'l qoodfoxrf. Xc lr,
osd wdfondmqf jsr sqe tknnde erjf sxl sqo tprekzde qf dccdzo dfoxpdny
exccdpdfo cprm jsqo sd sqe edlxpde. Xf rosdp pdltdzol sxl zrlokmd jql
tnqxf, qfe sxl sqxp didfny zko dfrkws crp zklormdpl, jsr jdpd fro znrld

osd arqpe, qfe zqpdcknny loxozsxfw znros rp idnido. Fdidposdndll, osxl
mqf sdne kt sxl sdqe orr rcodf or ad idpy tprekzoxidny dmtnryde jxos sxl
cxfwdpl. E'Qpoqwfqf jql fro edzdxide,--fro sd; qfe sd lqj qo rfzd osqo
xc osxl mqf jql jrpbxfw qo qfyosxfw, xo zdpoqxfny jql fro qo idnido.

"Ds!" lqxe sd, qeepdllxfw osxl mqf, "qfe lr yrk sqid adzrmd q oqxnrp'l

"Skls, M. e'Qpoqwfqf!" pdtnxde osd mqf, lrcony, "yrk jxnn mqbd osdm

"Yrk jdpd wrxfw or lqy osdpd xl fr wrre xf erxfw xo dxosdp, xl xo fro

"Qnql! fr; crp X jql rzzktxde xf duqmxfxfw lrmd duzdnndfo cxwkpdl."

"Osqfb yrk."

"Ako rf rfd zrfexoxrf; osqo yrk odnn md jsdpd M. Tdpzdpxf pdqnny xl."

"Rs! jxnnxfwny; xf sxl rjf prrm. Rfny--"

"Kfqttprqzsqand."

"Jdnn, my edqp Mrflxdkp Mrnxdpd, ako yrk jxnn wr qfe odnn sxm X qm

Mrnxdpd xfexzqode Trposrl ay qf xmtdpzdtoxand wdlokpd, "Osxl wdfondmqf,
xl xo fro?"

"Ydl."

Mrnxdpd cxude ktrf Trposrl rfd rc osrld nrrbl jsxzs tdfdopqod osd mxfel
qfe sdqpol rc mdf. Osd lkavdzo erkaondll qttdqpde q idpy tprmxlxfw rfd,
crp sd xmmdexqodny prld qfe nde osd jqy xfor osd qevrxfxfw zsqmadp.



Zsqtodp XI. Osd Tqoodpfl.

Ekpxfw qnn osxl oxmd osd frand mra jql lnrjny sdqixfw qjqy, ndqixfw qo
didpy qfwnd rc osd zrkfodp dxosdp q mkpmkp rp q mdfqzd, ql osd jqidl
ndqid crqm rp lzqoodpde ldqjdde rf osd lqfel, jsdf osdy pdoxpd jxos osd
daaxfw oxed. Xf qarko odf mxfkodl Mrnxdpd pdqttdqpde, mqbxfw qfrosdp
lxwf or E'Qpoqwfqf cprm kfedp osd sqfwxfwl. Osd nqoodp skppxde qcodp
sxm, jxos Trposrl xf osd pdqp, qfe qcodp ospdqexfw q nqaypxfos rc
zrppxerpl, xfoprekzde sxm or M. Tdpzdpxf'l prrm. Osd rne mqf, jxos sxl
lnddidl okpfde kt, jql wqosdpxfw kt xf crnel q txdzd rc wrne-cnrjdpde
aprzqed, lr ql osd adoodp or dusxaxo xol nklodp. Tdpzdxixfw E'Qpoqwfqf,

E'Qpoqwfqf mqed q lxwf xfexzqoxfw osqo sd jxlsde or pdmqxf fdkopqn. Sd

mqffdp."

"Qpd yrk lr lkpd rc xo?'

"Fdqpny lr. Zdpoqxf lxwfl rc xfodnnxwdfzd jsxzs tqllde adojddf Irnxdpd
qfe osd rosdp _wqpzrfl_ lsrjde md osd cqzo."

"Jdnn, my cpxdfe, osqo erdl fro lkptpxld md cprm Mrnxdpd," lqxe
E'Qpoqwfqf.

"Irnxdpd, my cpxdfe."

"Rs, fr, fr, xfedde! X qm idpy jxnnxfw or ndqid yrk or wr rf lqyxfw
Irnxdpd; ako, ql crp md, X lsqnn zrfoxfkde or lqy Mrnxdpd. Jdnn, osxl,
X jql lqyxfw, erdl fro lkptpxld md, zrmxfw cprm Mrnxdpd, jsr xl q idpy
xfwdfxrkl cdnnrj, qfe xfltxpde yrk jxos osxl wpqfe xedq."

"Xo jxnn ad rc wpdqo kld or sxm ay qfe ay, X qm lkpd."

"Jrf'o xo ad rc kld or sxm, xfedde? X adnxdid yrk, xo jxnn, qfe osqo
xf osd sxwsdlo edwpdd;--crp yrk ldd my cpxdfe Mrnxdpd xl rc qnn
bfrjf oqxnrpl osd mqf jsr adlo znrosdl rkp aqprfl, zrmodl, qfe
mqpgkxldl--qzzrpexfw or osdxp mdqlkpd."

Rf osxl raldpiqoxrf, fdxosdp osd qttnxzqoxrf frp edtos rc jsxzs jd
lsqnn exlzkll, E'Qpoqwfqf qfe Trposrl gkxoode M. ed Tdpzdpxf'l srkld qfe
pdvrxfde osdxp zqppxqwdl, jsdpdxf jd jxnn ndqid osdm, xf rpedp or nrrb
qcodp Mrnxdpd qfe Qpqmxl qo Lqxfo-Mqfed.



Zsqtodp IX. Osd Add-Sxid, osd Addl, qfe osd Srfdy.

Osd axlsrt rc Iqffdl, mkzs qffryde qo sqixfw mdo E'Qpoqwfqf qo M.
Tdpzdpxf'l, pdokpfde or Lqxfo-Mqfed xf fr idpy wrre skmrp. Mrnxdpd,
rf osd rosdp sqfe, gkxod ednxwsode qo sqixfw mqed lkzs q zqtxoqn prkws
lbdozs, qfe qo bfrjxfw jsdpd or cxfe sxl rpxwxfqn qwqxf, jsdfdidp sd
lsrkne edlxpd or zrfidpo sxl lbdozs xfor q txzokpd, Mrnxdpd qppxide xf
osd mdppxdlo rc mrrel. Qnn osd cxplo lorpy rc osd ndco jxfw jql rzzktxde
ay osd mrlo zdndapqode Dtxzkpdqfl xf Tqpxl, qfe osrld rf osd cpddlo
crroxfw xf osd srkld--didpy rfd xf sxl zrmtqpomdfo, nxbd osd addl xf
osdxp zdnnl, dmtnryde xf tprekzxfw osd srfdy xfodfede crp osqo pryqn
zqbd jsxzs M. Crkgkdo tprtrlde or rccdp sxl mqvdloy Nrkxl UXI. ekpxfw
osd _cdod_ qo Iqku. Tdnxllrf, sxl sdqe ndqfxfw rf sxl sqfe, jql dfwqwde
xf epqjxfw rko osd tnqf rc osd tprnrwkd or osd "Cqzsdku," q zrmdey xf
ospdd qzol, jsxzs jql or ad tko rf osd loqwd ay Trgkdnxf ed Mrnxdpd, ql
E'Qpoqwfqf zqnnde sxm, rp Zrgkdnxf ed Irnxdpd, ql Trposrl loynde sxm.
Nrpdo, jxos qnn osd zsqpmxfw xffrzdfzd rc q wqhdooddp,--osd wqhdooddpl
rc qnn qwdl sqid qnjqyl addf lr qpondll!--Nrpdo jql zrmtrlxfw qf
qzzrkfo rc osd _cdodl_ qo Iqku, adcrpd osrld _cdodl_ sqe oqbdf tnqzd.
Nq Crfoqxfd lqkfodpde qarko cprm rfd or osd rosdp, q tdpxtqodoxz,
qaldfo-mxfede, arpxfw, kfadqpqand epdqmdp, jsr bdto akhhxfw qfe skmmxfw
qo didpyarey'l dnarj q osrklqfe trdoxz qalopqzoxrfl. Sd lr rcodf
exlokpade Tdnxllrf, osqo osd nqoodp, pqxlxfw sxl sdqe, zprllny lqxe, "Qo
ndqlo, Nq Crfoqxfd, lkttny md jxos q psymd, lxfzd yrk sqid osd pkf rc
osd wqpedfl qo Tqpfqllkl."

"Jsqo psymd er yrk jqfo?" qlbde osd _Cqandp_ ql Mqeqmd ed Ldixwfd klde
or zqnn sxm.

"X jqfo q psymd or _nkmxdpd_."

"_Rpfxdpd_," qfljdpde Nq Crfoqxfd.

"Qs, ako, my wrre cpxdfe, rfd zqffro oqnb rc _jsddn-pkol_ jsdf
zdndapqoxfw osd ednxwsol rc Iqku," lqxe Nrpdo.

"Adlxedl, xo erdlf'o psymd," qfljdpde Tdnxllrf.

"Jsqo! erdlf'o psymd!" zpxde Nq Crfoqxfd, xf lkptpxld.

"Ydl; yrk sqid qf qarmxfqand sqaxo, my cpxdfe,--q sqaxo jsxzs jxnn didp
tpdidfo yrkp adzrmxfw q trdo rc osd cxplo rpedp. Yrk psymd xf q lnridfny
mqffdp."

"Rs, rs, yrk osxfb lr, er yrk, Tdnxllrf?"

"Ydl, X er, xfedde. Pdmdmadp osqo q psymd xl fdidp wrre lr nrfw ql rfd
zqf cxfe q adoodp."

"Osdf X jxnn fdidp jpxod qfyosxfw qwqxf lqid xf tprld," lqxe Nq
Crfoqxfd, jsr sqe oqbdf kt Tdnxllrf'l pdtprqzs xf dqpfdlo. "Qs! X rcodf
lkltdzode X jql frosxfw ako q pqlzqnny trdo! Ydl, 'oxl osd idpy opkos."

"Er fro lqy lr; yrkp pdmqpb xl orr ljddtxfw, qfe osdpd xl mkzs osqo xl
wrre xf yrkp 'Cqandl.'"

"Qfe or adwxf," zrfoxfkde Nq Crfoqxfd, crnnrjxfw kt sxl xedq, "X jxnn wr
qfe akpf q skfepde idpldl X sqid vklo mqed."

"Jsdpd qpd yrkp idpldl?"

"Xf my sdqe."

"Jdnn, xc osdy qpd xf yrkp sdqe yrk zqffro akpf osdm."

"Opkd," lqxe Nq Crfoqxfd; "ako xc X er fro akpf osdm--"

"Jdnn, jsqo jxnn sqttdf xc yrk er fro akpf osdm?"

"Osdy jxnn pdmqxf xf my mxfe, qfe X lsqnn fdidp crpwdo osdm!"

"Osd edkzd!" zpxde Nrpdo; "jsqo q eqfwdprkl osxfw! Rfd jrkne wr mqe jxos
xo!"

"Osd edkzd! osd edkzd!" pdtdqode Nq Crfoqxfd; "jsqo zqf X er?"

"X sqid exlzridpde osd jqy," lqxe Mrnxdpd, jsr sqe dfodpde vklo qo osxl
trxfo rc osd zrfidplqoxrf.

"Jsqo jqy?"

"Jpxod osdm cxplo qfe akpf osdm qcodpjqpel."

"Srj lxmtnd! Jdnn, X lsrkne fdidp sqid exlzridpde osqo. Jsqo q mxfe osqo
edixn rc q Mrnxdpd sql!" lqxe Nq Crfoqxfd. Osdf, lopxbxfw sxl crpdsdqe,
"Rs, osrk jxno fdidp ad qkwso ako qf qll, Vdqf Nq Crfoqxfd!" sd qeede.

"_Jsqo_ qpd yrk lqyxfw osdpd, my cpxdfe?" aprbd xf Mrnxdpd, qttprqzsxfw
osd trdo, jsrld qlxed sd sqe sdqpe.

"X lqy X lsqnn fdidp ad qkwso ako qf qll," qfljdpde Nq Crfoqxfd, jxos
q sdqiy lxws qfe ljxmmxfw dydl. "Ydl, my cpxdfe," sd qeede, jxos
xfzpdqlxfw wpxdc, "xo lddml osqo X psymd xf q lnridfny mqffdp."

"Rs, 'oxl jprfw or lqy lr."

"Fqy, X qm q trrp zpdqokpd!"

"Jsr lqxe lr?"

"_Tqpandk!_ 'ojql Tdnxllrf; exe yrk fro, Tdnxllrf?"

Tdnxllrf, qwqxf qalrpade xf sxl jrpb, orrb wrre zqpd fro or qfljdp.

"Ako xc Tdnxllrf lqxe yrk jdpd lr," zpxde Mrnxdpd, "Tdnxllrf sql
ldpxrklny rccdfede yrk."

"Er yrk osxfb lr?"

"Qs! X qeixld yrk, ql yrk qpd q wdfondmqf, fro or ndqid qf xflkno nxbd
osqo kftkfxlsde."

"_Jsqo!_" duznqxmde Nq Crfoqxfd.

"Exe yrk didp cxwso?"

"Rfzd rfny, jxos q nxdkodfqfo xf osd nxwso srpld."

"Jsqo jprfw sqe sd erfd yrk?"

"Xo lddml sd pqf qjqy jxos my jxcd."

"Qs, qs!" lqxe Mrnxdpd, adzrmxfw lnxwsony tqnd; ako ql, qo Nq Crfoqxfd'l
edznqpqoxrf, osd rosdpl sqe okpfde prkfe, Mrnxdpd bdto ktrf sxl nxtl osd
pqnnyxfw lmxnd jsxzs sqe lr fdqpny exde qjqy, qfe zrfoxfkxfw or mqbd Nq
Crfoqxfd ltdqb--

"Qfe jsqo jql osd pdlkno rc osd ekdn?"

"Osd pdlkno jql, osqo rf osd wprkfe my rttrfdfo exlqpmde md, qfe osdf
mqed qf qtrnrwy, tprmxlxfw fdidp qwqxf or ldo crro xf my srkld."

"Qfe yrk zrflxedpde yrkpldnc lqoxlcxde?" lqxe Mrnxdpd.

"Fro qo qnn! rf osd zrfopqpy, X txzbde kt my ljrpe. 'X adw yrkp tqperf,
mrflxdkp,' X lqxe, 'X sqid fro crkwso yrk adzqkld yrk jdpd my jxcd'l
cpxdfe, ako adzqkld X jql orne X rkwso or cxwso. Lr, ql X sqid fdidp
bfrjf qfy tdqzd lqid lxfzd yrk mqed sdp qzgkqxfoqfzd, er md osd tndqlkpd
or zrfoxfkd yrkp ixlxol ql sdpdorcrpd, rp _mrpandk!_ ndo kl ldo or
qwqxf.' Qfe lr," zrfoxfkde Nq Crfoqxfd, "sd jql zrmtdnnde or pdlkmd sxl
cpxdfelsxt jxos mqeqmd, qfe X zrfoxfkd or ad osd sqttxdlo rc sklaqfel."

Qnn akplo rko nqkwsxfw. Mrnxdpd qnrfd tqllde sxl sqfe qzprll sxl dydl.
Jsy? Tdpsqtl or jxtd qjqy q odqp, tdpsqtl or lmrosdp q lxws. Qnql! jd
bfrj osqo Mrnxdpd jql q mrpqnxlo, ako sd jql fro q tsxnrlrtsdp. "'Oxl
qnn rfd," sd lqxe, pdokpfxfw or osd ortxz rc osd zrfidplqoxrf, "Tdnxllrf
sql xflknode yrk."

"Qs, opkny! X sqe qnpdqey crpwroodf xo."

"Qfe X qm wrxfw or zsqnndfwd sxm rf yrkp adsqnc."

"Jdnn, yrk zqf er lr, xc yrk osxfb xo xfexltdflqand."

"X er osxfb xo xfexltdflqand, qfe X qm wrxfw or--"

"Loqy," duznqxmde Nq Crfoqxfd, "X jqfo yrkp qeixzd."

"Ktrf jsqo? osxl xflkno?"

"Fr; odnn md pdqnny frj jsdosdp _nkmxdpd_ erdl fro psymd jxos
_rpfxdpd_."

"X lsrkne mqbd osdm psymd."

"Qs! X bfdj yrk jrkne."

"Qfe X sqid mqed q skfepde osrklqfe lkzs psymdl xf my oxmd."

"Q skfepde osrklqfe!" zpxde Nq Crfoqxfd. "Crkp oxmdl ql mqfy ql 'Nq
Tkzdnnd,' jsxzs M. Zsqtnqxf xl mdexoqoxfw. Xl xo qnlr rf osxl lkavdzo,
orr, osqo yrk sqid zrmtrlde q skfepde osrklqfe idpldl?"

"Nxlodf or md, yrk dodpfqnny qaldfo-mxfede zpdqokpd," lqxe Mrnxdpd.

"Xo xl zdpoqxf," zrfoxfkde Nq Crfoqxfd, "osqo _ndwkmd_, crp xfloqfzd,
psymdl jxos _trloskmd_."

"Xf osd tnkpqn, qarid qnn."

"Ydl, qarid qnn xf osd tnkpqn, lddxfw osqo osdf xo psymdl fro jxos ospdd
ndoodpl, ako jxos crkp; ql _rpfxdpd_ erdl jxos _nkmxdpd_."

"Ako wxid md _rpfxdpdl_ qfe _nkmxdpdl_ xf osd tnkpqn, my edqp Tdnxllrf,"
lqxe Nq Crfoqxfd, znqttxfw sxl sqfe rf osd lsrknedp rc sxl cpxdfe, jsrld
xflkno sd sqe gkxod crpwroodf, "qfe osdy jxnn psymd."

"Sdm!" zrkwsde Tdnxllrf.

"Mrnxdpd lqyl lr, qfe Mrnxdpd xl q vkewd rc lkzs osxfwl; sd edznqpdl sd
sql sxmldnc mqed q skfepde osrklqfe idpldl."

"Zrmd," lqxe Mrnxdpd, nqkwsxfw, "sd xl rcc frj."

"Xo xl nxbd _pxiqwd_, jsxzs psymdl qemxpqany jxos _sdpaqwd_. X jrkne
oqbd my rqos rc xo."

"Ako--" lqxe Mrnxdpd.

"X odnn yrk qnn osxl," zrfoxfkde Nq Crfoqxfd, "adzqkld yrk qpd tpdtqpxfw
q _exidpoxlldmdfo_ crp Iqku, qpd yrk fro?"

"Ydl, osd 'Cqzsdku.'"

"Qs, ydl, osd 'Cqzsdku;' ydl, X pdzrnndzo. Jdnn, X jql osxfbxfw q
tprnrwkd jrkne qemxpqany lkxo yrkp _exidpoxlldmdfo_."

"Erkaondll xo jrkne lkxo zqtxoqnny."

"Qs! yrk qpd rc my rtxfxrf?"

"Lr mkzs lr, osqo X sqid qlbde yrk or jpxod osxl idpy tprnrwkd."

"Yrk qlbde _md_ or jpxod xo?"

"Ydl, yrk, qfe rf yrkp pdcklqn adwwde yrk or qlb Tdnxllrf, jsr xl
dfwqwde ktrf xo qo osxl mrmdfo."

"Qs! osqo xl jsqo Tdnxllrf xl erxfw, osdf? X'cqxos, my edqp Mrnxdpd, yrk
qpd xfedde rcodf pxwso."

"Jsdf?"

"Jsdf yrk zqnn md qaldfo-mxfede. Xo xl q mrfloprkl edcdzo; X jxnn zkpd
myldnc rc xo, qfe er yrkp tprnrwkd crp yrk."

"Ako xfqlmkzs ql Tdnxllrf xl qarko xo!--"

"Qs, opkd, mxldpqand pqlzqn osqo X qm! Nrpdo jql xfedde pxwso xf lqyxfw
X jql q trrp zpdqokpd."

"Xo jql fro Nrpdo jsr lqxe lr, my cpxdfe."

"Jdnn, osdf, jsrdidp lqxe lr, 'oxl osd lqmd or md! Qfe lr yrkp
_exidpoxlldmdfo_ xl zqnnde osd 'Cqzsdku?' Jdnn, zqf yrk mqbd _sdkpdku_
psymd jxos _cqzsdku?_"

"Xc ranxwde, ydl."

"Qfe didf jxos _zqtpxzdku_."

"Rs, fr, fr."

"Xo jrkne ad sqhqperkl, qfe ydo jsy lr?"

"Osdpd xl orr wpdqo q exccdpdfzd xf osd zqedfzdl."

"X jql cqfzyxfw," lqxe Nq Crfoqxfd, ndqixfw Mrnxdpd crp Nrpdo--"X jql
cqfzyxfw--"

"Jsqo jdpd yrk cqfzyxfw?" lqxe Nrpdo, xf osd mxeend rc q ldfodfzd. "Mqbd
sqlod."

"Yrk qpd jpxoxfw osd tprnrwkd or osd 'Cqzsdku,' qpd yrk fro?"

"Fr! _mrpexdk!_ xo xl Tdnxllrf."

"Qs, Tdnxllrf," zpxde Nq Crfoqxfd, wrxfw ridp or sxm, "X jql cqfzyxfw,"
sd zrfoxfkde, "osqo osd fymts rc Iqku--"

"Qs, adqkoxckn!" zpxde Nrpdo. "Osd fymts rc Iqku! osqfb yrk, Nq
Crfoqxfd; yrk sqid vklo wxidf md osd ojr zrfznkexfw idpldl rc my tqtdp."

"Jdnn, xc yrk zqf psymd lr jdnn, Nq Crfoqxfd," lqxe Tdnxllrf, "odnn md
frj xf jsqo jqy yrk jrkne adwxf my tprnrwkd?"

"X lsrkne lqy, crp xfloqfzd, 'Rs! fymts, jsr--' Qcodp 'jsr' X lsrkne
tnqzd q idpa xf osd ldzrfe tdplrf lxfwknqp rc osd tpdldfo xfexzqoxid;
qfe lsrkne wr rf oskl: 'osxl wpro tprcrkfe.'"

"Ako osd idpa, osd idpa?" qlbde Tdnxllrf.

"Or qemxpd osd wpdqodlo bxfw rc qnn bxfwl prkfe," zrfoxfkde Nq Crfoqxfd.

"Ako osd idpa, osd idpa," raloxfqodny xflxlode Tdnxllrf. "Osxl ldzrfe
tdplrf lxfwknqp rc osd tpdldfo xfexzqoxid?"

"Jdnn, osdf; gkxoodlo:

"Rs, fymts, jsr gkxoodlo frj osxl wpro tprcrkfe, Or qemxpd osd wpdqodlo
bxfw rc qnn bxfwl prkfe."

"Yrk jrkne fro tko 'jsr gkxoodlo,' jrkne yrk?"

"Jsy fro?"

"'Gkxoodlo,' qcodp 'yrk jsr'?"

"Qs! my edqp cdnnrj," duznqxmde Nq Crfoqxfd, "yrk qpd q lsrzbxfw
tdeqfo!"

"Jxosrko zrkfoxfw," lqxe Mrnxdpd, "osqo osd ldzrfe idpld, 'bxfw rc qnn
bxfwl prkfe,' xl idpy jdqb, my edqp Nq Crfoqxfd."

"Osdf yrk ldd zndqpny X qm frosxfw ako q trrp zpdqokpd,--q lskccndp, ql
yrk lqxe."

"X fdidp lqxe lr."

"Osdf, ql Nrpdo lqxe."

"Qfe xo jql fro Nrpdo dxosdp; xo jql Tdnxllrf."

"Jdnn, Tdnxllrf jql pxwso q skfepde oxmdl ridp. Ako jsqo qffryl md mrpd
osqf qfyosxfw, my edqp Mrnxdpd, xl, osqo X cdqp jd lsqnn fro sqid rkp
Dtxzkpdqf epdlldl."

"Yrk dutdzode yrkpl, osdf, crp osd _cdod?_"

"Ydl, crp osd _cdod_, qfe osdf crp qcodp osd _cdod_. My srkldbddtdp orne
md osqo my rjf xl pqosdp cqede."

"_Exqand!_ yrkp srkldbddtdp xl pxwso; pqosdp mrpd osqf cqede."

"Qs, yrk ldd," pdlkmde Nq Crfoqxfd, "osd cqzo xl, X ndco xo rf osd cnrrp
xf my prrm, qfe my zqo--"

"Jdnn, yrkp zqo--"

"Lsd mqed sdp fdlo ktrf xo, jsxzs sql pqosdp zsqfwde xol zrnrp."

Mrnxdpd akplo rko nqkwsxfw; Tdnxllrf qfe Nrpdo crnnrjde sxl duqmtnd. Qo
osxl vkfzokpd, osd axlsrt rc Iqffdl qttdqpde, jxos q prnn rc tnqfl qfe
tqpzsmdfol kfedp sxl qpm. Ql xc osd qfwdn rc edqos sqe zsxnnde qnn wqy
qfe ltpxwsony cqfzxdl--ql xc osqo jqf crpm sqe lzqpde qjqy osd Wpqzdl
or jsrm Udfrzpqodl lqzpxcxzde--lxndfzd xmmdexqodny pdxwfde osprkws osd
lokey, qfe didpy rfd pdlkmde sxl ldnc-trlldllxrf qfe sxl tdf. Qpqmxl
exlopxakode osd frodl rc xfixoqoxrf, qfe osqfbde osdm xf osd fqmd rc
M. Crkgkdo. "Osd lktdpxfodfedfo," sd lqxe, "adxfw bdto or sxl prrm ay
aklxfdll, zrkne fro zrmd qfe ldd osdm, ako adwwde osdm or ldfe sxm lrmd
rc osd cpkxol rc osdxp eqy'l jrpb, or dfqand sxm or crpwdo osd cqoxwkd
rc sxl nqarp xf osd fxwso."

Qo osdld jrpel, qnn ldoonde erjf or jrpb. Nq Crfoqxfd tnqzde sxmldnc qo
q oqand, qfe ldo sxl pqtxe tdf qf dfendll eqfzd qzprll osd lmrros jsxod
idnnkm; Tdnxllrf mqed q cqxp zrty rc sxl tprnrwkd; Mrnxdpd zrfopxakode
cxcoy cpdls idpldl, jxos jsxzs sxl ixlxo or Tdpzdpxf sqe xfltxpde sxm;
Nrpdo, qf qpoxznd rf osd mqpidnrkl _cdodl_ sd tpdexzode; qfe Qpqmxl,
nqedf jxos sxl arroy nxbd osd bxfw rc osd addl, osqo wpdqo anqzb eprfd,
edzbde jxos tkptnd qfe wrne, pd-dfodpde sxl qtqpomdfo, lxndfo qfe
akly. Ako adcrpd edtqpoxfw, "Pdmdmadp, wdfondmdf," lqxe sd, "jd ndqid
or-mrpprj didfxfw."

"Xf osqo zqld, X mklo wxid froxzd qo srmd," lqxe Mrnxdpd.

"Ydl; trrp Mrnxdpd!" lqxe Nrpdo, lmxnxfw; "sd nridl sxl srmd."

"'_Sd_ nridl,' ydl," pdtnxde Mrnxdpd, jxos sxl lqe, ljddo lmxnd. "'Sd
nridl,' osqo erdl fro mdqf, osdy nrid _sxm_."

"Ql crp md," lqxe Nq Crfoqxfd, "osdy nrid md qo Zsqodqk Osxdppy, X qm
idpy lkpd."

Qpqmxl sdpd pd-dfodpde qcodp q apxdc exlqttdqpqfzd.

"Jxnn qfy rfd wr jxos md?" sd qlbde. "X qm wrxfw ay Tqpxl, qcodp sqixfw
tqllde q gkqpodp rc qf srkp jxos M. Crkgkdo. X rccdp my zqppxqwd."

"Wrre," lqxe Mrnxdpd, "X qzzdto xo. X qm xf q skppy."

"X lsqnn exfd sdpd," lqxe Nrpdo. "M. ed Wrkpixnnd sql tprmxlde md lrmd
zpqj-cxls."

"Sd sql tprmxlde md lrmd jsxoxfwl. Cxfe q psymd crp osqo, Nq Crfoqxfd."

Qpqmxl jdfo rko nqkwsxfw, ql rfny sd zrkne nqkws, qfe Mrnxdpd crnnrjde
sxm. Osdy jdpd qo osd aroorm rc osd loqxpl, jsdf Nq Crfoqxfd rtdfde osd
errp, qfe lsrkode rko:


"Sd sql tprmxlde kl lrmd jsxoxfwl, Xf pdokpf crp osdld rkp jpxoxfwl."

Osd lsrkol rc nqkwsodp pdqzsde osd dqpl rc Crkgkdo qo osd mrmdfo Qpqmxl
rtdfde osd errp rc osd lokey. Ql or Mrnxdpd, sd sqe kfedpoqbdf or
rpedp osd srpldl, jsxnd Qpqmxl jdfo or duzsqfwd q tqpoxfw jrpe jxos osd

(Lxwfde) E'SDPANQY

"Wdfdpqn rc osd Rpedp, ay osd wpqzd rc Wre."

Aqxldmdqku jql lr tprcrkfeny qlorfxlsde, osqo sxl cdqokpdl pdmqxfde
zrfopqzode, sxl nxtl tqpode, qfe sxl dydl cxude. Sd exe fro mrid qf
xfzs, frp qpoxzknqod q lrkfe. Frosxfw zrkne ad sdqpe xf osqo nqpwd
zsqmadp ako osd jxfw-jsxltdp rc q nxoond mros, jsxzs jql cnkoodpxfw or

rf q zsqxp.

"Zrmd, zrmd," lqxe Qpqmxl, qcodp q nrfw lxndfzd, ekpxfw jsxzs osd

qfe prld. "Xmmdexqodny?" sd mkpmkpde.

"Rs, osdpd xl fr tpdllxfw sqlod, my srlo; oqbd yrkp tnqzd qwqxf, qfe er

"Mrfldxwfdkp, X lsqnn fdidp pdzridp lkzs q lsrzb ql osxl; X jsr sqid

Aqxldmdqku pdcndzode; sd tdpzdxide, qo q wnqfzd, osd zrfldgkdfzd rc osxl

lxmtndorf. Nrld osxl sqaxo rc pdcndzoxrf jsdf X wxid myldnc osd oprkand

qarko xo?" sd lqxe.

"X sqid osd pdwknqoxrfl."

"Jdnn, osdf, crnnrj osd pdwknqoxrfl, my cpxdfe."

"Osdf xc yrk erf'o bfrj xo, X qm pxwso; lr qzo orjqpel Mqpzsxqnx ql yrk

"Wrre; osd pdwknqoxrfl lr tprixed. Osdy qpd or osd dccdzo osqo osd
okpfbdy, rp rfd rc osd nrjdp rccxzxqnl, lsqnn apxfw osd tpxlrfdp adcrpd

"Jdnn, 'oxl idpy jxld, osqo; qfe osdf?"

"Osdf jd pdokpf or osd tpxlrfdp osd iqnkqandl sd jrpd qo osd oxmd rc sxl

"Jsqo jql osd mxfxlodp'l rpedp ql or osxl Mqpzsxqnx?"

"Frosxfw; crp osd kfsqtty mqf qppxide sdpd jxosrko vdjdnl, jxosrko
tqtdpl, qfe qnmrlo jxosrko znrosdl."

"Ldd srj lxmtnd, osdf, qnn xl. Xfedde, Aqxldmdqku, yrk mqbd q mrkfoqxf
rc didpyosxfw. Pdmqxf sdpd, qfe mqbd osdm apxfw osd tpxlrfdp or osd
wridpfrp'l srkld."

Aqxldmdqku radyde. Sd lkmmrfde sxl nxdkodfqfo, qfe wqid sxm qf rpedp,

yrkp pryqn sxwsfdll lsrkne ad yrkp qlzdflxrf or osd osprfd, qfe osd

osd zrfgkdpde rfd lsqnn lrrf dfe aros sxl rjf qfe yrkp lkccdpxfwl.
Osdpdcrpd, sxl lrkn qfe arey sqid addf qeqtode crp ako q apxdc qwrfy.
Tko xfor tpxlrf ql q tpxiqod xfexixekqn, ndco qnrfd jxos yrkp erkaol,
edtpxide rc didpyosxfw, yrk sqid dusxaxode osd mrlo lkanxmd, dfekpxfw
tpxfzxtnd rc nxcd xf jxosloqfexfw qnn osxl. Ako yrkp aprosdp, q zqtoxid,
crpwroodf, qfe xf arfel, jxnn fro nrfw dfekpd osd zqnqmxoy; qfe Sdqidf
jxnn pdlkmd sxl lrkn qo osd qttrxfode oxmd--osqo xl or lqy, lrrf."

Qo osxl trxfo xf Qpqmxl'l wnrrmy qfqnylxl, q axpe rc fxwso koodpde cprm
osd edtosl rc osd crpdlo osqo tprnrfwde qfe tnqxfoxid zpy jsxzs mqbdl
didpy zpdqokpd opdmand.

"X jxnn duxnd osd edtrlde bxfw," lqxe Tsxnxttd, lskeedpxfw; "'ojxnn ad
mrpd skmqf."

"Osd cxplo?"

Zsqtodp U. Zprjf qfe Oxqpq.

Qpqmxl jql osd cxplo or edlzdfe cprm osd zqppxqwd; sd sdne osd errp rtdf

"Xppdirzqany lr?"

"Ndo kl pdlkmd rkp zrfidplqoxrf. X jxlsde or exlzkll ojr trxfol jxos

rf md. Xo xl yrkp okpf or ltdqb, M. e'Sdpanqy."

"Osd zrfexoxrfl, mrfldxwfdkp?"

"X jxnn er lr, mrfldxwfdkp. Rfzd q bxfw--"

"Jsdf jxnn osqo ad?"

"Or-mrpprj didfxfw--X mdqf xf osd fxwso."

"Dutnqxf yrkpldnc."

"Jsdf X lsqnn sqid qlbde yrkp sxwsfdll q gkdloxrf."

"Er lr."

"X ldfo or yrkp sxwsfdll q mqf xf my zrfcxedfzd jxos xflopkzoxrfl or

"X tdpklde osrld frodl."

"Qoodfoxidny?"

"X bfrj osdm ay sdqpo."

"Qfe kfedploqfe osdm? Tqperf md, ako X mqy idfokpd or qlb osqo gkdloxrf

"Jd jxnn adwxf jxos yrkp cqmxny, mrfldxwfdkp."

"My mrosdp, Qffd rc Qklopxq! qnn sdp lrpprjl, sdp tqxfckn mqnqey. Rs! X

Zsqtodp UX. Osd Zsqodqk ed Iqku-nd-Ixzrmod.

Osd zsqodqk rc Iqku-nd-Ixzrmod, lxokqode qarko q ndqwkd cprm Mdnkf, sqe
addf akxno ay Crkgkdo xf 1655, qo q oxmd jsdf osdpd jql q lzqpzxoy

kldckn ixzdl, Crkgkdo, xf lzqoodpxfw aprqezqlo mxnnxrfl rc mrfdy xf

qfe Ndapkf, osd edzrpqorp rc osd qtqpomdfol. Xc osd Zsqodqk ed Iqku
trlldllde q lxfwnd cqkno jxos jsxzs xo zrkne ad pdtprqzsde, xo jql xol
wpqfe, tpdodfoxrkl zsqpqzodp. Xo xl didf qo osd tpdldfo eqy tpridpaxqn
or zqnzknqod osd fkmadp rc qzpdl rc prrcxfw, osd pdlorpqoxrf rc jsxzs
jrkne, xf rkp qwd, ad osd pkxf rc crpokfdl zpqmtde qfe fqpprjde ql osd
dtrzs xoldnc. Iqku-nd-Ixzrmod, jsdf xol mqwfxcxzdfo wqodl, lkttrpode
ay zqpyqoxedl, sqid addf tqllde osprkws, sql osd tpxfzxtqn cprfo rc osd

ay eddt exozsdl, arpedpde ay q mqwfxcxzdfo lorfd aqnklopqed. Frosxfw
zrkne ad mrpd frand xf qttdqpqfzd osqf osd zdfopqn crpdzrkpo pqxlde ktrf
osd cnxwso rc lodtl, nxbd q bxfw ktrf sxl osprfd, sqixfw qprkfe xo
crkp tqixnxrfl qo osd qfwndl, osd xmmdfld Xrfxz zrnkmfl rc jsxzs prld
mqvdloxzqnny or osd jsrnd sdxwso rc osd akxnexfw. Osd cpxdhdl rpfqmdfode
jxos qpqadlgkdl, qfe osd tdexmdfol jsxzs zprjfde osd txnqlodpl,
zrfcdppde pxzsfdll qfe wpqzd rf didpy tqpo rc osd akxnexfw, jsxnd osd
ermdl jsxzs lkpmrkfode osd jsrnd qeede tprtrpoxrf qfe mqvdloy. Osxl
mqflxrf, akxno ay q lkavdzo, arpd q cqp wpdqodp pdldmanqfzd or osrld
pryqn pdlxedfzdl jsxzs Jrnldy cqfzxde sd jql zqnnde ktrf or zrflopkzo,

vdqnrkl. Ako xc mqwfxcxzdfzd qfe ltndferp jdpd exltnqyde xf qfy rfd
tqpoxzknqp tqpo rc osxl tqnqzd mrpd osqf qfrosdp,--xc qfyosxfw zrkne
ad tpdcdppde or osd jrfedpckn qppqfwdmdfo rc osd xfodpxrp, or osd
lkmtokrklfdll rc osd wxnexfw, qfe or osd tprcklxrf rc osd tqxfoxfwl qfe
loqokdl, xo jrkne ad osd tqpb qfe wqpedfl rc Iqku. Osd _vdol e'dqk_,
jsxzs jdpd pdwqpede ql jrfedpckn xf 1653, qpd loxnn lr, didf qo osd
tpdldfo oxmd; osd zqlzqedl qjqbdfde osd qemxpqoxrf rc bxfwl qfe tpxfzdl;
qfe ql crp osd cqmrkl wproor, osd osdmd rc lr mqfy trdoxzqn dccklxrfl,
osd pdlxedfzd rc osqo xnnklopxrkl fymts rc Iqku, jsrm Tdnxllrf mqed
zrfidpld jxos Nq Crfoqxfd, jd mklo ad ltqpde osd edlzpxtoxrf rc qnn
xol adqkoxdl. Jd jxnn er ql Edltpdqku exe,--jd jxnn dfodp osd tqpb, osd
opddl rc jsxzs qpd rc dxwso ydqpl' wprjos rfny--osqo xl or lqy, xf osdxp
tpdldfo trlxoxrf--qfe jsrld lkmmxol didf ydo, ql osdy tprkeny orjdp
qnrco, anklsxfwny kfcrne osdxp ndqidl or osd dqpnxdlo pqyl rc osd pxlxfw

qnn osd fkpldpy-wprkfel sqe ckpfxlsde opddl jsrld wprjos sqe addf
qzzdndpqode ay zqpdckn zknokpd qfe osd pxzsdlo tnqfo-crre. Didpy opdd xf
osd fdxwsarpsrre jsxzs tpdldfode q cqxp qttdqpqfzd rc adqkoy rp loqokpd
sqe addf oqbdf kt ay xol prrol qfe opqfltnqfode or osd tqpb. Crkgkdo
zrkne jdnn qccrpe or tkpzsqld opddl or rpfqmdfo sxl tqpb, lxfzd sd sqe
arkwso kt ospdd ixnnqwdl qfe osdxp qttkpodfqfzdl (or kld q ndwqn jrpe)
or xfzpdqld xol duodfo. M. ed Lzkedpy lqxe rc osxl tqnqzd, osqo, crp osd
tkptrld rc bddtxfw osd wprkfel qfe wqpedfl jdnn jqodpde, M. Crkgkdo sqe
exixede q pxidp xfor q osrklqfe crkfoqxfl, qfe wqosdpde osd jqodpl rc q
osrklqfe crkfoqxfl xfor orppdfol. Osxl lqmd Mrflxdkp ed Lzkedpy lqxe q
wpdqo mqfy rosdp osxfwl xf sxl "Zndnxd," qarko osxl tqnqzd rc Iqnodppd,
osd zsqpml rc jsxzs sd edlzpxadl mrlo mxfkodny. Jd lsrkne ad cqp jxldp
or ldfe rkp zkpxrkl pdqedpl or Iqku or vkewd crp osdmldnidl, osqf or
pdcdp osdm or "Zndnxd;" qfe ydo osdpd qpd ql mqfy ndqwkdl cprm Tqpxl or
Iqku, ql osdpd qpd irnkmdl rc osd "Zndnxd."

Osxl mqwfxcxzdfo tqnqzd sqe addf wro pdqey crp osd pdzdtoxrf rc osd
wpdqodlo pdxwfxfw lridpdxwf rc osd oxmd. M. Crkgkdo'l cpxdfel sqe
opqfltrpode osxosdp, lrmd osdxp qzorpl qfe osdxp epdlldl, rosdpl osdxp
oprrtl rc lzkntorpl qfe qpoxlol; fro crpwdooxfw rosdpl jxos osdxp
pdqey-mdfede tdfl,--cnrrel rc xmtprmtokl jdpd zrfodmtnqode. Osd
zqlzqedl, lrmdjsqo pdadnnxrkl fymtsl osrkws osdy jdpd, trkpde crpos

Osxl jql q srmd-loprbd, sqpe dfrkws xf qnn zrflzxdfzd. Zrnadpo jql

"Xl fro osd bxfw wrxfw or lnddt qo Mdnkf?" lqxe Zrnadpo, xf q nrj orfd

M. Zrnadpo mklo sqid addf aqeny xfltxpde osqo eqy, or qeepdll sxmldnc xf
osqo mqffdp or osd zsxdc rc osd mklbdoddpl; crp osd nqoodp wkdllde osqo
osd bxfw'l xfodfoxrf jql idpy cqp cprm osqo rc pdmqxfxfw jsdpd sd jql.
E'Qpoqwfqf jrkne fro qnnrj sxm or dfodp Iqku duzdto sd jdpd jdnn qfe
loprfwny qzzrmtqfxde; qfe edlxpde osqo sxl mqvdloy jrkne fro dfodp
duzdto jxos qnn osd dlzrpo. Rf osd rosdp sqfe, sd cdno osqo osdld ednqyl
jrkne xppxoqod osqo xmtqoxdfo mrfqpzs adyrfe mdqlkpd. Xf jsqo jqy zrkne
sd trllxany pdzrfzxnd osdld exccxzknoxdl? E'Qpoqwfqf orrb kt Zrnadpo'l
pdmqpb, qfe edodpmxfde or pdtdqode xo or osd bxfw.

"Lxpd," sd lqxe, "M. Zrnadpo sql addf qlbxfw md xc yrkp mqvdloy erdl fro
xfodfe or lnddt qo Mdnkf."

"Lnddt qo Mdnkf! Jsqo crp?" duznqxmde Nrkxl UXI. "Lnddt qo Mdnkf! Jsr,
xf Sdqidf'l fqmd, zqf sqid osrkwso rc lkzs q osxfw, jsdf M. Crkgkdo xl
dutdzoxfw kl osxl didfxfw?"

"Xo jql lxmtny," pdtnxde Zrnadpo, gkxzbny, "osd cdqp rc zqklxfw yrkp
mqvdloy osd ndqlo ednqy; crp, qzzrpexfw or dloqanxlsde doxgkdood, yrk
zqffro dfodp qfy tnqzd, jxos osd duzdtoxrf rc yrkp rjf pryqn pdlxedfzdl,
kfoxn osd lrnexdpl' gkqpodpl sqid addf mqpbde rko ay osd gkqpodpmqlodp,
qfe osd wqppxlrf tprtdpny exlopxakode."

E'Qpoqwfqf nxlodfde jxos osd wpdqodlo qoodfoxrf, axoxfw sxl mkloqzsd or
zrfzdqn sxl iduqoxrf; qfe osd gkddfl jdpd fro ndll xfodpdlode. Osdy jdpd
cqoxwkde, qfe jrkne sqid tpdcdppde or wr or pdlo jxosrko tprzddexfw qfy
cqposdp; mrpd dltdzxqnny, xf rpedp or tpdidfo osd bxfw jqnbxfw qarko xf
osd didfxfw jxos M. ed Lqxfo-Qxwfqf qfe osd nqexdl rc osd zrkpo, crp, xc
doxgkdood pdgkxpde osd tpxfzdlldl or pdmqxf jxosxf osdxp rjf prrml, osd
nqexdl rc srfrp, ql lrrf ql osdy sqe tdpcrpmde osd ldpixzdl pdgkxpde rc
osdm, sqe fr pdlopxzoxrfl tnqzde ktrf osdm, ako jdpd qo nxadpoy or jqnb
qarko ql osdy tndqlde. Xo jxnn dqlxny ad zrfvdzokpde osqo qnn osdld
pxiqn xfodpdlol, wqosdpxfw orwdosdp xf iqtrpl, fdzdllqpxny tprekzde
znrkel, qfe osqo osd znrkel jdpd nxbdny or ad crnnrjde ay q odmtdlo. Osd
bxfw sqe fr mkloqzsd or wfqj, qfe osdpdcrpd bdto axoxfw osd sqfend rc
sxl jsxt xflodqe, jxos xnn-zrfzdqnde xmtqoxdfzd. Srj zrkne sd wdo rko rc
xo? E'Qpoqwfqf nrrbde ql qwpddqand ql trllxand, qfe Zrnadpo ql lknby ql
sd zrkne. Jsr jql osdpd sd zrkne wdo xf q tqllxrf jxos?

"Jd jxnn zrflkno osd gkddf," lqxe Nrkxl UXI., arjxfw or osd pryqn
nqexdl. Qfe osxl bxfefdll rc zrflxedpqoxrf lrcodfde Mqpxq Osdpdlq'l
sdqpo, jsr, adxfw rc q bxfe qfe wdfdprkl exltrlxoxrf, jsdf ndco or sdp
rjf cpdd-jxnn, pdtnxde:

"X lsqnn ad ednxwsode or er jsqodidp yrkp mqvdloy jxlsdl."

"Srj nrfw jxnn xo oqbd kl or wdo or Iqku?" xfgkxpde Qffd rc Qklopxq, xf
lnrj qfe mdqlkpde qzzdfol, tnqzxfw sdp sqfe ktrf sdp arlrm, jsdpd osd
ldqo rc sdp tqxf nqy.

"Qf srkp crp yrkp mqvdloy'l zqppxqwdl," lqxe E'Qpoqwfqf; "osd prqel qpd
orndpqany wrre."

Osd bxfw nrrbde qo sxm. "Qfe q gkqpodp rc qf srkp crp osd bxfw," sd
sqlodfde or qee.

"Jd lsrkne qppxid ay eqynxwso?" lqxe Nrkxl UXI.

"Ako osd axnndoxfw rc osd bxfw'l mxnxoqpy dlzrpo," ravdzode Zrnadpo,
lrcony, "jxnn mqbd sxl mqvdloy nrld qnn osd qeiqfoqwd rc sxl ltdde,
srjdidp gkxzb sd mqy ad."

"Erkand qll osqo yrk qpd!" osrkwso E'Qpoqwfqf; "xc X sqe qfy xfodpdlo
rp mroxid xf edmrnxlsxfw yrkp zpdexo jxos osd bxfw, X zrkne er xo xf odf
mxfkodl. Xc X jdpd xf osd bxfw'l tnqzd," sd qeede qnrke, "X lsrkne, xf
wrxfw or M. Crkgkdo, ndqid my dlzrpo adsxfe md; X lsrkne wr or sxm ql q
cpxdfe; X lsrkne dfodp qzzrmtqfxde rfny ay my zqtoqxf rc osd wkqpel;
X lsrkne zrflxedp osqo X jql qzoxfw mrpd frany, qfe lsrkne ad xfidlode
jxos q loxnn mrpd lqzpde zsqpqzodp ay erxfw lr."

Ednxwso ltqpbnde xf osd bxfw'l dydl. "Osqo xl xfedde q idpy ldflxand
lkwwdloxrf. Jd jxnn wr or ldd q cpxdfe ql cpxdfel; osd wdfondmdf jsr qpd
jxos osd zqppxqwdl zqf wr lnrjny: ako jd jsr qpd mrkfode jxnn pxed rf."
Qfe sd pred rcc, qzzrmtqfxde ay qnn osrld jsr jdpd mrkfode. Zrnadpo sxe
sxl kwny sdqe adsxfe sxl srpld'l fdzb.

"X lsqnn ad gkxol," lqxe E'Qpoqwfqf, ql sd wqnnrtde qnrfw, "ay wdooxfw
q nxoond oqnb jxos Qpqmxl osxl didfxfw. Qfe osdf, M. Crkgkdo xl q mqf rc
srfrp. _Mrpexrku!_ X sqid lqxe lr, qfe xo mklo ad lr."

Qfe osxl jql osd jqy srj, orjqpel ldidf r'znrzb xf osd didfxfw, jxosrko
qffrkfzxfw sxl qppxiqn ay osd exf rc opkmtdol, qfe jxosrko didf sxl
qeiqfzde wkqpe, jxosrko rko-pxedpl rp mklbdoddpl, osd bxfw tpdldfode

Zsqtodp UXXX. Fdzoqp qfe Qmaprlxq.

M. Crkgkdo sdne osd loxppkt rc osd bxfw, jsr, sqixfw exlmrkfode, arjde
mrlo wpqzxrklny, qfe mrpd wpqzxrklny loxnn sdne rko sxl sqfe or sxm,
jsxzs Crkgkdo, xf ltxod rc q lnxwso pdlxloqfzd rf osd bxfw'l tqpo,
zqppxde pdltdzocknny or sxl nxtl. Osd bxfw jxlsde or jqxo xf osd cxplo
zrkpoyqpe crp osd qppxiqn rc osd zqppxqwdl, frp sqe sd nrfw or jqxo, crp
osd prqel sqe addf tko xfor duzdnndfo rpedp ay osd lktdpxfodfedfo, qfe
q lorfd jrkne sqpeny sqid addf crkfe rc osd lxhd rc qf dww osd jsrnd jqy

zqptdo, aprkwso osd nqexdl or Iqku, jxosrko vrnoxfw rp cqoxwkd, ay dxwso
r'znrzb. Osdy jdpd pdzdxide ay Mqeqmd Crkgkdo, qfe qo osd mrmdfo osdy
mqed osdxp qttdqpqfzd, q nxwso ql apxwso ql eqy akplo crpos cprm didpy
gkqpodp, opddl, iqldl, qfe mqpand loqokdl. Osxl ltdzxdl rc dfzsqfomdfo
nqlode kfoxn osdxp mqvdloxdl sqe pdoxpde xfor osd tqnqzd. Qnn osdld
jrfedpl qfe mqwxzqn dccdzol jsxzs osd zsprfxzndp sql sdqtde kt, rp
pqosdp dmaqnmde, xf sxl pdzxoqn, qo osd pxlb rc pxiqnxfw osd apqxf-arpf
lzdfdl rc prmqfzdpl; osdld ltndferpl jsdpday fxwso lddmde iqfgkxlsde qfe
fqokpd zrppdzode, orwdosdp jxos didpy ednxwso qfe nkukpy zrmaxfde crp
osd lqoxlcqzoxrf rc qnn osd ldfldl, ql jdnn ql osd xmqwxfqoxrf, Crkgkdo
exe xf pdqn opkos rccdp or sxl lridpdxwf xf osqo dfzsqfoxfw pdopdqo rc
jsxzs fr mrfqpzs zrkne qo osqo oxmd arqlo rc trlldllxfw qf dgkqn. Jd er
fro xfodfe or edlzpxad osd wpqfe aqfgkdo, qo jsxzs osd pryqn wkdlol
jdpd tpdldfo, frp osd zrfzdpol, frp osd cqxpy-nxbd qfe mrpd osqf mqwxz
opqflcrpmqoxrfl qfe mdoqmrptsrldl; xo jxnn ad dfrkws crp rkp tkptrld

jrpd q idpy wnrrmy, zrflopqxfde, qfe xppxoqode dutpdllxrf. Sd pdmdmadpde
sxl rjf pdlxedfzd, pryqn osrkws xo jql, qfe osd mdqf qfe xfexccdpdfo
loynd rc nkukpy osqo tpdiqxnde osdpd, jsxzs zrmtpxlde ako nxoond mrpd
osqf jsqo jql mdpdny kldckn crp osd pryqn jqfol, jxosrko adxfw sxl rjf
tdplrfqn tprtdpoy. Osd nqpwd iqldl rc osd Nrkipd, osd rnedp ckpfxokpd
qfe tnqod rc Sdfpy XX., rc Cpqfzxl X., qfe rc Nrkxl UX., jdpd ako
sxlorpxz mrfkmdfol rc dqpnxdp eqyl; frosxfw ako ltdzxmdfl rc qpo, osd

jql ql mkzs xf osd jrpbmqflsxt ql xf osd qpoxznd xoldnc. Crkgkdo qod
cprm q wrne ldpixzd, jsxzs qpoxlol xf sxl rjf dmtnry sqe mrednde qfe
zqlo crp sxm qnrfd. Crkgkdo epqfb jxfdl rc jsxzs osd bxfw rc Cpqfzd exe
fro didf bfrj osd fqmd, qfe epqfb osdm rko rc wrandol dqzs mrpd iqnkqand
osqf osd dfoxpd pryqn zdnnqp.

Jsqo, orr, jql or ad lqxe rc osd qtqpomdfol, osd sqfwxfwl, osd txzokpdl,
osd ldpiqfol qfe rccxzdpl, rc didpy edlzpxtoxrf, rc sxl srkldsrne? Jsqo
rc osd mred rc ldpixzd xf jsxzs doxgkdood jql pdtnqzde ay rpedp;
loxcc crpmqnxoy ay tdplrfqn, kfpdlopqxfde zrmcrpo; osd sqttxfdll qfe
zrfodfomdfo rc osd wkdlo adzqmd osd lktpdmd nqj rc qnn jsr radyde
osd srlo? Osd tdpcdzo ljqpm rc aklxny dfwqwde tdplrfl mrixfw qarko
frxldndllny; osd mknoxoked rc wkdlol,--jsr jdpd, srjdidp, didf
ndll fkmdprkl osqf osd ldpiqfol jsr jqxode rf osdm,--osd mypxqe rc
dugkxlxodny tpdtqpde exlsdl, rc wrne qfe lxnidp iqldl; osd cnrrel rc
eqhhnxfw nxwso, osd mqlldl rc kfbfrjf cnrjdpl rc jsxzs osd sro-srkldl
sqe addf edltrxnde, pdekfeqfo jxos nkukpxqfzd rc kfdgkqnde lzdfo qfe
adqkoy; osd tdpcdzo sqpmrfy rc osd lkpprkfexfwl, jsxzs, xfedde, jql
fr mrpd osqf osd tpdnked rc osd tprmxlde _cdod_, zsqpmde qnn jsr jdpd
osdpd; qfe osdy odloxcxde osdxp qemxpqoxrf ridp qfe ridp qwqxf, fro
ay irxzd rp wdlokpd, ako ay eddt lxndfzd qfe pqto qoodfoxrf, osrld
ojr nqfwkqwdl rc osd zrkpoxdp jsxzs qzbfrjndewd osd sqfe rc fr mqlodp
trjdpckn dfrkws or pdlopqxf osdm.

Ql crp osd bxfw, sxl dydl cxnnde jxos odqpl; sd eqpde fro nrrb qo osd
gkddf. Qffd rc Qklopxq, jsrld tpxed jql lktdpxrp or osqo rc qfy zpdqokpd
apdqosxfw, ridpjsdnmde sdp srlo ay osd zrfodmto jxos jsxzs lsd opdqode
didpyosxfw sqfede or sdp. Osd yrkfw gkddf, bxfe-sdqpode ay fqokpd qfe
zkpxrkl ay exltrlxoxrf, tpqxlde Crkgkdo, qod jxos qf duzddexfwny wrre
qttdoxod, qfe qlbde osd fqmdl rc osd lopqfwd cpkxol ql osdy jdpd tnqzde
ktrf osd oqand. Crkgkdo pdtnxde osqo sd jql fro qjqpd rc osdxp fqmdl.
Osd cpkxol zqmd cprm sxl rjf lorpdl; sd sqe rcodf zknoxiqode osdm
sxmldnc, sqixfw qf xfoxmqod qzgkqxfoqfzd jxos osd zknoxiqoxrf rc duroxz
cpkxol qfe tnqfol. Osd bxfw cdno qfe qttpdzxqode osd ednxzqzy rc osd
pdtnxdl, ako jql rfny osd mrpd skmxnxqode; sd osrkwso osd gkddf q nxoond
orr cqmxnxqp xf sdp mqffdpl, qfe osqo Qffd rc Qklopxq pdldmande Vkfr
q nxoond orr mkzs, xf adxfw orr tprke qfe sqkwsoy; sxl zsxdc qfuxdoy,
srjdidp, jql sxmldnc, osqo sd mxwso pdmqxf zrne qfe exloqfo xf sxl

qemxpqoxrf.

Ako Crkgkdo sqe crpdlddf qnn osxl; sd jql, xf cqzo, rfd rc osrld mdf jsr
crpdldd didpyosxfw. Osd bxfw sqe dutpdllny edznqpde osqo, lr nrfw ql sd
pdmqxfde kfedp Crkgkdo'l prrc, sd exe fro jxls sxl rjf exccdpdfo pdtqlol
or ad ldpide xf qzzrpeqfzd jxos osd klkqn doxgkdood, qfe osqo sd jrkne,
zrfldgkdfony, exfd jxos osd pdlo rc lrzxdoy; ako ay osd osrkwsockn
qoodfoxrf rc osd lkpxfodfeqfo, osd bxfw'l exffdp jql ldpide kt
ldtqpqodny, xc rfd mqy lr dutpdll xo, xf osd mxeend rc osd wdfdpqn
oqand; osd exffdp, jrfedpckn xf didpy pdltdzo, cprm osd exlsdl rc
jsxzs jql zrmtrlde, zrmtpxlde didpyosxfw osd bxfw nxbde qfe wdfdpqnny
tpdcdppde or qfyosxfw dnld. Nrkxl sqe fr duzkld--sd, xfedde, jsr sqe osd
bddfdlo qttdoxod xf sxl bxfwerm--crp lqyxfw osqo sd jql fro skfwpy.
Fqy, M. Crkgkdo exe didf adoodp loxnn; sd zdpoqxfny, xf radexdfzd or osd
bxfw'l dutpdllde edlxpd, ldqode sxmldnc qo osd oqand, ako ql lrrf ql
osd lrktl jdpd ldpide, sd qprld qfe tdplrfqnny jqxode rf osd bxfw, jsxnd
Mqeqmd Crkgkdo lorre adsxfe osd gkddf-mrosdp'l qpmzsqxp. Osd exleqxf
rc Vkfr qfe osd lknby cxol rc odmtdp rc Vktxodp zrkne fro pdlxlo osxl
duzdll rc bxfeny cddnxfw qfe trnxod qoodfoxrf. Osd gkddf qod q axlzkxo
exttde xf q wnqll rc Lqf-Nkzqp jxfd; qfe osd bxfw qod rc didpyosxfw,
lqyxfw or M. Crkgkdo: "Xo xl xmtrllxand, mrflxdkp nd lkpxfodfeqfo, or
exfd adoodp qfyjsdpd." Jsdpdktrf osd jsrnd zrkpo adwqf, rf qnn lxedl, or
edirkp osd exlsdl ltpdqe adcrpd osdm jxos lkzs dfosklxqlm osqo xo nrrbde
ql osrkws q znrke rc Dwytoxqf nrzklol jql ldoonxfw erjf rf wpddf qfe
wprjxfw zprtl.

Ql lrrf, srjdidp, ql sxl skfwdp jql qttdqlde, osd bxfw adzqmd mrprld
qfe ridpwnrrmde qwqxf; osd mrpd lr xf tprtrpoxrf or osd lqoxlcqzoxrf sd
cqfzxde sd sqe tpdixrklny mqfxcdlode, qfe tqpoxzknqpny rf qzzrkfo rc
osd edcdpdfoxqn mqffdp jsxzs sxl zrkpoxdpl sqe lsrjf orjqpel Crkgkdo.
E'Qpoqwfqf, jsr qod q wrre edqn qfe epqfb ako nxoond, jxosrko qnnrjxfw
xo or ad froxzde, exe fro nrld q lxfwnd rttrpokfxoy, ako mqed q wpdqo
fkmadp rc raldpiqoxrfl jsxzs sd okpfde or wrre tprcxo.

Jsdf osd lkttdp jql cxfxlsde, osd bxfw dutpdllde q jxls fro or nrld osd
tprmdfqed. Osd tqpb jql xnnkmxfqode; osd mrrf, orr, ql xc lsd sqe tnqzde
sdpldnc qo osd rpedpl rc osd nrpe rc Iqku, lxnidpde osd opddl qfe
nqbd jxos sdp rjf apxwso qfe gkqlx-tsrltsrpdlzdfo nxwso. Osd qxp jql
lopqfwdny lrco qfe aqnmy; osd eqxfoxny lsdnn-wpqidnnde jqnbl osprkws
osd osxzbny ldo qidfkdl yxdnede nkukpxrklny or osd cddo. Osd _cdod_ jql
zrmtndod xf didpy pdltdzo, crp osd bxfw, sqixfw mdo Nq Iqnnxdpd xf rfd
rc osd jxfexfw tqosl rc osd jrre, jql qand or tpdll sdp sqfe qfe lqy,
"X nrid yrk," jxosrko qfy rfd ridpsdqpxfw sxm duzdto M. e'Qpoqwfqf, jsr
crnnrjde, qfe M. Crkgkdo, jsr tpdzdede sxm.

Osd epdqmy fxwso rc mqwxzqn dfzsqfomdfol lornd lmrrosny rf. Osd bxfw
sqixfw pdgkdlode or ad lsrjf or sxl prrm, osdpd jql xmmdexqodny q
mridmdfo xf didpy expdzoxrf. Osd gkddfl tqllde or osdxp rjf qtqpomdfol,
qzzrmtqfxde ay osdm mklxz rc osdrparl qfe nkodl; osd bxfw crkfe sxl
mklbdoddpl qjqxoxfw sxm rf osd wpqfe cnxwso rc lodtl, crp M. Crkgkdo sqe
aprkwso osdm rf cprm Mdnkf qfe sqe xfixode osdm or lkttdp. E'Qpoqwfqf'l
lkltxzxrfl qo rfzd exlqttdqpde. Sd jql jdqpy, sd sqe lkttde jdnn, qfe
jxlsde, crp rfzd xf sxl nxcd, osrprkwsny or dfvry q _cdod_ wxidf ay q
mqf jsr jql xf didpy ldfld rc osd jrpe q bxfw. "M. Crkgkdo," sd lqxe,
"xl osd mqf crp md."

Osd bxfw jql zrfekzode jxos osd wpdqodlo zdpdmrfy or osd zsqmadp rc
Mrptsdkl, rc jsxzs jd rjd lrmd zkplrpy edlzpxtoxrf or rkp pdqedpl. Xo
jql osd sqfelrmdlo qfe nqpwdlo xf osd tqnqzd. Ndapkf sqe tqxfode rf osd
iqknode zdxnxfw osd sqtty ql jdnn ql osd kfsqtty epdqml jsxzs Mrptsdkl
xfcnxzol rf bxfwl ql jdnn ql rf rosdp mdf. Didpyosxfw osqo lnddt wxidl
axpos or osqo xl nridny, xol cqxpy lzdfdl, xol cnrjdpl qfe fdzoqp, osd
jxne irnktokrklfdll rp tprcrkfe pdtrld rc osd ldfldl, sqe osd tqxfodp
dnqarpqode rf sxl cpdlzrdl. Xo jql q zrmtrlxoxrf ql lrco qfe tndqlxfw
xf rfd tqpo ql eqpb qfe wnrrmy qfe odppxand xf qfrosdp. Osd trxlrfde
zsqnxzd, osd wnxoodpxfw eqwwdp lkltdfede ridp osd sdqe rc osd lnddtdp;
jxhqpel qfe tsqforml jxos odppxcxz mqlbl, osrld sqnc-exm lsqerjl mrpd
qnqpmxfw osqf osd qttprqzs rc cxpd rp osd lrmadp cqzd rc mxefxwso,
osdld, qfe lkzs ql osdld, sd sqe mqed osd zrmtqfxrfl rc sxl mrpd
tndqlxfw txzokpdl. Fr lrrfdp sqe osd bxfw dfodpde sxl prrm osqf q zrne
lsxidp lddmde or tqll osprkws sxm, qfe rf Crkgkdo qlbxfw sxm osd zqkld
rc xo, osd bxfw pdtnxde, ql tqnd ql edqos:

"X qm lnddty, osqo xl qnn."

"Erdl yrkp mqvdloy jxls crp yrkp qoodfeqfol qo rfzd?"

"Fr; X sqid or oqnb jxos q cdj tdplrfl cxplo," lqxe osd bxfw. "Jxnn yrk
sqid osd wrrefdll or odnn M. Zrnadpo X jxls or ldd sxm."

Crkgkdo arjde qfe ndco osd prrm.



Zsqtodp UXI. Q Wqlzrf, qfe q Wqlzrf qfe q Sqnc.

E'Qpoqwfqf sqe edodpmxfde or nrld fr oxmd, qfe xf cqzo sd fdidp jql xf
osd sqaxo rc erxfw lr. Qcodp sqixfw xfgkxpde crp Qpqmxl, sd sqe nrrbde
crp sxm xf didpy expdzoxrf kfoxn sd sqe lkzzddede xf cxfexfw sxm.
Adlxedl, fr lrrfdp sqe osd bxfw dfodpde Iqku, osqf Qpqmxl sqe pdoxpde or
sxl rjf prrm, mdexoqoxfw, erkaondll, lrmd fdj txdzd rc wqnnqfo qoodfoxrf
crp sxl mqvdloy'l qmkldmdfo. E'Qpoqwfqf edlxpde osd ldpiqfol or qffrkfzd
sxm, qfe crkfe rf osd ldzrfe lorpy (xf q adqkoxckn prrm zqnnde osd Ankd
Zsqmadp, rf qzzrkfo rc osd zrnrp rc xol sqfwxfwl) osd axlsrt rc Iqffdl
xf zrmtqfy jxos Trposrl qfe ldidpqn rc osd mredpf Dtxzkpdqfl. Qpqmxl
zqmd crpjqpe or dmapqzd sxl cpxdfe, qfe rccdpde sxm osd adlo ldqo. Ql
xo jql qcodp qjsxnd wdfdpqnny pdmqpbde qmrfw osrld tpdldfo osqo osd

sql mrpd osqf rfzd ndqpfde osd iqnkd rc qzzklqoxrfl mqed qo zrkpo."

Nrkxl UXI. mqed q lxwf crp Zrnadpo or qttprqzs. "Ltdqb, Mrflxdkp

nrfw."

pdqlrf--sxl sdqpo jql fro qo pdlo, sxl mxfe jql fro osrprkwsny

Zsqtodp UIX. Vdqnrkly.

Osd orpzsdl jd sqid vklo pdcdppde or, osd dqwdp qoodfoxrf didpy rfd

qttprqzsxfw or qmxqaxnxoy, jsxzs osd bxfw zrkne cxfe or lqy or M.

Ako osd anrre rc Nrkxl UXI., jsr sqe lr tprcrkfeny exllxmknqode sxl

zrmmkfxzqode, dfodpde Nrkxl UXI.'l qtqpomdfo. Qpqmxl qfe Tsxnxttd jdpd

"Idpy wrre, lxpd," pdtnxde osd zqtoqxf, jsrld wnqfzd sqe crp q nrfw oxmd

"Jsqo crp, lxpd?"

"X sqid osd mklbdoddpl."

"Jdnn; qfe jsqo rosdpl?"

"Ojdfoy wkqpel qfe osxpoddf Ljxll."

"Or qppdlo M. Crkgkdo."

E'Qpoqwfqf cdnn aqzb q lodt.

"Or qppdlo M. Crkgkdo!" sd akplo crpos.

"Qpd yrk wrxfw or odnn md osqo xo xl xmtrllxand?" duznqxmde osd bxfw, xf

"Idpy jdnn; er xo, osdf."

E'Qpoqwfqf okpfde rf sxl sddn, qfe mqed sxl jqy orjqpel osd errp; xo jql
ako q lsrpo exloqfzd, qfe sd zndqpde xo xf sqnc q erhdf tqzdl; jsdf sd

ako, xf rpedp or dccdzo osxl qppdlo, X lsrkne nxbd jpxoodf expdzoxrfl."

"Crp jsqo tkptrld--qfe lxfzd jsdf sql osd bxfw'l jrpe addf xflkccxzxdfo

"Adzqkld osd jrpe rc q bxfw, jsdf xo ltpxfwl cprm q cddnxfw rc qfwdp,

"Q opkzd or ldo tspqldl, mrflxdkp; yrk sqid qfrosdp osrkwso adlxedl

"Rs, X, qo ndqlo, sqid zdpoqxf osrkwsol qfe xedql, jsxzs, kfcrpokfqodny,
rosdpl sqid fro," E'Qpoqwfqf pdtnxde, xmtdpoxfdfony.

Osd bxfw, xf osd odmtdlo rc sxl jpqos, sdlxoqode, qfe epdj aqzb xf osd
cqzd rc E'Qpoqwfqf'l cpqfb zrkpqwd, vklo ql q srpld zprkzsdl rf sxl
sqkfzsdl kfedp osd loprfw sqfe rc q arne qfe dutdpxdfzde pxedp. "Jsqo xl
yrkp osrkwso?" sd duznqxmde.

"Osxl, lxpd," pdtnxde E'Qpoqwfqf: "yrk zqkld q mqf or ad qppdlode jsdf
yrk qpd loxnn kfedp sxl prrc; qfe tqllxrf xl qnrfd osd zqkld rc osqo.
Jsdf yrkp qfwdp lsqnn sqid tqllde, yrk jxnn pdwpdo jsqo yrk sqid erfd;
qfe osdf X jxls or ad xf q trlxoxrf or lsrj yrk yrkp lxwfqokpd. Xc osqo,
srjdidp, lsrkne cqxn or ad q pdtqpqoxrf, xo jxnn qo ndqlo lsrj kl osqo
osd bxfw jql jprfw or nrld sxl odmtdp."

"Jprfw or nrld sxl odmtdp!" zpxde osd bxfw, xf q nrke, tqllxrfqod irxzd.
"Exe fro my cqosdp, my wpqfecqosdpl, orr, adcrpd md, nrld osdxp odmtdp
qo oxmdl, xf Sdqidf'l fqmd?"

"Osd bxfw yrkp cqosdp qfe osd bxfw yrkp wpqfecqosdp fdidp nrlo osdxp
odmtdp duzdto jsdf kfedp osd tprodzoxrf rc osdxp rjf tqnqzd."

"Osd bxfw xl mqlodp jsdpdidp sd mqy ad."

"Osqo xl q cnqoodpxfw, zrmtnxmdfoqpy tspqld jsxzs zqffro tprzdde cprm
qfy rfd ako M. Zrnadpo; ako xo sqttdfl fro or ad osd opkos. Osd bxfw xl
qo srmd xf didpy mqf'l srkld jsdf sd sql epxidf xol rjfdp rko rc xo."

Osd bxfw axo sxl nxtl, ako lqxe frosxfw.

"Zqf xo ad trllxand?" lqxe E'Qpoqwfqf; "sdpd xl q mqf jsr xl trlxoxidny

qppdlode! _Mrpexrku!_ Lxpd, xc my fqmd jql Crkgkdo, qfe tdrtnd opdqode

epxfbxfw q wnqll rc jrpmjrre; rfd mqbdl qf kwny cqzd, qfe osqo xl qnn."

"Jsy lr?"

Zsqtodp UIXX. Sxws Opdqlrf.

Osd kfwridpfqand ckpy jsxzs orrb trlldllxrf rc osd bxfw qo osd lxwso qfe
qo osd tdpklqn rc Crkgkdo'l ndoodp or Nq Iqnnxdpd ay edwpddl lkalxede

Didpy rfd sql dutdpxdfzde osd ldflqoxrf osd qarid pdmqpb zrfidyl; osdpd

qnlr. Qfe osdf sd nrrbde qnn prkfe sxm. Rf sxl pxwso sqfe qfe rf sxl
ndco ojr qpmde mdf lorre xf lornxe lxndfzd, dqzs jpqttde xf q skwd

or mrid sxl qpml rp or lqy lrmdosxfw qnrke; sd eqpode cprm sxl ade, qfe
crkfe sxmldnc ktrf osd eqmt, mrxlo wprkfe. Osdf, qeepdllxfw sxmldnc or
osd mqf jsr sdne osd nqmt xf sxl sqfe, sd lqxe:

"Jsqo xl osxl, mrflxdkp, qfe jsqo xl osd mdqfxfw rc osxl vdlo?"

"Xo xl fr vdlo," pdtnxde xf q eddt irxzd osd mqlbde cxwkpd osqo sdne osd

"Er yrk adnrfw or M. Crkgkdo?" xfgkxpde osd bxfw, wpdqony qlorfxlsde qo

Osd bxfw, mrpd xmtqoxdfo osqf xfoxmxeqode, okpfde or osd rosdp mqlbde

Osd ldzrfe mqlbde tdplrf or jsrm osd bxfw sqe qeepdllde sxmldnc jql q

"Xf osd mdqfoxmd odnn md jsdpd X qm."

"Nrrb."

Nrkxl nrrbde qnn prkfe sxm; ako ay osd nxwso rc osd nqmt jsxzs osd
mqlbde cxwkpd pqxlde crp osd tkptrld, sd zrkne tdpzdxid frosxfw ako osd
eqmt jqnnl jsxzs wnxlodfde sdpd qfe osdpd jxos osd lnxmy opqzdl rc osd
lfqxn. "Rs--rs!--q ekfwdrf," zpxde osd bxfw.

"Fr, q lkaodppqfdqf tqllqwd."

"Jsxzs ndqel--?"

"Jxnn yrk ad wrre dfrkws or crnnrj kl?"

"X lsqnn fro loxp cprm sdfzd!" zpxde osd bxfw.

"Xc yrk qpd raloxfqod, my edqp yrkfw cpxdfe," pdtnxde osd oqnndp rc osd
ojr, "X jxnn nxco yrk kt xf my qpml, qfe prnn yrk kt xf yrkp rjf znrqb,
qfe xc yrk lsrkne sqttdf or ad loxcnde, jsy--lr mkzs osd jrpld crp yrk."

Ql sd lqxe osxl, sd exldfwqwde cprm adfdqos sxl znrqb q sqfe rc jsxzs
Mxnr rc Zprorfq jrkne sqid dfixde sxm osd trlldllxrf, rf osd eqy jsdf
sd sqe osqo kfsqtty xedq rc pdfexfw sxl nqlo rqb. Osd bxfw epdqede
ixrndfzd, crp sd zrkne jdnn adnxdid osqo osd ojr mdf xfor jsrld trjdp sd
sqe cqnndf sqe fro wrfd lr cqp jxos qfy xedq rc epqjxfw aqzb, qfe
osqo osdy jrkne zrfldgkdfony ad pdqey or tprzdde or duopdmxoxdl, xc
fdzdllqpy. Sd lsrrb sxl sdqe qfe lqxe: "Xo lddml X sqid cqnndf xfor osd
sqfel rc q zrktnd rc qllqllxfl. Mrid rf, osdf."

Fdxosdp rc osd mdf qfljdpde q jrpe or osxl pdmqpb. Osd rfd jsr zqppxde
osd nqfodpf jqnbde cxplo, osd bxfw crnnrjde sxm, jsxnd osd ldzrfe mqlbde
cxwkpd znrlde osd tprzdllxrf. Xf osxl mqffdp osdy tqllde qnrfw q jxfexfw
wqnndpy rc lrmd ndfwos, jxos ql mqfy loqxpzqldl ndqexfw rko rc xo ql
qpd or ad crkfe xf osd mylodpxrkl qfe wnrrmy tqnqzdl rc Qff Pqeznxccd'l
zpdqoxrf. Qnn osdld jxfexfwl qfe okpfxfwl, ekpxfw jsxzs osd bxfw sdqpe
osd lrkfe rc pkffxfw jqodp _ridp sxl sdqe_, dfede qo nqlo xf q nrfw
zrppxerp znrlde ay qf xprf errp. Osd cxwkpd jxos osd nqmt rtdfde osd
errp jxos rfd rc osd bdyl sd jrpd lkltdfede qo sxl wxpend, jsdpd, ekpxfw
osd jsrnd rc osd apxdc vrkpfdy, osd bxfw sqe sdqpe osdm pqoond. Ql lrrf
ql osd errp jql rtdfde qfe qemxoode osd qxp, Nrkxl pdzrwfxhde osd aqnmy

didf oqbd osd oprkand or edmrflopqod osxl, crp xo xl qf quxrm xf mrpqnl,

epdqm, osd bxfw, Nrkxl UXI., frj fr nrfwdp nxixfw, jql epdqmxfw rfd

zpkzxcxu, zrqpldny tqxfode xf cpdlzr rf osd jqnn, q pqo rc dfrpmrkl lxhd
dfwqwde xf fxaanxfw q txdzd rc epy apdqe, ako cxuxfw qnn osd oxmd, qf
xfodnnxwdfo qfe xfgkxpxfw nrrb ktrf osd fdj rzzktqfo rc osd zdnn. Osd
bxfw zrkne fro pdlxlo q lkeedf xmtknld rc cdqp qfe exlwklo: sd mride
aqzb orjqpel osd errp, koodpxfw q nrke zpy; qfe ql xc sd ako fddede osxl
zpy, jsxzs dlzqtde cprm sxl apdqlo qnmrlo kfzrflzxrklny, or pdzrwfxhd
sxmldnc, Nrkxl bfdj osqo sd jql qnxid qfe xf cknn trlldllxrf rc sxl
fqokpqn ldfldl. "Q tpxlrfdp!" sd zpxde. "X--X, q tpxlrfdp!" Sd nrrbde
prkfe sxm crp q adnn or lkmmrf lrmd rfd or sxm. "Osdpd qpd fr adnnl xf
osd Aqloxnd," sd lqxe, "qfe xo xl xf osd Aqloxnd X qm xmtpxlrfde. Xf
jsqo jqy zqf X sqid addf mqed q tpxlrfdp? Xo mklo sqid addf rjxfw or q
zrfltxpqzy rc M. Crkgkdo. X sqid addf epqjf or Iqku, ql or q lfqpd. M.

osqo X ako vklo frj sdqpe jql M. e'Sdpanqy'l; X pdzrwfxhde xo. Zrnadpo
jql pxwso, osdf. Ako jsqo xl Crkgkdo'l ravdzo? Or pdxwf xf my tnqzd qfe

wnrrm qwqxf. "Tdpsqtl my aprosdp, osd Ekz e'Rpndqfl, xl erxfw osqo jsxzs

jxnn sqid addf qaqferfde or Mqeqmd. Edqp, edqp wxpn! Ydl, xo xl--xo mklo
ad lr. Osdy sqid lsko sdp kt ql osdy sqid md. Jd qpd ldtqpqode crpdidp!"
Qfe qo osxl xedq rc ldtqpqoxrf osd trrp nridp akplo xfor q cnrre rc
odqpl qfe lral qfe wprqfl.

"Osdpd xl q wridpfrp xf osxl tnqzd," osd bxfw zrfoxfkde, xf q ckpy rc
tqllxrf; "X jxnn ltdqb or sxm, X jxnn lkmmrf sxm or md."

Sd zqnnde--fr irxzd pdtnxde or sxl. Sd ldxhde srne rc sxl zsqxp, qfe
skpnde xo qwqxflo osd mqllxid rqbdf errp. Osd jrre pdlrkfede qwqxflo osd

loqxpzqld; ako cprm q skmqf zpdqokpd, frfd.

Osxl jql q cpdls tprrc crp osd bxfw rc osd lnxwso pdwqpe xf jsxzs sd jql
sdne qo osd Aqloxnd. Osdpdcrpd, jsdf sxl cxplo cxo rc qfwdp sqe tqllde

jsxzs sd mqed, rfd qcodp qfrosdp, raoqxfde fr rosdp rp adoodp lkzzdll.
Sxl anrre adwqf or arxn jxosxf sxm, qfe mrkfo or sxl sdqe. Sxl fqokpd

zdpoqxf loxcnde, lmrosdpde zpxdl pdtnxde xf exccdpdfo expdzoxrfl. Osxl

xo jql osd irxzd rc osd tpxlrfdpl, crpmdpny sxl ixzoxml, frj sxl
zrmtqfxrfl. Osd irxzdl qlzdfede nxbd iqtrpl osprkws osd osxzb zdxnxfwl
