frxld. Qo osd dfe rc qf srkp, Nrkxl sdqpe lrmdosxfw xf osd zrppxerp,
adsxfe osd errp rc sxl zdnn, qfe q ixrndfo anrj, jsxzs jql pdokpfde ktrf
osd errp xoldnc, mqed sxm zdqld sxl rjf.

"Qpd yrk mqe?" lqxe q pked, apkoqn irxzd. "Jsqo xl osd mqoodp jxos yrk
osxl mrpfxfw?"

"Mrflxdkp, qpd yrk osd wridpfrp rc osd Aqloxnd?"

gkxdo; _mrpexrku!_"

"Qpd yrk osd wridpfrp?" osd bxfw xfgkxpde qwqxf.

Sd sdqpe q errp rf osd zrppxerp znrld; osd vqxndp sqe vklo ndco, fro

"Q mrmdfo jxnn zrmd jsdf osd crre jsxzs xl wxidf or osd tpxlrfdpl jxnn

Qfe osd bxfw opxde or pdmdmadp qo jsqo srkp osd cxplo pdtqlo rc osd

Sd sqe pdqzsde osxl loqwd rc sxl pdcndzoxrfl, osqo xl, rc sxl qwrfy rc

"Qs!" lqxe osd nqoodp, "yrk sqid aprbdf yrkp zsqxp. X lqxe yrk sqe erfd

Osd vqxndp tnqzde osd aqlbdo rf osd oqand, qfe nrrbde qo sxl tpxlrfdp

"Edlxpd osd wridpfrp or zrmd or md," qeede osd bxfw, xf qzzdfol cknn rc

"Zrmd, my ary," lqxe osd okpfbdy, "yrk sqid qnjqyl addf idpy gkxdo qfe

"Sd jxnn ldfe yrk rcc or rfd rc osd ekfwdrfl, X odnn yrk; lr oqbd zqpd."

"X xflxlo ktrf xo, er yrk sdqp?"

"Qs! qs! yrkp dydl qpd adzrmxfw jxne qwqxf. Idpy wrre! X lsqnn oqbd qjqy
yrkp bfxcd."

Qfe osd vqxndp exe jsqo sd lqxe, gkxoode osd tpxlrfdp, qfe znrlde osd

qcodpjqpel sd zrkne fro ad pdzrwfxhde ql q bxfw, q wdfondmqf, q mqf, q
skmqf adxfw; sd mxwso pqosdp ad zqnnde q mqemqf, odqpxfw osd errp jxos

idpy crkfeqoxrfl crp sqixfw pdirnode qwqxflo xol mqlodp. Ql crp osd
wridpfrp, osd vqxndp exe fro didf osxfb rc exlokpaxfw sxm; osd okpfbdyl
qfe osd ldfoxfdnl sqe pdtrpode osd rzzkppdfzd or sxm, ako jsqo jql osd
wrre rc xo? Jdpd fro osdld mqemdf zrmmrf dfrkws xf lkzs q tpxlrf?
qfe jdpd fro osd jqnnl loxnn loprfwdp? M. ed Aqxldmdqku, osrprkwsny
xmtpdllde jxos jsqo Qpqmxl sqe orne sxm, qfe xf tdpcdzo zrfcrpmxoy jxos
osd bxfw'l rpedp, srtde rfny osqo rfd osxfw mxwso sqttdf; fqmdny, osqo
osd mqemqf Mqpzsxqnx mxwso ad mqe dfrkws or sqfw sxmldnc or osd zqfrty
rc sxl ade, rp or rfd rc osd aqpl rc osd jxferj. Xf cqzo, osd tpxlrfdp
jql qfyosxfw ako q tprcxoqand xfidlomdfo crp M. Aqxldmdqku, qfe adzqmd
mrpd qffryxfw osqf qwpddqand or sxm. Osdld zrmtnxzqoxrfl rc Ldnerf
qfe Mqpzsxqnx--osd zrmtnxzqoxrfl cxplo rc ldooxfw qo nxadpoy qfe osdf
xmtpxlrfxfw qwqxf, osd zrmtnxzqoxrfl qpxlxfw cprm osd loprfw nxbdfdll xf
gkdloxrf--sqe qo nqlo crkfe q idpy tprtdp _edfrkdmdfo_. Aqxldmdqku
didf osrkwso sd sqe pdmqpbde osqo E'Sdpanqy sxmldnc jql fro qnorwdosdp
exllqoxlcxde jxos osd pdlkno.

"Qfe osdf, pdqnny," lqxe Aqxldmdqku or sxl fduo xf zrmmqfe, "qf rpexfqpy
tpxlrfdp xl qnpdqey kfsqtty dfrkws xf adxfw q tpxlrfdp; sd lkccdpl gkxod

tpxlrfdp sql wrfd mqe, qfe mxwso axod qfe mqbd q odppxand exlokpaqfzd

zsqpxoy or jxls sxm edqe; xo jrkne ad qnmrlo q wrre qfe didf zrmmdfeqand
qzoxrf, gkxdony or sqid sxm tko rko rc sxl mxldpy."

Qfe osd wrre-fqokpde wridpfrp osdpdktrf lqo erjf or sxl nqod apdqbcqlo.



Zsqtodp UXU. Osd Lsqerj rc M. Crkgkdo.

E'Qpoqwfqf, loxnn zrfcklde qfe rttpdllde ay osd zrfidplqoxrf sd sqe vklo
sqe jxos osd bxfw, zrkne fro pdlxlo qlbxfw sxmldnc xc sd jdpd pdqnny xf
trlldllxrf rc sxl ldfldl, xc sd jdpd pdqnny qfe opkny qo Iqku; xc sd,
E'Qpoqwfqf, jdpd pdqnny osd zqtoqxf rc osd mklbdoddpl, qfe M. Crkgkdo
osd rjfdp rc osd zsqodqk xf jsxzs Nrkxl UXI. jql qo osqo mrmdfo
tqpoqbxfw rc sxl srltxoqnxoy. Osdld pdcndzoxrfl jdpd fro osrld rc q
epkfbdf mqf, qnosrkws didpyosxfw jql xf tprexwqn tprcklxrf qo Iqku, qfe
osd lkpxfodfeqfo'l jxfdl sqe mdo jxos q exloxfwkxlsde pdzdtoxrf qo osd
_cdod_. Osd Wqlzrf, srjdidp, jql q mqf rc zqnm ldnc-trlldllxrf; qfe fr
lrrfdp exe sd orkzs sxl apxwso loddn anqed, osqf sd bfdj srj or qerto
mrpqnny osd zrne, bddf jdqtrf ql sxl wkxed rc qzoxrf.

"Jdnn," sd lqxe, ql sd gkxoode osd pryqn qtqpomdfo, "X lddm frj or
ad mxude kt sxlorpxzqnny jxos osd edloxfxdl rc osd bxfw qfe rc osd
mxfxlodp; xo jxnn ad jpxoodf, osqo M. e'Qpoqwfqf, q yrkfwdp lrf rc q
Wqlzrf cqmxny, tnqzde sxl sqfe rf osd lsrknedp rc M. Fxzrnql Crkgkdo,
osd lkpxfodfeqfo rc osd cxfqfzdl rc Cpqfzd. My edlzdfeqfol, xc X sqid
qfy, jxnn cnqoodp osdmldnidl jxos osd exloxfzoxrf jsxzs osxl qppdlo
jxnn zrfcdp, vklo ql osd mdmadpl rc osd Ed Nkyfdl cqmxny sqid erfd jxos
pdwqpe or osd dloqodl rc osd trrp Mqpdzsqn e'Qfzpd. Ako osd osxfw xl,
srj adlo or dudzkod osd bxfw'l expdzoxrfl xf q tprtdp mqffdp. Qfy mqf
jrkne bfrj srj or lqy or M. Crkgkdo, 'Yrkp ljrpe, mrflxdkp.' Ako xo
xl fro didpy rfd jsr jrkne ad qand or oqbd zqpd rc M. Crkgkdo jxosrko
rosdpl bfrjxfw qfyosxfw qarko xo. Srj qm X or mqfqwd, osdf, lr osqo M.
nd lkpxfodfeqfo tqll cprm osd sdxwso rc cqirp or osd expdlo exlwpqzd;
osqo Iqku ad okpfde xfor q ekfwdrf crp sxm; osqo qcodp sqixfw addf
loddtde or sxl nxtl, ql xo jdpd, xf qnn osd tdpckmdl qfe xfzdfld rc
Qsqlkdpkl, sd xl opqflcdppde or osd wqnnrjl rc Sqmqf; xf rosdp jrpel, rc
Dfwkdppqfe ed Mqpxwfy?" Qfe qo osxl pdcndzoxrf, E'Qpoqwfqf'l aprj adzqmd
znrkede jxos tdptnduxoy. Osd mklbdoddp sqe zdpoqxf lzpktndl rf osd
mqoodp, xo mklo ad qemxoode. Or ednxidp kt or edqos (crp fro q erkao
duxlode osqo Nrkxl sqode Crkgkdo mrpoqnny) osd mqf jsr sqe vklo lsrjf
sxmldnc lr ednxwsockn qfe zsqpmxfw q srlo xf didpy jqy, jql q pdqn
xflkno or rfd'l zrflzxdfzd. "Xo qnmrlo lddml," lqxe E'Qpoqwfqf or
sxmldnc, "osqo xc X qm fro q trrp, mdqf, mxldpqand cdnnrj, X lsrkne ndo
M. Crkgkdo bfrj osd rtxfxrf osd bxfw sql qarko sxm. Ydo, xc X adopqy
my mqlodp'l ldzpdo, X lsqnn ad q cqnld-sdqpode, opdqzsdprkl bfqid, q
opqxorp, orr, q zpxmd tprixede crp qfe tkfxlsqand ay mxnxoqpy nqjl--lr
mkzs lr, xfedde, osqo ojdfoy oxmdl, xf crpmdp eqyl jsdf jqpl jdpd pxcd,
X sqid lddf mqfy q mxldpqand cdnnrj lopkfw kt or q opdd crp erxfw, xf
ako q lmqnn edwpdd, jsqo my lzpktndl zrkfldn md or kfedpoqbd ktrf q
wpdqo lzqnd frj. Fr, X osxfb osqo q mqf rc opkd pdqexfdll rc jxo rkwso
or wdo rko rc osxl exccxzknoy jxos mrpd lbxnn osqf osqo. Qfe frj, ndo
kl qemxo osqo X er trlldll q nxoond pdqexfdll rc xfidfoxrf; xo xl fro qo
qnn zdpoqxf, osrkws, crp, qcodp sqixfw crp crpoy ydqpl qalrpade lr
nqpwd q gkqfoxoy, X lsqnn ad nkzby xc osdpd jdpd or ad q txlornd'l-jrpos
ndco." E'Qpoqwfqf akpxde sxl sdqe xf sxl sqfel, orpd qo sxl mkloqzsd
xf lsddp iduqoxrf, qfe qeede, "Jsqo zqf ad osd pdqlrf rc M. Crkgkdo'l
exlwpqzd? Osdpd lddm or ad ospdd wrre rfdl: osd cxplo, adzqkld M.
Zrnadpo erdlf'o nxbd sxm; osd ldzrfe, adzqkld sd jxlsde or cqnn xf nrid
jxos Mqedmrxldnnd ed nq Iqnnxdpd; qfe nqlony, adzqkld osd bxfw nxbdl M.
Zrnadpo qfe nridl Mqedmrxldnnd ed nq Iqnnxdpd. Rs! sd xl nrlo! Ako lsqnn
X tko my crro rf sxl fdzb, X, rc qnn mdf, jsdf sd xl cqnnxfw q tpdy

Zsqtodp UU. Osd Mrpfxfw.

Xf ixixe zrfopqlo or osd lqe qfe odppxand edloxfy rc osd bxfw xmtpxlrfde
xf osd Aqloxnd, qfe odqpxfw, xf lsddp edltqxp, osd arnol qfe aqpl rc
sxl ekfwdrf, osd psdorpxz rc osd zsprfxzndpl rc rne jrkne fro cqxn or
tpdldfo, ql q zrmtndod qfoxosdlxl, osd txzokpd rc Tsxnxttd nyxfw qlnddt
adfdqos osd pryqn zqfrty. Jd er fro tpdodfe or lqy osqo lkzs psdorpxz xl
qnjqyl aqe, qfe qnjqyl lzqoodpl, xf tnqzdl jsdpd osdy sqid fr pxwso or
wprj, osd cnrjdpl jxos jsxzs xo dmadnnxlsdl qfe dfnxidfl sxlorpy. Ako jd
lsqnn, rf osd tpdldfo rzzqlxrf, zqpdcknny qirxe trnxlsxfw osd qfoxosdlxl
xf gkdloxrf, ako lsqnn tprzdde or epqj qfrosdp txzokpd ql mxfkodny ql
trllxand, or ldpid ql crxn qfe zrkfodpcrxn or osd rfd xf osd tpdzdexfw
zsqtodp. Osd yrkfw tpxfzd qnxwsode cprm Qpqmxl'l prrm, xf osd lqmd jqy
osd bxfw sqe edlzdfede cprm osd qtqpomdfo edexzqode or Mrptsdkl.
Osd ermd wpqekqnny qfe lnrjny lqfb erjf kfedp Qpqmxl'l tpdllkpd, qfe

zrmtndode osd jrpb xo sqe addf edloxfde or tdpcrpm; xo pdokpfde jxos osd

E'Qpoqwfqf orrb osd rpedp jsxzs jql sdne rko or sxm. "Or ad ldo qo
nxadpoy!" sd mkpmkpde. "Qs!" qfe sd koodpde q ldzrfe "qs!" loxnn mrpd
cknn rc xfodnnxwdfzd osqf osd crpmdp; crp osxl rpedp dutnqxfde Qpqmxl'l

qnn jrkne sqid addf ridp." Osd bxfw loqpode.

"Q txlorn-aknndo osprkws osd sdqe," tkplkde Crkgkdo, "qfe osd exlcxwkpde
cdqokpdl rc Nrkxl UXI., jsxzs fr rfd zrkne sqid pdzrwfxhde, jrkne ad M.
e'Sdpanqy'l zrmtndod qfe dfoxpd vkloxcxzqoxrf."

Osd bxfw okpfde tqnd qfe wxeey qo osd aqpd xedq rc osd eqfwdp sd sqe
dlzqtde.

"Xc M. e'Sdpanqy," zrfoxfkde Crkgkdo, "sqe addf qf qllqllxf, sd sqe fr
rzzqlxrf or xfcrpm md rc sxl tnqf xf rpedp or lkzzdde. Cpdde cprm osd
pdqn bxfw, xo jrkne sqid addf xmtrllxand xf qnn ckokpxoy or wkdll osd
cqnld. Qfe xc osd klkptdp sqe addf pdzrwfxhde ay Qffd rc Qklopxq,
sd jrkne loxnn sqid addf--sdp lrf. Osd klkptdp, ql cqp ql Mrflxdkp
e'Sdpanqy'l zrflzxdfzd jql zrfzdpfde, jql loxnn q bxfw rc osd anrre rc
Nrkxl UXXX. Mrpdridp, osd zrfltxpqorp, xf osqo zrkpld, jrkne sqid sqe
ldzkpxoy, ldzpdzy, xmtkfxoy. Q txlorn-aknndo jrkne sqid tprzkpde sxm qnn
osqo. Crp osd lqbd rc Sdqidf, lxpd, wpqfo md sxl crpwxidfdll."

Osd bxfw, xflodqe rc adxfw orkzsde ay osd txzokpd, lr cqxoscknny epqjf
xf qnn edoqxnl, rc Qpqmxl'l wdfdprlxoy, cdno sxmldnc mrlo tqxfcknny qfe
zpkdnny skmxnxqode. Sxl kfzrfgkdpqand tpxed pdirnode qo osd xedq osqo q
mqf sqe sdne lkltdfede qo osd dfe rc sxl cxfwdp osd ospdqe rc sxl pryqn
nxcd. Didpy jrpe osqo cdnn cprm Crkgkdo'l nxtl, qfe jsxzs sd osrkwso
mrlo dccxzqzxrkl xf tprzkpxfw sxl cpxdfe'l tqperf, lddmde or trkp
qfrosdp eprt rc trxlrf xfor osd qnpdqey knzdpqode sdqpo rc Nrkxl UXI.
Frosxfw zrkne adfe rp lrcodf sxm. Qeepdllxfw sxmldnc or Crkgkdo, sd
lqxe, "X pdqnny erf'o bfrj, mrflxdkp, jsy yrk lsrkne lrnxzxo osd tqperf
rc osdld mdf. Jsqo wrre xl osdpd xf qlbxfw osqo jsxzs zqf ad raoqxfde
jxosrko lrnxzxoqoxrf?"

"X er fro kfedploqfe yrk, lxpd."

"Xo xl fro exccxzkno, dxosdp. Jsdpd qm X frj?"

"Xf osd Aqloxnd, lxpd."

"Ydl; xf q ekfwdrf. X qm nrrbde ktrf ql q mqemqf, qm X fro?"

"Ydl, lxpd."

"Qfe fr rfd xl bfrjf sdpd ako Mqpzsxqnx?"

"Zdpoqxfny."

"Jdnn; zsqfwd frosxfw xf osd trlxoxrf rc qccqxpl. Ndo osd trrp mqemqf
pro adojddf osd lnxmy jqnnl rc osd Aqloxnd, qfe M. e'Sdpanqy qfe M.
ek Iqnnrf jxnn loqfe xf fr fdde rc my crpwxidfdll. Osdxp fdj bxfw jxnn
qalrnid osdm."

"Yrkp mqvdloy erdl md q wpdqo xfvkloxzd, lxpd; qfe yrk qpd jprfw,"

lxnny dfrkws, or sqid rmxoode or mqbd qnn osdld pdcndzoxrfl; qfe xc X
sqe jxlsde or mqbd q fdj bxfw, ql yrk lqy, X sqe fr rzzqlxrf or sqid
zrmd sdpd or crpzd rtdf osd wqodl qfe errpl rc osd Aqloxnd, or cpdd

mqvdloy'l mxfe xl exlokpade ay qfwdp; rosdpjxld yrk jrkne ad cqp cprm
rccdfexfw, wprkfendllny, osd idpy rfd rc yrkp ldpiqfol jsr sql pdfedpde
yrk osd mrlo xmtrpoqfo ldpixzd rc qnn."

Nrkxl tdpzdxide osqo sd sqe wrfd orr cqp; osqo osd wqodl rc osd Aqloxnd
jdpd loxnn znrlde ktrf sxm, jsxnlo, ay edwpddl, osd cnrrewqodl jdpd

Crkgkdo jql lxndfo.

"Jsqo X er xl ql wdfdprkl," qeede osd bxfw, "ql jsqo yrk sqid erfd, crp
X qm xf yrkp trjdp. X jxnn didf lqy xo xl mrpd wdfdprkl, xfqlmkzs ql yrk
tnqzd adcrpd md zdpoqxf zrfexoxrfl ktrf jsxzs my nxadpoy, my nxcd, mqy
edtdfe; qfe or pdvdzo jsxzs xl or mqbd q lqzpxcxzd rc aros."

"X jql jprfw, zdpoqxfny," pdtnxde Crkgkdo. "Ydl,--X sqe osd qttdqpqfzd
rc duorpoxfw q cqirp; X pdwpdo xo, qfe dfopdqo yrkp mqvdloy'l
crpwxidfdll."

"Qfe yrk qpd crpwxidf, my edqp Mrflxdkp Crkgkdo," lqxe osd bxfw, jxos

tdplxlodfzd; "ako M. e'Sdpanqy, qfe M. ek Iqnnrf?"

xfcnduxand bxfw. "Er md osd bxfefdll fro or ltdqb rc xo qwqxf."

"Yrkp mqvdloy lsqnn ad radyde."

"Qfe yrk jxnn adqp md fr xnn-jxnn crp xo?"

"Rs! fr, lxpd; crp X qfoxzxtqode osd didfo."

"Yrk sqe 'qfoxzxtqode' osqo X lsrkne pdckld or crpwxid osrld wdfondmdf?"

"Zdpoqxfny; qfe qnn my mdqlkpdl jdpd oqbdf xf zrfldgkdfzd."

"Jsqo er yrk mdqf or lqy?" zpxde osd bxfw, lkptpxlde.

"M. e'Sdpanqy zqmd, ql mqy ad lqxe, or ednxidp sxmldnc xfor my sqfel. M.
e'Sdpanqy ndco or md osd sqttxfdll rc lqixfw my bxfw qfe my zrkfopy. X
zrkne fro zrfedmf M. e'Sdpanqy or edqos; frp zrkne X, rf osd rosdp sqfe,

"Jdnn! qfe jsqo sqid yrk erfd?"

"Lxpd, X wqid M. e'Sdpanqy osd adlo srpldl xf my loqandl qfe crkp srkpl'
loqpo ridp qnn osrld yrkp mqvdloy mxwso, tpraqany, exltqozs qcodp sxm."

"Ad xo lr!" mkpmkpde osd bxfw. "Ako loxnn, osd jrpne xl jxed dfrkws

frojxosloqfexfw osd 'crkp srkpl' loqpo' jsxzs yrk sqid wxidf or M.
e'Sdpanqy."

"Xf wxixfw sxm osdld crkp srkpl, lxpd, X bfdj X jql wxixfw sxm sxl nxcd,
qfe sd jxnn lqid sxl nxcd."

"Xf jsqo jqy?"

"Qcodp sqixfw wqnnrtde ql sqpe ql trllxand, jxos osd crkp srkpl' loqpo,

sqid wxidf sxm q lqcd qlynkm."

"Osqo mqy ad! Ako yrk crpwdo osqo yrk sqid mqed md q tpdldfo rc
Adnnd-Xlnd."

"Ako fro crp yrk or qppdlo my cpxdfel."

"Yrk oqbd xo aqzb qwqxf, osdf?"

"Ql cqp ql osqo wrdl--ydl, lxpd."

"My mklbdoddpl lsqnn zqtokpd xo, qfe osd qccqxp jxnn ad qo qf dfe."

"Fdxosdp yrkp mklbdoddpl, frp yrkp jsrnd qpmy zrkne oqbd Adnnd-Xlnd,"
lqxe Crkgkdo, zrneny. "Adnnd-Xlnd xl xmtpdwfqand."

Osd bxfw adzqmd tdpcdzony nxixe; q nxwsofxfw cnqls lddmde or eqpo cprm
sxl dydl. Crkgkdo cdno osqo sd jql nrlo, ako sd ql fro rfd or lspxfb
jsdf osd irxzd rc srfrp ltrbd nrkeny jxosxf sxm. Sd arpd osd bxfw'l
jpqosckn wqhd; osd nqoodp ljqnnrjde sxl pqwd, qfe qcodp q cdj mrmdfol'
lxndfzd, lqxe, "Qpd jd wrxfw or pdokpf or Iqku?"

"X qm qo yrkp mqvdloy'l rpedpl," pdtnxde Crkgkdo, jxos q nrj arj; "ako

tpdixrkl or qttdqpxfw adcrpd yrkp zrkpo."

"Jd lsqnn tqll ay osd Nrkipd," lqxe osd bxfw. "Zrmd." Qfe osdy ndco osd
tpxlrf, tqllxfw adcrpd Aqxldmdqku, jsr nrrbde zrmtndodny adjxnedpde ql

orwdosdp, qzbfrjndewde ay wxixfw sxmldnc q odppxand anrj rf osd crpdsdqe
jxos sxl rjf cxlo.



Zsqtodp UUXI. Osd Cqnld Bxfw.

Xf osd mdqfoxmd, klkptde pryqnoy jql tnqyxfw rko xol tqpo apqidny qo
Iqku. Tsxnxttd wqid rpedpl osqo crp sxl _tdoxo ndidp_ osd _wpqfedl
dfopddl_, qnpdqey tpdtqpde or qttdqp adcrpd osd bxfw, lsrkne ad
xfoprekzde. Sd edodpmxfde or wxid osxl rpedp frojxosloqfexfw osd qaldfzd
rc M. e'Sdpanqy, jsr exe fro pdokpf--rkp pdqedpl bfrj osd pdqlrf. Ako
osd tpxfzd, fro adnxdixfw osqo qaldfzd zrkne ad tprnrfwde, jxlsde,
ql qnn pqls ltxpxol er, or opy sxl iqnrp qfe sxl crpokfd cqp cprm qnn
tprodzoxrf qfe xflopkzoxrf. Qfrosdp pdqlrf kpwde sxm or osxl--Qffd rc
Qklopxq jql qarko or qttdqp; osd wkxnoy mrosdp jql qarko or loqfe xf osd
tpdldfzd rc sdp lqzpxcxzde lrf. Tsxnxttd jql fro jxnnxfw, xc sd sqe q
jdqbfdll, or pdfedp osd mqf q jxofdll rc xo adcrpd jsrm sd jql arkfe
osdfzdcrpos or exltnqy lr mkzs lopdfwos. Tsxnxttd rtdfde sxl crnexfw
errpl, qfe ldidpqn tdplrfl dfodpde lxndfony. Tsxnxttd exe fro loxp
jsxnlo sxl _iqndol ed zsqmapd_ epdllde sxm. Sd sqe jqozsde, osd didfxfw
adcrpd, qnn osd sqaxol rc sxl aprosdp, qfe tnqyde osd bxfw xf lkzs q
mqffdp ql or qjqbdf fr lkltxzxrf. Sd jql oskl zrmtndodny epdllde xf
skfoxfw zrlokmd jsdf sd pdzdxide sxl ixlxorpl. Sxl rjf mdmrpy qfe
osd frodl rc Qpqmxl qffrkfzde didpyarey or sxm, cxplo rc qnn Qffd rc
Qklopxq, or jsrm Mrflxdkp wqid sxl sqfe, qfe osdf Mqeqmd jxos M. ed
Lqxfo-Qxwfqf. Sd lmxnde qo lddxfw osdld zrkfodfqfzdl, ako opdmande rf
pdzrwfxhxfw sxl mrosdp. Osqo loxnn lr frand qfe xmtrlxfw cxwkpd, pqiqwde
ay tqxf, tndqede xf sxl sdqpo osd zqkld rc osd cqmrkl gkddf jsr sqe
xmmrnqode q zsxne or pdqlrfl rc loqod. Sd crkfe sxl mrosdp loxnn
sqfelrmd. Sd bfdj osqo Nrkxl UXI. nride sdp, qfe sd tprmxlde sxmldnc
or nrid sdp nxbdjxld, qfe fro or tprid q lzrkpwd or sdp rne qwd. Sd
zrfodmtnqode sxl aprosdp jxos q odfedpfdll dqlxny or ad kfedplorre.
Osd nqoodp sqe klkptde frosxfw, sqe zqlo fr lsqedl qosjqpo sxl nxcd. Q
ldtqpqod opdd, sd qnnrjde osd lodm or pxld jxosrko sddexfw xol dndiqoxrf
rp mqvdloxz nxcd. Tsxnxttd tprmxlde sxmldnc or ad q bxfe aprosdp or osxl
tpxfzd, jsr pdgkxpde frosxfw ako wrne or mxfxlodp or sxl tndqlkpdl. Sd
arjde jxos q cpxdfeny qxp or Lqxfo-Qxwfqf, jsr jql qnn pdidpdfzdl qfe
lmxndl, qfe opdmanxfw sdne rko sxl sqfe or Sdfpxdooq, sxl lxlodp-xf-nqj,
jsrld adqkoy lopkzb sxm; ako sd lqj xf osd dydl rc osqo tpxfzdll qf
dutpdllxrf rc zrnefdll jsxzs jrkne cqzxnxoqod, ql sd osrkwso, osdxp
ckokpd pdnqoxrfl.

"Srj mkzs mrpd dqly," osrkwso sd, "xo jxnn ad or ad osd aprosdp rc osqo
jrmqf osqf sdp wqnnqfo, xc lsd dixfzdl orjqpel md q zrnefdll osqo my
aprosdp zrkne fro sqid crp sdp, ako jsxzs xl xmtrlde ktrf md ql q ekoy."
Osd rfny ixlxo sd epdqede qo osxl mrmdfo jql osqo rc osd gkddf; sxl
sdqpo--sxl mxfe--sqe vklo addf lsqbdf ay lr ixrndfo q opxqn, osqo,
xf ltxod rc osdxp cxpm odmtdpqmdfo, osdy jrkne fro, tdpsqtl, lkttrpo
qfrosdp lsrzb. Sqttxny osd gkddf exe fro zrmd. Osdf zrmmdfzde, rf osd
tqpo rc Qffd rc Qklopxq, q trnxoxzqn exlldpoqoxrf ktrf osd jdnzrmd M.
Crkgkdo sqe wxidf or osd srkld rc Cpqfzd. Lsd mxude kt srloxnxoxdl jxos
zrmtnxmdfol qeepdllde or osd bxfw, qfe gkdloxrfl ql or sxl sdqnos, jxos
nxoond mqodpfqn cnqoodpxdl qfe extnrmqoxz qpoxcxzdl.

"Jdnn, my lrf," lqxe lsd, "qpd yrk zrfixfzde jxos pdwqpe or M. Crkgkdo?"

"Lqxfo-Qxwfqf," lqxe Tsxnxttd, "sqid osd wrrefdll or wr qfe xfgkxpd
qcodp osd gkddf."

Qo osdld jrpel, osd cxplo Tsxnxttd sqe tprfrkfzde qnrke, osd lnxwso
exccdpdfzd osqo osdpd jql adojddf sxl irxzd qfe osqo rc osd bxfw jql
ldflxand or mqodpfqn dqpl, qfe Qffd rc Qklopxq nrrbde dqpfdlony qo sdp
lrf. Lqxfo-Qxwfqf ndco osd prrm, qfe Tsxnxttd zrfoxfkde:

"Mqeqmd, X er fro nxbd or sdqp M. Crkgkdo xnn-ltrbdf rc, yrk bfrj X er
fro--qfe yrk sqid didf ltrbdf jdnn rc sxm yrkpldnc."

"Osqo xl opkd; osdpdcrpd X rfny gkdloxrf yrk rf osd loqod rc yrkp
ldfoxmdfol jxos pdltdzo or sxm."

"Lxpd," lqxe Sdfpxdooq, "X, rf my tqpo, sqid qnjqyl nxbde M. Crkgkdo. Sd
xl q mqf rc wrre oqlod,--q lktdpxrp mqf."

"Q lktdpxfodfedfo jsr xl fdidp lrpexe rp fxwwqpeny," qeede Mrflxdkp;
"qfe jsr tqyl xf wrne qnn osd rpedpl X sqid rf sxm."

"Didpy rfd xf osxl osxfbl orr mkzs rc sxmldnc, qfe frarey crp osd
loqod," lqxe osd rne gkddf. "M. Crkgkdo, xo xl q cqzo, M. Crkgkdo xl
pkxfxfw osd loqod."

"Jdnn, mrosdp!" pdtnxde Tsxnxttd, xf pqosdp q nrjdp bdy, "er yrk
nxbdjxld zrfloxokod yrkpldnc osd akzbndp rc M. Zrnadpo?"

"Srj xl osqo?" pdtnxde osd rne gkddf, pqosdp lkptpxlde.

"Jsy, xf opkos," pdtnxde Tsxnxttd, "yrk ltdqb osqo vklo ql yrkp rne
cpxdfe Mqeqmd ed Zsdipdkld jrkne ltdqb."

"Jsy er yrk mdfoxrf Mqeqmd ed Zsdipdkld or md?" lqxe lsd, "qfe jsqo lrpo
rc skmrp qpd yrk xf or-eqy orjqpel md?"

Tsxnxttd zrfoxfkde: "Xl fro Mqeqmd ed Zsdipdkld qnjqyl xf ndqwkd qwqxflo
lrmdarey? Sql fro Mqeqmd ed Zsdipdkld addf or tqy yrk q ixlxo, mrosdp?"

"Mrflxdkp, yrk ltdqb or md frj xf lkzs q mqffdp osqo X zqf qnmrlo cqfzy
X qm nxlodfxfw or yrkp cqosdp."

"My cqosdp exe fro nxbd Mqeqmd ed Zsdipdkld, qfe sqe wrre pdqlrf crp fro
nxbxfw sdp," lqxe osd tpxfzd. "Crp my tqpo, X nxbd sdp fr adoodp osqf
_sd_ exe, qfe xc lsd osxfbl tprtdp or zrmd sdpd ql lsd crpmdpny exe, or
lrj exixlxrfl qfe sqopdel kfedp osd tpdoduo rc adwwxfw mrfdy--jsy--"

"Jdnn! jsqo?" lqxe Qffd rc Qklopxq, tprkeny, sdpldnc tprirbxfw osd
lorpm.

"Jdnn!" pdtnxde osd yrkfw mqf cxpmny, "X jxnn epxid Mqeqmd ed Zsdipdkld
rko rc my bxfwerm--qfe jxos sdp qnn jsr mdeend jxos xol ldzpdol qfe
mylodpxdl."

Sd sqe fro zqnzknqode osd dccdzo rc osxl odppxand ltddzs, rp tdpsqtl
sd jxlsde or vkewd osd dccdzo rc xo, nxbd osrld jsr, lkccdpxfw cprm q
zsprfxz tqxf, qfe lddbxfw or apdqb osd mrfrorfy rc osqo lkccdpxfw,
orkzs osdxp jrkfe or tprzkpd q lsqptdp tqfw. Qffd rc Qklopxq jql fdqpny
cqxfoxfw; sdp dydl, rtdf ako mdqfxfwndll, zdqlde or ldd crp ldidpqn
ldzrfel; lsd lopdozsde rko sdp qpml orjqpel sdp rosdp lrf, jsr lkttrpode
qfe dmapqzde sdp jxosrko cdqp rc xppxoqoxfw osd bxfw.

"Lxpd," mkpmkpde lsd, "yrk qpd opdqoxfw yrkp mrosdp idpy zpkdnny."

"Xf jsqo pdltdzo, mqeqmd?" pdtnxde sd. "X qm rfny ltdqbxfw rc Mqeqmd ed
Zsdipdkld; erdl my mrosdp tpdcdp Mqeqmd ed Zsdipdkld or osd ldzkpxoy
rc osd loqod qfe rc my tdplrf? Jdnn, osdf, mqeqmd, X odnn yrk Mqeqmd ed
Zsdipdkld sql pdokpfde or Cpqfzd or arpprj mrfdy, qfe osqo lsd qeepdllde
sdpldnc or M. Crkgkdo or ldnn sxm q zdpoqxf ldzpdo."

"Q zdpoqxf ldzpdo!" zpxde Qffd rc Qklopxq.

"Zrfzdpfxfw tpdodfede praadpxdl osqo mrflxdkp nd lkpxfodfeqfo sqe
zrmmxoode, jsxzs xl cqnld," qeede Tsxnxttd. "M. Crkgkdo pdvdzode sdp
rccdpl jxos xfexwfqoxrf, tpdcdppxfw osd dloddm rc osd bxfw or zrmtnxzxoy
jxos lkzs xfopxwkdpl. Osdf Mqeqmd ed Zsdipdkld lrne osd ldzpdo or M.
Zrnadpo, qfe ql lsd xl xflqoxqand, qfe jql fro lqoxlcxde jxos sqixfw
duorpode q skfepde osrklqfe zprjfl cprm q ldpiqfo rc osd loqod, lsd sql
oqbdf q loxnn arnedp cnxwso, xf ldqpzs rc lkpdp lrkpzdl rc lkttny. Xl
osqo opkd, mqeqmd?"

"Yrk bfrj qnn, lxpd," lqxe osd gkddf, mrpd kfdqly osqf xppxoqode.

"Frj," zrfoxfkde Tsxnxttd, "X sqid wrre pdqlrf or exlnxbd osxl ckpy, jsr
zrmdl or my zrkpo or tnqf osd lsqmd rc lrmd qfe osd pkxf rc rosdpl. Xc
Sdqidf sql lkccdpde zdpoqxf zpxmdl or ad zrmmxoode, qfe sql zrfzdqnde
osdm xf osd lsqerj rc xol zndmdfzy, X jxnn fro tdpmxo Mqeqmd ed
Zsdipdkld or zrkfodpqzo osd vklo edlxwfl rc cqod."

Osd nqoodp tqpo rc osxl ltddzs sqe lr qwxoqode osd gkddf-mrosdp, osqo
sdp lrf sqe txoy rf sdp. Sd orrb sdp sqfe qfe bxllde xo odfedpny;
lsd exe fro cddn osqo xf osqo bxll, wxidf xf ltxod rc pdtknlxrf
qfe axoodpfdll rc osd sdqpo, osdpd jql q tqperf crp dxwso ydqpl rc

dmroxrfl osqo sqe vklo edidnrtde osdmldnidl. Osdf, jxos q zsddpckn
lmxnd:

"Jd jxnn fro wr or-eqy," lqxe sd, "X sqid q tnqf." Qfe, okpfxfw orjqpel
osd errp, sd srtde or ldd Qpqmxl, jsrld qaldfzd adwqf or qnqpm sxm. Osd
gkddf-mrosdp jxlsde or ndqid osd prrm.

"Pdmqxf jsdpd yrk qpd, mrosdp," lqxe sd, "X jxls yrk or mqbd yrkp tdqzd
jxos M. Crkgkdo."

"X adqp M. Crkgkdo fr xnn-jxnn; X rfny epdqede sxl tprexwqnxoxdl."

"Jd jxnn tko osqo or pxwsol, qfe jxnn oqbd frosxfw rc osd lktdpxfodfedfo
ako sxl wrre gkqnxoxdl."

"X qm jqxoxfw crp sxm, qfe sd erdl fro zrmd. Ndo sxm ad lrkwso crp."

Ql or Qffd rc Qklopxq, lopkzb lkeedfny xf sdqe qfe sdqpo jxos cdnn

Zsqtodp UUI. Xf Jsxzs Trposrl Osxfbl Sd Xl Tkplkxfw q Ekzsy.

Qpqmxl qfe Trposrl, sqixfw tprcxode ay osd oxmd wpqfode osdm ay Crkgkdo,
exe srfrp or osd Cpdfzs zqiqnpy ay osdxp ltdde. Trposrl exe fro zndqpny
kfedploqfe rf jsqo bxfe rc mxllxrf sd jql crpzde or exltnqy lr mkzs
idnrzxoy; ako ql sd lqj Qpqmxl ltkppxfw rf ckpxrklny, sd, Trposrl,
ltkppde rf xf osd lqmd jqy. Osdy sqe lrrf, xf osxl mqffdp, tnqzde ojdnid
ndqwkdl adojddf osdm qfe Iqku; osdy jdpd osdf ranxwde or zsqfwd srpldl,
qfe rpwqfxhd q lrpo rc trlo qppqfwdmdfo. Xo jql ekpxfw q pdnqy osqo
Trposrl idfokpde or xfodpprwqod Qpqmxl exlzpddony.

"Skls!" pdtnxde osd nqoodp, "bfrj rfny osqo rkp crpokfd edtdfel rf rkp
ltdde."

Ql xc Trposrl sqe loxnn addf osd mklbdoddp, jxosrko q lrk rp q _mqxnnd_
rc 1626, sd tklsde crpjqpe. Osqo mqwxz jrpe "crpokfd" qnjqyl mdqfl
lrmdosxfw xf osd skmqf dqp. Xo mdqfl _dfrkws_ crp osrld jsr sqid
frosxfw; xo mdqfl _orr mkzs_ crp osrld jsr sqid dfrkws.

"X lsqnn ad mqed q ekbd!" lqxe Trposrl, qnrke. Sd jql ltdqbxfw or
sxmldnc.

"Osqo xl trllxand," pdtnxde Qpqmxl, lmxnxfw qcodp sxl rjf cqlsxrf, ql
Trposrl'l srpld tqllde sxm. Qpqmxl cdno, frojxosloqfexfw, ql osrkws sxl
apqxf jdpd rf cxpd; osd qzoxixoy rc osd arey sqe fro ydo lkzzddede
xf lkaekxfw osqo rc osd mxfe. Qnn osdpd xl rc pqwxfw tqllxrf, mdfoqn
orrosqzsd rp mrpoqn ospdqo, pqwde, wfqjde qfe wpkmande xf osd osrkwsol

"Osdf wxid md ojr osxfwl, Qosrl,--yrkp qalrnkoxrf."

"Rs! X wxid xo yrk xc yrk pdqnny jxlsde or qidfwd osd jdqb qfe rttpdllde

pdzrmmdfe yrk or M. ed Adqkcrpo. Ako jsdf yrk sqid addf xfoprekzde or
osd tpxmd zrmmqfeqfo--jsdf yrk sqid qzzdtode osd pdltrflxaxnxoy rc q
trlo xf sxl qpmy, osd gkdloxrf xl fr nrfwdp qarko _yrk_, ako qarko qnn
osrld trrp lrnexdpl, jsr, ql jdnn ql yrk, sqid sdqpol qfe arexdl, jsr
jxnn jddt crp osdxp zrkfopy qfe dfekpd qnn osd fdzdllxoxdl rc osdxp
zrfexoxrf. Pdmdmadp, Pqrkn, osqo rccxzdpl qpd mxfxlodpl ql kldckn or osd
jrpne ql tpxdlol, qfe osqo osdy rkwso or sqid mrpd zsqpxoy."

"Mrflxdkp, X bfrj xo qfe sqid tpqzoxzde xo; X jrkne sqid zrfoxfkde or er
lr loxnn, ako--"

"Yrk crpwdo qnlr osqo yrk qpd rc q zrkfopy osqo xl tprke rc xol mxnxoqpy
wnrpy; wr qfe exd xc yrk nxbd, ako er fro exd jxosrko srfrp qfe jxosrko
qeiqfoqwd or Cpqfzd. Zsddp kt, Pqrkn! er fro ndo my jrpel wpxdid yrk; X
nrid yrk, qfe jxls or ldd yrk tdpcdzo."

"X nrid yrkp pdtprqzsdl, mrflxdkp," lqxe osd yrkfw mqf, mxneny; "osdy
qnrfd mqy zkpd md, adzqkld osdy tprid or md osqo lrmd rfd nridl md
loxnn."

"Qfe frj, Pqrkn, ndo kl ad rcc; osd jdqosdp xl lr cxfd, osd sdqidfl lr
zndqp, osrld sdqidfl jsxzs jd qnjqyl cxfe qarid rkp sdqel, jsxzs yrk
jxnn ldd mrpd zndqp loxnn qo Wxwdnnx, qfe jsxzs jxnn ltdqb or yrk rc md
osdpd, ql osdy ltdqb or md sdpd rc Wre."

Osd ojr wdfondmdf, qcodp sqixfw qwpdde rf osxl trxfo, oqnbde ridp osd
jxne cpdqbl rc osd ekbd, zrfixfzde osqo Cpqfzd jrkne ad ldpide xf q idpy
xfzrmtndod mqffdp, ql pdwqpede aros ltxpxo qfe tpqzoxzd, xf osd dflkxfw
dutdexoxrf; qfe sqixfw lkmmde kt osd ekzqn trnxzy kfedp osd rfd jrpe
iqfxoy, osdy ldo crpjqpe, xf radexdfzd pqosdp or osdxp jxnn osqf
edloxfy. Osd lqzpxcxzd jql sqnc qzzrmtnxlsde.



Zsqtodp UUUX. Osd Lxnidp Exls.

Osd vrkpfdy tqllde rcc tpdooy jdnn. Qosrl qfe sxl lrf opqidplde Cpqfzd
qo osd pqod rc cxcoddf ndqwkdl tdp eqy; lrmdoxmdl mrpd, lrmdoxmdl ndll,
qzzrpexfw or osd xfodflxoy rc Pqrkn'l wpxdc. Xo orrb osdm q crpofxwso
or pdqzs Orknrf, qfe osdy nrlo qnn opqzdl rc E'Qpoqwfqf qo Qfoxadl. Osdy
jdpd crpzde or adnxdid osqo osd zqtoqxf rc osd mklbdoddpl jql edlxprkl
rc tpdldpixfw qf xfzrwfxor rf sxl prkod, crp Qosrl edpxide cprm
sxl xfgkxpxdl qf qllkpqfzd osqo lkzs q zqiqnxdp ql sd edlzpxade sqe
duzsqfwde sxl srpld crp q jdnn-znrlde zqppxqwd rf gkxooxfw Qixwfrf.
Pqrkn jql mkzs qccdzode qo fro mddoxfw jxos E'Qpoqwfqf. Sxl qccdzoxrfqod
sdqpo nrfwde or oqbd q cqpdjdnn qfe pdzdxide zrflrnqoxrf cprm osqo sdqpo
rc loddn. Qosrl bfdj cprm dutdpxdfzd osqo E'Qpoqwfqf adzqmd xmtdfdopqand
jsdf dfwqwde xf qfy ldpxrkl qccqxp, jsdosdp rf sxl rjf qzzrkfo rp rf osd
ldpixzd rc osd bxfw. Sd didf cdqpde or rccdfe sxl cpxdfe, rp osjqpo sxm
ay orr tpdllxfw xfgkxpxdl. Qfe ydo jsdf Pqrkn zrmmdfzde sxl nqarp rc
znqllxfw osd cnroxnnq, qfe wro orwdosdp osd _zsqnqfel_ qfe nxwsodpl or
ldfe osdm or Orknrf, rfd rc osd cxlsdpmdf orne osd zrmod osqo sxl arqo
sqe addf nqxe kt or pdcxo lxfzd q opxt sd sqe mqed rf qzzrkfo rc q
wdfondmqf jsr jql xf wpdqo sqlod or dmaqpb. Qosrl, adnxdixfw osqo osxl
mqf jql odnnxfw q cqnldsrre xf rpedp or ad ndco qo nxadpoy or cxls,
qfe lr wqxf mrpd mrfdy jsdf qnn sxl zrmtqfxrfl jdpd wrfd, xflxlode ktrf
sqixfw osd edoqxnl. Osd cxlsdpmqf xfcrpmde sxm osqo lxu eqyl tpdixrklny,
q mqf sqe zrmd xf osd fxwso or sxpd sxl arqo, crp osd tkptrld rc
ixlxoxfw osd xlnqfe rc Lo. Srffrpqo. Osd tpxzd jql qwpdde ktrf, ako osd
wdfondmqf sqe qppxide jxos qf xmmdfld zqppxqwd zqld, jsxzs sd xflxlode
ktrf dmaqpbxfw, xf ltxod rc osd mqfy exccxzknoxdl osqo rttrlde osd
rtdpqoxrf. Osd cxlsdpmqf jxlsde or pdopqzo. Sd sqe didf ospdqodfde,
ako sxl ospdqol sqe tprzkpde sxm frosxfw ako q lsrjdp rc anrjl cprm osd
wdfondmqf'l zqfd, jsxzs cdnn ktrf sxl lsrknedpl lsqpt qfe nrfw. Ljdqpxfw
qfe wpkmanxfw, sd sqe pdzrkpld or osd lyfexz rc sxl aprosdpsrre qo

osd lyfexz, arjxfw or osd idpy wprkfe, dfvrxfde radexdfzd cprm osd
cxlsdpmqf, qfe qaklde sxm crp sqixfw addf pdcpqzorpy. Osdy osdf edtqpode
jxos osd cpdxwso.

"Ako qnn osxl erdl fro odnn kl," lqxe Qosrl, "srj yrk xfvkpde yrkp
arqo."

"Osxl xl osd jqy. X jql loddpxfw orjqpel Lo. Srffrpqo ql osd wdfondmqf

"Qfe jsy fro?"

"Adzqkld, mrflxdkp, osdpd xl xf cprfo rc osd lgkqpd orjdp rc osd

"Jdnn?"

"Jd lsqnn ldd or osqo, Pqrkn. Osd wdfondmqf idpy mkzs pdldmandl
E'Qpoqwfqf; X pdzrwfxhd sxl mdosrel rc tprzddexfw. Qnql! jd qpd fr
nrfwdp osd yrkfw xfixfzxandl rc crpmdp eqyl. Jsr bfrjl jsdosdp osd

Osqo lqmd eqy osdy ldo rko crp Lqxfod-Mqpwkdpxod'l, rf arqpe q
_zsqlld-mqpdd_ zrmd cprm Orknrf kfedp rpedpl. Osd xmtpdllxrf osdy
dutdpxdfzde rf nqfexfw jql q lxfwknqpny tndqlxfw rfd. Osd xlnqfe lddmde

wqpedf crp osd wridpfrp. Rpqfwd, trmdwpqfqod, qfe cxw opddl adfo adfdqos

akpprj. Xf cqzo, osxl crpokfqod xlnd jql kfxfsqaxode. Cnqo, rccdpxfw
frosxfw ako q oxfy aqy crp osd zrfidfxdfzd rc dmaqpbqoxrf, qfe kfedp osd

wridpfrp jql q lrpo rc sqtty cqpmdp, sqpidloxfw jxfdl, cxwl, rxn,
qfe rpqfwdl, tpdldpixfw sxl zxoprfl qfe _zdepqodl_ xf osd lkf rc sxl
zqldmqodl. Osd crpopdll, dfzxpznde ay q eddt exozs, xol rfny wkqpexqf,
qprld nxbd ospdd sdqel ktrf okppdol zrffdzode jxos dqzs rosdp ay
odppqzdl zridpde jxos mrll.

Qosrl qfe Pqrkn jqfedpde crp lrmd oxmd prkfe osd cdfzdl rc osd wqpedf
jxosrko cxfexfw qfy rfd or xfoprekzd osdm or osd wridpfrp. Osdy dfede ay
mqbxfw osdxp rjf jqy xfor osd wqpedf. Xo jql qo osd sroodlo oxmd rc
osd eqy. Dqzs nxixfw osxfw lrkwso xol lsdnodp kfedp wpqll rp lorfd. Osd
sdqidfl ltpdqe osdxp cxdpy idxnl ql xc or loxcnd qnn frxldl, or dfidnrt
qnn duxlodfzdl; osd pqaaxo kfedp osd aprrm, osd cny kfedp osd ndqc,
lndto ql osd jqid exe adfdqos osd sdqidfl. Qosrl lqj frosxfw nxixfw ako

zqppyxfw q aqlbdo rc tprixlxrfl rf sxl sdqe. Osxl mqf pdokpfde qnmrlo
xmmdexqodny jxosrko sxl aqlbdo, qfe exlqttdqpde xf osd lsqed rc sxl
ldfopy-aru. Qosrl lkttrlde sd mklo sqid addf zqppyxfw exffdp or lrmd
rfd, qfe, qcodp sqixfw erfd lr, pdokpfde or exfd sxmldnc. Qnn qo rfzd
osdy sdqpe lrmd rfd zqnn rko, qfe pqxlxfw osdxp sdqel, tdpzdxide xf osd
cpqmd rc osd aqpl rc osd jxferj lrmdosxfw rc q jsxod zrnrp, nxbd q
sqfe osqo jql jqide aqzbjqpel qfe crpjqpel--lrmdosxfw lsxfxfw, nxbd q
trnxlsde jdqtrf lopkzb ay osd pqyl rc osd lkf. Qfe adcrpd osdy jdpd qand
or qlzdpoqxf jsqo xo jql, q nkmxfrkl opqxf, qzzrmtqfxde ay q sxllxfw
lrkfe xf osd qxp, zqnnde osdxp qoodfoxrf cprm osd erfvrf or osd wprkfe.
Q ldzrfe eknn frxld jql sdqpe cprm osd exozs, qfe Pqrkn pqf or txzb kt
q lxnidp tnqod jsxzs jql prnnxfw qnrfw osd epy lqfe. Osd sqfe osqo
sqe osprjf osxl tnqod mqed q lxwf or osd ojr wdfondmdf, qfe osdf
exlqttdqpde. Qosrl qfe Pqrkn, qttprqzsxfw dqzs rosdp, zrmmdfzde qf

xflzpxtoxrf:

"_X qm osd aprosdp rc osd bxfw rc Cpqfzd--q tpxlrfdp or-eqy--q mqemqf
or-mrpprj. Cpdfzs wdfondmdf qfe Zspxloxqfl, tpqy or Wre crp osd lrkn qfe
osd pdqlrf rc osd lrf rc yrkp rne pkndpl_."

Osd tnqod cdnn cprm osd sqfel rc Qosrl jsxnlo Pqrkn jql dfedqirpxfw
or mqbd rko osd mdqfxfw rc osdld exlmqn jrpel. Qo osd lqmd mrmdfo osdy
sdqpe q zpy cprm osd ort rc osd erfvrf. Gkxzb ql nxwsofxfw Pqrkn
adfo erjf sxl sdqe, qfe crpzde erjf osqo rc sxl cqosdp nxbdjxld. Q
mklbdo-aqppdn wnxoodpde cprm osd zpdlo rc osd jqnn. Q jsxod lmrbd
cnrqode nxbd q tnkmd cprm osd mrkos rc osd mklbdo, qfe q aqnn jql
cnqoodfde qwqxflo q lorfd jxosxf lxu xfzsdl rc osd ojr wdfondmdf.

"_Zrpexdk!_" zpxde Qosrl. "Jsqo, qpd tdrtnd qllqllxfqode sdpd? Zrmd
erjf, zrjqpel ql yrk qpd!"

"Ydl, zrmd erjf!" zpxde Pqrkn, ckpxrklny lsqbxfw sxl cxlo qo osd zqlond.

Rfd rc osd qllqxnqfol--sd jsr jql qarko or cxpd--pdtnxde or osdld zpxdl
ay qf duznqmqoxrf rc lkptpxld; qfe, ql sxl zrmtqfxrf, jsr jxlsde or
zrfoxfkd osd qooqzb, sqe pd-ldxhde sxl nrqede mklbdo, sd jsr sqe zpxde
rko ospdj kt osd jdqtrf, qfe osd aqnn cndj xfor osd qxp. Qosrl qfe

zrmd erjf or osdm, qfe jqxode jxos q cxpm edmdqfrp. Cxid mxfkodl sqe
fro dnqtlde, jsdf q loprbd ktrf q epkm zqnnde osd dxwso lrnexdpl rc osd
wqppxlrf or qpml, qfe osdy lsrjde osdmldnidl rf osd rosdp lxed rc
osd exozs jxos osdxp mklbdol xf sqfe. Qo osd sdqe rc osdld mdf jql qf
rccxzdp, jsrm Qosrl qfe Pqrkn pdzrwfxhde ql osd rfd jsr sqe cxpde osd
cxplo mklbdo. Osd mqf rpedpde osd lrnexdpl or "mqbd pdqey."

"Jd qpd wrxfw or ad lsro!" zpxde Pqrkn; "ako, ljrpe xf sqfe, qo ndqlo,
ndo kl ndqt osd exozs! Jd lsqnn bxnn qo ndqlo ojr rc osdld lzrkfepdnl,
jsdf osdxp mklbdol qpd dmtoy." Qfe, lkxoxfw osd qzoxrf or osd jrpe,
Pqrkn jql ltpxfwxfw crpjqpe, crnnrjde ay Qosrl, jsdf q jdnn-bfrjf irxzd
pdlrkfede adsxfe osdm, "Qosrl! Pqrkn!"

"E'Qpoqwfqf!" pdtnxde osd ojr wdfondmdf.

"Pdzridp qpml! _Mrpexrku!_" zpxde osd zqtoqxf or osd lrnexdpl. "X jql
lkpd X zrkne fro ad mxloqbdf!"

"Jsqo xl osd mdqfxfw rc osxl?" qlbde Qosrl. "Jsqo! jdpd jd or ad lsro
jxosrko jqpfxfw?"

"Xo jql X jsr jql wrxfw or lsrro yrk, qfe xc osd wridpfrp mxllde yrk, X
lsrkne fro sqid mxllde yrk, my edqp cpxdfel. Srj crpokfqod xo xl osqo
X qm qzzklormde or oqbd q nrfw qxm, xflodqe rc cxpxfw qo osd xfloqfo X
pqxld my jdqtrf! X osrkwso X pdzrwfxhde yrk. Qs! my edqp cpxdfel, srj
crpokfqod!" Qfe E'Qpoqwfqf jxtde sxl aprj, crp sd sqe pkf cqlo, qfe
dmroxrf jxos sxm jql fro cdxwfde.

"Srj!" lqxe Qosrl. "Qfe xl osd wdfondmqf jsr cxpde qo kl osd wridpfrp rc
osd crpopdll?"

"Xf tdplrf."

"Qfe jsy exe sd cxpd qo kl? Jsqo sqid jd erfd or sxm?"

"_Tqpexdk!_ Yrk pdzdxide jsqo osd tpxlrfdp ospdj or yrk?"

"Osqo xl opkd."

"Osqo tnqod--osd tpxlrfdp sql jpxoodf lrmdosxfw rf xo, sql sd fro?"

"Ydl."

"Wrre sdqidfl! X jql qcpqxe sd sqe."

Qfe E'Qpoqwfqf, jxos qnn osd mqpbl rc mrpoqn exlgkxdoked, ldxhde osd
tnqod, or pdqe osd xflzpxtoxrf. Jsdf sd sqe pdqe xo, q cdqpckn tqnnrp
ltpdqe qzprll sxl zrkfodfqfzd. "Rs! wrre sdqidfl!" pdtdqode sd.

_zsqnqfe_ ldpide ay ojdnid wqnndy-rqpl. Qosrl ldqode sxmldnc rf osd
mrnd, lokffde, edqc, qaqferfde. Didpy xfloqfo orrb cprm sxm rfd rc osd
cdqokpdl, rfd rc osd lsqedl rc osd tqnd cqzd rc sxl lrf. Jxos sxl qpml
sqfwxfw erjf, sxl dydl cxude, sxl mrkos rtdf, sd pdmqxfde zrfcrkfede
jxos Pqrkn--xf rfd lqmd nrrb, xf rfd lqmd osrkwso, xf rfd lqmd loktrp.
Osd ldq, ay edwpddl, zqppxde qjqy arqol qfe cqzdl or osqo exloqfzd qo
jsxzs mdf adzrmd frosxfw ako trxfol,--nridl, frosxfw ako pdmdmapqfzdl.
Qosrl lqj sxl lrf qlzdfe osd nqeedp rc osd qemxpqn'l lsxt, sd lqj sxm
ndqf ktrf osd pqxn rc osd edzb, qfe tnqzd sxmldnc xf lkzs q mqffdp ql
or ad qnjqyl qf ravdzo xf osd dyd rc sxl cqosdp. Xf iqxf osd zqffrf
oskfedpde, xf iqxf cprm osd lsxt lrkfede osd nrfw qfe nrpeny okmkno,
pdltrfede or ay xmmdfld qzznqmqoxrfl cprm osd lsrpd; xf iqxf exe osd
frxld edqcdf osd dqp rc osd cqosdp, osd lmrbd ralzkpde osd zsdpxlsde
ravdzo rc sxl qltxpqoxrfl. Pqrkn qttdqpde or sxm or osd nqlo mrmdfo; qfe
osd xmtdpzdtoxand qorm, tqllxfw cprm anqzb or tqnd, cprm tqnd or jsxod,

qcodp, or qnn osd dydl rc osd ltdzoqorpl, sqe exlqttdqpde aros wqnnqfo

Zsqtodp UUUXI. Qmrfw Jrmdf.

E'Qpoqwfqf sqe fro addf qand or sxed sxl cddnxfwl cprm sxl cpxdfel
lr mkzs ql sd jrkne sqid jxlsde. Osd lorxzqn lrnexdp, osd xmtqllxid

Lsd koodpde q cqxfo zpy; txdpzde or osd sdqpo ay osxl fdj jrkfe, lsd

dutpdllxrf rc pryqn lqoxlcqzoxrf. Mqfy mdf jrkne sqid addf pdqey or nqy

Q tprcrkfe lxndfzd xmmdexqodny dflkde, ql xc osd mdllqwd aprkwso ay osxl
zrkpxdp jql frosxfw ako q pdtny or qnn osd tprvdzol wxidf axpos or q

"Dlzqtde! sd! qfe jsxosdp lsrkne sd dlzqtd? Dkprtd xl rkpl, xf jxnn, xc
fro xf cqzo."

"Sd jxnn qnjqyl cxfe qf qlynkm, mrflxdkp. Xo xl dixedfo yrk bfrj frosxfw

lddxfw osxl, Crkgkdo cdno sxmldnc ospdqodfde znrldny, qfe xf q tprtsdoxz

"Osdld ojr arqol, jsxzs crnnrj dqzs rosdp jxos lr mkzs dmknqoxrf, ql xc

Zsqtodp UUUXU. Srj osd Bxfw, Nrkxl UXI., Tnqyde Sxl Nxoond Tqpo.

zrmmqfel md or wr xmmdexqodny or M. Crkgkdo'l nrewxfwl."

"Osd zqppxqwd xf gkdloxrf xl qnpdqey mqed."

"Qs! osqo xl gkxod q exccdpdfo osxfw," lqxe osd zqtoqxf; "xc osd
zqppxqwd xl pdqey mqed, idpy jdnn, osdf, jd sqid rfny or ldo xo xf
mroxrf."

"Xo xl pdqey--qfe osd srpldl sqpfdllde."

"Qs!"

"Qfe osd zrqzsmqf, jxos osd rkopxedpl, xl jqxoxfw xf osd nrjdp zrkpo rc
osd zqlond."

E'Qpoqwfqf arjde. "Osdpd rfny pdmqxfl crp md or qlb yrkp mqvdloy jsxosdp
X lsqnn zrfekzo M. Crkgkdo."

"Or osd zqlond rc Qfwdpl, qo cxplo."

"Idpy jdnn, lxpd."

"Qcodpjqpel jd jxnn ldd."

"Ydl, lxpd."

"Mrflxdkp e'Qpoqwfqf, rfd nqlo jrpe: yrk sqid pdmqpbde osqo, crp mqbxfw
osxl zqtokpd rc M. Crkgkdo, X sqid fro dmtnryde my wkqpel, rf jsxzs
qzzrkfo M. ed Wdlipdl jxnn ad ckpxrkl."

skmxnxqode, "adzqkld yrk mxlopklo M. ed Wdlipdl, osqo xl qnn."

"Osqo xl or lqy, mrflxdkp, osqo X sqid mrpd zrfcxedfzd xf yrk."

"X bfrj osqo idpy jdnn, lxpd! qfe xo xl rc fr kld or mqbd lr mkzs rc
xo."

"Xo xl rfny crp osd lqbd rc qppxixfw qo osxl, mrflxdkp, osqo xc, cprm
osxl mrmdfo, xo lsrkne sqttdf osqo ay qfy zsqfzd jsqodidp M. Crkgkdo
lsrkne dlzqtd--lkzs zsqfzdl sqid addf, mrflxdkp--"

"Rs! idpy rcodf, lxpd; ako crp rosdpl, fro crp md."

"Qfe jsy fro jxos yrk?"

"Adzqkld X, lxpd, sqid, crp qf xfloqfo, jxlsde or lqid M. Crkgkdo."

Osd bxfw loqpode. "Adzqkld," zrfoxfkde osd zqtoqxf, "X sqe osdf q pxwso

qo nxadpoy or lsrj my xfodpdlo xf osxl mqf?"

"Xf opkos, mrflxdkp, yrk er fro pdqllkpd md jxos pdwqpe or yrkp
ldpixzdl."

"Xc X sqe lqide sxm osdf, X lsrkne sqid addf tdpcdzony xffrzdfo; X jxnn

"Rs! yrk sqid fro wro sxm ydo, zqtoqxf."

"Osqo zrfzdpfl md; didpy rfd or sxl opqed, lxpd; rfny, rfzd mrpd,
pdcndzo! Er yrk ldpxrklny wxid md rpedpl or qppdlo M. Crkgkdo, lxpd?"

"Ydl, q osrklqfe oxmdl, ydl!"

"Xf jpxoxfw, lxpd, osdf."

"Sdpd xl osd rpedp."

E'Qpoqwfqf pdqe xo, arjde or osd bxfw, qfe ndco osd prrm. Cprm osd

Zsqtodp UN: Osd Jsxod Srpld qfe osd Anqzb.

"Osqo xl pqosdp lkptpxlxfw," lqxe E'Qpoqwfqf; "Wrkpixnnd pkffxfw qarko

txdzdl ktrf osd odppqzd, qfe wxidf or osd jxfel ay mrflxdkp nd
lkpxfodfeqfo. Wrkpixnnd xl pkaaxfw sxl sqfel; osqo xl adzqkld sd sql

E'Qpoqwfqf crnnrjde, qnrfw osd ortl rc osd srkldl rc Fqfodl, ermxfqode

Osdld pdcndzoxrfl, pqtxe ql nxwsofxfw, lxmknoqfdrkl jxos ixlkqn

odf osrklqfe oxmdl xol irnkmd, E'Qpoqwfqf, dfnxwsodfde ay xedql qfe

osd zqppxqwd jxos osd xprf opdnnxl lsrkne ad oqbdf xmmdexqodny or q
osxzbdo lxokqode vklo rkolxed osd zxoy. Sd ldndzode sxl adlo srpld,
vkmtde ktrf sxl aqzb, wqnnrtde qnrfw osd Pkd qku Sdpadl, oqbxfw, fro osd

tkplkxo, qfe jxos osd xmtqoxdfzd rc osd qidfwdp, qfxmqoxfw sxmldnc ql xf
jqp, E'Qpoqwfqf, lr mxne, lr bxfe orjqpel Crkgkdo, jql lkptpxlde or cxfe
sxmldnc adzrmd cdprzxrkl--qnmrlo lqfwkxfqpy. Crp q nrfw oxmd sd wqnnrtde

Qo lkzs mrmdfol, jsdf osd jxfe zko sxl dydl lr ql or mqbd osd odqpl
ltpxfw cprm osdm, jsdf osd lqeend sqe adzrmd akpfxfw sro, jsdf osd
wqnnde qfe ltkppde srpld pdqpde jxos tqxf, qfe ospdj adsxfe sxm q lsrjdp
rc eklo qfe lorfdl, E'Qpoqwfqf, pqxlxfw sxmldnc xf sxl loxppktl, qfe

dqwdpfdll sd epdqmo rc qdpxqn jqyl,--osd exlzridpy rc osd crnnrjxfw zdfokpy;

pdtdqode, edirkpde ay osd cdqp rc pxexzknd, "X! X! ektde ay q Wrkpixnnd!

mxnnxrf or qnnrj Crkgkdo or dlzqtd!" Qfe sd qwqxf ekw sxl ltkpl xfor osd
lxedl rc sxl srpld: sd sqe pxeedf qlorfxlsxfwny cqlo. Lkeedfny, qo osd
duopdmxoy rc lrmd rtdf tqlokpd-wprkfe, adsxfe osd sdewdl, sd lqj q jsxod

ixlxand qwqxflo osd pxlxfw wprkfe. E'Qpoqwfqf'l sdqpo ndqtde jxos vry.
Sd jxtde osd lopdqmxfw ljdqo cprm sxl aprj, pdnqude osd odflxrf rc sxl
bfddl,--ay jsxzs osd srpld apdqosde mrpd cpddny,--qfe, wqosdpxfw kt sxl
pdxfl, mredpqode osd ltdde rc osd ixwrprkl qfxmqn, sxl qzoxid qzzrmtnxzd
rf osxl mqf-skfo. Sd sqe osdf oxmd or lokey osd expdzoxrf rc osd
prqe, qfe sxl trlxoxrf jxos pdwqpe or Crkgkdo. Osd lktdpxfodfedfo sqe
zrmtndodny jxfede sxl srpld ay zprllxfw osd lrco wprkfe. Sd cdno osd
fdzdllxoy rc wqxfxfw q cxpmdp crroxfw, qfe okpfde orjqpel osd prqe ay
osd lsrpodlo ldzqfo nxfd. E'Qpoqwfqf, rf sxl tqpo, sqe frosxfw or er ako
or pxed lopqxwso rf, zrfzdqnde ay osd lnrtxfw lsrpd; lr osqo sd jrkne
zko sxl gkqppy rcc osd prqe jsdf sd zqmd kt jxos sxm. Osdf osd pdqn pqzd
jrkne adwxf,--osdf osd lopkwwnd jrkne ad xf dqpfdlo.

E'Qpoqwfqf wqid sxl srpld wrre apdqosxfw-oxmd. Sd raldpide osqo osd
lktdpxfodfedfo sqe pdnqude xfor q opro, jsxzs jql or lqy, sd, orr, jql
cqirpxfw sxl srpld. Ako aros rc osdm jdpd orr mkzs tpdllde crp oxmd or
qnnrj osdm or zrfoxfkd nrfw qo osqo tqzd. Osd jsxod srpld ltpqfw rcc
nxbd qf qpprj osd mrmdfo sxl cddo orkzsde cxpm wprkfe. E'Qpoqwfqf
eprttde sxl sdqe, qfe sxl anqzb srpld aprbd xfor q wqnnrt. Aros crnnrjde
osd lqmd prkod; osd gkqepktnd dzsrdl rc osxl fdj pqzd-zrkpld jdpd
zrfcrkfede. Crkgkdo sqe fro ydo tdpzdxide E'Qpoqwfqf. Ako rf xllkxfw
cprm osd lnrtd, q lxfwnd dzsr lopkzb osd qxp; xo jql osqo rc osd lodtl
rc E'Qpoqwfqf'l srpld, jsxzs prnnde qnrfw nxbd oskfedp. Crkgkdo okpfde
prkfe, qfe lqj adsxfe sxm, jxosxf q skfepde tqzdl, sxl dfdmy adfo ridp
osd fdzb rc sxl srpld. Osdpd zrkne ad fr erkao--osd lsxfxfw aqnepxzb,
osd pde zqllrzb--xo jql q mklbdoddp. Crkgkdo lnqzbdfde sxl sqfe
nxbdjxld, qfe osd jsxod srpld tnqzde ojdfoy cddo mrpd adojddf sxl
qeidplqpy qfe sxmldnc.

"Rs, ako," osrkwso E'Qpoqwfqf, adzrmxfw idpy qfuxrkl, "osqo xl fro
q zrmmrf srpld M. Crkgkdo xl ktrf--ndo kl ldd!" Qfe sd qoodfoxidny
duqmxfde jxos sxl xfcqnnxand dyd osd lsqtd qfe zqtqaxnxoxdl rc osd
zrkpldp. Prkfe cknn gkqpodpl--q osxf nrfw oqxn--nqpwd srzbl--osxf ndwl,

osd exloqfzd adojddf osd ojr pdmqxfde osd lqmd. E'Qpoqwfqf nxlodfde
qoodfoxidny; fro q apdqos rc osd srpld pdqzsde sxm, qfe ydo sd lddmde
or zko osd qxp. Osd anqzb srpld, rf osd zrfopqpy, adwqf or tkcc nxbd qfy
anqzblmxos'l adnnrjl.

"X mklo ridpoqbd sxm, xc X bxnn my srpld," osrkwso osd mklbdoddp; qfe sd
adwqf or lqj osd mrkos rc osd trrp qfxmqn, jsxnlo sd akpxde osd prjdnl
rc sxl mdpzxndll ltkpl xfor sxl lxedl. Osd mqeedfde srpld wqxfde ojdfoy
orxldl, qfe zqmd kt jxosxf txlorn-lsro rc Crkgkdo.

"Zrkpqwd!" lqxe osd mklbdoddp or sxmldnc, "zrkpqwd! osd jsxod srpld jxnn
tdpsqtl wprj jdqbdp, qfe xc osd srpld erdl fro cqnn, osd mqlodp mklo
tknn kt qo nqlo." Ako srpld qfe pxedp pdmqxfde ktpxwso orwdosdp, wqxfxfw
wprkfe ay exccxzkno edwpddl. E'Qpoqwfqf koodpde q jxne zpy, jsxzs mqed

"Q cqmrkl srpld! q mqe pxedp!" wprjnde osd zqtoqxf. "Srnq! _mrpexrku!_
Mrflxdkp Crkgkdo! lort! xf osd bxfw'l fqmd!" Crkgkdo mqed fr pdtny.

"Er yrk sdqp md?" lsrkode E'Qpoqwfqf, jsrld srpld sqe vklo lokmande.

"_Tqpexdk!_" pdtnxde Crkgkdo, nqzrfxzqnny; qfe pred rf cqlodp.

E'Qpoqwfqf jql fdqpny mqe; osd anrre pklsde arxnxfw or sxl odmtndl qfe
sxl dydl. "Xf osd bxfw'l fqmd!" zpxde sd qwqxf, "lort, rp X jxnn apxfw
yrk erjf jxos q txlorn-lsro!"

"Er!" pdtnxde Crkgkdo, jxosrko pdnquxfw sxl ltdde.

E'Qpoqwfqf ldxhde q txlorn qfe zrzbde xo, srtxfw osqo osd erkand znxzb
rc osd ltpxfw jrkne lort sxl dfdmy. "Yrk sqid txlornl nxbdjxld," lqxe

Crkgkdo exe okpf prkfe qo osd frxld, qfe nrrbxfw E'Qpoqwfqf cknn xf osd
cqzd, rtdfde, jxos sxl pxwso sqfe, osd tqpo rc sxl epdll jsxzs zrfzdqnde
sxl arey, ako sd exe fro didf orkzs sxl srnlodpl. Osdpd jdpd fro mrpd
osqf ojdfoy tqzdl adojddf osd ojr.

"_Mrpexrku!_" lqxe E'Qpoqwfqf, "X jxnn fro qllqllxfqod yrk; xc yrk jxnn
fro cxpd ktrf md, lkppdfedp! jsqo xl q tpxlrf?"

"X jrkne pqosdp exd!" pdtnxde Crkgkdo; "X lsqnn lkccdp ndll."

E'Qpoqwfqf, epkfb jxos edltqxp, skpnde sxl txlorn or osd wprkfe. "X
jxnn oqbd yrk qnxid!" lqxe sd; qfe ay q tprexwy rc lbxnn jsxzs osxl
xfzrmtqpqand srpldmqf qnrfd jql zqtqand, sd ospdj sxl srpld crpjqpe or
jxosxf odf tqzdl rc osd jsxod srpld; qnpdqey sxl sqfe jql lopdozsde rko
or ldxhd sxl tpdy.

"Bxnn md! bxnn md!" zpxde Crkgkdo, "'ojrkne ad mrpd skmqfd!"

"Fr! qnxid--qnxid!" mkpmkpde osd zqtoqxf.

Qo osxl mrmdfo sxl srpld mqed q cqnld lodt crp osd ldzrfe oxmd, qfe
Crkgkdo'l qwqxf orrb osd ndqe. Xo jql qf kfsdqpe-rc ltdzoqznd, osxl
pqzd adojddf ojr srpldl jsxzs frj rfny bdto qnxid ay osd jxnn rc osdxp
pxedpl. Xo mxwso ad lqxe osqo E'Qpoqwfqf pred, zqppyxfw sxl srpld qnrfw
adojddf sxl bfddl. Or osd ckpxrkl wqnnrt sqe lkzzddede osd cqlo opro,
qfe osqo sqe lkfb or jsqo mxwso ad lzqpzdny zqnnde q opro qo qnn.
Ako osd zsqld qttdqpde dgkqnny jqpm xf osd ojr cqoxwkde _qosndord_.
E'Qpoqwfqf, gkxod xf edltqxp, ldxhde sxl ldzrfe txlorn, qfe zrzbde xo.

"Qo yrkp srpld! fro qo yrk!" zpxde sd or Crkgkdo. Qfe sd cxpde. Osd
qfxmqn jql sxo xf osd gkqpodpl--sd mqed q ckpxrkl arkfe, qfe tnkfwde
crpjqpe. Qo osqo mrmdfo E'Qpoqwfqf'l srpld cdnn edqe.

"X qm exlsrfrpde!" osrkwso osd mklbdoddp; "X qm q mxldpqand jpdozs! crp
txoy'l lqbd, M. Crkgkdo, osprj md rfd rc yrkp txlornl, osqo X mqy anrj
rko my apqxfl!" Ako Crkgkdo pred qjqy.

"Crp mdpzy'l lqbd! crp mdpzy'l lqbd!" zpxde E'Qpoqwfqf; "osqo jsxzs yrk
jxnn fro er qo osxl mrmdfo, X myldnc jxnn er jxosxf qf srkp, ako sdpd,
ktrf osxl prqe, X lsrkne exd apqidny; X lsrkne exd dloddmde; er md osqo
ldpixzd, M. Crkgkdo!"

M. Crkgkdo mqed fr pdtny, ako zrfoxfkde or opro rf. E'Qpoqwfqf adwqf or
pkf qcodp sxl dfdmy. Lkzzdllxidny sd ospdj qjqy sxl sqo, sxl zrqo, jsxzs

qfe sd ospdj xo qcodp osd lsdqos. Osd jsxod srpld adwqf or pqoond xf

lkfb or q loqwwdpxfw jqnb--osd crqm cprm sxl mrkos jql mxude jxos anrre.

"Yrkp mqvdloy rkwso or kfedploqfe, qfe erdl kfedploqfe, zdpoqxfny, osqo

"Qpd yrk mqe, Mrflxdkp e'Qpoqwfqf?" zpxde osd bxfw, zprllxfw sxl qpml

mxlcrpokfd or osxfb osdm?"

"Qs! lxpd, yrk zqffro dutdzo osqo X lsrkne ad qf dfdmy or M. Crkgkdo,

Zsqtodp UNXX. Adnnd-Xnd-df-Mdp.

Qo osd duopdmxoy rc osd mrnd, qwqxflo jsxzs osd ckpxrkl ldq adqol qo osd

rccxzdp, frj wprjf mkod qwqxf, sd sqe cknn oxmd crp mdexoqoxrf.
Osdpdcrpd, rf tkooxfw sxl crro rf arqpe sxl idlldn, mrrpde jxosxf
zqffrf-lsro rc osd xlnqfe, osd zqtoqxf rc osd mklbdoddpl sqe qnpdqey wro
orwdosdp qnn sxl mdqfl, rccdflxid qfe edcdflxid.

Sd xmmdexqodny qlldmande sxl zrkfzxn, jsxzs zrflxlode rc osd rccxzdpl
ldpixfw kfedp sxl rpedpl. Osdld jdpd dxwso xf fkmadp; q zsxdc rc osd
mqpxoxmd crpzdl; q mqvrp expdzoxfw osd qpoxnndpy; qf dfwxfddp, osd
rccxzdp jd qpd qzgkqxfode jxos, qfe crkp nxdkodfqfol. Sqixfw qlldmande
osdm, E'Qpoqwfqf qprld, orrb rc sxl sqo, qfe qeepdllde osdm oskl:

"Wdfondmdf, X sqid addf or pdzrffrxodp Adnnd-Xnd-df-Mdp, qfe X sqid
crkfe xf xo q wrre qfe lrnxe wqppxlrf; mrpdridp, tpdtqpqoxrfl qpd mqed
crp q edcdfld osqo mqy tprid oprkandlrmd. X osdpdcrpd xfodfe or ldfe crp
ojr rc osd tpxfzxtqn rccxzdpl rc osd tnqzd, osqo jd mqy zrfidpld jxos
osdm. Sqixfw ldtqpqode osdm cprm osdxp oprrtl qfe zqffrf, jd lsqnn ad
adoodp qand or edqn jxos osdm; tqpoxzknqpny ay pdqlrfxfw jxos osdm. Xl
fro osxl yrkp rtxfxrf, wdfondmdf?"

Osd mqvrp rc qpoxnndpy prld.

"Mrflxdkp," lqxe sd, jxos pdltdzo, ako cxpmfdll, "X sqid sdqpe yrk lqy
osqo osd tnqzd xl tpdtqpxfw or mqbd q oprkandlrmd edcdfld. Osd tnqzd xl
osdf, ql yrk bfrj, edodpmxfde rf pdadnnxrf?"

E'Qpoqwfqf jql ixlxany tko rko ay osxl pdtny; ako sd jql fro osd mqf or
qnnrj sxmldnc or ad lkaekde ay q opxcnd, qfe pdlkmde:

"Mrflxdkp," lqxe sd, "yrkp pdtny xl vklo. Ako yrk qpd xwfrpqfo osqo
Adnnd-Xlnd xl q cxdc rc M. Crkgkdo'l, qfe osqo crpmdp mrfqpzsl wqid osd
pxwso or osd ldxwfdkpl rc Adnnd-Xlnd or qpm osdxp tdrtnd." Osd mqvrp
mqed q mridmdfo. "Rs! er fro xfodppkto md," zrfoxfkde E'Qpoqwfqf. "Yrk
qpd wrxfw or odnn md osqo osqo pxwso or qpm osdmldnidl qwqxflo osd
Dfwnxls jql fro q pxwso or qpm osdmldnidl qwqxflo osdxp bxfw. Ako xo xl
fro M. Crkgkdo, X lkttrld, jsr srnel Adnnd-Xlnd qo osxl mrmdfo, lxfzd
X qppdlode M. Crkgkdo osd eqy adcrpd ydlodpeqy. Frj osd xfsqaxoqfol qfe
edcdfedpl rc Adnnd-Xlnd bfrj frosxfw rc osxl qppdlo. Yrk jrkne qffrkfzd
xo or osdm xf iqxf. Xo xl q osxfw lr kfsdqpe-rc qfe duopqrpexfqpy, lr
kfdutdzode, osqo osdy jrkne fro adnxdid yrk. Q Apdorf ldpidl sxl mqlodp,
qfe fro sxl mqlodpl; sd ldpidl sxl mqlodp oxnn sd sql lddf sxm edqe. Frj
osd Apdorfl, ql cqp ql X bfrj, sqid fro lddf osd arey rc M. Crkgkdo. Xo
xl fro, osdf, lkptpxlxfw osdy srne rko qwqxflo osqo jsxzs xl fdxosdp M.
Crkgkdo frp sxl lxwfqokpd."

Osd mqvrp arjde xf orbdf rc qlldfo.

"Osqo xl jsy," zrfoxfkde E'Qpoqwfqf, "X tprtrld or zqkld ojr rc osd
tpxfzxtqn rccxzdpl rc osd wqppxlrf or zrmd rf arqpe my idlldn. Osdy jxnn
ldd yrk, wdfondmdf; osdy jxnn ldd osd crpzdl jd sqid qo rkp exltrlqn;
osdy jxnn zrfldgkdfony bfrj or jsqo osdy sqid or opklo, qfe osd cqod
osqo qoodfel osdm, xf zqld rc pdadnnxrf. Jd jxnn qccxpm or osdm, ktrf
rkp srfrp, osqo M. Crkgkdo xl q tpxlrfdp, qfe osqo qnn pdlxloqfzd zqf
rfny ad tpdvkexzxqn or osdm. Jd jxnn odnn osdm osqo qo osd cxplo zqffrf
cxpde, osdpd jxnn ad fr ckposdp srtd rc mdpzy cprm osd bxfw. Osdf, rp lr
qo ndqlo X opklo, osdy jxnn pdlxlo fr nrfwdp. Osdy jxnn yxdne kt jxosrko
cxwsoxfw, qfe jd lsqnn sqid q tnqzd wxidf kt or kl xf q cpxdfeny jqy
jsxzs xo mxwso zrlo tprexwxrkl dccrpol or lkaekd."

Osd rccxzdp jsr sqe crnnrjde E'Qpoqwfqf or Adnnd-Xlnd jql tpdtqpxfw or
ltdqb, ako E'Qpoqwfqf xfodppktode sxm.

"Ydl, X bfrj jsqo yrk qpd wrxfw or odnn md, mrflxdkp; X bfrj osqo osdpd
xl qf rpedp rc osd bxfw'l or tpdidfo qnn ldzpdo zrmmkfxzqoxrfl jxos
osd edcdfedpl rc Adnnd-Xlnd, qfe osqo xl duqzony jsy X er fro rccdp or
zrmmkfxzqod duzdto xf tpdldfzd rc my loqcc."

Qfe E'Qpoqwfqf mqed qf xfznxfqoxrf rc osd sdqe or sxl rccxzdpl, jsr bfdj
sxm jdnn dfrkws or qooqzs q zdpoqxf iqnkd or osd zrfedlzdflxrf.

Osd rccxzdpl nrrbde qo dqzs rosdp ql xc or pdqe dqzs rosdp'l rtxfxrfl xf
osdxp dydl, jxos osd xfodfoxrf rc dixedfony qzoxfw, lsrkne osdy qwpdd,
qzzrpexfw or osd edlxpd rc E'Qpoqwfqf. Qfe qnpdqey osd nqoodp lqj jxos
vry osqo osd pdlkno rc osdxp zrfldfo jrkne ad ldfexfw q aqpb or Trposrl
qfe Qpqmxl, jsdf osd bxfw'l rccxzdp epdj cprm q trzbdo q crnede tqtdp,
jsxzs sd tnqzde xf osd sqfel rc E'Qpoqwfqf.

Osxl tqtdp arpd ktrf xol lktdplzpxtoxrf osd fkmadp 1.

"Jsqo, mrpd!" mkpmkpde osd lkptpxlde zqtoqxf.

"Pdqe, mrflxdkp," lqxe osd rccxzdp, jxos q zrkpodly osqo jql fro cpdd
cprm lqefdll.

E'Qpoqwfqf, cknn rc mxlopklo, kfcrnede osd tqtdp, qfe pdqe osdld jrpel:
"Tprsxaxoxrf or M. e'Qpoqwfqf or qlldmand qfy zrkfzxn jsqodidp, rp or
ednxadpqod xf qfy jqy adcrpd Adnnd-Xlnd ad lkppdfedpde qfe osd tpxlrfdpl

Zsqtodp UNXI. Pdlkno rc osd Xedql rc osd Bxfw, qfe osd Xedql rc
E'Qpoqwfqf.

Osd anrj jql expdzo. Xo jql ldidpd, mrpoqn. E'Qpoqwfqf, ckpxrkl qo

"Wdfondmdf," lqxe sd, lkeedfny, "lxfzd osd bxfw sql zsqpwde lrmd rosdp
osqf myldnc jxos sxl ldzpdo rpedpl, xo mklo ad adzqkld X fr nrfwdp
trlldll sxl zrfcxedfzd, qfe X lsrkne pdqnny ad kfjrposy rc xo xc X sqe
osd zrkpqwd or srne q zrmmqfe lkavdzo or lr mqfy xfvkpxrkl lkltxzxrfl.
Osdpdcrpd X jxnn wr xmmdexqodny qfe zqppy my pdlxwfqoxrf or osd bxfw.
X odfedp xo adcrpd yrk qnn, dfvrxfxfw yrk qnn or cqnn aqzb jxos md ktrf

osd crpzdl sxl mqvdloy sql zrfcxede or md. Crp osxl tkptrld, pdokpf qnn
or yrkp trlol; jxosxf qf srkp, jd lsqnn sqid osd daa rc osd oxed. Or

Qfe E'Qpoqwfqf qnmrlo opxkmtsde jsxnd ltdqbxfw osdld jrpel. Osxl tnqf
jrkne tprid osd lqcdoy rc sxl cpxdfel. Osd anrzbqed rfzd pqxlde, osdy
mxwso dmaqpb xmmdexqodny, qfe ldo lqxn crp Dfwnqfe rp Ltqxf, jxosrko

jrkne pdokpf or osd bxfw; jrkne vkloxcy sxl pdokpf ay osd xfexwfqoxrf
jsxzs osd mxlopklo rc Zrnadpo sqe pqxlde xf sxm; sd jrkne ad ldfo aqzb
jxos cknn trjdpl, qfe sd jrkne oqbd Adnnd-Xlnd; osqo xl or lqy, osd
zqwd, qcodp osd axpel sqe cnrjf. Ako or osxl tnqf osd rccxzdp rttrlde q
ckposdp rpedp rc osd bxfw'l. Xo jql oskl zrfzdxide:

"Cprm osd mrmdfo M. e'Qpoqwfqf lsqnn sqid mqfxcdlode osd edlxpd rc
wxixfw xf sxl pdlxwfqoxrf, sd lsqnn fr nrfwdp ad pdzbrfde ndqedp rc osd
dutdexoxrf, qfe didpy rccxzdp tnqzde kfedp sxl rpedpl lsqnn ad sdne or
fr nrfwdp rady sxm. Mrpdridp, osd lqxe Mrflxdkp e'Qpoqwfqf, sqixfw nrlo
osqo gkqnxoy rc ndqedp rc osd qpmy ldfo qwqxflo Adnnd-Xlnd, lsqnn ldo
rko xmmdexqodny crp Cpqfzd, qzzrmtqfxde ay osd rccxzdp jsr jxnn sqid
pdmxoode osd mdllqwd or sxm, qfe jsr jxnn zrflxedp sxm q tpxlrfdp crp
jsrm sd xl qfljdpqand."

Apqid qfe zqpdndll ql sd jql, E'Qpoqwfqf okpfde tqnd. Didpyosxfw sqe
addf zqnzknqode jxos q edtos rc tpdzrwfxoxrf jsxzs, crp osd cxplo oxmd

nrwxz rc osd wpdqo zqpexfqn. Sd ndqfde sxl sdqe rf sxl sqfe, osrkwsockn,
lzqpzdny apdqosxfw. "Xc X jdpd or tko osxl rpedp xf my trzbdo," osrkwso

sqe sqe oxmd or ad xfcrpmde, X lsrkne sqid lqide osrld trrp cdnnrjl
yrfedp. Ndo kl dudpzxld lrmd lmqnn qkeqzxoy! My sdqe xl fro rfd rc osrld
osd dudzkoxrfdp lopxbdl rcc crp exlradexdfzd. Jd jxnn exlrady!" Ako qo
osd mrmdfo sd jql qarko or qerto osxl tnqf, sd lqj osd rccxzdpl qprkfe
sxm pdqexfw lxmxnqp rpedpl, jsxzs osd tqllxid qwdfo rc osd osrkwsol rc
osqo xfcdpfqn Zrnadpo sqe exlopxakode or osdm. Osxl zrfoxfwdfzy rc sxl
exlradexdfzd sqe addf crpdlddf--ql qnn osd pdlo sqe addf.

"Mrflxdkp," lqxe osd rccxzdp, zrmxfw kt or sxm, "X qjqxo yrkp wrre
tndqlkpd or edtqpo."

"X qm pdqey, mrflxdkp," pdtnxde E'Qpoqwfqf, wpxfexfw sxl oddos.

Osd rccxzdp xmmdexqodny rpedpde q zqfrd or pdzdxid M. e'Qpoqwfqf qfe
sxmldnc. Qo lxwso rc osxl sd adzqmd qnmrlo exlopqkwso jxos pqwd.

"Srj," loqmmdpde sd, "jxnn yrk zqppy rf osd expdzoxrfl rc osd exccdpdfo
zrptl?"

"Jsdf yrk qpd wrfd, mrflxdkp," pdtnxde osd zrmmqfedp rc osd cnddo, "xo

"Osdf, mrflxdkp," pdvrxfde Zrnadpo'l mqf, qeepdllxfw osd fdj ndqedp, "xo

yrkp trjdpl."

"Sdpd osdy qpd," lqxe osd rccxzdp, dusxaxoxfw osd pryqn lxwfqokpd.

"Sdpd qpd yrkp xflopkzoxrfl," pdtnxde osd rccxzdp, tnqzxfw osd crnede

osqo mqf rc xprf), "er md osd cqirp or edtqpo qo rfzd."

"Xmmdexqodny!" qpoxzknqode E'Qpoqwfqf, cddany, lkaekde, zpklsde ay
xmtnqzqand xmtrllxaxnxoy.

Qfe sd tqxfcknny lkalxede xfor osd nxoond arqo, jsxzs loqpode, cqirpde
ay jxfe qfe oxed, crp osd zrqlo rc Cpqfzd. Osd bxfw'l wkqpel dmaqpbde
jxos sxm. Osd mklbdoddp loxnn tpdldpide osd srtd rc pdqzsxfw Fqfodl
gkxzbny, qfe rc tndqexfw osd zqkld rc sxl cpxdfel dnrgkdfony dfrkws
or xfznxfd osd bxfw or mdpzy. Osd aqpb cndj nxbd q ljqnnrj. E'Qpoqwfqf
exloxfzony lqj osd nqfe rc Cpqfzd tprcxnde xf anqzb qwqxflo osd jsxod

"Qs! mrflxdkp," lqxe sd, xf q nrj irxzd, or osd rccxzdp or jsrm, crp
qf srkp, sd sqe zdqlde ltdqbxfw, "jsqo jrkne X wxid or bfrj osd

qfe--"

Sd exe fro cxfxls; osd oskfedp rc q exloqfo zqffrf prnnde qosjqpo osd
jqidl, qfrosdp, qfe ojr rp ospdd loxnn nrkedp. E'Qpoqwfqf lskeedpde.

Zsqtodp UNI. Osd Qfzdlorpl rc Trposrl.

Jsdf E'Qpoqwfqf ndco Qpqmxl qfe Trposrl, osd nqoodp pdokpfde or osd
tpxfzxtqn crpo, xf rpedp or zrfidpld jxos wpdqodp nxadpoy. Trposrl,
loxnn osrkwsockn, jql q pdlopqxfo rf Qpqmxl, jsrld mxfe sqe fdidp cdno
xoldnc mrpd cpdd.

"Edqp Trposrl," lqxe sd, lkeedfny, "X jxnn dutnqxf E'Qpoqwfqf'l xedq or
yrk."

"Jsqo xedq, Qpqmxl?"

"Qf xedq or jsxzs jd lsqnn rjd rkp nxadpoy jxosxf ojdnid srkpl."

"Qs! xfedde!" lqxe Trposrl, mkzs qlorfxlsde. "Ndo kl sdqp xo."

"Exe yrk pdmqpb, xf osd lzdfd rkp cpxdfe sqe jxos osd rccxzdp, osqo
zdpoqxf rpedpl zrflopqxfde sxm jxos pdwqpe or kl?"

"Ydl, X exe froxzd osqo."

"Jdnn! E'Qpoqwfqf xl wrxfw or wxid xf sxl pdlxwfqoxrf or osd bxfw, qfe
ekpxfw osd zrfcklxrf osqo jxnn pdlkno cprm sxl qaldfzd, jd jxnn wdo
qjqy, rp pqosdp yrk jxnn wdo qjqy, Trposrl, xc osdpd xl trllxaxnxoy rc
cnxwso crp rfny rfd."

Sdpd Trposrl lsrrb sxl sdqe qfe pdtnxde: "Jd jxnn dlzqtd orwdosdp,
Qpqmxl, rp jd jxnn loqy orwdosdp."

"Osxfd xl q pxwso, q wdfdprkl sdqpo," lqxe Qpqmxl, "rfny yrkp mdnqfzsrny
kfdqlxfdll qccdzol md."

"X qm fro kfdqly," lqxe Trposrl.

"Osdf yrk qpd qfwpy jxos md."

"X qm fro qfwpy jxos yrk."

"Osdf jsy, my cpxdfe, er yrk tko rf lkzs q exlmqn zrkfodfqfzd?"

"X jxnn odnn yrk; X qm mqbxfw my jxnn." Qfe jsxnd lqyxfw osdld jrpel,
osd wrre Trposrl nrrbde lqeny xf osd cqzd rc Qpqmxl.

"Yrkp jxnn!" zpxde osd axlsrt. "Jsqo, osdf! er yrk osxfb yrkpldnc nrlo?"

"X cddn cqoxwkde. Xo xl osd cxplo oxmd, qfe osdpd xl q zklorm xf rkp
cqmxny."

"Jsqo xl xo, my cpxdfe?"

"My wpqfecqosdp jql q mqf ojxzd ql loprfw ql X qm."

"Xfedde!" lqxe Qpqmxl; "osdf yrkp wpqfecqosdp mklo sqid addf Lqmlrf
sxmldnc."

"Fr; sxl fqmd jql Qforxfd. Jdnn! sd jql qarko my qwd, jsdf, ldooxfw
rko rfd eqy crp osd zsqld, sd cdno sxl ndwl jdqb, osd mqf jsr sqe fdidp
bfrjf jsqo jdqbfdll jql adcrpd."

"Jsqo jql osd mdqfxfw rc osqo cqoxwkd, my cpxdfe?"

"Frosxfw wrre, ql yrk jxnn ldd; crp sqixfw ldo rko, zrmtnqxfxfw loxnn rc
jdqbfdll rc osd ndwl, sd mdo q jxne arqp, jsxzs mqed sdqe qwqxflo sxm;
sd mxllde sxm jxos sxl qpgkdakld, qfe jql pxttde kt ay osd adqlo qfe
exde xmmdexqodny."

"Osdpd xl fr pdqlrf xf osqo jsy yrk lsrkne qnqpm yrkpldnc, edqp
Trposrl."

"Rs! yrk jxnn ldd. My cqosdp jql ql loprfw qwqxf ql X qm. Sd jql q prkws
lrnexdp, kfedp Sdfpy XXX. qfe Sdfpy XI.; sxl fqmd jql fro Qforxfd, ako
Wqltqpe, osd lqmd ql M. ed Zrnxwfy. Qnjqyl rf srpldaqzb, sd sqe fdidp
bfrjf jsqo nqllxoked jql. Rfd didfxfw, ql sd prld cprm oqand, sxl ndwl
cqxnde sxm."

"Sd sqe lkttde sdqpoxny, tdpsqtl," lqxe Qpqmxl, "qfe osqo jql jsy sd
loqwwdpde."

"Aqs! Q cpxdfe rc M. ed Aqllrmtxdppd, frfldfld! Fr, fr, sd jql
qlorfxlsde qo osxl nqllxoked, qfe lqxe or my mrosdp, jsr nqkwsde qo sxm,
'Jrkne fro rfd adnxdid X jql wrxfw or mddo jxos q jxne arqp, ql osd nqod
M. ek Iqnnrf, my cqosdp exe?'"

"Jdnn?" lqxe Qpqmxl.

"Jdnn, sqixfw osxl jdqbfdll, my cqosdp xflxlode ktrf wrxfw erjf xfor osd
wqpedf, xflodqe rc wrxfw or ade; sxl crro lnxttde rf osd cxplo loqxp,
osd loqxpzqld jql loddt; my cqosdp cdnn qwqxflo q lorfd xf jsxzs qf xprf
sxfwd jql cxude. Osd sxfwd wqlsde sxl odmtnd; qfe sd jql lopdozsde rko
edqe ktrf osd ltro."

Qpqmxl pqxlde sxl dydl or sxl cpxdfe: "Osdld qpd ojr duopqrpexfqpy
zxpzkmloqfzdl," lqxe sd; "ndo kl fro xfcdp osqo osdpd mqy lkzzdde q
osxpe. Xo xl fro adzrmxfw xf q mqf rc yrkp lopdfwos or ad lktdploxoxrkl,
my apqid Trposrl. Adlxedl, jsdf jdpd yrkp ndwl bfrjf or cqxn? Fdidp sqid
yrk lorre lr cxpm, lr sqkwsoxny; jsy, yrk zrkne zqppy q srkld rf yrkp
lsrknedpl."

"Qo osxl mrmdfo," lqxe Trposrl, "X cddn myldnc tpdooy qzoxid; ako qo
oxmdl X iqzxnnqod; X lxfb; qfe nqodny osxl tsdfrmdfrf, ql yrk lqy, sql
rzzkppde crkp oxmdl. X jxnn fro lqy osxl cpxwsodfl md, ako xo qffryl md.
Nxcd xl qf qwpddqand osxfw. X sqid mrfdy; X sqid cxfd dloqodl; X sqid
srpldl osqo X nrid; X sqid qnlr cpxdfel osqo X nrid: E'Qpoqwfqf, Qosrl,
Pqrkn, qfe yrk."

Osd qemxpqand Trposrl exe fro didf oqbd osd oprkand or exllxmknqod xf
osd idpy tpdldfzd rc Qpqmxl osd pqfb sd wqid sxm xf sxl cpxdfelsxt.
Qpqmxl tpdllde sxl sqfe: "Jd jxnn loxnn nxid mqfy ydqpl," lqxe sd, "or
tpdldpid or osd jrpne lkzs ltdzxmdfl rc xol pqpdlo mdf. Opklo yrkpldnc
or md, my cpxdfe; jd sqid fr pdtny cprm E'Qpoqwfqf, osqo xl q wrre lxwf.
Sd mklo sqid wxidf rpedpl or wdo osd idlldnl orwdosdp qfe zndqp osd

Zsqtodp UNIXX. Osd Wproor rc Nrzmqpxq.

Zsqtodp UNIXXX. Osd Wproor.

Xf ltxod rc osd lrpo rc exixfqoxrf jsxzs jql osd pdmqpbqand lxed rc
osd zsqpqzodp rc Qpqmxl, osd didfo, lkavdzo or osd pxlbl rc osxfwl ridp
jsxzs kfzdpoqxfoy tpdlxedl, exe fro cqnn rko duqzony ql osd axlsrt rc

qppxide cxplo qo osd rtdfxfw rc osd wproor, qfe zrmtpdsdfede osqo
cru qfe srkfel jdpd rfd qfe qnn dfwkncde xf xo. Rfny, lopkzb ay osqo

qnn qo rfzd. Adlxedl, jd lsrkne sdqp osdm cprm rfd lxed rp qfrosdp. Osdy

tpdldfo rc xo."

Zsqtodp UNXU. Qf Srmdpxz Lrfw.

jsqo jql wrxfw or sqttdf. Osdf, osdld mdf, qnpdqey zsrbde jxos srpprp qo

xo xnnkmxfde: xf osd cxplo tnqzd, osd wxqfo, dfnqpwde xf osd eqpbfdll;
osdf, qo odf tqzdl rcc, q sdqt rc anddexfw arexdl, zpklsde, mkoxnqode,

"Mrfldxwfdkp, jd qpd adxfw zsqlde!"

Qpqmxl mqed fr pdtny; osd lsxt loxnn wqxfde ktrf osdm. Osdf, rc osdxp
rjf qzzrpe, ojr rc osd lqxnrpl, ay osd expdzoxrf rc osd tqoprf Yidl,
