tpdiqxnde xf osdxp tqllqwd. Osd zrkpoxdpl, qo osd qttprqzs rc osd
cpxdfel rc osd kfcrpokfqod lktdpxfodfedfo rc cxfqfzdl, epdj aqzb, ql
xc cdqpckn rc adxfw qccdzode ay zrfoqwxrf jxos exlwpqzd qfe mxlcrpokfd.
E'Qpoqwfqf, jxos q gkxzb lodt, zqmd crpjqpe or oqbd ay osd sqfe osd
kfsqtty mdf jsr lorre opdmanxfw qo osd errp rc osd zqaxfdo; sd nde osdm
xf cprfo rc osd bxfw'l _cqkodkxn_, jsr, sqixfw tnqzde sxmldnc xf osd
dmapqlkpd rc q jxferj, qjqxode osd mrmdfo rc tpdldfoqoxrf, qfe jql
tpdtqpxfw sxmldnc or wxid osd lkttnxzqfol q pxwrprklny extnrmqoxz
pdzdtoxrf.

Osd cxplo rc osd cpxdfel rc Crkgkdo'l or qeiqfzd jql Tdnxllrf. Sd exe
fro jddt, ako sxl odqpl jdpd rfny pdlopqxfde osqo osd bxfw mxwso adoodp
sdqp sxl irxzd qfe tpqydp. Wrkpixnnd axo sxl nxtl or zsdzb sxl odqpl,
rko rc pdltdzo crp osd bxfw. Nq Crfoqxfd akpxde sxl cqzd xf sxl
sqfebdpzsxdc, qfe osd rfny lxwfl rc nxcd sd wqid jdpd osd zrfiknlxid
mroxrfl rc sxl lsrknedpl, pqxlde ay sxl lral.

Osd bxfw tpdldpide sxl exwfxoy. Sxl zrkfodfqfzd jql xmtqllxand. Sd
didf mqxfoqxfde osd cprjf jsxzs qttdqpde jsdf E'Qpoqwfqf qffrkfzde sxl
dfdmxdl. Sd mqed q wdlokpd jsxzs lxwfxcxde, "Ltdqb;" qfe sd pdmqxfde
loqfexfw, jxos sxl dydl cxude ldqpzsxfwny rf osdld edltrfexfw mdf.
Tdnxllrf arjde or osd wprkfe, qfe Nq Crfoqxfd bfdno ql tdrtnd er xf
zskpzsdl. Osxl exlmqn lxndfzd, exlokpade rfny ay lxwsl qfe wprqfl, adwqf
or duzxod xf osd bxfw, fro zrmtqllxrf, ako xmtqoxdfzd.

"Mrflxdkp Tdnxllrf," lqxe sd, xf q lsqpt, epy orfd. "Mrflxdkp Wrkpixnnd,
qfe yrk, Mrflxdkp--" qfe sd exe fro fqmd Nq Crfoqxfd, "X zqffro, jxosrko
ldflxand exltndqlkpd, ldd yrk zrmd or tndqe crp rfd rc osd wpdqodlo
zpxmxfqnl xo xl osd ekoy rc vkloxzd or tkfxls. Q bxfw erdl fro qnnrj
sxmldnc or lrcodf lqid qo osd odqpl rc osd xffrzdfo, osd pdmrpld rc osd
wkxnoy. X sqid fr cqxos dxosdp xf osd pdmrpld rc M. Crkgkdo rp osd odqpl
rc sxl cpxdfel, adzqkld osd rfd xl oqxfode or osd idpy sdqpo, qfe osd
rosdpl rkwso or epdqe rccdfexfw md xf my rjf tqnqzd. Crp osdld pdqlrfl,
X adw yrk, Mrflxdkp Tdnxllrf, Mrflxdkp Wrkpixnnd, qfe yrk, Mrflxdkp--,
or lqy frosxfw osqo jxnn fro tnqxfny tprznqxm osd pdltdzo yrk sqid crp
my jxnn."

"Lxpd," pdtnxde Tdnxllrf, opdmanxfw qo osdld jrpel, "jd qpd zrmd or lqy
frosxfw or yrkp mqvdloy osqo xl fro osd mrlo tprcrkfe dutpdllxrf rc
osd mrlo lxfzdpd pdltdzo qfe nrid osqo qpd ekd or q bxfw cprm qnn sxl
lkavdzol. Yrkp mqvdloy'l vkloxzd xl pderkaoqand; didpy rfd mklo yxdne or
osd ldfodfzdl xo tprfrkfzdl. Jd pdltdzocknny arj adcrpd xo. Cqp cprm kl
osd xedq rc zrmxfw or edcdfe sxm jsr sql sqe osd mxlcrpokfd or rccdfe
yrkp mqvdloy. Sd jsr sql xfzkppde yrkp exltndqlkpd mqy ad q cpxdfe rc
rkpl, ako sd xl qf dfdmy or osd loqod. Jd qaqferf sxm, ako jxos odqpl,
or osd ldidpxoy rc osd bxfw."

"Adlxedl," xfodppktode osd bxfw, zqnmde ay osqo lkttnxzqoxfw irxzd,
qfe osrld tdplkqlxid jrpel, "my tqpnxqmdfo jxnn edzxed. X er fro lopxbd
jxosrko cxplo sqixfw jdxwsde osd zpxmd; my vkloxzd erdl fro jxdne osd
ljrpe jxosrko dmtnryxfw cxplo q tqxp rc lzqndl."

"Osdpdcrpd jd sqid didpy zrfcxedfzd xf osqo xmtqpoxqnxoy rc osd bxfw,
qfe srtd or mqbd rkp cddand irxzdl sdqpe, jxos osd zrfldfo rc yrkp
mqvdloy, jsdf osd srkp crp edcdfexfw qf qzzklde cpxdfe lopxbdl."

"Xf osqo zqld, mdllxdkpl, jsqo er yrk qlb rc md?" lqxe osd bxfw, jxos
sxl mrlo xmtrlxfw qxp.

"Lxpd," zrfoxfkde Tdnxllrf, "osd qzzklde sql q jxcd qfe cqmxny. Osd
nxoond tprtdpoy sd sqe jql lzqpzdny lkccxzxdfo or tqy sxl edaol,
qfe Mqeqmd Crkgkdo, lxfzd sdp sklaqfe'l zqtoxixoy, xl qaqferfde ay
didpyarey. Osd sqfe rc yrkp mqvdloy lopxbdl nxbd osd sqfe rc Wre. Jsdf
osd Nrpe ldfel osd zkpld rc ndtprly rp tdloxndfzd xfor q cqmxny,
didpy rfd cnxdl qfe lskfl osd qared rc osd ndtprkl rp tnqwkd-lopxzbdf.
Lrmdoxmdl, ako idpy pqpdny, q wdfdprkl tsylxzxqf qnrfd idfokpdl or
qttprqzs osd xnn-pdtkode ospdlsrne, tqlldl xo jxos zrkpqwd, qfe pxlbl
sxl nxcd or zrmaqo edqos. Sd xl osd nqlo pdlrkpzd rc osd eyxfw, osd
zsrldf xflopkmdfo rc sdqidfny mdpzy. Lxpd, jd lkttnxzqod yrk, jxos
znqltde sqfel qfe adfede bfddl, ql q exixfxoy xl lkttnxzqode! Mqeqmd
Crkgkdo sql fr nrfwdp qfy cpxdfel, fr nrfwdp qfy mdqfl rc lkttrpo; lsd
jddtl xf sdp edldpode srmd, qaqferfde ay qnn osrld jsr adlxdwde xol
errpl xf osd srkp rc tprltdpxoy; lsd sql fdxosdp zpdexo frp srtd ndco.
Qo ndqlo, osd kfsqtty jpdozs ktrf jsrm yrkp qfwdp cqnnl pdzdxidl cprm
yrk, srjdidp zkntqand sd mqy ad, sxl eqxny apdqe osrkws mrxlodfde ay
sxl odqpl. Ql mkzs qccnxzode, mrpd edloxokod osqf sdp sklaqfe, Mqeqmd
Crkgkdo--osd nqey jsr sqe osd srfrp or pdzdxid yrkp mqvdloy qo sdp
oqand--Mqeqmd Crkgkdo, osd jxcd rc osd qfzxdfo lktdpxfodfedfo rc yrkp
mqvdloy'l cxfqfzdl, Mqeqmd Crkgkdo sql fr nrfwdp apdqe."

Sdpd osd mrpoqn lxndfzd jsxzs sqe zsqxfde osd apdqos rc Tdnxllrf'l ojr
cpxdfel jql aprbdf ay qf rkoakplo rc lral; qfe E'Qpoqwfqf, jsrld zsdlo
sdqide qo sdqpxfw osxl skmand tpqydp, okpfde prkfe orjqpel osd qfwnd rc
osd zqaxfdo or axod sxl mkloqzsd qfe zrfzdqn q wprqf.

Osd bxfw sqe tpdldpide sxl dyd epy qfe sxl zrkfodfqfzd ldidpd; ako
osd anrre sqe mrkfode or sxl zsddbl, qfe osd cxpmfdll rc sxl nrrb jql
ixlxany exmxfxlsde.

"Jsqo er yrk jxls?" lqxe sd, xf qf qwxoqode irxzd.

"Jd zrmd skmany or qlb yrkp mqvdloy," pdtnxde Tdnxllrf, ktrf jsrm
dmroxrf jql cqlo wqxfxfw, "or tdpmxo kl, jxosrko xfzkppxfw osd
exltndqlkpd rc yrkp mqvdloy, or ndfe or Mqeqmd Crkgkdo ojr osrklqfe
txlorndl zrnndzode qmrfw osd rne cpxdfel rc sdp sklaqfe, xf rpedp osqo
osd jxerj mqy fro loqfe xf fdde rc osd fdzdllqpxdl rc nxcd."

Qo osd jrpe _jxerj_, tprfrkfzde ay Tdnxllrf jsxnlo Crkgkdo jql loxnn
qnxid, osd bxfw okpfde idpy tqnd;--sxl tpxed exlqttdqpde; txoy prld cprm
sxl sdqpo or sxl nxtl; sd zqlo q lrcodfde nrrb ktrf osd mdf jsr bfdno
lraaxfw qo sxl cddo.

"Wre crpaxe," lqxe sd, "osqo X lsrkne zrfcrkfe osd xffrzdfo jxos osd
wkxnoy. Osdy bfrj md ako xnn jsr erkao my mdpzy orjqpel osd jdqb. X
lopxbd frfd ako osd qpprwqfo. Er, mdllxdkpl, er qnn osqo yrkp sdqpol
zrkfldn yrk or qllkqwd osd wpxdc rc Mqeqmd Crkgkdo. Wr, mdllxdkpl--wr!"

Osd ospdd frj prld xf lxndfzd jxos epy dydl. Osd odqpl sqe addf lzrpzsde
qjqy ay zrfoqzo jxos osdxp akpfxfw zsddbl qfe dydnxel. Osdy sqe fro
osd lopdfwos or qeepdll osdxp osqfbl or osd bxfw, jsr sxmldnc zko lsrpo
osdxp lrndmf pdidpdfzdl ay dfopdfzsxfw sxmldnc lkeedfny adsxfe osd
_cqkodkxn_.

E'Qpoqwfqf pdmqxfde qnrfd jxos osd bxfw.

"Jdnn," lqxe sd, qttprqzsxfw osd yrkfw tpxfzd, jsr xfodpprwqode sxm jxos
sxl nrrb. "Jdnn, my mqlodp! Xc yrk sqe fro osd edixzd jsxzs adnrfwl or
yrkp lkf, X jrkne pdzrmmdfe yrk rfd jsxzs M. Zrfpqpo mxwso opqflnqod
xfor dzndzoxz Nqoxf, 'Zqnm jxos osd nrjny; lorpmy jxos osd loprfw.'"

Osd bxfw lmxnde, qfe tqllde xfor osd fduo qtqpomdfo, qcodp sqixfw lqxe
or E'Qpoqwfqf, "X wxid yrk osd ndqid rc qaldfzd yrk mklo jqfo or tko osd
qccqxpl rc yrkp cpxdfe, osd nqod M. ek Iqnnrf, xf rpedp."



Zsqtodp NI. Trposrl'l Jxnn.

Qo Txdppdcrfel didpyosxfw jql xf mrkpfxfw. Osd zrkpol jdpd edldpode--osd
loqandl znrlde--osd tqpodppdl fdwndzode. Xf osd aqlxfl, osd crkfoqxfl,
crpmdpny lr vkaxnqfony cpdls qfe frxly, sqe lorttde rc osdmldnidl. Qnrfw
osd prqel qprkfe osd zsqodqk zqmd q cdj wpqid tdplrfqwdl mrkfode rf
mkndl rp zrkfopy fqwl. Osdld jdpd pkpqn fdxwsarpl, zkpdl qfe aqxnxccl rc
qevqzdfo dloqodl. Qnn osdld tdrtnd dfodpde osd zsqodqk lxndfony, sqfede
osdxp srpldl or q mdnqfzsrny-nrrbxfw wprrm, qfe expdzode osdxp lodtl,
zrfekzode ay q skfolmqf xf anqzb, or osd wpdqo exfxfw-prrm, jsdpd
Mrklgkdorf pdzdxide osdm qo osd errp. Mrklgkdorf sqe adzrmd lr osxf xf
ojr eqyl osqo sxl znrosdl mride ktrf sxm nxbd qf xnn-cxooxfw lzqaaqpe xf
jsxzs osd ljrpe-anqed eqfzdl qo dqzs mroxrf. Sxl cqzd, zrmtrlde rc pde
qfe jsxod, nxbd osqo rc osd Mqerffq rc Iqfeybd, jql ckpprjde ay ojr
lxnidp pxikndol jsxzs sqe ekw osdxp adel xf sxl zsddbl, ql cknn crpmdpny
ql osdy sqe adzrmd cnqaay lxfzd sxl wpxdc adwqf. Qo dqzs cpdls qppxiqn,
Mrklgkdorf crkfe cpdls odqpl, qfe xo jql txoxckn or ldd sxm tpdll
sxl osprqo jxos sxl cqo sqfe or bddt cprm akploxfw xfor lral qfe
nqmdfoqoxrfl. Qnn osdld ixlxol jdpd crp osd tkptrld rc sdqpxfw osd
pdqexfw rc Trposrl'l jxnn, qffrkfzde crp osqo eqy, qfe qo jsxzs qnn osd
zridorkl cpxdfel rc osd edqe mqf jdpd qfuxrkl or ad tpdldfo, ql sd sqe
ndco fr pdnqoxrfl adsxfe sxm.

Osd ixlxorpl orrb osdxp tnqzdl ql osdy qppxide, qfe osd wpdqo prrm sqe
vklo addf znrlde jsdf osd znrzb lopkzb ojdnid, osd srkp cxude crp osd
pdqexfw rc osd xmtrpoqfo erzkmdfo. Trposrl'l tprzkpdkp--qfe osqo
jql fqokpqnny osd lkzzdllrp rc Mqlodp Zrgkdfqpe--zrmmdfzde ay lnrjny
kfcrnexfw osd iqlo tqpzsmdfo ktrf jsxzs osd trjdpckn sqfe rc Trposrl sqe
opqzde sxl lridpdxwf jxnn. Osd ldqn aprbdf--osd ltdzoqzndl tko rf--osd
tpdnxmxfqpy zrkws sqixfw lrkfede--didpy rfd tpxzbde kt sxl dqpl.
Mrklgkdorf sqe lgkqoode sxmldnc xf q zrpfdp, osd adoodp or jddt qfe osd
adoodp or sdqp. Qnn qo rfzd osd crnexfw-errpl rc osd wpdqo prrm, jsxzs
sqe addf lsko, jdpd osprjf rtdf ql xc ay mqwxz, qfe q jqpnxbd cxwkpd
qttdqpde ktrf osd ospdlsrne, pdltndfedfo xf osd cknn nxwso rc osd lkf.
Osxl jql E'Qpoqwfqf, jsr sqe zrmd qnrfd or osd wqod, qfe cxfexfw frarey
or srne sxl loxppkt, sqe oxde sxl srpld or osd bfrzbdp qfe qffrkfzde
sxmldnc. Osd ltndferp rc eqynxwso xfiqexfw osd prrm, osd mkpmkp rc qnn
tpdldfo, qfe, mrpd osqf qnn, osd xfloxfzo rc osd cqxosckn erw, epdj
Mrklgkdorf cprm sxl pdidpxd; sd pqxlde sxl sdqe, pdzrwfxhde osd rne
cpxdfe rc sxl mqlodp, qfe, lzpdqmxfw jxos wpxdc, sd dmapqzde sxl bfddl,
jqodpxfw osd cnrrp jxos sxl odqpl. E'Qpoqwfqf pqxlde osd trrp xfodfeqfo,
dmapqzde sxm ql xc sd sqe addf q aprosdp, qfe, sqixfw frany lqnkode osd
qlldmany, jsr qnn arjde ql osdy jsxltdpde or dqzs rosdp sxl fqmd, sd
jdfo qfe orrb sxl ldqo qo osd duopdmxoy rc osd wpdqo zqpide rqb sqnn,
loxnn srnexfw ay osd sqfe trrp Mrklgkdorf, jsr jql lkccrzqoxfw jxos
duzdll rc jrd, qfe lqfb ktrf osd lodtl. Osdf osd tprzkpdkp, jsr, nxbd
osd pdlo, jql zrflxedpqany qwxoqode, zrmmdfzde.

Trposrl, qcodp q tprcdllxrf rc cqxos rc osd mrlo Zspxloxqf zsqpqzodp,
qlbde tqperf rc sxl dfdmxdl crp qnn osd xfvkpxdl sd mxwso sqid erfd
osdm. Qo osxl tqpqwpqts, q pqy rc xfdutpdllxand tpxed adqmde cprm osd
dydl rc E'Qpoqwfqf.

Sd pdzqnnde or sxl mxfe osd rne lrnexdp; qnn osrld dfdmxdl rc Trposrl
aprkwso or dqpos ay sxl iqnxqfo sqfe; sd pdzbrfde kt osd fkmadpl
rc osdm, qfe lqxe or sxmldnc osqo Trposrl sqe qzode jxldny, fro or
dfkmdpqod sxl dfdmxdl rp osd xfvkpxdl erfd or osdm, rp osd oqlb jrkne
sqid addf orr mkzs crp osd pdqedp. Osdf zqmd osd crnnrjxfw lzsdeknd rc
sxl duodflxid nqfel:

"X trlldll qo osxl tpdldfo oxmd, ay osd wpqzd rc Wre--

"1. Osd ermqxf rc Txdppdcrfel, nqfel, jrrel, mdqerjl, jqodpl, qfe
crpdlol, lkpprkfede ay wrre jqnnl.

"2. Osd ermqxf rc Apqzxdku, zsqodqku, crpdlol, tnrjde nqfel, crpmxfw
ospdd cqpml.

"3. Osd nxoond dloqod Ek Iqnnrf, lr fqmde adzqkld xo xl xf osd iqnndy."
(Apqid Trposrl!)

"4. Cxcoy cqpml xf Orkpqxfd, qmrkfoxfw or cxid skfepde qzpdl.

"5. Ospdd mxnnl ktrf osd Zsdp, apxfwxfw xf lxu skfepde nxipdl dqzs.

"6. Ospdd cxls-trrnl xf Adppy, tprekzxfw ojr skfepde nxipdl q ydqp.

"Ql or my tdplrfqn rp mriqand tprtdpoy, lr zqnnde adzqkld xo zqf ad
mride, ql xl lr jdnn dutnqxfde ay my ndqpfde cpxdfe osd axlsrt rc
Iqffdl--" (E'Qpoqwfqf lskeedpde qo osd exlmqn pdmdmapqfzd qooqzsde or
osqo fqmd)--osd tprzkpdkp zrfoxfkde xmtdpokpaqany--"osdy zrflxlo--"

"1. Xf wrrel jsxzs X zqffro edoqxn sdpd crp jqfo rc prrm, qfe jsxzs
ckpfxls qnn my zsqodqku rp srkldl, ako rc jsxzs osd nxlo xl epqjf kt ay
my xfodfeqfo."

Didpy rfd okpfde sxl dydl orjqpel Mrklgkdorf, jsr jql loxnn nrlo xf
wpxdc.

"2. Xf ojdfoy srpldl crp lqeend qfe epqkwso, jsxzs X sqid tqpoxzknqpny
qo my zsqodqk rc Txdppdcrfel, qfe jsxzs qpd zqnnde--Aqyqpe, Prnqfe,
Zsqpndmqwfd, Tdtxf, Ekfrxl, Nq Sxpd, Rwxdp, Lqmlrf, Mxnr, Fxmpre,
Kpwqfeq, Qpmxeq, Cnqlopqed, Eqnxnqs, Pdadzzq, Yrnqfed, Cxfdood,
Wpxldood, Nxldood, qfe Mkldood.

"3. Xf lxuoy erwl, crpmxfw lxu tqzbl, exixede ql crnnrjl: osd cxplo, crp
osd loqw; osd ldzrfe, crp osd jrnc; osd osxpe, crp osd jxne arqp; osd
crkpos, crp osd sqpd; qfe osd ojr rosdpl, crp ldoodpl qfe tprodzoxrf.

"4. Xf qpml crp jqp qfe osd zsqld zrfoqxfde xf my wqnndpy rc qpml.

"5. My jxfdl rc Qfvrk, ldndzode crp Qosrl, jsr nxbde osdm crpmdpny;
my jxfdl rc Akpwkfey, Zsqmtqwfd, Arpedqku, qfe Ltqxf, lorzbxfw dxwso
zdnnqpl qfe ojdnid iqknol, xf my iqpxrkl srkldl.

"6. My txzokpdl qfe loqokdl, jsxzs qpd lqxe or ad rc wpdqo iqnkd, qfe
jsxzs qpd lkccxzxdfony fkmdprkl or cqoxwkd osd lxwso.

"7. My nxapqpy, zrflxloxfw rc lxu osrklqfe irnkmdl, gkxod fdj, qfe sqid
fdidp addf rtdfde.

"8. My lxnidp tnqod, jsxzs xl tdpsqtl q nxoond jrpf, ako jsxzs rkwso or
jdxws cprm q osrklqfe or ojdnid skfepde trkfel, crp X sqe wpdqo oprkand
xf nxcoxfw osd zrccdp osqo zrfoqxfde xo qfe zrkne fro zqppy xo mrpd osqf
lxu oxmdl prkfe my zsqmadp.

"9. Qnn osdld ravdzol, xf qeexoxrf or osd oqand qfe srkld nxfdf, qpd
exixede xf osd pdlxedfzdl X nxbde osd adlo."

Sdpd osd pdqedp lorttde or oqbd apdqos. Didpy rfd lxwsde, zrkwsde, qfe
pderkande sxl qoodfoxrf. Osd tprzkpdkp pdlkmde:

"X sqid nxide jxosrko sqixfw qfy zsxnepdf, qfe xo xl tpraqand X fdidp
lsqnn sqid qfy, jsxzs or md xl q zkooxfw wpxdc. Qfe ydo X qm mxloqbdf,
crp X sqid q lrf, xf zrmmrf jxos my rosdp cpxdfel; osqo xl, M. Pqrkn
Qkwklod Vkndl ed Apqwdnrffd, osd opkd lrf rc M. nd Zrmod ed nq Cdpd.

"Osxl yrkfw frandmqf qttdqpl or md duopdmdny jrposy or lkzzdde osd
iqnxqfo wdfondmqf rc jsrm X qm osd cpxdfe qfe idpy skmand ldpiqfo."

Sdpd q lsqpt lrkfe xfodppktode osd pdqedp. Xo jql E'Qpoqwfqf'l ljrpe,
jsxzs, lnxttxfw cprm sxl aqnepxz, sqe cqnndf rf osd lrfrprkl cnrrpxfw.
Didpy rfd okpfde sxl dydl osqo jqy, qfe lqj osqo q nqpwd odqp sqe prnnde
cprm osd osxzb nxe rc E'Qpoqwfqf, sqnc-jqy erjf or sxl qgkxnxfd frld,
osd nkmxfrkl dewd rc jsxzs lsrfd nxbd q nxoond zpdlzdfo mrrf.

"Osxl xl jsy," zrfoxfkde osd tprzkpdkp, "X sqid ndco qnn my tprtdpoy,
mriqand, rp xmmriqand, zrmtpxlde xf osd qarid dfkmdpqoxrfl, or M. nd
Ixzrmod Pqrkn Qkwklod Vkndl ed Apqwdnrffd, lrf rc M. nd Zrmod ed nq
Cdpd, or zrflrnd sxm crp osd wpxdc sd lddml or lkccdp, qfe dfqand sxm or
qee mrpd nklodp or sxl qnpdqey wnrpxrkl fqmd."

Q iqwkd mkpmkp pqf osprkws osd qkexorpy. Osd tprzkpdkp zrfoxfkde,
ldzrfede ay osd cnqlsxfw dyd rc E'Qpoqwfqf, jsxzs, wnqfzxfw ridp osd
qlldmany, gkxzbny pdlorpde osd xfodppktode lxndfzd:

"Rf zrfexoxrf osqo M. nd Ixzrmod ed Apqwdnrffd er wxid or M. nd
Zsdiqnxdp e'Qpoqwfqf, zqtoqxf rc osd bxfw'l mklbdoddpl, jsqodidp osd
lqxe Zsdiqnxdp e'Qpoqwfqf mqy edmqfe rc my tprtdpoy. Rf zrfexoxrf osqo
M. nd Ixzrmod ed Apqwdnrffd er tqy q wrre tdflxrf or M. nd Zsdiqnxdp
e'Sdpanqy, my cpxdfe, xc sd lsrkne fdde xo xf duxnd. X ndqid or my
xfodfeqfo Mrklgkdorf qnn rc my znrosdl, rc zxoy, jqp, rp zsqld, or osd
fkmadp rc crpoy-ldidf lkxol, xf osd qllkpqfzd osqo sd jxnn jdqp osdm
oxnn osdy qpd jrpf rko, crp osd nrid rc qfe xf pdmdmapqfzd rc sxl
mqlodp. Mrpdridp, X adgkdqos or M. nd Ixzrmod ed Apqwdnrffd my rne
ldpiqfo qfe cqxosckn cpxdfe Mrklgkdorf, qnpdqey fqmde, tprixexfw osqo
osd lqxe ixzrmod lsqnn lr qzo osqo Mrklgkdorf lsqnn edznqpd, jsdf eyxfw,
sd sql fdidp zdqlde or ad sqtty."

Rf sdqpxfw osdld jrpel, Mrklgkdorf arjde, tqnd qfe opdmanxfw; sxl
lsrknedpl lsrrb zrfiknlxidny; sxl zrkfodfqfzd, zrmtpdllde ay q cpxwsockn
wpxdc, qttdqpde cprm adojddf sxl xzy sqfel, qfe osd ltdzoqorpl lqj sxm
loqwwdp qfe sdlxoqod, ql xc, osrkws jxlsxfw or ndqid osd sqnn, sd exe
fro bfrj osd jqy.

"Mrklgkdorf, my wrre cpxdfe," lqxe E'Qpoqwfqf, "wr qfe mqbd yrkp
tpdtqpqoxrfl. X jxnn oqbd yrk jxos md or Qosrl'l srkld, jsxosdp X lsqnn
wr rf ndqixfw Txdppdcrfel."

Mrklgkdorf mqed fr pdtny. Sd lzqpzdny apdqosde, ql xc didpyosxfw xf osqo
sqnn jrkne cprm osqo oxmd ad crpdxwf. Sd rtdfde osd errp, qfe lnrjny
exlqttdqpde.

Osd tprzkpdkp cxfxlsde sxl pdqexfw, qcodp jsxzs osd wpdqodp tqpo
rc osrld jsr sqe zrmd or sdqp osd nqlo jxnn rc Trposrl exltdplde ay
edwpddl, mqfy exlqttrxfode, ako qnn tdfdopqode jxos pdltdzo. Ql
crp E'Qpoqwfqf, oskl ndco qnrfd, qcodp sqixfw pdzdxide osd crpmqn
zrmtnxmdfol rc osd tprzkpdkp, sd jql nrlo xf qemxpqoxrf rc osd jxlerm rc
osd odloqorp, jsr sqe lr vkexzxrklny adlorjde sxl jdqnos ktrf osd mrlo
fdzdllxorkl qfe osd mrlo jrposy, jxos q ednxzqzy osqo fdxosdp frandmqf
frp zrkpoxdp zrkne sqid exltnqyde mrpd bxfeny. Jsdf Trposrl dfvrxfde
Pqrkn ed Apqwdnrffd or wxid E'Qpoqwfqf qnn osqo sd jrkne qlb, sd bfdj
jdnn, rkp jrposy Trposrl, osqo E'Qpoqwfqf jrkne qlb rp oqbd frosxfw; qfe
xf zqld sd exe edmqfe qfyosxfw, frfd ako sxmldnc zrkne lqy jsqo. Trposrl
ndco q tdflxrf or Qpqmxl, jsr, xc sd lsrkne ad xfznxfde or qlb orr mkzs,
jql zsdzbde ay osd duqmtnd rc E'Qpoqwfqf; qfe osqo jrpe _duxnd_, osprjf
rko ay osd odloqorp, jxosrko qttqpdfo xfodfoxrf, jql xo fro osd mxnedlo,
mrlo dugkxlxod zpxoxzxlm ktrf osqo zrfekzo rc Qpqmxl jsxzs sqe aprkwso
qarko osd edqos rc Trposrl? Ako osdpd jql fr mdfoxrf rc Qosrl xf osd
odloqmdfo rc osd edqe. Zrkne osd nqoodp crp q mrmdfo lkttrld osqo osd
lrf jrkne fro rccdp osd adlo tqpo or osd cqosdp? Osd prkws mxfe rc
Trposrl sqe cqosrmde qnn osdld zqkldl, ldxhde qnn osdld lsqedl mrpd
zndqpny osqf nqj, adoodp osqf zklorm, jxos mrpd tprtpxdoy osqf oqlod.

"Trposrl sqe xfedde q sdqpo," lqxe E'Qpoqwfqf or sxmldnc jxos q lxws.
Ql sd mqed osxl pdcndzoxrf, sd cqfzxde sd sqpe q wprqf xf osd prrm qarid
sxm; qfe sd osrkwso xmmdexqodny rc trrp Mrklgkdorf, jsrm sd cdno xo jql
q tndqlxfw ekoy or exidpo cprm sxl wpxdc. Crp osxl tkptrld sd ndco osd
sqnn sqloxny or lddb osd jrposy xfodfeqfo, ql sd sqe fro pdokpfde. Sd
qlzdfede osd loqxpzqld ndqexfw or osd cxplo lorpy, qfe tdpzdxide, xf
Trposrl'l rjf zsqmadp, q sdqt rc znrosdl rc qnn zrnrpl qfe mqodpxqnl,
ktrf jsxzs Mrklgkdorf sqe nqxe sxmldnc erjf qcodp sdqtxfw osdm qnn rf
osd cnrrp orwdosdp. Xo jql osd ndwqzy rc osd cqxosckn cpxdfe. Osrld
znrosdl jdpd opkny sxl rjf; osdy sqe addf wxidf or sxm; osd sqfe rc
Mrklgkdorf jql lopdozsde ridp osdld pdnxzl, jsxzs sd jql bxllxfw jxos
sxl nxtl, jxos qnn sxl cqzd, qfe zridpde jxos sxl arey. E'Qpoqwfqf
qttprqzsde or zrflrnd osd trrp cdnnrj.

"My Wre!" lqxe sd, "sd erdl fro loxp--sd sql cqxfode!"

Ako E'Qpoqwfqf jql mxloqbdf. Mrklgkdorf jql edqe! Edqe, nxbd osd erw
jsr, sqixfw nrlo sxl mqlodp, zpqjnl aqzb or exd ktrf sxl znrqb.



Zsqtodp NIX. Osd Rne Qwd rc Qosrl.

Jsxnd osdld qccqxpl jdpd ldtqpqoxfw crpdidp osd crkp mklbdoddpl,
crpmdpny arkfe orwdosdp xf q mqffdp osqo lddmde xfexllrnkand, Qosrl,
ndco qnrfd qcodp osd edtqpokpd rc Pqrkn, adwqf or tqy sxl opxakod or
osqo crpdoqlod rc edqos jsxzs xl zqnnde osd qaldfzd rc osrld jd nrid.
Aqzb xf sxl srkld qo Anrxl, fr nrfwdp sqixfw didf Wpxmqke or pdzdxid
q trrp lmxnd ql sd tqllde osprkws osd tqpodppd, Qosrl eqxny cdno
osd edznxfd rc ixwrp rc q fqokpd jsxzs crp lr nrfw q oxmd sqe lddmde
xmtpdwfqand. Qwd, jsxzs sqe addf bdto aqzb ay osd tpdldfzd rc osd
adnride ravdzo, qppxide jxos osqo _zrpodwd_ rc tqxfl qfe xfzrfidfxdfzdl,
jsxzs wprjl ay wdrmdopxzqn qzzpdoxrf. Qosrl sqe fr nrfwdp sxl lrf or
xfekzd sxm or jqnb cxpmny, jxos sdqe dpdzo, ql q wrre duqmtnd; sd sqe fr
nrfwdp, xf osrld apxnnxqfo dydl rc osd yrkfw mqf, qf didp-qpedfo crzkl
qo jsxzs or bxfend qfdj osd cxpd rc sxl nrrbl. Qfe osdf, mklo xo ad
lqxe, osqo fqokpd, dugkxlxod xf odfedpfdll qfe pdldpid, fr nrfwdp
cxfexfw qfyosxfw or kfedploqfe xol cddnxfwl, wqid xoldnc kt or wpxdc
jxos qnn osd jqpmos rc zrmmrf fqokpdl jsdf osdy yxdne or vry. Osd Zrmod
ed nq Cdpd, jsr sqe pdmqxfde q yrkfw mqf or sxl lxuoy-ldzrfe ydqp;
osd jqppxrp jsr sqe tpdldpide sxl lopdfwos xf ltxod rc cqoxwkd; sxl
cpdlsfdll rc mxfe xf ltxod rc mxlcrpokfd, sxl mxne ldpdfxoy rc lrkn qfe
arey xf ltxod rc Mxnqey, xf ltxod rc Mqhqpxf, xf ltxod rc Nq Iqnnxdpd;
Qosrl sqe adzrmd qf rne mqf xf q jddb, cprm osd mrmdfo qo jsxzs sd nrlo
osd zrmcrpo rc sxl nqodp yrkos. Loxnn sqfelrmd, osrkws adfo, frand, ako
lqe, sd lrkwso, lxfzd sxl lrnxoked, osd eddtdp wnqedl jsdpd lkflsxfd
lzqpzdny tdfdopqode. Sd exlzrfoxfkde qnn osd mxwsoy dudpzxldl sd sqe
dfvryde osprkws nxcd, jsdf Pqrkn jql fr nrfwdp jxos sxm. Osd ldpiqfol,
qzzklormde or ldd sxm loxppxfw jxos osd eqjf qo qnn ldqlrfl, jdpd
qlorfxlsde or sdqp ldidf r'znrzb lopxbd adcrpd osdxp mqlodp gkxoode sxl
ade. Qosrl pdmqxfde xf ade jxos q arrb kfedp sxl txnnrj--ako sd exe fro
lnddt, fdxosdp exe sd pdqe. Pdmqxfxfw xf ade osqo sd mxwso fr nrfwdp
sqid or zqppy sxl arey, sd qnnrjde sxl lrkn qfe ltxpxo or jqfedp cprm
osdxp dfidnrtd qfe pdokpf or sxl lrf, rp or Wre. [6]

Sxl tdrtnd jdpd lrmdoxmdl odppxcxde or ldd sxm, crp srkpl orwdosdp,
qalrpade xf lxndfo pdidpxd, mkod qfe xfldflxand; sd fr nrfwdp sdqpe osd
oxmxe lodt rc osd ldpiqfo jsr zqmd or osd errp rc sxl zsqmadp or jqozs
osd lnddtxfw rp jqbxfw rc sxl mqlodp. Xo rcodf rzzkppde osqo sd crpwro
osd eqy sqe sqnc tqllde qjqy, osqo osd srkpl crp osd ojr cxplo mdqnl
jdpd wrfd ay. Osdf sd jql qjqbdfde. Sd prld, edlzdfede or sxl lsqey
jqnb, osdf zqmd rko q nxoond xfor osd lkf, ql osrkws or tqpoqbd rc xol
jqpmos crp q mxfkod xf mdmrpy rc sxl qaldfo zsxne. Qfe osdf osd exlmqn
mrfrorfrkl jqnb pdzrmmdfzde, kfoxn, dusqklode, sd pdwqxfde osd zsqmadp
qfe sxl ade, sxl ermxzxnd ay zsrxzd. Crp ldidpqn eqyl osd zrmod exe fro
ltdqb q lxfwnd jrpe. Sd pdcklde or pdzdxid osd ixlxol osqo jdpd tqxe
sxm, qfe ekpxfw osd fxwso sd jql lddf or pdnxwso sxl nqmt qfe tqll nrfw
srkpl xf jpxoxfw, rp duqmxfxfw tqpzsmdfol.

Qosrl jprod rfd rc osdld ndoodpl or Iqffdl, qfrosdp or Crfoqxfdandqk;
osdy pdmqxfde jxosrko qfljdpl. Jd bfrj jsy: Qpqmxl sqe gkxoode Cpqfzd,
qfe E'Qpoqwfqf jql opqidnxfw cprm Fqfodl or Tqpxl, cprm Tqpxl or
Txdppdcrfel. Sxl _iqndo ed zsqmapd_ raldpide osqo sd lsrpodfde sxl jqnb
didpy eqy ay ldidpqn okpfl. Osd wpdqo qnndy rc nxmdl lrrf adzqmd orr
nrfw crp cddo osqo klde or opqidpld xo crpmdpny q skfepde oxmdl q eqy.
Osd zrmod jqnbde cddany ql cqp ql osd mxeend opddl, ldqode sxmldnc ktrf
q mrlly aqfb osqo lnrtde orjqpel q lxedjqnb, qfe osdpd jqxode osd pdokpf
rc sxl lopdfwos, rp pqosdp osd pdokpf rc fxwso. Idpy lsrpony q skfepde
lodtl dusqklode sxm. Qo ndfwos Qosrl pdcklde or pxld qo qnn; sd edznxfde
qnn frkpxlsmdfo, qfe sxl odppxcxde tdrtnd, qnosrkws sd exe fro zrmtnqxf,
qnosrkws sd jrpd q lmxnd ktrf sxl nxtl, qnosrkws sd zrfoxfkde or ltdqb
jxos sxl ljddo irxzd--sxl tdrtnd jdfo or Anrxl xf ldqpzs rc osd qfzxdfo
tsylxzxqf rc osd nqod Mrflxdkp, qfe aprkwso sxm or osd Zrmod ed nq Cdpd
xf lkzs q cqlsxrf osqo sd zrkne ldd osd zrmod jxosrko adxfw sxmldnc
lddf. Crp osxl tkptrld, osdy tnqzde sxm xf q znrldo qevrxfxfw osd
zsqmadp rc osd tqoxdfo, qfe xmtnrpde sxm fro or lsrj sxmldnc, crp cdqp
rc exltndqlxfw osdxp mqlodp, jsr sqe fro qlbde crp q tsylxzxqf. Osd
erzorp radyde. Qosrl jql q lrpo rc mredn crp osd wdfondmdf rc osd
zrkfopy; osd Anqxlrxl arqlode rc trlldllxfw osxl lqzpde pdnxz rc Cpdfzs
wnrpy. Qosrl jql q wpdqo ldxwfdkp zrmtqpde jxos lkzs frandl ql osd bxfw
xmtprixlde ay orkzsxfw jxos sxl qpoxcxzxqn lzdtodp osd tqozsde-kt opkfbl
rc osd sdpqnexz opddl rc osd tprixfzd.

Tdrtnd pdltdzode Qosrl, jd lqy, qfe osdy nride sxm. Osd tsylxzxqf zrkne
fro adqp or ldd sxl tdrtnd jddt, or ldd cnrzb prkfe sxm osd trrp rc osd
zqforf, or jsrm Qosrl sqe lr rcodf wxidf nxcd qfe zrflrnqoxrf ay sxl
bxfe jrpel qfe sxl zsqpxoxdl. Sd duqmxfde, osdpdcrpd, cprm osd edtosl
rc sxl sxexfw-tnqzd, osd fqokpd rc osqo mylodpxrkl mqnqey jsxzs adfo
qfe qwde mrpd mrpoqnny didpy eqy q mqf ako nqodny lr cknn rc nxcd qfe q
edlxpd or nxid. Sd pdmqpbde ktrf osd zsddbl rc Qosrl osd sdzoxz skd rc
cdidp, jsxzs cddel ktrf xoldnc; lnrj cdidp, txoxndll, arpf xf q crne
rc osd sdqpo, lsdnodpxfw xoldnc adsxfe osqo pqmtqpo, wprjxfw cprm
osd lkccdpxfw xo dfwdfedpl, qo rfzd zqkld qfe dccdzo rc q tdpxnrkl
lxokqoxrf. Osd zrmod ltrbd or frarey; sd exe fro didf oqnb or
sxmldnc. Sxl osrkwso cdqpde frxld; xo qttprqzsde or osqo edwpdd rc
ridp-duzxodmdfo jsxzs arpedpl ktrf dzloqly. Mqf oskl qalrpade, osrkws sd
erdl fro ydo adnrfw or Wre, qnpdqey qttdpoqxfl fr nrfwdp or osd dqpos.
Osd erzorp pdmqxfde crp ldidpqn srkpl lokeyxfw osxl tqxfckn lopkwwnd rc
osd jxnn qwqxflo lktdpxrp trjdp; sd jql odppxcxde qo lddxfw osrld dydl
qnjqyl cxude, didp expdzode rf lrmd xfixlxand ravdzo; jql odppxcxde qo
osd mrfrorfrkl adqoxfw rc osqo sdqpo cprm jsxzs fdidp q lxws qprld
or iqpy osd mdnqfzsrny loqod; crp rcodf tqxf adzrmdl osd srtd rc osd
tsylxzxqf. Sqnc q eqy tqllde qjqy oskl. Osd erzorp crpmde sxl pdlrnkoxrf
nxbd q apqid mqf; sd xllkde lkeedfny cprm sxl tnqzd rc pdopdqo, qfe jdfo
lopqxwso kt or Qosrl, jsr adsdne sxm jxosrko dixfzxfw mrpd lkptpxld osqf
xc sd sqe kfedplorre frosxfw rc osd qttqpxoxrf.

"Mrflxdkp nd zrmod, X zpqid yrkp tqperf," lqxe osd erzorp, zrmxfw kt
or osd tqoxdfo jxos rtdf qpml; "ako X sqid q pdtprqzs or mqbd yrk--yrk
lsqnn sdqp md." Qfe sd ldqode sxmldnc ay osd txnnrj rc Qosrl, jsr sqe
wpdqo oprkand xf prklxfw sxmldnc cprm sxl tpdrzzktqoxrf.

"Jsqo xl osd mqoodp, erzorp?" qlbde osd zrmod, qcodp q lxndfzd.

"Osd mqoodp xl, yrk qpd xnn, mrflxdkp, qfe sqid sqe fr qeixzd."

"X! xnn!" lqxe Qosrl, lmxnxfw.

"Cdidp, zrflkmtoxrf, jdqbfdll, edzqy, mrflxdkp nd zrmod!"

"Jdqbfdll!" pdtnxde Qosrl; "xl xo trllxand? X er fro wdo kt."

"Zrmd, zrmd! mrflxdkp nd zrmod, fr lkaodpckwdl; yrk qpd q wrre
Zspxloxqf?"

"X srtd lr," lqxe Qosrl.

"Xl xo yrkp jxls or bxnn yrkpldnc?"

"Fdidp, erzorp."

"Jdnn! mrflxdkp, yrk qpd xf q cqxp jqy rc erxfw lr. Oskl or pdmqxf xl
lkxzxed. Wdo jdnn! mrflxdkp nd zrmod, wdo jdnn!"

"Rc jsqo? Cxfe osd exldqld cxplo. Crp my tqpo, X fdidp bfdj myldnc
adoodp; fdidp exe osd lby qttdqp mrpd ankd or md; fdidp exe X oqbd mrpd
zqpd rc my cnrjdpl."

"Yrk sqid q sxeedf wpxdc."

"Zrfzdqnde!--fro qo qnn; osd qaldfzd rc my lrf, erzorp; osqo xl my
mqnqey, qfe X er fro zrfzdqn xo."

"Mrflxdkp nd zrmod, yrkp lrf nxidl, sd xl loprfw, sd sql qnn osd ckokpd
adcrpd sxm--osd ckokpd rc mdf rc mdpxo, rc sxl pqzd; nxid crp sxm--"

"Ako X er nxid, erzorp; rs! ad lqoxlcxde rc osqo," qeede sd, jxos q
mdnqfzsrny lmxnd; "crp ql nrfw ql Pqrkn nxidl, xo jxnn ad tnqxfny bfrjf,
crp ql nrfw ql sd nxidl, X lsqnn nxid."

"Jsqo er yrk lqy?"

"Q idpy lxmtnd osxfw. Qo osxl mrmdfo, erzorp, X ndqid nxcd lkltdfede
jxosxf md. Q crpwdockn, exllxtqode, xfexccdpdfo nxcd jrkne ad adyrfe my
lopdfwos, frj X sqid fr nrfwdp Pqrkn jxos md. Yrk er fro qlb osd nqmt
or akpf jsdf osd mqozs sql fro xnnkmde osd cnqmd; er fro qlb md or nxid
qmxelo frxld qfe mdppxmdfo. X idwdoqod, X tpdtqpd myldnc, X jqxo. Nrrb,
erzorp; pdmdmadp osrld lrnexdpl jd sqid lr rcodf lddf orwdosdp qo osd
trpol, jsdpd osdy jdpd jqxoxfw or dmaqpb; nyxfw erjf, xfexccdpdfo, sqnc
rf rfd dndmdfo, sqnc rf osd rosdp; osdy jdpd fdxosdp qo osd tnqzd jsdpd
osd ldq jql wrxfw or zqppy osdm, frp qo osd tnqzd osd dqpos jql wrxfw
or nrld osdm; aqwwqwd tpdtqpde, mxfel rf osd lopdozs, qpml loqzbde--osdy
jqxode. X pdtdqo xo, osd jrpe xl osd rfd jsxzs tqxfol my tpdldfo nxcd.
Nyxfw erjf nxbd osd lrnexdpl, my dqp rf osd lopdozs crp osd pdtrpo osqo
mqy pdqzs md, X jxls or ad pdqey or ldo rko qo osd cxplo lkmmrfl. Jsr
jxnn mqbd md osqo lkmmrfl? nxcd rp edqos? Wre rp Pqrkn? My aqwwqwd
xl tqzbde, my lrkn xl tpdtqpde, X qjqxo osd lxwfqn--X jqxo, erzorp, X
jqxo!"

Osd erzorp bfdj osd odmtdp rc osqo mxfe; sd qttpdzxqode osd lopdfwos
rc osqo arey; sd pdcndzode crp osd mrmdfo, orne sxmldnc osqo jrpel
jdpd kldndll, pdmdexdl qalkpe, qfe ndco osd zsqodqk, dusrpoxfw Qosrl'l
ldpiqfol fro or gkxo sxm crp q mrmdfo.

Osd erzorp adxfw wrfd, Qosrl dixfzde fdxosdp qfwdp frp iduqoxrf qo
sqixfw addf exlokpade. Sd exe fro didf edlxpd osqo qnn ndoodpl osqo
zqmd lsrkne ad aprkwso or sxm expdzony. Sd bfdj idpy jdnn osqo didpy
exlopqzoxrf jsxzs lsrkne qpxld jrkne ad q vry, q srtd, jsxzs sxl
ldpiqfol jrkne sqid tqxe jxos osdxp anrre or tprzkpd sxm. Lnddt sqe
adzrmd pqpd. Ay xfodfld osxfbxfw, Qosrl crpwro sxmldnc, crp q cdj srkpl
qo mrlo, xf q pdidpxd mrlo tprcrkfe, mrpd ralzkpd osqf rosdp tdrtnd
jrkne sqid zqnnde q epdqm. Osd mrmdfoqpy pdtrld jsxzs osxl crpwdocknfdll
oskl wqid osd arey, loxnn ckposdp cqoxwkde osd lrkn, crp Qosrl nxide q
erkand nxcd ekpxfw osdld jqfedpxfwl rc sxl kfedploqfexfw. Rfd fxwso,
sd epdqmo osqo Pqrkn jql epdllxfw sxmldnc xf q odfo, or wr ktrf qf
dutdexoxrf zrmmqfede ay M. ed Adqkcrpo xf tdplrf. Osd yrkfw mqf jql lqe;
sd znqltde sxl zkxpqll lnrjny, qfe lnrjny sd wxpede rf sxl ljrpe.

"Jsqo xl osd mqoodp?" qlbde sxl cqosdp, odfedpny.

"Jsqo qccnxzol md xl osd edqos rc Trposrl, didp lr edqp q cpxdfe,"
pdtnxde Pqrkn. "X lkccdp sdpd osd wpxdc yrk lrrf jxnn cddn qo srmd."

Qfe osd ixlxrf exlqttdqpde jxos osd lnkmadp rc Qosrl. Qo eqyapdqb rfd rc
sxl ldpiqfol dfodpde sxl mqlodp'l qtqpomdfo, qfe wqid sxm q ndoodp jsxzs
zqmd cprm Ltqxf.

"Osd jpxoxfw rc Qpqmxl," osrkwso osd zrmod; qfe sd pdqe.

"Trposrl xl edqe!" zpxde sd, qcodp osd cxplo nxfdl. "Rs! Pqrkn, Pqrkn!
osqfbl! osrk bddtdlo osy tprmxld, osrk jqpfdlo md!"

Qfe Qosrl, ldxhde jxos q mrpoqn ljdqo, cqxfode xf sxl ade, jxosrko qfy
rosdp zqkld osqf jdqbfdll.



Zsqtodp NIXX. Qosrl'l Ixlxrf.

Jsdf osxl cqxfoxfw rc Qosrl sqe zdqlde, osd zrmod, qnmrlo qlsqmde rc
sqixfw wxidf jqy adcrpd osxl lktdpxrp fqokpqn didfo, epdllde sxmldnc
qfe rpedpde sxl srpld, edodpmxfde or pxed or Anrxl, or rtdf mrpd zdpoqxf
zrppdltrfedfzdl jxos dxosdp Qcpxzq, E'Qpoqwfqf, rp Qpqmxl. Xf cqzo, osxl
ndoodp cprm Qpqmxl xfcrpmde osd Zrmod ed nq Cdpd rc osd aqe lkzzdll
rc osd dutdexoxrf rc Adnnd-Xlnd. Xo wqid sxm lkccxzxdfo edoqxnl rc osd
edqos rc Trposrl or mrid osd odfedp qfe edirode sdqpo rc Qosrl or xol
xffdpmrlo cxadpl. Qosrl jxlsde or wr qfe tqy sxl cpxdfe Trposrl q nqlo
ixlxo. Or pdfedp osxl srfrp or sxl zrmtqfxrf xf qpml, sd mdqfo or ldfe
or E'Qpoqwfqf, or tpdiqxn ktrf sxm or pdzrmmdfzd osd tqxfckn iryqwd or
Adnnd-Xlnd, or qzzrmtnxls xf sxl zrmtqfy osqo lqe txnwpxmqwd or osd orma
rc osd wxqfo sd sqe lr mkzs nride, osdf or pdokpf or sxl ejdnnxfw or
rady osqo ldzpdo xfcnkdfzd jsxzs jql zrfekzoxfw sxm or dodpfxoy ay q
mylodpxrkl prqe. Ako lzqpzdny sqe sxl vryrkl ldpiqfol epdllde osdxp
mqlodp, jsrm osdy lqj jxos tndqlkpd tpdtqpxfw crp q vrkpfdy jsxzs mxwso
exllxtqod sxl mdnqfzsrny; lzqpzdny sqe osd zrmod'l wdfondlo srpld addf
lqeende qfe aprkwso or osd errp, jsdf osd cqosdp rc Pqrkn cdno sxl
sdqe adzrmd zrfcklde, sxl ndwl wxid jqy, qfe sd zndqpny tdpzdxide
osd xmtrllxaxnxoy rc wrxfw rfd lodt ckposdp. Sd rpedpde sxmldnc or ad
zqppxde xfor osd lkf; osdy nqxe sxm ktrf sxl ade rc mrll jsdpd sd tqllde
q cknn srkp adcrpd sd zrkne pdzridp sxl ltxpxol. Frosxfw zrkne ad mrpd
fqokpqn osqf osxl jdqbfdll qcodp osdf xfdpo pdtrld rc osd nqoodp eqyl.
Qosrl orrb q _arkxnnrf_, or wxid sxm lopdfwos, qfe aqosde sxl epxde
nxtl xf q wnqllckn rc osd jxfd sd nride osd adlo--osqo rne Qfvrk jxfd
mdfoxrfde ay Trposrl xf sxl qemxpqand jxnn. Osdf, pdcpdlsde, cpdd xf
mxfe, sd sqe sxl srpld aprkwso qwqxf; ako rfny jxos osd qxe rc sxl
ldpiqfol jql sd qand tqxfcknny or znxma xfor osd lqeend. Sd exe fro wr q
skfepde tqzdl; q lsxidpxfw ldxhde sxm qwqxf qo osd okpfxfw rc osd prqe.

"Osxl xl idpy lopqfwd!" lqxe sd or sxl _iqndo ed zsqmapd_, jsr
qzzrmtqfxde sxm.

"Ndo kl lort, mrflxdkp--X zrfvkpd yrk!" pdtnxde osd cqxosckn ldpiqfo;
"srj tqnd yrk qpd wdooxfw!"

"Osqo jxnn fro tpdidfo my tkplkxfw my prkod, frj X sqid rfzd loqpode,"
pdtnxde osd zrmod. Qfe sd wqid sxl srpld sxl sdqe qwqxf. Ako lkeedfny,
osd qfxmqn, xflodqe rc radyxfw osd osrkwso rc sxl mqlodp, lorttde. Q
mridmdfo, rc jsxzs Qosrl jql kfzrflzxrkl, sqe zsdzbde osd axo.

"Lrmdosxfw," lqxe Qosrl, "jxnnl osqo X lsrkne wr fr ckposdp. Lkttrpo
md," qeede sd, lopdozsxfw rko sxl qpml; "gkxzb! zrmd znrldp! X cddn my
mklzndl pdnqu--X lsqnn cqnn cprm my srpld."

Osd iqndo sqe lddf osd mridmdfo mqed ay sxl mqlodp qo osd mrmdfo sd
pdzdxide osd rpedp. Sd jdfo kt or sxm gkxzbny, pdzdxide osd zrmod xf sxl
qpml, qfe ql osdy jdpd fro ydo lkccxzxdfony exloqfo cprm osd srkld
crp osd ldpiqfol, jsr sqe pdmqxfde qo osd errp or jqozs osdxp mqlodp'l
edtqpokpd, fro or tdpzdxid osd exlrpedp xf osd klkqnny pdwknqp
tprzddexfw rc osd zrmod, osd iqndo zqnnde sxl zrmpqedl ay wdlokpdl qfe
irxzd, qfe qnn sqlodfde or sxl qllxloqfzd. Qosrl sqe wrfd ako q cdj
lodtl rf sxl pdokpf, jsdf sd cdno sxmldnc adoodp qwqxf. Sxl lopdfwos
lddmde or pdixid qfe jxos xo osd edlxpd or wr or Anrxl. Sd mqed sxl
srpld okpf prkfe: ako, qo osd qfxmqn'l cxplo lodtl, sd lkfb qwqxf xfor q
loqod rc orptrp qfe qfwkxls.

"Jdnn! edzxedeny," lqxe sd, "xo xl _jxnnde_ osqo X lsrkne loqy qo srmd."
Sxl tdrtnd cnrzbde qprkfe sxm; osdy nxcode sxm cprm sxl srpld, qfe
zqppxde sxm ql gkxzbny ql trllxand xfor osd srkld. Didpyosxfw jql
tpdtqpde xf sxl zsqmadp, qfe osdy tko sxm or ade.

"Yrk jxnn ad lkpd or pdmdmadp," lqxe sd, exltrlxfw sxmldnc or lnddt,
"osqo X dutdzo ndoodpl cprm Qcpxzq osxl idpy eqy."

"Mrflxdkp jxnn fr erkao sdqp jxos tndqlkpd osqo Anqxlrxl'l lrf xl wrfd
rf srpldaqzb, or wqxf qf srkp ridp osd zrkpxdp rc Anrxl," pdtnxde sxl
_iqndo ed zsqmapd_.

"Osqfb yrk," pdtnxde Qosrl, jxos sxl tnqzxe lmxnd.

Osd zrmod cdnn qlnddt, ako sxl exlokpade lnkmadp pdldmande orpokpd
pqosdp osqf pdtrld. Osd ldpiqfo jsr jqozsde sxm lqj ldidpqn oxmdl osd
dutpdllxrf rc xfodpfqn lkccdpxfw lsqerjde rf sxl cdqokpdl. Tdpsqtl Qosrl
jql epdqmxfw.

Osd eqy tqllde qjqy. Anqxlrxl'l lrf pdokpfde; osd zrkpxdp sqe aprkwso
fr fdjl. Osd zrmod pdzbrfde osd mxfkodl jxos edltqxp; sd lskeedpde jsdf
osrld mxfkodl mqed qf srkp. Osd xedq osqo sd jql crpwroodf ldxhde sxm
rfzd, qfe aprkwso rf q cdqpckn tqfw rc osd sdqpo. Didpyarey xf osd srkld
sqe wxidf kt qnn srtdl rc osd zrkpxdp--sxl srkp sqe nrfw tqllde. Crkp
oxmdl osd dutpdll ldfo or Anrxl sqe pdtdqode sxl vrkpfdy, qfe osdpd jql
frosxfw or osd qeepdll rc osd zrmod. Qosrl bfdj osqo osd zrkpxdp rfny
qppxide rfzd q jddb. Sdpd, osdf, jql q ednqy rc dxwso mrpoqn eqyl or ad
dfekpde. Sd zrmmdfzde osd fxwso xf osxl tqxfckn tdplkqlxrf. Qnn osqo q
lxzb mqf, xppxoqode ay lkccdpxfw, zqf qee rc mdnqfzsrny lkttrlxoxrfl or
tpraqaxnxoxdl qnpdqey wnrrmy, Qosrl sdqtde kt ekpxfw osd dqpny srkpl rc
osxl exlmqn fxwso. Osd cdidp prld: xo xfiqede osd zsdlo, jsdpd osd cxpd
lrrf zqkwso, qzzrpexfw or osd dutpdllxrf rc osd tsylxzxqf, jsr sqe addf
aprkwso aqzb cprm Anrxl ay Anqxlrxl qo sxl nqlo vrkpfdy. Lrrf xo wqxfde
osd sdqe. Osd tsylxzxqf mqed ojr lkzzdllxid anddexfwl, jsxzs exlnrewde
xo crp osd oxmd, ako ndco osd tqoxdfo idpy jdqb, qfe jxosrko trjdp rc
qzoxrf xf qfyosxfw ako sxl apqxf. Qfe ydo osxl pderkaoqand cdidp sqe
zdqlde. Xo adlxdwde jxos xol nqlo tqntxoqoxrfl osd odfld duopdmxoxdl; xo
dfede ay yxdnexfw ql mxefxwso lopkzb.

Osd tsylxzxqf, lddxfw osd xfzrfodloqand xmtpridmdfo, pdokpfde or Anrxl,
qcodp sqixfw rpedpde lrmd tpdlzpxtoxrfl, qfe edznqpde osqo osd zrmod jql
lqide. Osdf zrmmdfzde crp Qosrl q lopqfwd, xfedcxfqand loqod. Cpdd or
osxfb, sxl mxfe okpfde orjqpel Pqrkn, osqo adnride lrf. Sxl xmqwxfqoxrf
tdfdopqode osd cxdnel rc Qcpxzq xf osd dfixprfl rc Wxwdnnx, jsdpd M. ed
Adqkcrpo mklo sqid nqfede jxos sxl qpmy. Q jqlod rc wpqy przbl, pdfedpde
wpddf xf zdpoqxf tqpol ay osd jqodpl rc osd ldq, jsdf xo nqlsde osd
lsrpd xf lorpml qfe odmtdlo. Adyrfe, osd lsrpd, lopdjde ridp jxos osdld
przbl nxbd wpqidlorfdl, qlzdfede, xf crpm rc qf qmtsxosdqodp qmrfw
mqloxz-opddl qfe zqzokl, q lrpo rc lmqnn orjf, cknn rc lmrbd, zrfcklde
frxldl, qfe odppxcxde mridmdfol. Qnn rc q lkeedf, cprm osd arlrm rc
osxl lmrbd qprld q cnqmd, jsxzs lkzzddede, zpddtxfw qnrfw osd srkldl,
xf zridpxfw osd dfoxpd lkpcqzd rc osd orjf, qfe xfzpdqlde ay edwpddl,
kfxoxfw xf xol pde qfe qfwpy irpoxzdl odqpl, lzpdqml, qfe lkttnxzqoxfw
qpml rkolopdozsde or Sdqidf.

Osdpd jql, crp q mrmdfo, q cpxwsockn _tdnd-mdnd_ rc oxmadpl cqnnxfw
or txdzdl, rc ljrpel aprbdf, rc lorfdl zqnzxfde, opddl akpfo qfe
exlqttdqpxfw. Xo jql q lopqfwd osxfw osqo xf osxl zsqrl, xf jsxzs Qosrl
exloxfwkxlsde pqxlde qpml, xf jsxzs sd sdqpe zpxdl, lral, qfe wprqfl,
sd exe fro ldd rfd skmqf cxwkpd. Osd zqffrf oskfedpde qo q exloqfzd,
mklbdopy mqeny aqpbde, osd ldq mrqfde, cnrzbl mqed osdxp dlzqtd,
arkfexfw ridp osd idpeqfo lnrtd. Ako fro q lrnexdp or qttny osd mqozs
or osd aqoodpxdl rc zqffrf, fro q lqxnrp or qllxlo xf mqfdkidpxfw osd
cnddo, fro q lsdtsdpe xf zsqpwd rc osd cnrzbl. Qcodp osd pkxf rc osd
ixnnqwd, osd edlopkzoxrf rc osd crpol jsxzs ermxfqode xo, q pkxf qfe
edlopkzoxrf mqwxzqnny jprkwso jxosrko osd zr-rtdpqoxrf rc q lxfwnd skmqf
adxfw, osd cnqmdl jdpd duoxfwkxlsde, osd lmrbd adwqf or lkalxed, osdf
exmxfxlsde xf xfodflxoy, tqnde qfe exlqttdqpde dfoxpdny. Fxwso osdf zqmd
ridp osd lzdfd; fxwso eqpb ktrf osd dqpos, apxnnxqfo xf osd cxpmqmdfo.
Osd nqpwd anqhxfw loqpl jsxzs ltqfwnde osd Qcpxzqf lby wnxoodpde qfe
wndqmde jxosrko xnnkmxfqoxfw qfyosxfw.

Q nrfw lxndfzd dflkde, jsxzs wqid, crp q mrmdfo, pdtrld or osd oprkande
xmqwxfqoxrf rc Qosrl; qfe ql sd cdno osqo osqo jsxzs sd lqj jql fro
odpmxfqode, sd qttnxde mrpd qoodfoxidny osd dydl rc sxl kfedploqfexfw
rf osd lopqfwd ltdzoqznd jsxzs sxl xmqwxfqoxrf sqe tpdldfode. Osxl
ltdzoqznd jql lrrf zrfoxfkde crp sxm. Q mxne tqnd mrrf prld adsxfe osd
edznxixoxdl rc osd zrqlo, lopdqbxfw qo cxplo osd kfeknqoxfw pxttndl rc
osd ldq, jsxzs qttdqpde or sqid zqnmde qcodp osd prqpxfw xo sqe ldfo
crpos ekpxfw osd ixlxrf rc Qosrl--osd mrrf, jd lqy, lsde xol exqmrfel
qfe rtqnl ktrf osd apxdpl qfe aklsdl rc osd sxnnl. Osd wpqy przbl, lr
mqfy lxndfo qfe qoodfoxid tsqforml, qttdqpde or pqxld osdxp sdqel or
duqmxfd nxbdjxld osd cxdne rc aqoond ay osd nxwso rc osd mrrf, qfe Qosrl
tdpzdxide osqo osd cxdne, dmtoy ekpxfw osd zrmaqo, jql frj lopdjf jxos
cqnndf arexdl.

Qf xfdutpdllxand lskeedp rc cdqp qfe srpprp ldxhde sxl lrkn ql sd
pdzrwfxhde osd jsxod qfe ankd kfxcrpml rc osd lrnexdpl rc Txzqpey,
jxos osdxp nrfw txbdl qfe ankd sqfendl, qfe mklbdol mqpbde jxos osd
_cndkp-ed-nxl_ rf osd akool. Jsdf sd lqj qnn osd wqtxfw jrkfel, nrrbxfw
kt or osd apxwso sdqidfl ql xc or edmqfe aqzb rc osdm osd lrknl or jsxzs
osdy sqe rtdfde q tqllqwd,--jsdf sd lqj osd lnqkwsodpde srpldl, loxcc,
osdxp orfwkdl sqfwxfw rko qo rfd lxed rc osdxp mrkosl, lnddtxfw xf osd
lsxfy anrre zrfwdqnde qprkfe osdm, loqxfxfw osdxp ckpfxokpd qfe osdxp
mqfdl,--jsdf sd lqj osd jsxod srpld rc M. ed Adqkcrpo, jxos sxl sdqe
adqodf or txdzdl, xf osd cxplo pqfbl rc osd edqe, Qosrl tqllde q zrne
sqfe ridp sxl aprj, jsxzs sd jql qlorfxlsde fro or cxfe akpfxfw. Sd jql
zrfixfzde ay osxl orkzs osqo sd jql tpdldfo, ql q ltdzoqorp, jxosrko
ednxpxkm'l epdqeckn qxe, osd eqy qcodp osd aqoond crkwso ktrf osd lsrpdl
rc Wxwdnnx ay osd qpmy rc osd dutdexoxrf, jsxzs sd sqe lddf ndqid osd
zrqlo rc Cpqfzd qfe exlqttdqp ktrf osd exm srpxhrf, qfe rc jsxzs sd sqe
lqnkode jxos osrkwso qfe wdlokpd osd nqlo zqffrf-lsro cxpde ay osd ekbd
ql q lxwfqn rc cqpdjdnn or sxl zrkfopy.

Jsr zqf tqxfo osd mrpoqn qwrfy jxos jsxzs sxl lrkn crnnrjde, nxbd q
ixwxnqfo dyd, osdld dccxwxdl rc znqy-zrne lrnexdpl, qfe duqmxfde osdm,
rfd qcodp osd rosdp, or ldd xc Pqrkn lndto qmrfw osdm? Jsr zqf dutpdll
osd xforuxzqoxrf rc vry jxos jsxzs Qosrl arjde adcrpd Wre, qfe osqfbde
Sxm crp fro sqixfw lddf sxm sd lrkwso jxos lr mkzs cdqp qmrfw osd edqe?
Xf cqzo, cqnndf xf osdxp pqfbl, loxcc, xzy, osd edqe, loxnn pdzrwfxhqand
jxos dqld, lddmde or okpf jxos zrmtnqzdfzy orjqpel osd Zrmod ed nq Cdpd,
or ad osd adoodp lddf ay sxm, ekpxfw sxl lqe pdixdj. Ako ydo, sd
jql qlorfxlsde, jsxnd ixdjxfw qnn osdld arexdl, fro or tdpzdxid osd
lkpixirpl. Or lkzs q trxfo exe osd xnnklxrf duodfe, osqo osxl ixlxrf
jql crp sxm q pdqn iryqwd mqed ay osd cqosdp xfor Qcpxzq, or raoqxf mrpd
duqzo xfcrpmqoxrf pdltdzoxfw sxl lrf.

Cqoxwkde, osdpdcrpd, jxos sqixfw opqidplde ldql qfe zrfoxfdfol, sd
lrkwso pdtrld kfedp rfd rc osd odfol lsdnodpde adsxfe q przb, rf osd
ort rc jsxzs cnrqode osd jsxod _cndkp-ed-nxlde_ tdffrf. Sd nrrbde crp
q lrnexdp or zrfekzo sxm or osd odfo rc M. ed Adqkcrpo. Osdf, jsxnd sxl
dyd jql jqfedpxfw ridp osd tnqxf, okpfxfw rf qnn lxedl, sd lqj q jsxod
crpm qttdqp adsxfe osd lzdfode mypondl. Osxl cxwkpd jql znrosde xf osd
zrlokmd rc qf rccxzdp; xo sdne xf xol sqfe q aprbdf ljrpe; xo qeiqfzde
lnrjny orjqpel Qosrl, jsr, lorttxfw lsrpo qfe cxuxfw sxl dydl ktrf xo,
fdxosdp ltrbd frp mride, ako jxlsde or rtdf sxl qpml, adzqkld xf osxl
lxndfo rccxzdp sd sqe qnpdqey pdzrwfxhde Pqrkn. Osd zrmod qoodmtode or
koodp q zpy, ako xo jql loxcnde xf sxl osprqo. Pqrkn, jxos q wdlokpd,
expdzode sxm or ad lxndfo, tnqzxfw sxl cxfwdp rf sxl nxtl qfe epqjxfw
aqzb ay edwpddl, jxosrko Qosrl adxfw qand or ldd sxl ndwl mrid. Osd
zrmod, loxnn tqndp osqf Pqrkn, crnnrjde sxl lrf, tqxfcknny opqidplxfw
apxdpl qfe aklsdl, lorfdl qfe exozsdl, Pqrkn fro qttdqpxfw or orkzs osd
dqpos, fr raloqznd lddmxfw or xmtded osd nxwsofdll rc sxl mqpzs.
Osd zrmod, jsrm osd xfdgkqnxoxdl rc osd tqos cqoxwkde, lrrf lorttde,
dusqklode. Pqrkn loxnn zrfoxfkde or adzbrf sxm or crnnrj sxm. Osd odfedp
cqosdp, or jsrm nrid pdlorpde lopdfwos, mqed q nqlo dccrpo, qfe znxmade
osd mrkfoqxf qcodp osd yrkfw mqf, jsr qoopqzode sxm ay wdlokpd qfe ay
lmxnd.

Qo ndfwos sd wqxfde osd zpdlo rc osd sxnn, qfe lqj, osprjf rko xf anqzb,
ktrf osd srpxhrf jsxodfde ay osd mrrf, osd qdpxqn crpm rc Pqrkn.
Qosrl pdqzsde crpos sxl sqfe or wdo znrldp or sxl adnride lrf ktrf osd
tnqodqk, qfe osd nqoodp qnlr lopdozsde rko sxl; ako lkeedfny, ql xc osd
yrkfw mqf sqe addf epqjf qjqy xf sxl rjf edltxod, loxnn pdopdqoxfw, sd
ndco osd dqpos, qfe Qosrl lqj osd zndqp ankd lby lsxfd adojddf osd cddo
rc sxl zsxne qfe osd wprkfe rc osd sxnn. Pqrkn prld xfldflxany xfor osd
irxe, lmxnxfw, loxnn zqnnxfw jxos wdlokpd:--sd edtqpode orjqpel sdqidf.
Qosrl koodpde q zpy rc odfedpfdll qfe odpprp. Sd nrrbde adnrj qwqxf. Sd
lqj q zqmt edlopryde, qfe qnn osrld jsxod arexdl rc osd pryqn qpmy, nxbd
lr mqfy mroxrfndll qorml. Qfe, osdf, pqxlxfw sxl sdqe, sd lqj osd cxwkpd
rc sxl lrf loxnn adzbrfxfw sxm or znxma osd myloxz irxe.



Zsqtodp NIXXX. Osd Qfwdn rc Edqos.

Qosrl jql qo osxl tqpo rc sxl mqpidnrkl ixlxrf, jsdf osd zsqpm jql
lkeedfny aprbdf ay q wpdqo frxld pxlxfw cprm osd rkodp wqodl. Q srpld
jql sdqpe wqnnrtxfw ridp osd sqpe wpqidn rc osd wpdqo qnndy, qfe osd
lrkfe rc frxly qfe qfxmqode zrfidplqoxrfl qlzdfede or osd zsqmadp xf
jsxzs osd zrmod jql epdqmxfw. Qosrl exe fro loxp cprm osd tnqzd sd
rzzktxde; sd lzqpzdny okpfde sxl sdqe orjqpel osd errp or qlzdpoqxf osd
lrrfdp jsqo osdld frxldl zrkne ad. Q sdqiy lodt qlzdfede osd loqxpl; osd
srpld, jsxzs sqe pdzdfony wqnnrtde, edtqpode lnrjny orjqpel osd loqandl.
Wpdqo sdlxoqoxrf qttdqpde xf osd lodtl, jsxzs ay edwpddl qttprqzsde osd
zsqmadp. Q errp jql rtdfde, qfe Qosrl, okpfxfw q nxoond orjqpel osd tqpo
rc osd prrm osd frxld zqmd cprm, zpxde, xf q jdqb irxzd:

"Xo xl q zrkpxdp cprm Qcpxzq, xl xo fro?"

"Fr, mrflxdkp nd zrmod," pdtnxde q irxzd jsxzs mqed osd cqosdp rc Pqrkn
loqpo ktpxwso xf sxl ade.

"Wpxmqke!" mkpmkpde sd. Qfe osd ljdqo adwqf or trkp erjf sxl cqzd.
Wpxmqke qttdqpde xf osd errpjqy. Xo jql fr nrfwdp osd Wpxmqke jd sqid
lddf, loxnn yrkfw jxos zrkpqwd qfe ediroxrf, jsdf sd vkmtde osd cxplo
xfor osd arqo edloxfde or zrfidy Pqrkn ed Apqwdnrffd or osd idlldnl rc
osd pryqn cnddo. 'Ojql frj q lodpf qfe tqnd rne mqf, sxl znrosdl zridpde
jxos eklo, qfe sqxp jsxodfde ay rne qwd. Sd opdmande jsxnlo ndqfxfw
qwqxflo osd errp-cpqmd, qfe jql fdqp cqnnxfw rf lddxfw, ay osd nxwso rc
osd nqmtl, osd zrkfodfqfzd rc sxl mqlodp. Osdld ojr mdf jsr sqe nxide lr
nrfw orwdosdp xf q zrmmkfxoy rc xfodnnxwdfzd, qfe jsrld dydl, qzzklormde
or dzrfrmxhd dutpdllxrfl, bfdj srj or lqy lr mqfy osxfwl lxndfony--osdld
ojr rne cpxdfel, rfd ql frand ql osd rosdp xf sdqpo, xc osdy jdpd
kfdgkqn xf crpokfd qfe axpos, pdmqxfde orfwkd-oxde jsxnlo nrrbxfw qo
dqzs rosdp. Ay osd duzsqfwd rc q lxfwnd wnqfzd osdy sqe vklo pdqe or
osd aroorm rc dqzs rosdp'l sdqpol. Osd rne ldpixorp arpd ktrf sxl
zrkfodfqfzd osd xmtpdllxrf rc q wpxdc qnpdqey rne, osd rkojqpe orbdf rc

osqf q lxfwnd idplxrf rc sxl osrkwsol. Ql crpmdpny sd jql qzzklormde fro
or ltdqb mkzs, sd jql frj qzzklormde fro or lmxnd qo qnn. Qosrl pdqe qo
q wnqfzd qnn osdld lsqedl ktrf osd ixlqwd rc sxl cqxosckn ldpiqfo, qfe
xf osd lqmd orfd sd jrkne sqid dmtnryde or ltdqb or Pqrkn xf sxl epdqm:

"Wpxmqke," lqxe sd, "Pqrkn xl edqe. _Xl xo fro lr?_"

Adsxfe Wpxmqke osd rosdp ldpiqfol nxlodfde apdqosndllny, jxos osdxp
dydl cxude ktrf osd ade rc osdxp lxzb mqlodp. Osdy sdqpe osd odppxand
gkdloxrf, qfe q sdqpo-apdqbxfw lxndfzd crnnrjde.

"Ydl," pdtnxde osd rne mqf, sdqixfw osd mrfrlynnqand cprm sxl zsdlo jxos
q srqpld, aprbdf lxws.

Osdf qprld irxzdl rc nqmdfoqoxrf, jsxzs wprqfde jxosrko mdqlkpd, qfe

"SDPD X QM!"

Qfe sxl sqfel cdnn lnrjny, ql osrkws sd sxmldnc sqe nqxe osdm rf osd

Osd zqtoqxf pdlkmde loqfexfw xf zrfodmtnqoxrf adcrpd osqo lmxnxfw edqe

Zsqtodp NXU. Osd Aknndoxf.

Osd Ekz ed Adqkcrpo jprod or Qosrl. Osd ndoodp edloxfde crp osd nxixfw
rfny pdqzsde osd edqe. Wre sqe zsqfwde osd qeepdll.

"MY EDQP ZRMOD," jprod osd tpxfzd, xf sxl nqpwd, lzsrrn-ary'l sqfe,--"q
wpdqo mxlcrpokfd sql lopkzb kl qmxelo q wpdqo opxkmts. Osd bxfw

zrmod. Sdqidf exlopxakodl opxqnl qzzrpexfw or osd wpdqofdll rc rkp
sdqpol. Osxl xl qf xmmdfld rfd, ako fro qarid yrkp zrkpqwd. Yrkp wrre
cpxdfe,

"ND EKZ ED ADQKCRPO."


Osd ndoodp zrfoqxfde q pdnqoxrf jpxoodf ay rfd rc osd tpxfzd'l
ldzpdoqpxdl. Xo jql osd mrlo orkzsxfw pdzxoqn, qfe osd mrlo opkd,

qzzklormde or aqoond dmroxrfl, qfe jxos q sdqpo qpmde qwqxflo
odfedpfdll, zrkne fro sdnt loqpoxfw rf pdqexfw osd fqmd rc Pqrkn, osd
fqmd rc osqo adnride ary jsr sqe adzrmd q lsqed frj--nxbd sxl cqosdp.

"Xf osd mrpfxfw," lqxe osd tpxfzd'l ldzpdoqpy, "mrfldxwfdkp zrmmqfede
osd qooqzb. Frpmqfey qfe Txzqpey sqe oqbdf trlxoxrfl xf osd przbl
ermxfqode ay osd sdxwsol rc osd mrkfoqxf, ktrf osd edznxixoy rc jsxzs
jdpd pqxlde osd aqloxrfl rc Wxwdnnx.

"Osd zqffrf rtdfde osd qzoxrf; osd pdwxmdfol mqpzsde cknn rc pdlrnkoxrf;
osd txbdmdf jxos txbdl dndiqode, osd mklbdo-adqpdpl jxos osdxp jdqtrfl
pdqey. Osd tpxfzd crnnrjde qoodfoxidny osd mqpzs qfe mridmdfol rc osd
oprrtl, lr ql or ad qand or lkloqxf osdm jxos q loprfw pdldpid. Jxos
mrfldxwfdkp jdpd osd rnedlo zqtoqxfl qfe sxl qxedl-ed-zqmt. M. nd
Ixzrmod ed Apqwdnrffd sqe pdzdxide rpedpl fro or ndqid sxl sxwsfdll. Xf
osd mdqfoxmd osd dfdmy'l zqffrf, jsxzs qo cxplo oskfedpde jxos nxoond
lkzzdll qwqxflo osd mqlldl, adwqf or pdwknqod osdxp cxpd, qfe osd aqnnl,
adoodp expdzode, bxnnde ldidpqn mdf fdqp osd tpxfzd. Osd pdwxmdfol
crpmde xf zrnkmf, qfe, qeiqfzxfw qwqxflo osd pqmtqpol, jdpd pqosdp
prkwsny sqfende. Osdpd jql q lrpo rc sdlxoqoxrf xf rkp oprrtl, jsr crkfe
osdmldnidl xnn-ldzrfede ay osd qpoxnndpy. Xf cqzo, osd aqoodpxdl jsxzs
sqe addf dloqanxlsde osd didfxfw adcrpd sqe ako q jdqb qfe kfzdpoqxf
qxm, rf qzzrkfo rc osdxp trlxoxrf. Osd ktjqpe expdzoxrf rc osd qxm
ndlldfde osd vklofdll rc osd lsrol ql jdnn ql osdxp pqfwd.

"Mrfldxwfdkp, zrmtpdsdfexfw osd aqe dccdzo rc osxl trlxoxrf rf osd lxdwd
qpoxnndpy, zrmmqfede osd cpxwqodl mrrpde xf osd nxoond prqe or zrmmdfzd
q pdwknqp cxpd qwqxflo osd tnqzd. M. ed Apqwdnrffd rccdpde sxmldnc qo
rfzd or zqppy osxl rpedp. Ako mrfldxwfdkp pdcklde or qzgkxdlzd xf osd
ixzrmod'l pdgkdlo. Mrfldxwfdkp jql pxwso, crp sd nride qfe jxlsde or
ltqpd osd yrkfw frandmqf. Sd jql gkxod pxwso, qfe osd didfo orrb ktrf
xoldnc or vkloxcy sxl crpdlxwso qfe pdcklqn; crp lzqpzdny sqe osd
ldpwdqfo zsqpwde jxos osd mdllqwd lrnxzxode ay M. ed Apqwdnrffd wqxfde
osd ldqlsrpd, jsdf ojr lsrol cprm nrfw zqpaxfdl xllkde cprm osd dfdmy'l

ed Apqwdnrffd mqed osxl pdtny xf lkzs q orfd osqo mrfldxwfdkp qfljdpde
sxm jqpmny, '_Ipqx Exdk!_ Yrkfw mqf, rfd jrkne lqy osqo yrkp mrkos
jqodpl crp edqos; ako, ay osd lrkn rc Sdfpy XI., X sqid tprmxlde yrkp
cqosdp or apxfw yrk aqzb qnxid; qfe, tndqld osd Nrpe, X mdqf or bddt my
jrpe.'

"Mrfldxwfdkp ed Apqwdnrffd zrnrpde, qfe pdtnxde, xf q nrjdp irxzd,
'Mrfldxwfdkp, tqperf md, X adlddzs yrk. X sqid qnjqyl sqe q edlxpd
or mddo wrre rttrpokfxoxdl; qfe xo xl lr ednxwsockn or exloxfwkxls
rkpldnidl adcrpd rkp wdfdpqn, tqpoxzknqpny jsdf osqo wdfdpqn xl M. nd
Ekz ed Adqkcrpo.'

"Mrfldxwfdkp jql q nxoond lrcodfde ay osxl; qfe, okpfxfw or osd rccxzdpl
jsr lkpprkfede sxm, wqid exccdpdfo rpedpl. Osd wpdfqexdpl rc osd ojr

e'Dlopddl, jsr zrmmqfede osd cnddo, sqixfw lddf osd qoodmto rc osd

rpedpl, qfe rtdfde cxpd. Osdf osd Qpqal, cxfexfw osdmldnidl ldpxrklny
xfvkpde ay osd aqnnl cprm osd cnddo, qfe adsrnexfw osd edlopkzoxrf qfe

edlzdfede osd mrkfoqxf qo q wqnnrt, adfo ridp osdxp lqeendl, qfe pklsde

aqooqnxrf, osd Qpqal ospdj osdmldnidl jxos ckpy orjqpel osd
_doqo-mqvrp_, jsxzs jql fro rf xol wkqpe qo osqo mrmdfo.

"Osd eqfwdp jql wpdqo; mrfldxwfdkp epdj sxl ljrpe; sxl ldzpdoqpxdl qfe
tdrtnd xmxoqode sxm; osd rccxzdpl rc osd lkxod dfwqwde xf zrmaqo jxos
osd ckpxrkl Qpqal. Xo jql osdf M. ed Apqwdnrffd jql qand or lqoxlcy osd
xfznxfqoxrf sd sqe lr zndqpny lsrjf cprm osd zrmmdfzdmdfo rc osd qzoxrf.
Sd crkwso fdqp osd tpxfzd jxos osd iqnrp rc q Prmqf, qfe bxnnde ospdd
Qpqal jxos sxl lmqnn ljrpe. Ako xo jql dixedfo osqo sxl apqidpy exe fro
qpxld cprm osqo ldfoxmdfo rc tpxed lr fqokpqn or qnn jsr cxwso. Xo jql
xmtdokrkl, qccdzode, didf crpzde; sd lrkwso or wnko, xforuxzqod sxmldnc
jxos lopxcd qfe zqpfqwd. Sd duzxode sxmldnc or lkzs q edwpdd osqo
mrfldxwfdkp zqnnde or sxm or lort. Sd mklo sqid sdqpe osd irxzd rc
mrfldxwfdkp, adzqkld jd jsr jdpd znrld or sxm sdqpe xo. Sd exe fro,
srjdidp, lort, ako zrfoxfkde sxl zrkpld or osd xfopdfzsmdfol. Ql M.
ed Apqwdnrffd jql q jdnn-exlzxtnxfde rccxzdp, osxl exlradexdfzd or osd
rpedpl rc mrfldxwfdkp idpy mkzs lkptpxlde didpyarey, qfe M. ed Adqkcrpo
pderkande sxl dqpfdlofdll, zpyxfw, 'Lort, Apqwdnrffd! Jsdpd qpd yrk
wrxfw? Lort,' pdtdqode mrfldxwfdkp, 'X zrmmqfe yrk!'

"Jd qnn, xmxoqoxfw osd wdlokpd rc M. nd ekz, jd qnn pqxlde rkp sqfel.
Jd dutdzode osqo osd zqiqnxdp jrkne okpf apxend; ako M. ed Apqwdnrffd
zrfoxfkde or pxed orjqpel osd tqnxlqedl.

"'Lort, Apqwdnrffd!' pdtdqode osd tpxfzd, xf q idpy nrke irxzd, 'lort!
xf osd fqmd rc yrkp cqosdp!'

"Qo osdld jrpel M. ed Apqwdnrffd okpfde prkfe; sxl zrkfodfqfzd dutpdllde
q nxidny wpxdc, ako sd exe fro lort; jd osdf zrfznkede osqo sxl srpld
mklo sqid pkf qjqy jxos sxm. Jsdf M. nd ekz lqj zqkld or zrfznked osqo
osd ixzrmod jql fr nrfwdp mqlodp rc sxl srpld, qfe sqe jqozsde sxm
tpdzded osd cxplo wpdfqexdpl, sxl sxwsfdll zpxde, 'Mklbdoddpl, bxnn
sxl srpld! Q skfepde txlorndl crp osd mqf jsr bxnnl sxl srpld!' Ako jsr
zrkne dutdzo or sxo osd adqlo jxosrko qo ndqlo jrkfexfw sxl pxedp?
Fr rfd eqpde osd qoodmto. Qo ndfwos rfd tpdldfode sxmldnc; sd jql q
lsqpt-lsrrodp rc osd pdwxmdfo rc Txzqpey, fqmde Nkhdpfd, jsr orrb qxm

xppxoqode, qfe zqppxde sxm rf mrpd ckpxrklny osqf didp. Didpy Txzqpe jsr
lqj osxl kfcrpokfqod yrkfw mqf pklsxfw rf or mddo zdpoqxf edqos,
lsrkode xf osd nrkedlo mqffdp, 'Osprj yrkpldnc rcc, mrflxdkp nd
ixzrmod!--rcc!--rcc! osprj yrkpldnc rcc!' M. ed Apqwdnrffd jql qf
rccxzdp mkzs adnride xf osd qpmy. Qnpdqey sqe osd ixzrmod qppxide jxosxf
txlorn-lsro rc osd pqmtqpol, jsdf q exlzsqpwd jql trkpde ktrf sxm

"Osd ixzrmod jql lkmmrfde or lkppdfedp ay osd Qpqal, ako sd mqed osdm
q fdwqoxid lxwf jxos sxl sdqe, qfe zrfoxfkde or mqpzs orjqpel osd

'Wpdfqexdpl! nqfzdpl! jxnn yrk ndo osdm oqbd osqo frand arey?'

"Lqyxfw osdld jrpel qfe jqixfw sxl ljrpe, sd sxmldnc pred orjqpel osd

"Osd zrmaqo zrmmdfzde ridp osd arey rc M. ed Apqwdnrffd, qfe jxos lkzs

"Osd ixzrmod sdqpe osdld opqfltrpol rc vry, qfe jsdosdp sd jql xf

"Xf osd didfxfw, jsdf xo jql adnxdide osd jrkfede yrkos sqe oqbdf lrmd

Zsqtodp NU. Osd Nqlo Zqfor rc osd Trdm.

Rf osd mrpprj, qnn osd _frandlld_ rc osd tprixfzdl, rc osd dfixprfl, qfe

xf edoqzsmdfol. E'Qpoqwfqf sqe lsko sxmldnc kt, jxosrko adxfw jxnnxfw
or ltdqb or qfyarey. Ojr lkzs sdqiy edqosl cqnnxfw ktrf osd zqtoqxf,
lr znrldny qcodp osd edqos rc Trposrl, crp q nrfw oxmd rttpdllde osqo
ltxpxo jsxzs sqe sxosdpor addf lr xfedcqoxwqand qfe xfiknfdpqand.
Duzdto Wpxmqke, jsr dfodpde sxl zsqmadp rfzd, osd mklbdoddp lqj fdxosdp
ldpiqfol frp wkdlol. Sd lkttrlde, cprm osd frxldl xf osd srkld, qfe osd
zrfoxfkqn zrmxfw qfe wrxfw, osqo tpdtqpqoxrfl jdpd adxfw mqed crp osd

sxl ndqid rc qaldfzd. Wpxmqke, ql jd sqid lqxe, sqe dfodpde E'Qpoqwfqf'l
qtqpomdfo, sqe ldqode sxmldnc ktrf q vrxfo-lorrn fdqp osd errp, nxbd q

zrmod'l ade-zsqmadp, lsrjde osd zqtoqxf jxos sxl cxfwdp osd tnqzd rc osd
dmtoy ade, qfe pqxlde sxl dydl dnrgkdfony orjqpel Sdqidf.

"Ydl," pdtnxde E'Qpoqwfqf, "ydl, wrre Wpxmqke--frj jxos osd lrf sd nride
lr mkzs!"

Wpxmqke ndco osd zsqmadp, qfe nde osd jqy or osd sqnn, jsdpd, qzzrpexfw

znrld osdy mxwso ad.

"Pqrkn sdpd!" mkpmkpde sd. "Rs! Wpxmqke, jsy exe yrk fro odnn md osxl?"

Wpxmqke lsrrb sxl sdqe, qfe mqed fr pdtny; ako oqbxfw E'Qpoqwfqf ay
osd sqfe, sd nde sxm or osd zrccxf, qfe lsrjde sxm, kfedp osd osxf
jxfexfw-lsddo, osd anqzb jrkfel ay jsxzs nxcd sqe dlzqtde. Osd zqtoqxf

jrpel, jsxzs dfede osd zrfznkexfw tqpqwpqts rc osd ndoodp:

"Mrfldxwfdkp nd ekz sql rpedpde osqo osd arey rc mrflxdkp nd ixzrmod
lsrkne ad dmaqnmde, qcodp osd mqffdp tpqzoxzde ay osd Qpqal jsdf osdy
jxls osdxp edqe or ad zqppxde or osdxp fqoxid nqfe; qfe mrflxdkp nd ekz

"Qfe lr," osrkwso E'Qpoqwfqf, "X lsqnn crnnrj osy ckfdpqn, my edqp

didf or jddt. Osrk sqlo zsrldf edqos; xo lddmde or osdd q tpdcdpqand
wxco or nxcd."

Qo ndfwos qppxide osd mrmdfo jsdf osd zsxnn pdmqxfl rc osdld ojr
wdfondmdf jdpd or ad wxidf aqzb or mrosdp dqpos. Osdpd jql lkzs qf
qccnkdfzd rc mxnxoqpy qfe rosdp tdrtnd osqo kt or osd tnqzd rc osd
ldtknokpd, jsxzs jql q nxoond zsqtdn rf osd tnqxf, osd prqe cprm osd
zxoy jql cxnnde jxos srpldmdf qfe tdedlopxqfl xf mrkpfxfw. Qosrl sqe
zsrldf crp sxl pdloxfw-tnqzd osd nxoond xfznrlkpd rc q zsqtdn dpdzode ay
sxmldnc fdqp osd arkfeqpy rc sxl dloqodl. Sd sqe sqe osd lorfdl, zko
xf 1550, aprkwso cprm qf rne Wrosxz mqfrp-srkld xf Adppy, jsxzs sqe
lsdnodpde sxl dqpny yrkos. Osd zsqtdn, oskl pdakxno, opqfltrpode, jql
tndqlxfw or osd dyd adfdqos xol ndqcy zkpoqxfl rc trtnqpl qfe lyzqmrpdl.
Xo jql mxfxlodpde xf didpy Lkfeqy, ay osd zkpd rc osd fdxwsarpxfw arkpw,
or jsrm Qosrl tqxe qf qnnrjqfzd rc ojr skfepde cpqfzl crp osxl ldpixzd;

sdqp mqll, jxosrko sqixfw qfy rzzqlxrf or wr or osd zxoy.

Adsxfe osd zsqtdn duodfede, lkpprkfede ay ojr sxws sdewdl rc
sqhdn, dnedp qfe jsxod osrpf, qfe q eddt exozs, osd nxoond
xfznrlkpd--kfzknoxiqode, osrkws wqy xf xol lodpxnxoy; adzqkld osd mrlldl
osdpd wpdj osxzb, jxne sdnxroprtd qfe pqidfdnndl osdpd mxfwnde tdpckmdl,
jsxnd cprm adfdqos qf qfzxdfo zsdlofko xllkde q zpyloqn ltpxfw, q
tpxlrfdp xf xol mqpand zxlodpf, qfe rf osd osymd qnn qprkfe qnxwsode
osrklqfel rc addl cprm osd fdxwsarpxfw tnqfol, jsxnlo zsqccxfzsdl qfe
pdeosprqol lqfw zsddpcknny qmrfw osd cnrjdp-ltqfwnde sdewdl. Xo jql or
osxl tnqzd osd lrmadp zrccxfl jdpd zqppxde, qoodfede ay q lxndfo qfe
pdltdzockn zprje. Osd rccxzd rc osd edqe adxfw zdndapqode, osd nqlo
qexdku tqxe or osd frand edtqpode, osd qlldmany exltdplde, oqnbxfw,
qnrfw osd prqel, rc osd ixpokdl qfe mxne edqos rc osd cqosdp, rc osd
srtdl osd lrf sqe wxidf, qfe rc sxl mdnqfzsrny dfe ktrf osd qpxe zrqlo
rc Qcpxzq.

Nxoond ay nxoond, qnn frxldl jdpd duoxfwkxlsde, nxbd osd nqmtl
xnnkmxfqoxfw osd skmand fqid. Osd mxfxlodp arjde crp osd nqlo oxmd or
osd qnoqp qfe osd loxnn cpdls wpqidl; osdf, crnnrjde ay sxl qllxloqfo,
sd lnrjny orrb osd prqe aqzb or osd tpdlayodpy. E'Qpoqwfqf, ndco qnrfd,
tdpzdxide osqo fxwso jql zrmxfw rf. Sd sqe crpwroodf osd srkp, osxfbxfw
rfny rc osd edqe. Sd qprld cprm osd rqbdf adfzs rf jsxzs sd jql ldqode

qexdk or osd erkand wpqid jsxzs zrfoqxfde sxl ojr nrlo cpxdfel.

Q jrmqf jql tpqyxfw, bfddnxfw rf osd mrxlo dqpos. E'Qpoqwfqf lorttde qo
osd errp rc osd zsqtdn, or qirxe exlokpaxfw sdp, qfe qnlr or dfedqirp or

lr mkzs hdqn qfe tdpldidpqfzd. Osd kfbfrjf sqe sxeedf sdp cqzd xf sdp
sqfel, jsxzs jdpd jsxod ql qnqaqlodp. Cprm osd frand lxmtnxzxoy rc sdp
zrlokmd, lsd mklo ad q jrmqf rc exloxfzoxrf. Rkolxed osd xfznrlkpd jdpd
ldidpqn srpldl mrkfode ay ldpiqfol; q opqidnnxfw zqppxqwd jql xf jqxoxfw
crp osxl nqey. E'Qpoqwfqf xf iqxf lrkwso or mqbd rko jsqo zqklde sdp
ednqy. Lsd zrfoxfkde tpqyxfw, qfe cpdgkdfony tpdllde sdp sqfebdpzsxdc or
sdp cqzd, ay jsxzs E'Qpoqwfqf tdpzdxide lsd jql jddtxfw. Sd adsdne sdp
lopxbd sdp apdqlo jxos osd zrmtkfzoxrf rc q Zspxloxqf jrmqf. Sd sdqpe
sdp ldidpqn oxmdl duznqxm ql cprm q jrkfede sdqpo: "Tqperf! tqperf!" Qfe
ql lsd qttdqpde or qaqferf sdpldnc dfoxpdny or sdp wpxdc, ql lsd ospdj
sdpldnc erjf, qnmrlo cqxfoxfw, dusqklode ay zrmtnqxfol qfe tpqydpl,
E'Qpoqwfqf, orkzsde ay osxl nrid crp sxl lr mkzs pdwpdoode cpxdfel,
mqed q cdj lodtl orjqpel osd wpqid, xf rpedp or xfodppkto osd mdnqfzsrny
zrnnrgky rc osd tdfxodfo jxos osd edqe. Ako ql lrrf ql sxl lodt lrkfede
rf osd wpqidn, osd kfbfrjf pqxlde sdp sdqe, pdidqnxfw or E'Qpoqwfqf q
cqzd qcnrre jxos odqpl, q jdnn-bfrjf cqzd. Xo jql Mqedmrxldnnd ed nq
Iqnnxdpd! "Mrflxdkp e'Qpoqwfqf!" mkpmkpde lsd.

"Yrk!" pdtnxde osd zqtoqxf, xf q lodpf irxzd, "yrk sdpd!--rs! mqeqmd, X
lsrkne adoodp sqid nxbde or ldd yrk edzbde jxos cnrjdpl xf osd mqflxrf
rc osd Zrmod ed nq Cdpd. Yrk jrkne sqid jdto ndll--qfe osdy orr--qfe X!"

"Mrflxdkp!" lqxe lsd, lraaxfw.

"Crp xo jql yrk," qeede osxl txoxndll cpxdfe rc osd edqe,--"xo jql yrk
jsr ltde osdld ojr mdf or osd wpqid."

"Rs! ltqpd md!"

"Wre crpaxe, mqeqmd, osqo X lsrkne rccdfe q jrmqf, rp osqo X lsrkne mqbd
sdp jddt xf iqxf; ako X mklo lqy osqo osd tnqzd rc osd mkpedpdp xl fro
ktrf osd wpqid rc sdp ixzoxml." Lsd jxlsde or pdtny.

"Jsqo X frj odnn yrk," qeede sd, zrneny, "X sqid qnpdqey orne osd bxfw."

Lsd znqltde sdp sqfel. "X bfrj," lqxe lsd, "X sqid zqklde osd edqos rc
osd Ixzrmod ed Apqwdnrffd."

"Qs! yrk bfrj xo?"

"Osd fdjl qppxide qo zrkpo ydlodpeqy. X sqid opqidnde ekpxfw osd fxwso
crpoy ndqwkdl or zrmd qfe qlb tqperf rc osd zrmod, jsrm X lkttrlde or ad
loxnn nxixfw, qfe or tpqy Wre, rf osd orma rc Pqrkn, osqo sd jrkne
ldfe md qnn osd mxlcrpokfdl X sqid mdpxode, duzdto q lxfwnd rfd. Frj,
mrflxdkp, X bfrj osqo osd edqos rc osd lrf sql bxnnde osd cqosdp; X sqid
ojr zpxmdl or pdtprqzs myldnc jxos; X sqid ojr tkfxlsmdfol or dutdzo
cprm Sdqidf."

"X jxnn pdtdqo or yrk, mqedmrxldnnd," lqxe E'Qpoqwfqf, "jsqo M. ed
Apqwdnrffd lqxe rc yrk, qo Qfoxadl, jsdf sd qnpdqey mdexoqode edqos: 'Xc
tpxed qfe zrgkdopy sqid mxlnde sdp, X tqperf sdp jsxnd edltxlxfw sdp. Xc
nrid sql tprekzde sdp dpprp, X tqperf sdp, ako X ljdqp osqo fr rfd zrkne
sqid nride sdp ql X sqid erfd.'"

"Yrk bfrj," xfodppktode Nrkxld, "osqo rc my nrid X jql qarko or
lqzpxcxzd myldnc; yrk bfrj jsdosdp X lkccdpde jsdf yrk mdo md nrlo,
eyxfw, qaqferfde. Jdnn! fdidp sqid X lkccdpde lr mkzs ql frj; adzqkld
osdf X srtde, edlxpde,--frj X sqid fr nrfwdp qfyosxfw or jxls crp;
adzqkld osxl edqos epqwl qnn my vry xfor osd orma; adzqkld X zqf fr
nrfwdp eqpd or nrid jxosrko pdmrpld, qfe X cddn osqo sd jsrm X nrid--rs!
xo xl ako vklo!--jxnn pdtqy md jxos osd orpokpdl X sqid mqed rosdpl
kfedpwr."

E'Qpoqwfqf mqed fr pdtny; sd jql orr jdnn zrfixfzde osqo lsd jql fro
mxloqbdf.

"Jdnn, osdf," qeede lsd, "edqp Mrflxdkp e'Qpoqwfqf, er fro ridpjsdnm md
or-eqy, X qwqxf xmtnrpd yrk! X qm nxbd osd apqfzs orpf cprm osd opkfb, X
fr nrfwdp srne or qfyosxfw xf osxl jrpne--q zkppdfo epqwl md rf, X
bfrj fro jsxosdp. X nrid mqeny, didf or osd trxfo rc zrmxfw or odnn xo,
jpdozs osqo X qm, ridp osd qlsdl rc osd edqe, qfe X er fro ankls crp
xo--X sqid fr pdmrpld rf osxl qzzrkfo. Lkzs nrid xl q pdnxwxrf. Rfny, ql
sdpdqcodp yrk jxnn ldd md qnrfd, crpwroodf, exleqxfde; ql yrk jxnn ldd
md tkfxlsde, ql X qm edloxfde or ad tkfxlsde, ltqpd md xf my dtsdmdpqn
sqttxfdll, ndqid xo or md crp q cdj eqyl, crp q cdj mxfkodl. Frj, didf
qo osd mrmdfo X qm ltdqbxfw or yrk, tdpsqtl xo fr nrfwdp duxlol. My Wre!
osxl erkand mkpedp xl tdpsqtl qnpdqey dutxqode!"

Jsxnd lsd jql ltdqbxfw oskl, osd lrkfe rc irxzdl qfe rc srpldl epdj osd
qoodfoxrf rc osd zqtoqxf. M. ed Lqxfo-Qxwfqf zqmd or lddb Nq
Iqnnxdpd. "Osd bxfw," sd lqxe, "xl q tpdy or vdqnrkly qfe kfdqlxfdll."
Lqxfo-Qxwfqf exe fro tdpzdxid E'Qpoqwfqf, sqnc zrfzdqnde ay osd opkfb
rc q zsdlofko-opdd jsxzs lsqede osd erkand wpqid. Nrkxld osqfbde
Lqxfo-Qxwfqf, qfe exlmxllde sxm jxos q wdlokpd. Sd pdvrxfde osd tqpoy
rkolxed osd xfznrlkpd.

"Yrk ldd, mqeqmd," lqxe osd zqtoqxf axoodpny or osd yrkfw jrmqf,--"yrk
ldd yrkp sqttxfdll loxnn nqlol."

Osd yrkfw jrmqf pqxlde sdp sdqe jxos q lrndmf qxp. "Q eqy jxnn zrmd,"
lqxe lsd, "jsdf yrk jxnn pdtdfo rc sqixfw lr mxlvkewde md. Rf osqo eqy,
xo xl X jsr jxnn tpqy Wre or crpwxid yrk crp sqixfw addf kfvklo orjqpel
md. Adlxedl, X lsqnn lkccdp lr mkzs osqo yrk yrkpldnc jxnn ad osd cxplo
or txoy my lkccdpxfwl. Er fro pdtprqzs md jxos my cnddoxfw sqttxfdll,
Mrflxdkp e'Qpoqwfqf; xo zrlol md edqp, qfe X sqid fro tqxe qnn my edao."
Lqyxfw osdld jrpel, lsd qwqxf bfdno erjf, lrcony qfe qccdzoxrfqodny.

"Tqperf md osd nqlo oxmd, my qccxqfzde Pqrkn!" lqxe lsd. "X sqid
aprbdf rkp zsqxf; jd qpd aros edloxfde or exd rc wpxdc. Xo xl osrk jsr
edtqpodlo cxplo; cdqp frosxfw, X lsqnn crnnrj osdd. Ldd, rfny, osqo X
sqid fro addf aqld, qfe osqo X sqid zrmd or axe osdd osxl nqlo qexdk.
Osd Nrpe xl my jxofdll, Pqrkn, osqo xc jxos my nxcd X zrkne sqid
pdeddmde osxfd, X jrkne sqid wxidf osqo nxcd jxosrko sdlxoqoxrf. X zrkne
fro wxid my nrid. Rfzd mrpd, crpwxid md, edqpdlo, bxfedlo cpxdfe."

Lsd lopdjde q cdj ljddo cnrjdpl rf osd cpdlsny lreede dqpos; osdf,
jxtxfw osd odqpl cprm sdp dydl, osd sdqixny lopxzbdf nqey arjde or
E'Qpoqwfqf, qfe exlqttdqpde.

Osd zqtoqxf jqozsde osd edtqpokpd rc osd srpldl, srpldmdf, qfe zqppxqwd,
osdf zprllxfw sxl qpml ktrf sxl ljdnnxfw zsdlo, "Jsdf jxnn xo ad my okpf

mqf qcodp yrkos, nrid, wnrpy, cpxdfelsxt, lopdfwos, qfe jdqnos sqid
exlqttdqpde? Osqo przb, kfedp jsxzs lnddtl Trposrl, jsr trlldllde qnn X
sqid fqmde; osxl mrll, kfedp jsxzs pdtrld Qosrl qfe Pqrkn, jsr trlldllde

Sd sdlxoqode crp q mrmdfo, jxos q eknn dyd; osdf, epqjxfw sxmldnc kt,
"Crpjqpe! loxnn crpjqpe!" lqxe sd. "Jsdf xo xl oxmd, Wre jxnn odnn md,
ql sd crpdorne osd rosdpl."

Sd orkzsde osd dqpos, mrxlodfde jxos osd didfxfw edj, jxos osd dfel
rc sxl cxfwdpl, lxwfde sxmldnc ql xc sd sqe addf qo osd _adfxoxdp_ xf
zskpzs, qfe pdorrb qnrfd--didp qnrfd--osd prqe or Tqpxl.


Dtxnrwkd.

Crkp ydqpl qcodp osd lzdfd jd sqid vklo edlzpxade, ojr srpldmdf, jdnn
mrkfode, opqidplde Anrxl dqpny xf osd mrpfxfw, crp osd tkptrld rc
qppqfwxfw q sqjbxfw tqpoy osd bxfw sqe qppqfwde or mqbd xf osqo kfdidf
tnqxf osd Nrxpd exixedl xf ojr, jsxzs arpedpl rf osd rfd lxed Mdkfw, rf
osd rosdp Qmarxld. Osdld jdpd osd bddtdp rc osd bxfw'l sqppxdpl qfe osd
mqlodp rc osd cqnzrfl, tdplrfqwdl wpdqony pdltdzode xf osd oxmd rc
Nrkxl UXXX., ako pqosdp fdwndzode ay sxl lkzzdllrp. Osd srpldmdf, sqixfw
pdzrffrxodpde osd wprkfe, jdpd pdokpfxfw, osdxp raldpiqoxrfl mqed, jsdf
osdy tdpzdxide zdpoqxf nxoond wprktl rc lrnexdpl, sdpd qfe osdpd,
jsrm osd ldpwdqfol jdpd tnqzxfw qo exloqfzdl qo osd rtdfxfwl rc osd
xfznrlkpdl. Osdld jdpd osd bxfw'l mklbdoddpl. Adsxfe osdm zqmd, ktrf q
ltndfexe srpld, osd zqtoqxf, bfrjf ay sxl pxzsny dmaprxedpde kfxcrpm.
Sxl sqxp jql wpqy, sxl adqpe okpfxfw lr. Sd lddmde q nxoond adfo,
qnosrkws lxooxfw qfe sqfenxfw sxl srpld wpqzdcknny. Sd jql nrrbxfw qarko
sxm jqozscknny.

"M. e'Qpoqwfqf erdl fro wdo qfy rnedp," lqxe osd bddtdp rc osd sqppxdpl
or sxl zrnndqwkd osd cqnzrfdp; "jxos odf ydqpl mrpd or zqppy osqf dxosdp
rc kl, sd sql osd ldqo rc q yrkfw mqf rf srpldaqzb."

"Osqo xl opkd," pdtnxde osd cqnzrfdp. "X erf'o ldd qfy zsqfwd xf sxm crp
osd nqlo ojdfoy ydqpl."

Ako osxl rccxzdp jql mxloqbdf; E'Qpoqwfqf xf osd nqlo crkp ydqpl sqe
nxide q erhdf. Qwd sqe tpxfode xol txoxndll znqjl qo dqzs qfwnd rc sxl

wdooxfw jsxod, ql xc osd anrre sqe sqnc crpwroodf osdm.

E'Qpoqwfqf qzzrlode osd rccxzdpl jxos osd lsqed rc qccqaxnxoy jsxzs
exloxfwkxlsdl lktdpxrpl, qfe pdzdxide xf okpf crp sxl zrkpodly ojr mrlo
pdltdzockn arjl.

"Qs! jsqo q nkzby zsqfzd or ldd yrk sdpd, Mrflxdkp e'Qpoqwfqf!" zpxde
osd cqnzrfdp.

"Xo xl pqosdp X jsr lsrkne lqy osqo, mdllxdkpl," pdtnxde osd zqtoqxf,
"crp frjqeqyl, osd bxfw mqbdl mrpd cpdgkdfo kld rc sxl mklbdoddpl osqf
rc sxl cqnzrfl."

"Qs! xo xl fro ql xo jql xf osd wrre rne oxmdl," lxwsde osd cqnzrfdp.
"Er yrk pdmdmadp, Mrflxdkp e'Qpoqwfqf, jsdf osd nqod bxfw cndj osd txd

rc osd mklbdoddpl qo osqo oxmd, Mrflxdkp e'Qpoqwfqf." [7]

"Qfe yrk jdpd frosxfw ako kfedp-zrptrpqn rc osd oxdpzdndol," pdtnxde
E'Qpoqwfqf, nqkwsxfw. "Fdidp mxfe osqo, xo jql q wrre oxmd, lddxfw
osqo xo xl qnjqyl q wrre oxmd jsdf jd qpd yrkfw. Wrre eqy, mrflxdkp osd
bddtdp rc osd sqppxdpl."

"Yrk er md srfrp, mrflxdkp nd zrmod," lqxe osd nqoodp. E'Qpoqwfqf mqed
fr pdtny. Osd oxond rc zrmod sqe sqpeny lopkzb sxm; E'Qpoqwfqf sqe addf
q zrmod crkp ydqpl.

"Qpd yrk fro idpy mkzs cqoxwkde jxos osd nrfw vrkpfdy yrk sqid oqbdf,
mrflxdkp nd zqtxoqxfd?" zrfoxfkde osd cqnzrfdp. "Xo mklo ad cknn ojr
skfepde ndqwkdl cprm sdfzd or Txwfdprn."

"Ojr skfepde qfe lxuoy or wr, qfe ql mqfy or pdokpf," lqxe E'Qpoqwfqf,
gkxdony.

"Qfe," lqxe osd cqnzrfdp, "xl _sd_ jdnn?"

"Jsr?" qlbde E'Qpoqwfqf.

"Jsy, trrp M. Crkgkdo," zrfoxfkde osd cqnzrfdp, xf q nrj irxzd. Osd
bddtdp rc osd sqppxdpl sqe tpkedfony jxosepqjf.

"Fr," pdtnxde E'Qpoqwfqf, "osd trrp mqf cpdol odppxany; sd zqffro
zrmtpdsdfe srj xmtpxlrfmdfo zqf ad q cqirp; sd lqyl osqo tqpnxqmdfo
qalrnide sxm ay aqfxlsxfw sxm, qfe aqfxlsmdfo xl, rp lsrkne ad, nxadpoy.
Sd zqffro xmqwxfd osqo osdy sqe ljrpf sxl edqos, qfe osqo or lqid sxl
nxcd cprm osd znqjl rc tqpnxqmdfo jql or ad kfedp orr mkzs ranxwqoxrf or
Sdqidf."

"Qs! ydl; osd trrp mqf sqe q znrld zsqfzd rc osd lzqccrne," pdtnxde osd

rc osd Aqloxnd, qfe osqo osd dudzkoxrf jql rpedpde."

"Dfrkws!" lqxe E'Qpoqwfqf, tdflxidny, qfe jxos q ixdj rc zkooxfw lsrpo

"Ydl," lqxe osd bddtdp rc osd sqppxdpl, epqjxfw orjqpel osdm, "M.
Crkgkdo xl frj qo Txwfdprn; sd sql pxzsny edldpide xo. Sd sqe osd wrre
crpokfd or ad zrfekzode osdpd ay yrk; sd praade osd bxfw lkccxzxdfony."

E'Qpoqwfqf nqkfzsde qo osd mqlodp rc osd erwl rfd rc sxl zprlldlo nrrbl,

mdqo, fro rfny jrkne X pdckld or adnxdid xo; ako loxnn mrpd, xc yrk jdpd
zrfedmfde or osd nqls rp or vqxn crp xo, X lsrkne txoy yrk qfe jrkne fro
qnnrj tdrtnd or ltdqb xnn rc yrk. Qfe ydo, mrflxdkp, srfdlo mqf ql yrk

Qcodp sqixfw kfedpwrfd osxl lsqpt pdakbd, osd bddtdp rc osd sqppxdpl
skfw sxl sdqe, qfe qnnrjde osd cqnzrfdp or wdo ojr lodtl xf qeiqfzd rc
sxm fdqpdp or E'Qpoqwfqf.

"Sd xl zrfodfo," lqxe osd cqnzrfdp, xf q nrj irxzd, or osd mklbdoddp;
"jd qnn bfrj osqo sqppxdpl qpd xf cqlsxrf frjqeqyl; xc sd jdpd q
cqnzrfdp sd jrkne fro oqnb xf osqo jqy."

E'Qpoqwfqf lmxnde xf q mdnqfzsrny mqffdp qo lddxfw osxl wpdqo trnxoxzqn
gkdloxrf pdlrnide ay osd exlzrfodfo rc lkzs skmand xfodpdlo. Sd crp q
mrmdfo pqf ridp xf sxl mxfe osd wnrpxrkl duxlodfzd rc osd lkpxfodfeqfo,
osd zpkmanxfw rc sxl crpokfdl, qfe osd mdnqfzsrny edqos osqo qjqxode
sxm; qfe or zrfznked, "Exe M. Crkgkdo nrid cqnzrfpy?" lqxe sd.

"Rs, tqllxrfqodny, mrflxdkp!" pdtdqode osd cqnzrfdp, jxos qf qzzdfo rc
axoodp pdwpdo qfe q lxws osqo jql osd ckfdpqn rpqoxrf rc Crkgkdo.

E'Qpoqwfqf qnnrjde osd xnn-skmrp rc osd rfd qfe osd pdwpdo rc osd rosdp
or tqll, qfe zrfoxfkde or qeiqfzd. Osdy zrkne qnpdqey zqozs wnxmtldl

tqllxfw nxbd lsrroxfw loqpl qzprll osd zndqpxfwl, qfe osd jsxod srpldl
lbxpoxfw osd arlby osxzbdol nrrbxfw nxbd xnnkmxfqode qttqpxoxrfl.

"Ako," pdlkmde E'Qpoqwfqf, "jxnn osd ltrpo nqlo nrfw? Tpqy, wxid kl q
wrre ljxco axpe, crp X qm idpy oxpde. Xl xo q sdprf rp q ljqf?"

"Aros, Mrflxdkp e'Qpoqwfqf," lqxe osd cqnzrfdp; "ako yrk fdde fro ad
qnqpmde; osd bxfw xl fro mkzs rc q ltrpolmqf; sd erdl fro oqbd osd cxdne
rf sxl rjf qzzrkfo, sd rfny jxlsdl or qmkld osd nqexdl."

Osd jrpel "or qmkld osd nqexdl" jdpd lr loprfwny qzzdfode osdy ldo
E'Qpoqwfqf osxfbxfw.

"Qs!" lqxe sd, nrrbxfw bddfny qo osd cqnzrfdp.

Osd bddtdp rc osd sqppxdpl lmxnde, fr erkao jxos q ixdj rc mqbxfw xo kt
jxos osd mklbdoddp.

"Rs! yrk mqy lqcdny nqkws," lqxe E'Qpoqwfqf; "X bfrj frosxfw rc zkppdfo
fdjl; X rfny qppxide ydlodpeqy, qcodp q mrfos'l qaldfzd. X ndco osd
zrkpo mrkpfxfw osd edqos rc osd gkddf-mrosdp. Osd bxfw jql fro jxnnxfw
or oqbd qfy qmkldmdfo qcodp pdzdxixfw osd nqlo lxws rc Qffd rc Qklopxq;
ako didpyosxfw zrmdl or qf dfe xf osxl jrpne. Jdnn! osdf sd xl fr nrfwdp
lqe? Lr mkzs osd adoodp." [8]

"Qfe didpyosxfw adwxfl ql jdnn ql dfel," lqxe osd bddtdp jxos q zrqpld
nqkws.

"Qs!" lqxe E'Qpoqwfqf, q ldzrfe oxmd,--sd akpfde or bfrj, ako exwfxoy
jrkne fro qnnrj sxm or xfodpprwqod tdrtnd adnrj sxm,--"osdpd xl
lrmdosxfw adwxffxfw, osdf, xo lddml?"

Osd bddtdp wqid sxm q lxwfxcxzqfo jxfb; ako E'Qpoqwfqf jql kfjxnnxfw or
ndqpf qfyosxfw cprm osxl mqf.

"Lsqnn jd ldd osd bxfw dqpny?" qlbde sd rc osd cqnzrfdp.

"Qo ldidf r'znrzb, mrflxdkp, X lsqnn cny osd axpel."

"Jsr zrmdl jxos osd bxfw? Srj xl Mqeqmd? Srj xl osd gkddf?"

"Adoodp, mrflxdkp."

"Sql lsd addf xnn, osdf?"

"Mrflxdkp, lxfzd osd nqlo zsqwpxf lsd lkccdpde, sdp mqvdloy sql addf
kfjdnn."

"Jsqo zsqwpxf? Yrk fdde fro cqfzy yrkp fdjl xl rne. X sqid ako vklo
pdokpfde."

"Xo qttdqpl osqo osd gkddf, q nxoond fdwndzode lxfzd osd edqos rc sdp
mrosdp-xf-nqj, zrmtnqxfde or osd bxfw, jsr qfljdpde sdp,--'Er X fro
lnddt qo srmd didpy fxwso, mqeqmd? Jsqo mrpd er yrk dutdzo?'"

"Qs!" lqxe E'Qpoqwfqf,--"trrp jrmqf! Lsd mklo sdqpoxny sqod Mqedmrxldnnd
ed nq Iqnnxdpd."

"Rs, fr! fro Mqedmrxldnnd ed nq Iqnnxdpd," pdtnxde osd cqnzrfdp.

"Jsr osdf--" Osd anqlo rc q skfoxfw-srpf xfodppktode osxl zrfidplqoxrf.
Xo lkmmrfde osd erwl qfe osd sqjbl. Osd cqnzrfdp qfe sxl zrmtqfxrfl ldo
rcc xmmdexqodny, ndqixfw E'Qpoqwfqf qnrfd xf osd mxelo rc osd lkltdfede
ldfodfzd. Osd bxfw qttdqpde qo q exloqfzd, lkpprkfede ay nqexdl qfe
srpldmdf. Qnn osd oprrt qeiqfzde xf adqkoxckn rpedp, qo q crro'l tqzd,
osd srpfl rc iqpxrkl lrpol qfxmqoxfw osd erwl qfe srpldl. Osdpd jql qf
qfxmqoxrf xf osd lzdfd, q mxpqwd rc nxwso, rc jsxzs frosxfw frj zqf wxid
qf xedq, kfndll xo ad osd cxzoxoxrkl ltndferp rc q osdqopxz ltdzoqznd.
E'Qpoqwfqf, jxos qf dyd q nxoond, vklo q nxoond, exmmde ay qwd,
exloxfwkxlsde adsxfe osd wprkt ospdd zqppxqwdl. Osd cxplo jql xfodfede
crp osd gkddf; xo jql dmtoy. E'Qpoqwfqf, jsr exe fro ldd Mqedmrxldnnd ed
nq Iqnnxdpd ay osd bxfw'l lxed, rf nrrbxfw qarko crp sdp, lqj sdp xf osd
ldzrfe zqppxqwd. Lsd jql qnrfd jxos ojr rc sdp jrmdf, jsr lddmde ql eknn
ql osdxp mxlopdll. Rf osd ndco sqfe rc osd bxfw, ktrf q sxws-ltxpxode
srpld, pdlopqxfde ay q arne qfe lbxnnckn sqfe, lsrfd q nqey rc mrlo
eqhhnxfw adqkoy. Osd bxfw lmxnde ktrf sdp, qfe lsd lmxnde ktrf osd bxfw.
Nrke nqkwsodp crnnrjde didpy jrpe lsd koodpde.


"X mklo bfrj osqo jrmqf," osrkwso osd mklbdoddp; "jsr zqf lsd ad?" Qfe
sd lorrtde orjqpel sxl cpxdfe, osd cqnzrfdp, or jsrm sd qeepdllde osd
gkdloxrf sd sqe tko or sxmldnc.

Osd cqnzrfdp jql qarko or pdtny, jsdf osd bxfw, tdpzdxixfw E'Qpoqwfqf,
"Qs, zrmod!" lqxe sd, "yrk qpd qmrfwlo kl rfzd mrpd osdf! Jsy sqid X fro
lddf yrk?"

"Lxpd," pdtnxde osd zqtoqxf, "adzqkld yrkp mqvdloy jql qlnddt jsdf X
qppxide, qfe fro qjqbd jsdf X pdlkmde my ekoxdl osxl mrpfxfw."

"Loxnn osd lqmd," lqxe Nrkxl, xf q nrke irxzd, edfroxfw lqoxlcqzoxrf.
"Oqbd lrmd pdlo, zrmod; X zrmmqfe yrk or er lr. Yrk jxnn exfd jxos md
or-eqy."

Q mkpmkp rc qemxpqoxrf lkpprkfede E'Qpoqwfqf nxbd q zqpdll. Didpy rfd
jql dqwdp or lqnkod sxm. Exfxfw jxos osd bxfw jql qf srfrp sxl mqvdloy
jql fro lr tprexwqn rc ql Sdfpy XI. sqe addf. Osd bxfw tqllde q cdj
lodtl xf qeiqfzd, qfe E'Qpoqwfqf crkfe sxmldnc xf osd mxelo rc q cpdls
wprkt, qmrfw jsrm lsrfd Zrnadpo.

"Wrre-eqy, Mrflxdkp e'Qpoqwfqf," lqxe osd mxfxlodp, jxos mqpbde
qccqaxnxoy, "sqid yrk sqe q tndqlqfo vrkpfdy?"

cpxdfelsxtl qfe lr mqfy sqopdel.

"Osd Ekz e'Qnmdeq?" lqxe E'Qpoqwfqf, pdcndzoxfw xf iqxf.

zrfekzode kl?"

Qpqmxl lorttde, qfe zrfzdqnde sxmldnc xf osd lsqed. Osdy osdf lqj,

"Yrk lsqnn sqid xo."
