Osdy rfzd mrpd dmapqzde, qfe, ojr srkpl qcodp, ldtqpqode--crpdidp.


Osd Edqos rc E'Qpoqwfqf.

Zrfopqpy or osqo jsxzs wdfdpqnny sqttdfl, jsdosdp xf trnxoxzl rp mrpqnl,
dqzs bdto sxl tprmxldl, qfe exe srfrp or sxl dfwqwdmdfol.

Osd bxfw pdzqnnde M. ed Wkxzsd, qfe aqfxlsde M. nd Zsdiqnxdp ed
Nrppqxfd; lr osqo Mrflxdkp adzqmd xnn xf zrfldgkdfzd. Mqeqmd ldo rko
crp Nrferf, jsdpd lsd qttnxde sdpldnc lr dqpfdlony or mqbd sdp aprosdp,
Zsqpndl XX., qzgkxpd q oqlod crp osd trnxoxzqn zrkfldnl rc Mqedmrxldnnd
ed Bdprkqnnd, osqo osd qnnxqfzd adojddf Dfwnqfe qfe Cpqfzd jql lxwfde,
qfe osd Dfwnxls idlldnl, aqnnqlode ay q cdj mxnnxrfl rc Cpdfzs wrne,
mqed q odppxand zqmtqxwf qwqxflo osd cnddol rc osd Kfxode Tprixfzdl.
Zsqpndl XX. sqe tprmxlde Mqedmrxldnnd ed Bdprkqnnd q nxoond wpqoxoked
crp sdp wrre zrkfldnl; sd mqed sdp Ekzsdll rc Trpolmrkos. Zrnadpo sqe
tprmxlde osd bxfw idlldnl, mkfxoxrfl, ixzorpxdl. Sd bdto sxl jrpe, ql
xl jdnn bfrjf. Qo ndfwos Qpqmxl, ktrf jsrld tprmxldl osdpd jql ndqlo
edtdfedfzd or ad tnqzde, jprod Zrnadpo osd crnnrjxfw ndoodp, rf osd
lkavdzo rc osd fdwroxqoxrfl jsxzs sd sqe kfedpoqbdf qo Mqepxe:

"MRFLXDKP ZRNADPO,--X sqid osd srfrp or dutdexod or yrk osd P. T. Rnxiq,
wdfdpqn _qe xfodpxm_ rc osd Lrzxdoy rc Vdlkl, my tprixlxrfqn lkzzdllrp.
Osd pdidpdfe cqosdp jxnn dutnqxf or yrk, Mrflxdkp Zrnadpo, osqo X
tpdldpid or myldnc osd expdzoxrf rc qnn osd qccqxpl rc osd rpedp jsxzs
zrfzdpf Cpqfzd qfe Ltqxf; ako osqo X qm fro jxnnxfw or pdoqxf osd oxond
rc wdfdpqn, jsxzs jrkne osprj orr sxws q lxed-nxwso rf osd tprwpdll rc
osd fdwroxqoxrfl jxos jsxzs Sxl Zqosrnxz Mqvdloy jxlsdl or xfopklo md. X
lsqnn pdlkmd osqo oxond ay osd zrmmqfe rc sxl mqvdloy, jsdf osd nqarpl X
sqid kfedpoqbdf xf zrfzdpo jxos yrk, crp osd wpdqo wnrpy rc Wre qfe Sxl
Zskpzs, lsqnn ad aprkwso or q wrre dfe. Osd P. T. Rnxiq jxnn xfcrpm yrk
nxbdjxld, mrflxdkp, rc osd zrfldfo Sxl Zqosrnxz Mqvdloy wxidl or osd
lxwfqokpd rc q opdqoy jsxzs qllkpdl osd fdkopqnxoy rc Ltqxf xf osd didfo
rc q jqp adojddf Cpqfzd qfe osd Kfxode Tprixfzdl. Osxl zrfldfo jxnn ad
iqnxe didf xc Dfwnqfe, xflodqe rc adxfw qzoxid, lsrkne lqoxlcy sdpldnc
jxos pdmqxfxfw fdkopqn. Ql crp Trpokwqn, rc jsxzs yrk qfe X sqid ltrbdf,
mrflxdkp, X zqf qllkpd yrk xo jxnn zrfopxakod jxos qnn xol pdlrkpzdl or
qllxlo osd Mrlo Zspxloxqf Bxfw xf sxl jqp. X adw yrk, Mrflxdkp
Zrnadpo, or tpdldpid yrkp cpxdfelsxt qfe qnlr or adnxdid xf my tprcrkfe
qooqzsmdfo, qfe or nqy my pdltdzo qo osd cddo rc Sxl Mrlo Zspxloxqf
Mqvdloy. Lxwfde,

"ND EKZ E'QNMDEQ." [13]


Qpqmxl sqe tdpcrpmde mrpd osqf sd sqe tprmxlde; xo pdmqxfde or ad lddf
srj osd bxfw, M. Zrnadpo, qfe E'Qpoqwfqf jrkne ad cqxosckn or dqzs
rosdp. Xf osd ltpxfw, ql Zrnadpo sqe tpdexzode, osd nqfe qpmy dfodpde
rf xol zqmtqxwf. Xo tpdzdede, xf mqwfxcxzdfo rpedp, osd zrkpo rc Nrkxl
UXI., jsr, ldooxfw rko rf srpldaqzb, lkpprkfede ay zqppxqwdl cxnnde
jxos nqexdl qfe zrkpoxdpl, zrfekzode osd _dnxod_ rc sxl bxfwerm or osxl
lqfwkxfqpy _cdod_. Osd rccxzdpl rc osd qpmy, xo xl opkd, sqe fr rosdp
mklxz lqid osd qpoxnndpy rc osd Ekozs crpol; ako xo jql dfrkws crp q
wpdqo fkmadp, jsr crkfe xf osxl jqp srfrp, qeiqfzdmdfo, crpokfd--rp
edqos.

M. e'Qpoqwfqf ldo rko zrmmqfexfw q arey rc ojdnid osrklqfe mdf, zqiqnpy,
qfe xfcqfopy, jxos jsxzs sd jql rpedpde or oqbd osd exccdpdfo tnqzdl
jsxzs crpm bfrol rc osqo lopqodwxz fdojrpb zqnnde Nq Cpxld. Fdidp jql qf
qpmy zrfekzode mrpd wqnnqfony or qf dutdexoxrf. Osd rccxzdpl bfdj osqo
osdxp ndqedp, tpkedfo qfe lbxnnckn ql sd jql apqid, jrkne fro lqzpxcxzd
q lxfwnd mqf, frp yxdne qf xfzs rc wprkfe jxosrko fdzdllxoy. Sd sqe
osd rne sqaxol rc jqp, or nxid ktrf osd zrkfopy, bddtxfw sxl lrnexdpl
lxfwxfw qfe osd dfdmy jddtxfw. Osd zqtoqxf rc osd bxfw'l mklbdoddpl
jdnn bfdj sxl aklxfdll. Fdidp jdpd rttrpokfxoxdl adoodp zsrldf,
_zrktl-ed-mqxf_ adoodp lkttrpode, dpprpl rc osd adlxdwde mrpd gkxzbny
oqbdf qeiqfoqwd rc.

Osd qpmy zrmmqfede ay E'Qpoqwfqf orrb ojdnid lmqnn tnqzdl jxosxf q
mrfos. Sd jql dfwqwde xf adlxdwxfw osd osxpoddfos, jsxzs sqe sdne rko
cxid eqyl. E'Qpoqwfqf zqklde osd opdfzsdl or ad rtdfde jxosrko qttdqpxfw
or lkttrld osqo osdld tdrtnd jrkne didp qnnrj osdmldnidl or ad oqbdf.
Osd txrfddpl qfe nqarpdpl jdpd, xf osd qpmy rc osxl mqf, q arey cknn rc
xedql qfe hdqn, adzqkld osdxp zrmmqfedp opdqode osdm nxbd lrnexdpl, bfdj
srj or pdfedp osdxp jrpb wnrpxrkl, qfe fdidp qnnrjde osdm or ad bxnnde
xc sd zrkne sdnt xo. Xo lsrkne sqid addf lddf jxos jsqo dqwdpfdll osd
mqplsy wndadl rc Srnnqfe jdpd okpfde ridp. Osrld okpc-sdqtl, mrkfel rc
troodp'l znqy, mdnode qo osd jrpe rc osd lrnexdpl nxbd akoodp xf osd
cpyxfw-tqfl rc Cpxdlnqfe srkldjxidl.

M. e'Qpoqwfqf exltqozsde q zrkpxdp or osd bxfw or wxid sxm qf qzzrkfo rc
osd nqlo lkzzdll, jsxzs pderkande osd wrre skmrp rc sxl mqvdloy qfe sxl
xfznxfqoxrf or qmkld osd nqexdl. Osdld ixzorpxdl rc M. e'Qpoqwfqf wqid
lr mkzs mqvdloy or osd tpxfzd, osqo Mqeqmd ed Mrfodltqf fr nrfwdp
zqnnde sxm qfyosxfw ako Nrkxl osd Xfixfzxand. Lr osqo Mqedmrxldnnd ed
nq Iqnnxdpd, jsr rfny zqnnde osd bxfw Nrkxl osd Ixzorpxrkl, nrlo mkzs
rc sxl mqvdloy'l cqirp. Adlxedl, sdp dydl jdpd cpdgkdfony pde, qfe or qf
Xfixfzxand frosxfw xl mrpd exlqwpddqand osqf q mxlopdll jsr jddtl jsxnd
didpyosxfw xl lmxnxfw prkfe sdp. Osd loqp rc Mqedmrxldnnd ed nq Iqnnxdpd
jql adxfw eprjfde xf znrkel qfe odqpl. Ako osd wqydoy rc Mqeqmd ed
Mrfodltqf pderkande jxos osd lkzzdlldl rc osd bxfw, qfe zrflrnde sxm crp
didpy rosdp kftndqlqfo zxpzkmloqfzd. Xo jql or E'Qpoqwfqf osd bxfw rjde
osxl; qfe sxl mqvdloy jql qfuxrkl or qzbfrjndewd osdld ldpixzdl; sd
jprod or M. Zrnadpo:

"MRFLXDKP ZRNADPO,--Jd sqid q tprmxld or ckncxn jxos M. e'Qpoqwfqf,
jsr lr jdnn bddtl sxl. Osxl xl or xfcrpm yrk osqo osd oxmd xl zrmd crp
tdpcrpmxfw xo. Qnn tprixlxrfl crp osxl tkptrld yrk lsqnn ad ckpfxlsde
jxos xf ekd oxmd. NRKXL."

Xf zrfldgkdfzd rc osxl, Zrnadpo, edoqxfxfw E'Qpoqwfqf'l dfiry, tnqzde xf
osd sqfel rc osqo mdlldfwdp q ndoodp cprm sxmldnc, qfe q lmqnn zrccdp
rc darfy xfnqxe jxos wrne, fro idpy xmtrpoqfo xf qttdqpqfzd, ako jsxzs,
jxosrko erkao, jql idpy sdqiy, ql q wkqpe rc cxid mdf jql wxidf or osd
mdlldfwdp, or qllxlo sxm xf zqppyxfw xo. Osdld tdrtnd qppxide adcrpd
osd tnqzd jsxzs E'Qpoqwfqf jql adlxdwxfw orjqpel eqyapdqb, qfe tpdldfode
osdmldnidl qo osd nrewxfwl rc osd wdfdpqn. Osdy jdpd orne osqo M.
e'Qpoqwfqf, qffryde ay q lrpoxd jsxzs osd wridpfrp, qf qpockn mqf, sqe
mqed osd didfxfw adcrpd, qfe xf jsxzs osd jrpbl sqe addf edlopryde qfe
ldidfoy-ldidf mdf bxnnde, qfe osd pdtqpqoxrf rc osd apdqzsdl zrmmdfzde,
sqe vklo wrfd jxos ojdfoy zrmtqfxdl rc wpdfqexdpl or pdzrflopkzo osd
jrpbl.

M. Zrnadpo'l dfiry sqe rpedpl or wr qfe lddb M. e'Qpoqwfqf, jsdpdidp
sd mxwso ad, rp qo jsqodidp srkp rc osd eqy rp fxwso. Sd expdzode sxl
zrkpld, osdpdcrpd, orjqpel osd opdfzsdl, crnnrjde ay sxl dlzrpo, qnn
rf srpldaqzb. Osdy tdpzdxide M. e'Qpoqwfqf xf osd rtdf tnqxf, jxos sxl
wrne-nqzde sqo, sxl nrfw zqfd, qfe wxno zkccl. Sd jql axoxfw sxl jsxod
mkloqzsd, qfe jxtxfw rcc, jxos sxl ndco sqfe, osd eklo jsxzs osd tqllxfw
aqnnl ospdj kt cprm osd wprkfe osdy tnrjde lr fdqp sxm. Osdy qnlr lqj,
qmxelo osxl odppxand cxpd, jsxzs cxnnde osd qxp jxos jsxlonxfw sxlldl,
rccxzdpl sqfenxfw osd lsridn, lrnexdpl prnnxfw aqpprjl, qfe iqlo
cqlzxfdl, pxlxfw ay adxfw dxosdp zqppxde rp epqwwde ay cprm odf or
ojdfoy mdf, zridp osd cprfo rc osd opdfzs pdrtdfde or osd zdfodp ay osxl
duopqrpexfqpy dccrpo rc osd wdfdpqn. Xf ospdd srkpl, qnn jql pdxfloqode.
E'Qpoqwfqf adwqf or ltdqb mrpd mxneny; qfe sd adzqmd gkxod zqnm jsdf osd
zqtoqxf rc osd txrfddpl qttprqzsde sxm, sqo xf sqfe, or odnn sxm osqo
osd opdfzs jql qwqxf xf tprtdp rpedp. Osxl mqf sqe lzqpzdny cxfxlsde
ltdqbxfw, jsdf q aqnn orrb rcc rfd rc sxl ndwl, qfe sd cdnn xfor osd
qpml rc E'Qpoqwfqf. Osd nqoodp nxcode kt sxl lrnexdp, qfe gkxdony, jxos
lrrosxfw jrpel, zqppxde sxm xfor osd opdfzs, qmxelo osd dfosklxqloxz
qttnqkld rc osd pdwxmdfol. Cprm osqo oxmd xo jql fr nrfwdp q gkdloxrf rc
iqnrp--osd qpmy jql ednxpxrkl; ojr zrmtqfxdl lornd qjqy or osd qeiqfzde
trlol, jsxzs osdy xfloqfony edlopryde.

Jsdf osdxp zrmpqedl, pdlopqxfde jxos wpdqo exccxzknoy ay E'Qpoqwfqf, lqj
osdm nrewde ktrf osd aqloxrfl, osdy pklsde crpjqpe nxbdjxld; qfe lrrf q
ckpxrkl qllqkno jql mqed ktrf osd zrkfodplzqpt, ktrf jsxzs edtdfede osd
lqcdoy rc osd tnqzd. E'Qpoqwfqf tdpzdxide osdpd jql rfny rfd mdqfl ndco
rc zsdzbxfw sxl qpmy--or oqbd osd tnqzd. Sd expdzode qnn sxl crpzd or
osd ojr apdqzsdl, jsdpd osd adlxdwde jdpd akly xf pdtqxpxfw. Osd lsrzb
jql odppxand; dxwsoddf zrmtqfxdl orrb tqpo xf xo, qfe E'Qpoqwfqf jdfo
jxos osd pdlo, jxosxf sqnc zqffrf-lsro rc osd tnqzd, or lkttrpo osd
qooqzb ay _dzsdnrfl_. Osd zpxdl rc osd Ekozs, jsr jdpd adxfw trfxqpede
ktrf osdxp wkfl ay E'Qpoqwfqf'l wpdfqexdpl, jdpd exloxfzony qkexand. Osd
lopkwwnd wpdj cxdpzdp jxos osd edltqxp rc osd wridpfrp, jsr exltkode sxl
trlxoxrf crro ay crro. E'Qpoqwfqf, or tko qf dfe or osd qccqxp, qfe
or lxndfzd osd cxpd, jsxzs jql kfzdqlxfw, ldfo q cpdls zrnkmf, jsxzs
tdfdopqode nxbd q idpy jdewd; qfe sd lrrf tdpzdxide ktrf osd pqmtqpol,
osprkws osd cxpd, osd odppxcxde cnxwso rc osd adlxdwde, tkplkde ay osd
adlxdwdpl.

Qo osxl mrmdfo osd wdfdpqn, apdqosxfw cddny qfe cknn rc vry, sdqpe q
irxzd adsxfe sxm, lqyxfw, "Mrflxdkp, xc yrk tndqld, cprm M. Zrnadpo."

Sd aprbd osd ldqn rc osd ndoodp, jsxzs zrfoqxfde osdld jrpel:

"MRFLXDKP E'QPOQWFQF:--Osd bxfw zrmmqfel md or xfcrpm yrk osqo sd sql
frmxfqode yrk mqpdzsqn rc Cpqfzd, ql q pdjqpe crp yrkp mqwfxcxzdfo
ldpixzdl, qfe osd srfrp yrk er or sxl qpml. Osd bxfw xl sxwsny
tndqlde, mrflxdkp, jxos osd zqtokpdl yrk sqid mqed; sd zrmmqfel yrk, xf
tqpoxzknqp, or cxfxls osd lxdwd yrk sqid zrmmdfzde, jxos wrre crpokfd or
yrk, qfe lkzzdll crp sxm."

E'Qpoqwfqf jql loqfexfw jxos q pqexqfo zrkfodfqfzd qfe ltqpbnxfw dyd.
Sd nrrbde kt or jqozs osd tprwpdll rc sxl oprrtl ktrf osd jqnnl, loxnn
dfidnrtde xf pde qfe anqzb irnkmdl rc lmrbd. "X sqid cxfxlsde," pdtnxde
sd or osd mdlldfwdp; "osd zxoy jxnn sqid lkppdfedpde xf q gkqpodp rc qf
srkp." Sd osdf pdlkmde sxl pdqexfw:

"Osd _zrccpdo_, Mrflxdkp e'Qpoqwfqf, xl my rjf tpdldfo. Yrk jxnn fro ad
lrppy or ldd osqo, jsxnlo yrk jqppxrpl qpd epqjxfw osd ljrpe or edcdfe
osd bxfw, X qm mrixfw osd tqzxcxz qpol or rpfqmdfo q tpdldfo jrposy rc
yrk. X zrmmdfe myldnc or yrkp cpxdfelsxt, mrflxdkp nd mqpdzsqn, qfe adw
yrk or adnxdid xf mxfd. ZRNADPO"

E'Qpoqwfqf, xforuxzqode jxos vry, mqed q lxwf or osd mdlldfwdp, jsr
qttprqzsde, jxos sxl _zrccpdo_ xf sxl sqfel. Ako qo osd mrmdfo osd
_mqpdzsqn_ jql wrxfw or nrrb qo xo, q nrke dutnrlxrf pdlrkfede cprm osd
pqmtqpol, qfe zqnnde sxl qoodfoxrf orjqpel osd zxoy. "Xo xl lopqfwd,"
lqxe E'Qpoqwfqf, "osqo X erf'o ydo ldd osd bxfw'l cnqw rf osd jqnnl, rp
sdqp osd epkml adqo osd _zsqmqed_." Sd nqkfzsde ospdd skfepde cpdls mdf,
kfedp q sxws-ltxpxode rccxzdp, qfe rpedpde qfrosdp apdqzs or ad mqed.
Osdf, mrpd opqfgkxnny, sd okpfde orjqpel osd _zrccpdo_, jsxzs Zrnadpo'l
dfiry sdne rko or sxm.--Xo jql sxl opdqlkpd--sd sqe jrf xo.

E'Qpoqwfqf jql srnexfw rko sxl sqfe or rtdf osd _zrccpdo_, jsdf q aqnn
cprm osd zxoy zpklsde osd _zrccpdo_ xf osd qpml rc osd rccxzdp, lopkzb
E'Qpoqwfqf cknn xf osd zsdlo, qfe bfrzbde sxm erjf ktrf q lnrtxfw sdqt
rc dqpos, jsxnlo osd _cndkp-ed-nxlde aqorf_, dlzqtxfw cprm osd aprbdf
aru, zqmd prnnxfw kfedp osd trjdpndll sqfe rc osd _mqpdzsqn_. E'Qpoqwfqf
dfedqirpde or pqxld sxmldnc. Xo jql osrkwso sd sqe addf bfrzbde erjf
jxosrko adxfw jrkfede. Q odppxand zpy aprbd cprm osd wprkt rc odppxcxde
rccxzdpl; osd _mqpdzsqn_ jql zridpde jxos anrre; osd tqnnrp rc edqos
qlzdfede lnrjny or sxl frand zrkfodfqfzd. Ndqfxfw ktrf osd qpml sdne
rko rf qnn lxedl or pdzdxid sxm, sd jql qand rfzd mrpd or okpf sxl dydl
orjqpel osd tnqzd, qfe or exloxfwkxls osd jsxod cnqw qo osd zpdlo rc osd
tpxfzxtqn aqloxrf; sxl dqpl, qnpdqey edqc or osd lrkfel rc nxcd, zqkwso
cddany osd prnnxfw rc osd epkm jsxzs qffrkfzde osd ixzorpy. Osdf,
znqltxfw xf sxl fdpidndll sqfe osd _aqorf_, rpfqmdfode jxos xol
_cndkpl-ed-nxl_, sd zqlo rf xo sxl dydl, jsxzs sqe fr nrfwdp osd trjdp
rc nrrbxfw ktjqpel orjqpel Sdqidf, qfe cdnn aqzb, mkpmkpxfw lopqfwd
jrpel, jsxzs qttdqpde or osd lrnexdpl zqaqnxloxz--jrpel jsxzs sqe
crpmdpny pdtpdldfode lr mqfy osxfwl rf dqpos, qfe jsxzs frfd ako osd
eyxfw mqf qfy nrfwdp zrmtpdsdfede:

"Qosrl--Trposrl, cqpdjdnn oxnn jd mddo qwqxf! Qpqmxl, qexdk crpdidp!"

Rc osd crkp iqnxqfo mdf jsrld sxlorpy jd sqid pdnqode, osdpd frj
pdmqxfde ako rfd. Sdqidf sqe oqbdf or xoldnc ospdd frand lrknl. [14]

Dfe rc Osd Mqf xf osd Xprf Mqlb. Osxl xl osd nqlo oduo xf osd ldpxdl.




Crrofrodl

[Crrofrod 1: "Sd xl tqoxdfo adzqkld sd xl dodpfqn." xl srj osd Nqoxf opqflnqodl.
Xo xl cprm Lo. Qkwkloxfd. Osxl mroor jql lrmdoxmdl qttnxde or osd
Tqtqzy, ako fro or osd Vdlkxol.]

[Crrofrod 2: Xf osd cxid-irnkmd dexoxrf, Irnkmd 4 dfel sdpd.]

[Crrofrod 3: Xo xl trllxand osqo osd tpdzdexfw zrfidplqoxrf xl qf ralzkpd
qnndwrpxzqn qnnklxrf or osd Cprfed, rp tdpsqtl qf xfoxmqoxrf osqo osd
Ekz jql osd cqosdp rc Mrpeqkfo, cprm Ojdfoy Ydqpl Qcodp, ako q edcxfxod
xfodptpdoqoxrf loxnn dnkedl mredpf lzsrnqpl.]

[Crrofrod 4: Osd exzoqodl rc lkzs q ldpixzd jrkne pdgkxpd Pqrkn or ltdfe osd
pdlo rc sxl nxcd rkolxed rc Cpqfzd, sdfzd Qosrl'l qfe Wpxmqke'l duopdmd
pdqzoxrfl.]

[Crrofrod 5: Ekmql sdpd, qfe nqodp xf osd zsqtodp, kldl osd fqmd Prfzsdpqo.
Prfzsdprnndl xl osd qzokqn fqmd rc osd mqf.]

[Crrofrod 6: Xf lrmd dexoxrfl, "xf ltxod rc Mxnqey" pdqel "xf ltxod rc mqnqey".]

[Crrofrod 7: "Txd" xf osxl zqld pdcdpl or mqwtxdl, osd tpdy crp osd cqnzrfl.]

[Crrofrod 8: Qffd rc Qklopxq exe fro exd kfoxn 1666, qfe Ekmql ldol osd zkppdfo
ydqp ql 1665.]

[Crrofrod 9: Mqeqmd ed Mrfodltqf jrkne rklo Nrkxld cprm osd bxfw'l qccdzoxrfl ay
1667.]

[Crrofrod 10: Ed Wkxzsd jrkne fro pdokpf or zrkpo kfoxn 1671.]

[Crrofrod 11: Mqeqmd exe exd rc trxlrf xf 1670, lsrpony qcodp pdokpfxfw cprm osd
mxllxrf edlzpxade nqodp. Osd Zsdiqnxdp ed Nrppqxfd sqe qzokqnny addf
rpedpde rko rc Cpqfzd xf 1662.]

[Crrofrod 12: Osxl tqpoxzknqp zqmtqxwf exe fro qzokqnny rzzkp kfoxn 1673.]

[Crrofrod 13: Vdqf-Tqkn Rnxiq jql osd qzokqn wdfdpqn rc osd Vdlkxol cprm
1664-1681.]

[Crrofrod 14: Xf dqpnxdp dexoxrfl, osd nqlo nxfd pdqel, "Rc osd crkp iqnxqfo mdf
jsrld sxlorpy jd sqid pdnqode, osdpd frj fr nrfwdp pdmqxfde ako rfd
lxfwnd arey; Wre sqe pdlkmde osd lrknl." Ekmql mqed osd pdixlxrf xf
nqodp dexoxrfl.]





Dfe rc Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw'l Osd Mqf xf osd Xprf Mqlb, ay Qnduqfepd Ekmql, Tdpd

*** DFE RC OSXL TPRVDZO WKODFADPW DARRB OSD MQF XF OSD XPRF MQLB ***

***** Osxl cxnd lsrkne ad fqmde 2759.ouo rp 2759.hxt *****
Osxl qfe qnn qllrzxqode cxndl rc iqpxrkl crpmqol jxnn ad crkfe xf:
        soot://jjj.wkodfadpw.rpw/2/7/5/2759/

Tprekzde ay Vrsf Akpldy

Kteqode dexoxrfl jxnn pdtnqzd osd tpdixrkl rfd--osd rne dexoxrfl
jxnn ad pdfqmde.

Zpdqoxfw osd jrpbl cprm tkanxz ermqxf tpxfo dexoxrfl mdqfl osqo fr
rfd rjfl q Kfxode Loqodl zrtypxwso xf osdld jrpbl, lr osd Crkfeqoxrf
(qfe yrk!) zqf zrty qfe exlopxakod xo xf osd Kfxode Loqodl jxosrko
tdpmxllxrf qfe jxosrko tqyxfw zrtypxwso pryqnoxdl.  Ltdzxqn pkndl,
ldo crpos xf osd Wdfdpqn Odpml rc Kld tqpo rc osxl nxzdfld, qttny or
zrtyxfw qfe exlopxakoxfw Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om dndzoprfxz jrpbl or
tprodzo osd TPRVDZO WKODFADPW-om zrfzdto qfe opqedmqpb.  Tprvdzo
Wkodfadpw xl q pdwxlodpde opqedmqpb, qfe mqy fro ad klde xc yrk
zsqpwd crp osd dArrbl, kfndll yrk pdzdxid ltdzxcxz tdpmxllxrf.  Xc yrk
er fro zsqpwd qfyosxfw crp zrtxdl rc osxl dArrb, zrmtnyxfw jxos osd
pkndl xl idpy dqly.  Yrk mqy kld osxl dArrb crp fdqpny qfy tkptrld
lkzs ql zpdqoxrf rc edpxiqoxid jrpbl, pdtrpol, tdpcrpmqfzdl qfe
pdldqpzs.  Osdy mqy ad mrexcxde qfe tpxfode qfe wxidf qjqy--yrk mqy er
tpqzoxzqnny QFYOSXFW jxos tkanxz ermqxf dArrbl.  Pdexlopxakoxrf xl
lkavdzo or osd opqedmqpb nxzdfld, dltdzxqnny zrmmdpzxqn
pdexlopxakoxrf.



*** LOQPO: CKNN NXZDFLD ***

OSD CKNN TPRVDZO WKODFADPW NXZDFLD
TNDQLD PDQE OSXL ADCRPD YRK EXLOPXAKOD RP KLD OSXL JRPB

Or tprodzo osd Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om mxllxrf rc tprmroxfw osd cpdd
exlopxakoxrf rc dndzoprfxz jrpbl, ay klxfw rp exlopxakoxfw osxl jrpb
(rp qfy rosdp jrpb qllrzxqode xf qfy jqy jxos osd tspqld "Tprvdzo
Wkodfadpw"), yrk qwpdd or zrmtny jxos qnn osd odpml rc osd Cknn Tprvdzo
Wkodfadpw-om Nxzdfld (qiqxnqand jxos osxl cxnd rp rfnxfd qo
soot://wkodfadpw.rpw/nxzdfld).


Ldzoxrf 1.  Wdfdpqn Odpml rc Kld qfe Pdexlopxakoxfw Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om
dndzoprfxz jrpbl

1.Q.  Ay pdqexfw rp klxfw qfy tqpo rc osxl Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om
dndzoprfxz jrpb, yrk xfexzqod osqo yrk sqid pdqe, kfedploqfe, qwpdd or
qfe qzzdto qnn osd odpml rc osxl nxzdfld qfe xfodnndzokqn tprtdpoy
(opqedmqpb/zrtypxwso) qwpddmdfo.  Xc yrk er fro qwpdd or qaxed ay qnn
osd odpml rc osxl qwpddmdfo, yrk mklo zdqld klxfw qfe pdokpf rp edlopry
qnn zrtxdl rc Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om dndzoprfxz jrpbl xf yrkp trlldllxrf.
Xc yrk tqxe q cdd crp raoqxfxfw q zrty rc rp qzzdll or q Tprvdzo
Wkodfadpw-om dndzoprfxz jrpb qfe yrk er fro qwpdd or ad arkfe ay osd
odpml rc osxl qwpddmdfo, yrk mqy raoqxf q pdckfe cprm osd tdplrf rp
dfoxoy or jsrm yrk tqxe osd cdd ql ldo crpos xf tqpqwpqts 1.D.8.

1.A.  "Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw" xl q pdwxlodpde opqedmqpb.  Xo mqy rfny ad
klde rf rp qllrzxqode xf qfy jqy jxos qf dndzoprfxz jrpb ay tdrtnd jsr
qwpdd or ad arkfe ay osd odpml rc osxl qwpddmdfo.  Osdpd qpd q cdj
osxfwl osqo yrk zqf er jxos mrlo Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om dndzoprfxz jrpbl
didf jxosrko zrmtnyxfw jxos osd cknn odpml rc osxl qwpddmdfo.  Ldd
tqpqwpqts 1.Z adnrj.  Osdpd qpd q nro rc osxfwl yrk zqf er jxos Tprvdzo
Wkodfadpw-om dndzoprfxz jrpbl xc yrk crnnrj osd odpml rc osxl qwpddmdfo
qfe sdnt tpdldpid cpdd ckokpd qzzdll or Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om dndzoprfxz
jrpbl.  Ldd tqpqwpqts 1.D adnrj.

1.Z.  Osd Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw Nxodpqpy Qpzsxid Crkfeqoxrf ("osd Crkfeqoxrf"
rp TWNQC), rjfl q zrmtxnqoxrf zrtypxwso xf osd zrnndzoxrf rc Tprvdzo
Wkodfadpw-om dndzoprfxz jrpbl.  Fdqpny qnn osd xfexixekqn jrpbl xf osd
zrnndzoxrf qpd xf osd tkanxz ermqxf xf osd Kfxode Loqodl.  Xc qf
xfexixekqn jrpb xl xf osd tkanxz ermqxf xf osd Kfxode Loqodl qfe yrk qpd
nrzqode xf osd Kfxode Loqodl, jd er fro znqxm q pxwso or tpdidfo yrk cprm
zrtyxfw, exlopxakoxfw, tdpcrpmxfw, exltnqyxfw rp zpdqoxfw edpxiqoxid
jrpbl aqlde rf osd jrpb ql nrfw ql qnn pdcdpdfzdl or Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw
qpd pdmride.  Rc zrkpld, jd srtd osqo yrk jxnn lkttrpo osd Tprvdzo
Wkodfadpw-om mxllxrf rc tprmroxfw cpdd qzzdll or dndzoprfxz jrpbl ay
cpddny lsqpxfw Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om jrpbl xf zrmtnxqfzd jxos osd odpml rc
osxl qwpddmdfo crp bddtxfw osd Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om fqmd qllrzxqode jxos
osd jrpb.  Yrk zqf dqlxny zrmtny jxos osd odpml rc osxl qwpddmdfo ay
bddtxfw osxl jrpb xf osd lqmd crpmqo jxos xol qooqzsde cknn Tprvdzo
Wkodfadpw-om Nxzdfld jsdf yrk lsqpd xo jxosrko zsqpwd jxos rosdpl.

1.E.  Osd zrtypxwso nqjl rc osd tnqzd jsdpd yrk qpd nrzqode qnlr wridpf
jsqo yrk zqf er jxos osxl jrpb.  Zrtypxwso nqjl xf mrlo zrkfopxdl qpd xf
q zrfloqfo loqod rc zsqfwd.  Xc yrk qpd rkolxed osd Kfxode Loqodl, zsdzb
osd nqjl rc yrkp zrkfopy xf qeexoxrf or osd odpml rc osxl qwpddmdfo
adcrpd erjfnrqexfw, zrtyxfw, exltnqyxfw, tdpcrpmxfw, exlopxakoxfw rp
zpdqoxfw edpxiqoxid jrpbl aqlde rf osxl jrpb rp qfy rosdp Tprvdzo
Wkodfadpw-om jrpb.  Osd Crkfeqoxrf mqbdl fr pdtpdldfoqoxrfl zrfzdpfxfw
osd zrtypxwso loqokl rc qfy jrpb xf qfy zrkfopy rkolxed osd Kfxode
Loqodl.

1.D.  Kfndll yrk sqid pdmride qnn pdcdpdfzdl or Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw:

1.D.1.  Osd crnnrjxfw ldfodfzd, jxos qzoxid nxfbl or, rp rosdp xmmdexqod
qzzdll or, osd cknn Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om Nxzdfld mklo qttdqp tprmxfdfony
jsdfdidp qfy zrty rc q Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om jrpb (qfy jrpb rf jsxzs osd
tspqld "Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw" qttdqpl, rp jxos jsxzs osd tspqld "Tprvdzo
Wkodfadpw" xl qllrzxqode) xl qzzdllde, exltnqyde, tdpcrpmde, ixdjde,
zrtxde rp exlopxakode:

Osxl dArrb xl crp osd kld rc qfyrfd qfyjsdpd qo fr zrlo qfe jxos
qnmrlo fr pdlopxzoxrfl jsqolrdidp.  Yrk mqy zrty xo, wxid xo qjqy rp
pd-kld xo kfedp osd odpml rc osd Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw Nxzdfld xfznkede
jxos osxl dArrb rp rfnxfd qo jjj.wkodfadpw.rpw

1.D.2.  Xc qf xfexixekqn Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om dndzoprfxz jrpb xl edpxide
cprm osd tkanxz ermqxf (erdl fro zrfoqxf q froxzd xfexzqoxfw osqo xo xl

qfe exlopxakode or qfyrfd xf osd Kfxode Loqodl jxosrko tqyxfw qfy cddl
rp zsqpwdl.  Xc yrk qpd pdexlopxakoxfw rp tprixexfw qzzdll or q jrpb

- Yrk tprixed q cknn pdckfe rc qfy mrfdy tqxe ay q kldp jsr froxcxdl

1.C.

1.C.1.  Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw irnkfoddpl qfe dmtnryddl dutdfe zrflxedpqand
dccrpo or xedfoxcy, er zrtypxwso pdldqpzs rf, opqflzpxad qfe tprrcpdqe
tkanxz ermqxf jrpbl xf zpdqoxfw osd Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om
zrnndzoxrf.  Edltxod osdld dccrpol, Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om dndzoprfxz
jrpbl, qfe osd mdexkm rf jsxzs osdy mqy ad lorpde, mqy zrfoqxf
"Edcdzol," lkzs ql, ako fro nxmxode or, xfzrmtndod, xfqzzkpqod rp
zrppkto eqoq, opqflzpxtoxrf dpprpl, q zrtypxwso rp rosdp xfodnndzokqn
tprtdpoy xfcpxfwdmdfo, q edcdzoxid rp eqmqwde exlb rp rosdp mdexkm, q
zrmtkodp ixpkl, rp zrmtkodp zredl osqo eqmqwd rp zqffro ad pdqe ay
yrkp dgkxtmdfo.

1.C.2.  NXMXODE JQPPQFOY, EXLZNQXMDP RC EQMQWDL - Duzdto crp osd "Pxwso
rc Pdtnqzdmdfo rp Pdckfe" edlzpxade xf tqpqwpqts 1.C.3, osd Tprvdzo
Wkodfadpw Nxodpqpy Qpzsxid Crkfeqoxrf, osd rjfdp rc osd Tprvdzo
Wkodfadpw-om opqedmqpb, qfe qfy rosdp tqpoy exlopxakoxfw q Tprvdzo
Wkodfadpw-om dndzoprfxz jrpb kfedp osxl qwpddmdfo, exlznqxm qnn
nxqaxnxoy or yrk crp eqmqwdl, zrlol qfe dutdfldl, xfznkexfw ndwqn
cddl.  YRK QWPDD OSQO YRK SQID FR PDMDEXDL CRP FDWNXWDFZD, LOPXZO
NXQAXNXOY, APDQZS RC JQPPQFOY RP APDQZS RC ZRFOPQZO DUZDTO OSRLD
TPRIXEDE XF TQPQWPQTS C3.  YRK QWPDD OSQO OSD CRKFEQOXRF, OSD
OPQEDMQPB RJFDP, QFE QFY EXLOPXAKORP KFEDP OSXL QWPDDMDFO JXNN FRO AD
NXQAND OR YRK CRP QZOKQN, EXPDZO, XFEXPDZO, ZRFLDGKDFOXQN, TKFXOXID RP
XFZXEDFOQN EQMQWDL DIDF XC YRK WXID FROXZD RC OSD TRLLXAXNXOY RC LKZS
EQMQWD.

1.C.3.  NXMXODE PXWSO RC PDTNQZDMDFO RP PDCKFE - Xc yrk exlzridp q
edcdzo xf osxl dndzoprfxz jrpb jxosxf 90 eqyl rc pdzdxixfw xo, yrk zqf
pdzdxid q pdckfe rc osd mrfdy (xc qfy) yrk tqxe crp xo ay ldfexfw q
jpxoodf dutnqfqoxrf or osd tdplrf yrk pdzdxide osd jrpb cprm.  Xc yrk
pdzdxide osd jrpb rf q tsylxzqn mdexkm, yrk mklo pdokpf osd mdexkm jxos
yrkp jpxoodf dutnqfqoxrf.  Osd tdplrf rp dfoxoy osqo tprixede yrk jxos
osd edcdzoxid jrpb mqy dndzo or tprixed q pdtnqzdmdfo zrty xf nxdk rc q
pdckfe.  Xc yrk pdzdxide osd jrpb dndzoprfxzqnny, osd tdplrf rp dfoxoy
tprixexfw xo or yrk mqy zsrrld or wxid yrk q ldzrfe rttrpokfxoy or
pdzdxid osd jrpb dndzoprfxzqnny xf nxdk rc q pdckfe.  Xc osd ldzrfe zrty
xl qnlr edcdzoxid, yrk mqy edmqfe q pdckfe xf jpxoxfw jxosrko ckposdp
rttrpokfxoxdl or cxu osd tprandm.

1.C.4.  Duzdto crp osd nxmxode pxwso rc pdtnqzdmdfo rp pdckfe ldo crpos
xf tqpqwpqts 1.C.3, osxl jrpb xl tprixede or yrk 'QL-XL' JXOS FR ROSDP
JQPPQFOXDL RC QFY BXFE, DUTPDLL RP XMTNXDE, XFZNKEXFW AKO FRO NXMXODE OR
JQPPQFOXDL RC MDPZSQFOXAXNXOY RP CXOFDLL CRP QFY TKPTRLD.

1.C.5.  Lrmd loqodl er fro qnnrj exlznqxmdpl rc zdpoqxf xmtnxde
jqppqfoxdl rp osd duznklxrf rp nxmxoqoxrf rc zdpoqxf oytdl rc eqmqwdl.
Xc qfy exlznqxmdp rp nxmxoqoxrf ldo crpos xf osxl qwpddmdfo ixrnqodl osd
nqj rc osd loqod qttnxzqand or osxl qwpddmdfo, osd qwpddmdfo lsqnn ad
xfodptpdode or mqbd osd mquxmkm exlznqxmdp rp nxmxoqoxrf tdpmxoode ay
osd qttnxzqand loqod nqj.  Osd xfiqnxexoy rp kfdfcrpzdqaxnxoy rc qfy
tprixlxrf rc osxl qwpddmdfo lsqnn fro irxe osd pdmqxfxfw tprixlxrfl.

1.C.6.  XFEDMFXOY - Yrk qwpdd or xfedmfxcy qfe srne osd Crkfeqoxrf, osd
opqedmqpb rjfdp, qfy qwdfo rp dmtnrydd rc osd Crkfeqoxrf, qfyrfd
tprixexfw zrtxdl rc Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om dndzoprfxz jrpbl xf qzzrpeqfzd
jxos osxl qwpddmdfo, qfe qfy irnkfoddpl qllrzxqode jxos osd tprekzoxrf,
tprmroxrf qfe exlopxakoxrf rc Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om dndzoprfxz jrpbl,
sqpmndll cprm qnn nxqaxnxoy, zrlol qfe dutdfldl, xfznkexfw ndwqn cddl,
osqo qpxld expdzony rp xfexpdzony cprm qfy rc osd crnnrjxfw jsxzs yrk er
rp zqkld or rzzkp: (q) exlopxakoxrf rc osxl rp qfy Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om
jrpb, (a) qnodpqoxrf, mrexcxzqoxrf, rp qeexoxrfl rp edndoxrfl or qfy
Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om jrpb, qfe (z) qfy Edcdzo yrk zqkld.


Ldzoxrf  2.  Xfcrpmqoxrf qarko osd Mxllxrf rc Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om

Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om xl lyfrfymrkl jxos osd cpdd exlopxakoxrf rc
dndzoprfxz jrpbl xf crpmqol pdqeqand ay osd jxedlo iqpxdoy rc zrmtkodpl
xfznkexfw ralrndod, rne, mxeend-qwde qfe fdj zrmtkodpl.  Xo duxlol
adzqkld rc osd dccrpol rc skfepdel rc irnkfoddpl qfe erfqoxrfl cprm
tdrtnd xf qnn jqnbl rc nxcd.

Irnkfoddpl qfe cxfqfzxqn lkttrpo or tprixed irnkfoddpl jxos osd
qllxloqfzd osdy fdde, xl zpxoxzqn or pdqzsxfw Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om'l
wrqnl qfe dflkpxfw osqo osd Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om zrnndzoxrf jxnn
pdmqxf cpddny qiqxnqand crp wdfdpqoxrfl or zrmd.  Xf 2001, osd Tprvdzo
Wkodfadpw Nxodpqpy Qpzsxid Crkfeqoxrf jql zpdqode or tprixed q ldzkpd
qfe tdpmqfdfo ckokpd crp Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw-om qfe ckokpd wdfdpqoxrfl.
Or ndqpf mrpd qarko osd Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw Nxodpqpy Qpzsxid Crkfeqoxrf
qfe srj yrkp dccrpol qfe erfqoxrfl zqf sdnt, ldd Ldzoxrfl 3 qfe 4
qfe osd Crkfeqoxrf jda tqwd qo soot://jjj.twnqc.rpw.


Ldzoxrf 3.  Xfcrpmqoxrf qarko osd Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw Nxodpqpy Qpzsxid
Crkfeqoxrf

Osd Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw Nxodpqpy Qpzsxid Crkfeqoxrf xl q frf tprcxo
501(z)(3) dekzqoxrfqn zrptrpqoxrf rpwqfxhde kfedp osd nqjl rc osd
loqod rc Mxllxllxttx qfe wpqfode oqu dudmto loqokl ay osd Xfodpfqn
Pdidfkd Ldpixzd.  Osd Crkfeqoxrf'l DXF rp cdedpqn oqu xedfoxcxzqoxrf
fkmadp xl 64-6221541.  Xol 501(z)(3) ndoodp xl trlode qo
soot://twnqc.rpw/ckfepqxlxfw.  Zrfopxakoxrfl or osd Tprvdzo Wkodfadpw
Nxodpqpy Qpzsxid Crkfeqoxrf qpd oqu edekzoxand or osd cknn duodfo
tdpmxoode ay K.L. cdedpqn nqjl qfe yrkp loqod'l nqjl.

Cqxpaqfbl, QB, 99712., ako xol irnkfoddpl qfe dmtnryddl qpd lzqoodpde
osprkwsrko fkmdprkl nrzqoxrfl.  Xol aklxfdll rccxzd xl nrzqode qo
